pratimāyā vibhāgena tālagaṇyena bhājanam
aṅgulam tu samākhyātam deha labdha pramāṇataḥ
prāsāda maṇḍapānām ca māna aṅgula vidhānataḥ
mātrā aṅgula vidhānataḥ
deha labdha pramāṇena pratimām kārayet tathā
aṅgulaiḥkiṣkuḥ iti uktam caturviṃśatibhiḥ tathā
pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ ca eva prājāpatyam udāhṛtam
ṣaṣ vintiśa dhannuḥ muṣṭhi saptaviṃśat hanu granhaḥ
hastānām lakṣaṇam proktam māna aṅgula vidhānataḥ
tri hasta ādi samārabhya nava hasta antam eva ca
ayugmaiḥ atha hastaiḥ tu kuryāt eka talam budhaḥ
dvi talam tu tatas kuryāt sa trayodaśa hastakaiḥ
pañca adhika daśa aihan stai prāsādaḥ syāt tri bhūmikaḥ
talam pratyadhikam kuryāt ṣaṣ hasta tantu viśeṣataḥ
ā dvādaśa talāt evam kuryāt vistāra mānakam
vistāra dviguṇa utsedha muttaman tu pracakṣate
vistāram saptadhā kṛtvā
ekādaśa aṃśam adhamam vistāre saptadhā kṛte
ā dvādaśa talāt evam utsedhan tu vidhīyate
prāc mukha udak mukhaiḥ sūtraiḥ
padam kuryāt tu ṣoḍhaśam
madhya mantu catuṣpadam
bāhyatas dvādaśa padam bhitti artham upakalpayet
ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ tadhā sūtraiḥ
padānām pañcaviṃśatiḥ
śeṣam ucyate
trividhantu samākhyātam
prāsāda ākṛtayaḥ tathā
nāgaran drāviḍan ca iti vesaran ca tridhā bhavet
nthūpi antar caturaśraṃsyāt nāgaraṃsam udāhṛtam
kaṇṭha prabhṛti ca aṣṭa asram prāsādandrāviḍam bhavet
kaṇṭha prabhṛti vṛttam yat vesaran tat pracakṣate

agratas maṇḍapam kuryāt prāsāda sama vistṛtam

prāsādasya agratas dvāram prakuryāt lakṣaṇa anvitam
vrateḥ upari sīmāntam dvārasya utsedhaḥ ucyate
uttaman dvāra vistāram utsetha ardham udāhṛtam
utsedha ardha daśa aṃśena hīnam madhyamam ucyate
viṃśatyā a parihīnam syāḥ dvis tāram adhamam bhavet
kāyam ca api anukāyam ca kuryāt utsedha mānataḥ
bhāgam ekam adhiṣṭhānam utse dhaḥ vasudhā bhavet
pāda āyāmaḥ ud vibhāgaḥ syāt bhāgaḥ prastāraḥ ucyate
bhāgaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ eti proktam dvi bhāsam śikharam bhavet
bhāgasthyūpiḥ iti khyātam mevam utsedhaḥ ucyate
kāmam evaṃsamākhyāta manu kāyam adha ucyate
kuryāt prāsāda vistāram caturviṃśati bhāgikam
eka bhāgaḥ tu vistāram
daśa aṅgulam scāt dvi tale tri tale dvādaśa aṅgulam
yuga aṅgula vivṛddhyā tu kartavyam syāt talam prati
pāda masya tu viṣkaṃbham aṣṭa bhāgam vihīnakam
manu kāya pramāṇataḥ
upānasya tuviṣkaṃbham agre pāda dvayam bhavet
adhiṣṭhānam tridhā kṛtvā
kumudantu dvitīyena bhāgena eva tu kārayet
kṛtvā
kuryāt sārdhena kaṇṭham tu śeṣam vājinam ucyate
pādabandham iti khyātam sarva kāryeṣu pūjitam
pratikramam vā a kartavyam adhiṣṭhāna pramāṇataḥ
jagatīn tadvat eva atha kumudaṃpṛttam ucyate
bhāgena pūrvavat kṛtvā caturtham śeṣam ācaret
paṭṭikena eva kartavya megamastarikam tathā
dvābhyām pratimukham kuryāt pratikramam idam bavet
adhiṣṭhānam iti khyātam pāda mānam pravakṣyate
caturaśram atha aṣṭa aśram vṛttam ca eva tridhā bhavet
kuṃbha yuktam tathā ke cid kecid kuṃbha vihīnakam

athavā ṣoḍaśa aśrakam
pādānām ākṛtiḥ proktā kuṃbha lakṣaṇam ucyate
pāda adhikam adha adhyartham
pāda viṣkaṃbha mānataḥ
saumukhyam priya darśanam
yathākrameṇa nāmāni kartavyāni viśeṣataḥ
śrīkaram vṛtta pādānām kalā śrāṇām tathā eva ca
caṃndrakāntam atha aṣṭāśram somakhaṇḍam iti smṛtam
atibhāreṣu staṃbheṣu priya darśanam ucyate

āsyam eka aṃśam iti uktam śeṣam kuryāt dvi daṇḍam

vistāram evam uktam syāt maṇḍailan kṣaṇam ucyate
maṇḍaiḥ tri pādam utsedham
tri bhāga ekam bhavet padmam vetram ekam tathā eva ca
vetra avāpāda rūpavat
pāda agra karma mānena skandham kuryāt vidhānataḥ
staṃbha agra sama vistāram
tad ūrdhve pāda tām kuryāt vistāram pāda vistṛtam
sa mantri pādam ardham vā bodhikā utsedhā ucyate
tri daṇḍam adhama āyāme
uttamam pañca daṇḍam syāḥ
jagatī ante kumuda ante paṭṭikā ante athavā punar
jala niryāṇam āgan ca
haṃsapād antri pādam vā vitastiḥ vā aviśeṣatas
nālīm śaila mayīn tathā
gaja uṣṭha sadṛśa ākārām siṃha ākṛti mukha uttarām
bhūta siṃha upamām ūrdhva sāra vārādhi kārayet
dvi daṇḍam ca tri daṇḍam vā
bera udaya samam vā atha dviguṇam vā adhyartham eva vā
praṇāla mūla vistāram tri bhāga eka agra vistaram
vyāsa tri bhāgam bhāga ūnam
vāri saṃcāra gaṃbhīra tāram jhajhanra lakṣaṇam
a nimna unnatam ā bhitte
sarva vādya samāyuktam tadā amaṅgala vācakaiḥ
vāstu homan tatas kṛtvā ācārya vūjayet tatas
śilpinam pūjayet paścāt su muhūrte su lagnake
ācāryaḥ su prasanna ātmā vāruṇam sūktam uccaret
bera prāsāda gabhansya yāvat tālasya ca avadhi
dhārā antu kevalam kuryāt bhittautālasya dhīmataḥ
śreṣṭha madhya kaniṣṭhāni
dhārā dala samāptau tu sthāpanam ca uttamam bhavet
dvārabandhasya pūrve tu sthāpanam madhyamam bhavet
mūrdha upalasya pūrve tu sthāpanam syāt kanīyasam
yaḥ karoti anyathā ca asmai dabhicārāya ca eva hi
evam nālam ca saṃsthāpya prastaran ca uttara ādikam
viṣkaṃbham pāda vistāram utsedhan trividham bhavet
tri pādam madhyamam bhavet
adhamaḥ ca ardham utsedham uttamaḥ syāt vidhānataḥ
staṃbha agra eka tri bhāga ekam tasya ūrdhve paṭṭikā bhavet
paṭṭikā lakṣaṇam tu idam
dvi bhāgena tad ūrdhve tu kartavyam padma paṭṭikam
dvi daṇḍantu kapotaṃsyāḥ du pāna sama niganmam
śeṣam prastāra mānam tu kartavyam pañca bhāgikam
ekena paṭṭikām kuryāt kaṇṭham ekena kārayet
dvābhyām tad ūrdhve kartavyam eka aṃśena tu paṭṭikām
evaṃprastāram ākhyātam toraṇam vakṣyate athunā
pāśu anyoḥ pṛṣṭhatas ca api
prateḥ uttara sīmānte toraṇasya āśrayaḥ bhavet
vistāran tu tad ardham syāḥ dvistāram pañca bhāgikam
śeṣam pādam iti smṛtam
pūrva uktam eva kartavyam makara aṃśa pramāṇataḥ
pramāṇa antaḥ raṇasya uktam nāsikāyāḥ tu lakṣaṇam
vakṣyate tu pramāṇena yathā śāstra viniścitam
mahān āsi iti kīrtyate
nigad mantu tad ardham syāt tri pādam samam eva cā
śikhareṣu catur dhikṣu kuryāt eka antu nāsikām
vistāran tu tad ardham syāt ka poteṣu aṣṭa nāsikāḥ
kūṭasya lakṣaṇam proktam kūṭa śālam vidhīyate
kṛtvā prāsāda ṣaṣ bhāgam eka bhāgam vidhīyate
bhāgena kūṭaśālam syāt bhāga ardham pañcamam bhavet
caturguṇam bhavet kūyam śālā āsyāt gopura ākṛtiḥ
śālā vistāra mānena
eka nāsikayā ayuktam pañjaraṃsam udāhṛtam
tatas kaṇṭha ardha mānena śikharam vardhayet tatas
kaṇṭhāt dvi daṇḍam iti uktam
vardhanam tu tad ardhakam
sthū piṅkubha samāyuktam kuryāt daṇḍam vidhānataḥ
vistāran tad pramāṇena śikharan tatra ca ucyatam
tad ūrdhvekaṇṭham iti uktam phalakāca tad ūrdhvataḥ
krameṇa kṛśa tām kuryāt yāna dantaḥ tu mākṣmataḥ

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kramam mūrdha iṣṭakā vidheḥ
pramukhe yāga śālān ca kṛtvā ca eva vicakṣaṇa
madhyevedim prakalpya eva sthūpi kīla pramāṇataḥ
sabhyam prakalpya ca prācyā m āghāram vidhivat yajet
vedi madhye nyaset vidvān
vaiṣṇavañca japitvā eva catasraḥ ca iṣṭakāḥ kramāt
kiñcid agram bhavet nimnam mūlā iva ekiñcid unnatam
adhobhāge bhavet pṛṣṭam ūrdhvabhāge mukham bhavet
śāli piṣṭa mayena atha lekhayet akṣarāṇi tu
yakāram pūrvatas lekhya rakāran dakṣiṇe nyaset
lakāram paścime lekhya vakāre ca uttare likhet
loha jān dāru jām vā atha sthūpin tatra nyaset budhaḥ
vistāram pāda sammitam
agram aṅgula vistāra mānupūrvyāt kṛśan tathā
tri bhāgaiḥ
vṛttam tat ūrdhvatas kuryāt śīlī pādam adhas nyaset
vistāra triguṇa āyāmam vistāra sama vistaram
tad dvayena samāyojya naman śūlam sthitam yadhā
pañcagavyaiḥ samabhyukṣya puṇyāham apivācayet
vāstu jomañca hutvā eva paryagnikaraṇam caret
mūrdheṣṭakā vidhānena homam kṛtvā a vicakṣaṇaḥ

śilā ādīn saṃpragṛhya eva vimāna īropayet tadhā
pāṇibhyām saṃpragṛhya eva prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ api vā
catur veda ādi mantraiḥ ca śilāḥ indra ādiṣu nyaset
dhruva sūktam japitvā tu mathye sthūpim nyaset tadhā
kāleśilpinam āhūya pūjayitvā viśeṣataḥ
śilā ādi upari vinyasya dṛḍhīkaraṇam ācaret
vimāne paritas kramāt vimāna devāḥ

original: prācyāṃ viṣṇuṃ prakurvīta yasya garbhagṛhesthitiḥ // BhS_6.15 //
analyzed: prācyām viṣṇum prakurvīta yasya garbhagṛhe sthitiḥ
dakṣiṇesatyamūrteḥ tu cyutasya ca
uttare ca aniruddhasya sthitim evam prakalpayet
gale puruṣa mūrtiḥ tu dakṣiṇe nārasiṃhakaḥ
paścime tu varāhaḥ ca hayagrīvaḥ tathā uttare
sukha sana samāluktam sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
vyāloddhvakoṇakam ca eva vīśam vā atha mṛgeśvaram
vakratuṇḍam ca durgām ca api agra maṇḍapa bhittiṣu
sthitam evam su saṃsthāpya yathālābham samarcayet
dvāreṣu dvārapālānām sthitim evam prakalpayet
prāsāda lakṣaṇam proktam maṇḍapānām atha ucyate
staṃbhaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ yuktam maṇḍapam śrī pratiṣṭhitam
dvādaśa staṃbha saṃyuktam bījāsanam iti smṛtam
dvātriṃśat gātra saṃyuktam jayabhadra iti kīrtyate
ṣaṭtriṃśat gātra saṃyuktam nandyāvartam su śobhanam
yuktam śrī bhadrakam smṛtam

original: staṃbhānāṃ tu śatairyuktaṃ viśālamiti saṃjñitam // BhS_6.23 //
analyzed: staṃbhānām tu śataiḥ yuktam viśālam iti saṃjñitam
prāsāda vat samākhyātam prastāram tad pramāṇataḥ
vājinā upari kartavyam dhārakaḥ tu kalāḥ tathā
staṃbha viṣkaṃbham utsedham catur bhāgena vistṛtam
tulā vistāra mānena jayantī syāt sama unnatā
tatas daṇḍa ardha bāhulya manu mārgam tad ūrdhvatas
iṣṭakābhiḥ tad ūrdhvam tu chādayet gala ka anvitam
dviguṇam pāda hīnakam
caturvidham atha āyāmam kartavyam
āyāme tu yathā yuktam staṃbhānām vidhiḥ ucyate
dvi hastam vā a tri hastam vā catur hastam atha api vā
staṃbha antaram prakartavyam yathāyukti viśeṣataḥ
evaṅkramāt samākhyātam prākāram adhunā ucyate
paritas kuryāt prāsādasya pramāṇataḥ
prākārasya tu vistāram tasya daṇḍam iha ucyate
antar maṇḍalam iti āhuḥ radhi ardham daṇḍa mānataḥ
madhya bhāram
catur daṇḍa pramāṇena yuktā maryāda bhittikā
mahā maryāda bhittiḥ syāt sapta daṇḍa pramāṇataḥ
adhyardha dviguṇam vā api triguṇam vā caturguṇam
mukha āyāmam iti proktam prākārāṇām viśeṣataḥ
bhitti hasta pramāṇataḥ
kūṭaśālā yutam vā api kuryāt prākāra saṃyutam
mūla jam tu tala utsedham hastam evam vidhīyate
yathā lābha unnatam vā api pradhama āvaraṇam smṛtam
ṣaṣ aṅgulam kramāt kuryāt nyūna prākārakam viduḥ
jala niryāṇa mārgam syāt pada ante taṭake api vā
pradhama āvaraṇa dvāram pramukhe kalpayet tathā
dvitīya āvaraṇa dvāraḥ vyastaḥ chet nāsti dūṣaṇam
vimāna utsedha turyam vā poda ūnam ca artham eva vā
pṛdhak gopura saṃyukta mucchritam tu
pañca prākāram iti evam tri prākāram atha api vā
tri prākāra iṣaṣ aṅgulyam tridhā adhas tala nimna gam
prākāra iha ucchrayam vindyāt kapota antam tat uttamam
madhyamam ca utkara antena kalaśa antam tathā adhamam
evam prākāra saṃgena tu utsedham trividham kramāt
utsedhāt pañca bhāga ekam catur aṃśakam eva vā
ṣaṣ bhāga ekena vā ākuryāt trividham bhitti vistaram atha vā
prāsāda bhittiḥ tu tad samam bhittim eva ca
garbhe aṣṭa aṃśa ucchrayam śreṣṭham sapta bhāga idvi madhyamam
pañca bhāga ekam adhamam bali pīṭham tathā bhavet
garbha pañca tri bhāga ekam
madhyama adhamam uttamam
tridhā paiśācikam pīṭhāt hasta mātram kramāt bhavet
dvi hasta antam tri hasta antam catur hasta antam ucyate
adhamam madhyamam śreṣṭham tridhā paiśāca pīṭhakam
saptaviṃśati bhāgaiḥ ca samam evam samunnatam

original: dvyaṃśaṃ ca pādukā jñeyaṃ caturaṃśaṃ janiṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: dvi aṃśam ca pādukā jñeyam catur aṃśam janim viduḥ

original: tṣaṃśaṃ tu kuṃbhamityāhu ścaturthaṅkaṇṭhameva ca // BhS_6.47 //
analyzed: tṣaṃśam tu kuṃbham iti āhuḥ caturthaṅkaṇṭham eva ca
ṣaḍbhāgam karaṇā iti āhuḥ dvi aṃśam valakam eva ca
catur aṃśe kapotāḥ ca aṃśe ca eva agra paṭṭikā
ekārdham padmapuṣpakam
evam samyak viditvā tu bhāge bhāge vinirdiśet

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavaccāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat cāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
parivāra ālaya lakṣaṇam
atha atas parivārāṇām ālayasya ca lakṣaṇam

original: vimānātpādahīnaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā samācaret // BhS_7.1 //
analyzed: vimānāt pāda hīnam vā tad ardham vā samācaret
varṇa yuktam tatas śreṣṭham kaniyaḥ varṇa hīnakam
soma īśāna dvayoḥ madhye viṣvaksenam prakalbayet
dvārasya dakṣiṇe ca indra māgneyyām pacana ālayam
tasya paścima deśe tu pānīya sthānam eva ca
yāmye śayanam uddiṣṭam tad pūrve yāga maṇḍapam
aiśānye dakṣiṇe vastra saṃcayam
īśāna somayoḥ madhye sthāpanam tathā
indra agnyoḥ madhyam eva eva dhānya sthānam praśasyate
sopāna madhye śrī bhūtam arcayet bahis ānanam
purastāt garuḍam tasya deva abhimukham arcayet
vimāna pālān dikpālān bhāskareṇa samāyutam

original: cakraṃ dhvajaṃ ca śaṅkhaṃ ca bhūtaṃ vai bhūtanāyakam // BhS_7.7 //
analyzed: cakram dhvajam ca śaṅkham ca bhūtam vai bhūtanāyakam
prathama āvaraṇe dehuḥ tad tad deśe samarcayet
utsavam balim ārabhya anapāyi viśeṣataḥ
amitasya api tat tatra pradakṣiṇam atha ācaret
devasya kaṇṭha sīmāntam bāhyantam stana sammitam
nābhi antam vā viśeṣeṇa parivāra udayam kramāt
dhātṛ ādi bhūta paryantam parivārān viśeṣataḥ
varṇa vāhana ketu ādyaiḥ nāma nakṣatra pūrvakam
mayā akriyā adhikāre tu vyaktam uktantu lakṣaṇam
bera lakṣaṇam śaila ādi bhedaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa bera lakṣaṇam uttamam

original: śailajaṃ ratnajaṃ caiva dhātujaṃ dāravaṃ tathā // BhS_7.12 //
analyzed: śailajam ratnajam ca eva dhātujam dāravam tathā
mṛṇmayam syāt tathā evā iti pañcadhā āberam ucyate

original: caturvidhaṃ tu śailaṃ syātsaptadhā ratnajaṃ tathā // BhS_7.13 //
analyzed: caturvidham tu śailam syāt saptadhā ratna jam tathā
aṣṭadhā dhātu jam proktam dāru jam ṣoḍaśa ucyate
mṛṇmayam dvividham proktam kramāt lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: śvetaṃ raktaṃ tathā pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ caiva catuṣṭayam /
analyzed: śvetam raktam tathā pītam kṛṣṇam ca eva catuṣṭayam
śailajam bhedam ākhyātam tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate
go kṣīra sannibhā ca eva śaṅkha kunda indu sannibhā

original: śīlā śvetā samākhyātā sā tu vaśyapradāyikā // BhS_7.16 //
analyzed: śīlā śvetā samākhyātā sā tu vaśya pradāyikā
japā kusuma saṃkāśā śilā śoṇita sannibhā

śilā raktā samākhyātā jaya dā lakṣaṇa anvitā
pītā suvarṇa sadṛśā rajanī cūrṇa sannibhā
śilā lakṣaṇa saṃyuktā dhana dhānya sukha pradā
māṣa mudgala
saṃkāśā tathā jaṃbū phala upamā
bhṛṅga mutpala saṃkāśā prajā vṛddhi karā smṛtā

original: śilā kṛṣṇā tu sarveṣāṃ sarvasiddhipradāyikā // BhS_7.20 //
analyzed: śilā kṛṣṇā tu sarveṣām sarva siddhi pradāyikā

original: śvetā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam // BhS_7.21 //
analyzed: śvetā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā ca eva yathākramam

original: dvijānāṃ ca trivarṇānāṃ śilā raktā jayapradā /
analyzed: dvijānām ca tri varṇānām śilā raktā jaya pradā

original: śvetā mokṣapradā proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // BhS_7.22 //
analyzed: śvetā mokṣa pradā proktā brāhmaṇānām viśeṣataḥ

original: māṇikyaṃ ca pravālaṃ ca vaidūryaṃ sbhaṭikaṃ tathā // BhS_7.23 //
analyzed: māṇikyam ca pravālam ca vaidūryam sbhaṭikam tathā
maratakam puṣyarāgam ca nīlam ca etad iṣu ratna jāḥ

original: māṇikyaṃ śrīkaraṃ proktaṃ pravālaṃ vaśyakārakam // BhS_7.24 //

analyzed: ākarṣaṇam tu vaiḍhūryam sphāṭikam putra vṛddhi dam

original: nīlaṃ turamaṇaiḥ kāryaṃ ratnajānāṃ phalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nīlam tura maṇaiḥ kāryam ratna jānām phalam bhavet

original: eteṣāṃ kautukaṃ kuryā danyeṣāṃ ca vidhīyate // BhS_7.26 //
analyzed: eteṣām kautukam kuryāt anyeṣām ca vidhīyate
haimam raipyam tathā ātāmram kāṃsyam ca eva ārakūṭakam

original: āyasaṃ sīsakaṃ caiva trapukaṃ ceti dhātujam // BhS_7.27 //
analyzed: āyasam sīsakam ca eva trapukam ca iti dhātu jam
haiman tu śrī pradam proktam raupyam rājya pradāyakam

original: evaṃ tu lohajaṃ proktaṃ tato dārujamucyate /
analyzed: evam tu loha jam proktam tatas dāru jam ucyate
devadāruḥ śamīvṛkṣam pippalam nandanam tathā
asanam khadiram ca eva vakulam śaṅkhi vātanam
mayūra padma ḍuṇḍūka karṇikāram tathā eva ca
nibūka añjanikā ca eva plakṣam auduṃbaram tathā
etaiḥ varjyāḥ tu
catvāraḥ dvijāti krama yogataḥ

original: mṛṇmayaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ pakvāpakvaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: mṛṇmayam dvividham proktam pakva apakvam tathā eva ca

original: pakvaṃ ca nāśakaṃ caivam apakvaṃ sarvasiddhitam // BhS_7.33 //
analyzed: pakvam ca nāśakam ca evam apakvam
nimitta darśanam śubha nimittāni
yasmin deśe śilā asti iti gacchet niścita mānasaḥ

śubha vākya uda kuṃbha asthi gaja rāja dvijottamāḥ
carma māṃsa dadhi kṣīra dundabhi dhvanayaḥ śubhāḥ
aśubha nimittāni
aśobhanān tathā avakṣye śapamānā yathāyati
vikīrṇa keśa a vipra aikya ghṛta taila akta darśanam
rikta kuṃbha nirodha ukti taila bhājana darśanam
prayāṇa kāle naṣṭāḥ tu viparīta phala pradāḥ
śubhe prayāṇam kartavyam sthitvā śobhana lakṣaṇam

original: śilāṃ prāpya śubhesthāne vāstuhomaṃ samācaret // BhS_7.38 //
analyzed: śilām prāpya vāstu homam samācaret

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ śrībhūsūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam pauruṣam sūktam śrī bhūsūktam tathā eva ca

original: pariṣekaṃ tataḥkṛtvā kalaśān pañca sunyaset // BhS_7.39 //
analyzed: pariṣekam tatas kṛtvā kalaśān pañca su nyaset
mṛd gandha akṣata japyān ca sarva oṣadhi udakam tathā
saṃsthāpya abhyarcya pādya ādyaiḥ n tat tat devān samarcayet
abhiṣiñcet śilām sūtre
atodeva ādi mantreṇa śilām chitvā avicakṣaṇaḥ

original: adhobhāgaṃ mukhaṃ tatra śira ūrdhva prakalpayet /
analyzed: adhobhāgam mukham tatra śiraḥ ūrdhva prakalpayet

original: mukhaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ tathāpādaṃ pārśvaṃ caiva śirastathā /
analyzed: mukham pṛṣṭham tathā ā pādam pārśvam ca eva śiraḥ tathā
lāñchayitvā vidhānena tatas takṣaṇa mācaret

original: snigdhā mṛdvī natā caiva bālā kṣīrasvarātathā // BhS_7.44 //
analyzed: snigdhā mṛdvī natā ca eva bālā kṣīra svarā tathā

original: susvarā kā ntisaṃyuktā yuvatī sā śilā smṛtā /
analyzed: su svarā kā nti saṃyuktā yuvatī sā śilā smṛtā

original: asitā jhargharā rūkṣā vṛddhā yā nissvarāśilā // BhS_7.45 //
analyzed: asitā jhargharā rūkṣā vṛddhā yā nissvarā śilā
bālā kṣaya pradā proktā yuvatī su samṛddhi dā
kārya nāśa karī vṛddhā grāhyā jñātvā śilāḥ tathā
mūrdhanaḥ takṣaṇam kṛtvā śilādoṣān tu lakṣayet
śilām pralipya kṣīreṇa sarpiṣā sīsa gairikaiḥ
eka rātra uṣita śilām saṃprakṣālya aṃbhasā tatas
śilā doṣam parīkṣya eva kartavyam vidhi coditam

original: maṇḍalaṃ tu bhavettatra yatra garbhaṃ vinirdiśet // BhS_7.49 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam tu bhavet tatra yatra garbham vinirdiśet
site tu maṇḍale sarpaḥ rakte tu kṛkalāsakam

original: pīte tu maṇḍale godhā mañjiṣṭhe darduro bhavet // BhS_7.50 //
analyzed: pīte tu maṇḍale godhā mañjiṣṭhe darduraḥ bhavet
śveta rakta vimiśre tu vṛścikaḥ śveta raktake
rakta miśre tu maṇḍūkaḥ maṇḍalaḥ bhavet
siṃdūra varṇe khadyotaḥ kapote gṛhagaulikā

original: varjayedgarbha saṃyuktāṃ vimalair añcintāṃ tathā // BhS_7.53 //
analyzed: varjayet garbha saṃyuktām vimalaiḥ añcintām tathā
vimalam hema kāṃsya ākhyam loha ākhyam ca tridā smṛtam

prāsāda garbha mānam vā hasta mānam atha api vā
pratyekam tri tri bhedam syāt dvāra mānam pravakṣyate
dvārāt adhyardhakam ca eva dvārāt pāda adhikam tathā
madhyamam ca kanīyaḥ syāt dvāram evam vidhīyate
adhama uttamayoḥ madhye tu aṣṭadhā kārayet budhaḥ

original: kanīyastrīṇi vijñeyaṃ trīṇi madhyamakaṃ tathā // BhS_7.57 //
analyzed: kanīyaḥ trīṇi vijñeyam trīṇi madhyamakam tathā
trīṇi ca uttamakam vidyāt utsedham navathā bhavet
staṃbhāt adhyardhakam tuṅgam uttamam tu viśeṣuḥ
uttama adhamayoḥ madhye dvāra mānena yojayet

original: garbhagehasamaṃ madhyaṃ tripādaṃ cādhamaṃ bhavet // BhS_7.59 //
analyzed: garbha geha samam madhyam tri pādam ca adhamam bhavet
pāda adhikam tu vijñeyam śreṣṭham evam vidhīyate
uttama adhamayoḥ madhye dvāra mānena yojayet
hasta mānam tadhā avakṣye nava hastam tadhā uttamam
ṣaṣ aṅgulaiḥ sahāni ānyāntu sārdha dvi hastaka avadhi
evam utsedha mānam tu sthāvarasya praśasyate
jaṅgamānām bhavet nāma mūlabera vaśāt tathā
biṃba udayam caturviṃśat bhāgān aṣṭa aṃśakam tathā
biṃba udayam caturviṃśat bhāgān aṣṭa aṃśakam tathā

original: vedāṃśaṃ tu bhaveduccaṃ jaṅgamasya prakīrtitam // BhS_7.63 //
analyzed: vedāṃśam tu bhavet uccam jaṅgamasya prakīrtitam
māna aṅgulena sapta ādi dvi dvi aṅgula vidhānataḥ
pañcāśat savana aṅgulyā vidhiḥ sarvaḥ vidhīyate
mūlabera aṃgulāt mānam ārabhya ekādaśa aṃgulam
dvi dvi aṅgula vivṛddhyā tu bhavet
pratyekam tu tri bhedam syāt uttama adhama madhyataḥ
utkṛṣṭam nava tuṅgam syāt madhyamam nava tuṅgakam
nikṛṣṭam tu tathā proktam saptaviṃśati tuṅgakam

original: etairuttamamānaṃ syāsmadhyamaṃ ca tathaiva hi // BhS_7.67 //
analyzed: etaiḥ uttama mānam ca tathā eva hi
karma arcā utsava snānāt ca yojyam syāt anyadhā na tu
adhamaiḥ tu bhavet yatra baliberam vidhīyate

original: mātrāṃgulena yanmāraṃ gṛhārcāṇāṃ tu nānyathā // BhS_7.69 //
analyzed: mātrā aṃgulena yat māram gṛha arcāṇām tu na anyathā
iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre
bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre

atha aṣṭamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha aṣṭamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
pīṭha mānam
atha pīṭha udayam viśeṣataḥ

original: bhuvaṅgasya samaṃ vātha adhyarthaṃ triguṇaṃ tu vā // BhS_8.1 //
analyzed: bhuvaṅgasya samam vā atha adhyartham triguṇam tu vā
paritas pāvayoḥ asya bhāgam aṅgulam

original: hanvastaṃ bāhusīmāntaṃ nābhyantaṃ vādha kārayet // BhS_8.3 //
analyzed: hanu astam bāhu sīmāntam nābhi antam vā adha kārayet

dhruva arcāyām viśeṣeṇa pīṭham evam prakalpayet

original: sthānakaṃ cāsanaṃ vāpi yānakaṃ vā samācaret // BhS_8.5 //
analyzed: sthānakam ca āsanam vā api yānakam vā samācaret
garbhāgāra tri bhāga ekam caturaśram tri mekhalam

original: prāṅmukhodaṅmukhaṃ sūtraṃ daśa sapta samarcayet // BhS_8.8 //

original: vaidāthikāśītipadaṃ mānuṣaṃ ca tathaiva ca // BhS_8.9 //

original: arcāsthānaṃ tu brahmāṃśaṃ tridhā kṛtya ca daivikam // BhS_8.10 //

original: tathaiva paścime bhāge madhye vā sthānakāya ca /

original: asanaṃ vāpi ca tadhā devamānuṣamadhyame // BhS_8.11 //
analyzed: asanam vā api ca tadhā deva mānuṣa madhyame

original: dhruvārcane viśeṣeṇa nāgasūtrān samarpya ca // BhS_8.12 //
analyzed: dhruva arcane viśeṣeṇa nāga sūtrān samarpya ca

original: daivikaṃ cāṣṭabhāgantu mānuṣaṃ cārtvijaṃ padam // BhS_8.13 //

original: anyeṣāṃ tu dhruvārcāyāṃ bhogaṃ vā yogameva vā /

original: ālayoddakṣiṇe vāpi vūrve vāpi prapāṃ tathā // BhS_8.17 //

original: bhūmiyajñaṃ ca kṛtvātu paryagni prokṣaṇaṃ caret /

anyat sarva kriyām kṛtvā a hautra śaṃsanam ācaret

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam pauruṣam sūktam viṣṇusūktam tathā eva ca

original: śrībhūsūktaṃ tato hutvā brāhmaṃ raudrantathaivaca // BhS_8.23 //
analyzed: śrī bhū sūktam tatas hutvā brāhmam raudram tathā eva ca
nṛttaiḥ geyaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ ca rātri śeṣam vinīya ca

original: snātvā prabhāte tvācāryo devamutthāpya cādarāt // BhS_8.24 //
analyzed: snātvā prabhāte tu ācāryaḥ devam utthāpya ca ādarāt
garbhāgāram praviśya eva sthāpite vihite api vā
nyasya pīṭham tu tad madhye ratna ādīn vinyaset tadā
dhruvasūktena saṃsthāpya atas deva ādim uccaran
tad tad mantreṇa devī ādīn sthāpayet vihite pade
vidhinā saṃyojya eva tu pūrayet
anta homam tatas hutvā dadyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām
śilbinam ca samāhūya śarkarām lepayet kramāt
śilā pratiṣṭhā ca evam syāt dāru saṃgrahaṇam tatas
dāru saṃgrahaṇam candanam khadiram tālam asanam

original: rājānaṃ ciribilvañca aśokaṃ stimitaṃ tathā // BhS_8.29 //
analyzed: rājānam ciribilvam ca aśokam stimitam tathā
khādiram dhanvinam ca eva śirīṣam padmakam tathā
iti evamādayaḥ vṛkṣāḥ gṛhyante bera karmaṇi
caṇḍāla sthāna pārśve tu duṣṭa prāṇi niṣevite
mātṛ sthāna samudbūte
śmaśāne devamandire
kūpa vāpī taṭāka ante muni vāse saha ālaye
yogasthānapade dharmaśālāyām mārga madhyame
preta bhūta ālaye cora sattvānām ca niṣevite
prasthāna śalabhasthāne kalpa asdhinilaye api ca
sauṣṭābhūta samudbhūta deśe
rauṇika deśake

original: evaṃ sthāne samudbhūtaṃ na gṛhṇanti drumaṃ tataḥ // BhS_8.34 //
analyzed: evam sthāne samudbhūtam na gṛhṇanti drumam tatas
pādān apāvanam tardhi
asākṣikam sarpa nilayam bahu valmīka saṃyutam

original: asthiraṃ bahucakraṃ ca suśākhaṃ caikaśākhinam // BhS_8.36 //
analyzed: asthiram bahu cakram ca su śākham ca ekaśākhinam
karmāntara gṛhitam ca karmāntara prayojanam
evam īdṛgvidham vṛkṣam varjayet bera karmaṇi
ā mūla agram samam vṛttam ṛjum ca eva pradakṣiṇam
vistāra yāma saṃpannam śubhāya eva samāyutam

original: evaṃ lakṣaṇa saṃpannaṃ drumaṃ gatvā prasannadhīḥ /

tad mūle gomayena api lepayet caturaśrakam
divya lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam drumam kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam

original: mūlamantraṃ japitvā tu dhmāyedviṣṇuṃ parātparam // BhS_8.42 //
analyzed: mūlamantram japitvā tu dhmāyet viṣṇum parātparam

original: payaḥ parisrave tatra śubhamevaṃ vidhīyate // BhS_8.43 //
analyzed: payaḥ parisrave tatra śubham evam vidhīyate

original: pūrvaṃ tupatanaṃ śastamāgneyyāṃ tu bhayāvaham // BhS_8.44 //
analyzed: pūrvam tupatanam śastam āgneyyām tu bhaya āvaham

original: aiśānyāṃ śāntikaṃ tatra sarvavṛddhikaraṃ nṛṇām // BhS_8.46 //
analyzed: aiśānyām śāntikam tatra sarva vṛddhi karam nṛṇām

original: vṛkṣāgraṃ bhevayitvā tu tvacaṃ samyagvyapohya ca /

original: rathevā śakaṭe vāthaskanthe vā kṣipya veśayet // BhS_8.49 //
analyzed: śakaṭe vā atha skanthe vā kṣipya veśayet
grāmam pradakṣiṇaṅkṛtya ā svasti sūktam samuccaran

original: viṣṇuśūlaṃ tu keśānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paṭṭikameva ca /
analyzed: viṣṇuśūlam tu keśānām śreṣṭham paṭṭikam eva ca

original: dhyeyaṃ meḍhrādayaśbordhvaṃ samaṃ bhāgasya yattrayam // BhS_8.52 //
analyzed: dhyeyam meḍhra ādayaḥ ūrdhvam samam bhāgasya yat trayam
ūru keśānta paryantam tasya artham ca takam mukham

hikkāyām ṣaṣ yavam pañca aṅgulam nābhyantakam matam

uṣṇīṣam mātṛkam śūlam sthāna ādīnām sanātanam

original: sarveṣāṃ devatānāṃ ca sāmānyaṃ ca turaśrakam // BhS_8.57 //
analyzed: sarveṣām devatānām ca sāmānyam ca turaśrakam
catur mātrā ardha vistāram śūla mūla viśālakam
agra tāram catur mātram aṣṭa aṃśa ūnam atha api vā

vistṛtayoḥ bāhye mātṛ sūtra sama ūrdhayoḥ
vakṣaḥ daṇḍa āyatam svena mukhena dviguṇam matam

original: tāraṃ saptāṅgulaṃ teṣāṃ yena sārthaṃ trimātrakam /
analyzed: tāram sapta aṅgulam teṣām yena sārtham tri mātrakam
ṣoḍhaśa aṣṭa catur mātra āyāma tāra samanvitam

original: dakṣiṇe mūlamadhye tu agraṃ kuryāddvayorapi // BhS_8.63 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe mūla madhye tu agram kuryāt dvayoḥ api
śikhā
evam catur bhujam kṛtvā dvi bhuje dvi śikham tathā

yāvantaḥ bāhavaḥ tasmin stāvatyaḥ ca śikhāḥ matāḥ

vina dvi mātram eva syāt dvi śikham kaṭi daṇḍakam
śroṇi bhāgāt adhas tena śeṣayet vaṃśa daṇḍakam
ūrudaṇḍa ālayam saptaviṃśat aṅgulam ucyate

āropya mānayet jānu daṇḍasya asaṃbhavāt api

ūru daṇḍa viśālam syāt mūlebhāgam tad aśrake
kalā aṅgulam tat ekam syāt jaṅghā mūla viśālakam

tri mātra kala mūlasya tāram agre adhika aṃgulam

adhyardha aṅgulam agrasya viśālam lakṣaṇa anvitam

śeṣayet agra bhāgebhyaḥ korpare śeṣayet tatas

jānu korparam uddiṣṭam tasya tu dvi śikhā matam
śeṣayet nalakānām tu prakoṣṭhe tu bhavet budhāḥ

original: tathaiva visṛjānāṃ ca budhānāṃ korparaṃ matam /

original: vaṃśadaṇḍaṃ tathā vakṣye daṇḍaṃ ca kaṭidaṇḍakam /

original: tathā caraṇadaṇḍau dvau daṇḍāssapta daśa smṛtāḥ // BhS_8.82 //

kaṭi daṇḍa ardham ārabhya yāvat āsīnaḥ api

yojayet upayānīlam
pṛṣṭhatas vṛttam eva vā
vaṃśa daṇḍam tathā tena kleśayet viśikhena tu

original: śikhāgrasuṣīre kīlaṃ lohaṃ vā skāmathāpi vā // BhS_8.85 //
analyzed: śikhā agra suṣīre kīlam loham vā vā

original: anyatkīlaṃ tu suṣiraṃ kartavyaṃ kathañcana // BhS_8.86 //

original: āsane śayane caiva jānusandhiḥ praśasyate // BhS_8.89 //

original: pañcānye dvibhuje daṇḍa daṇḍā haste caturdaśa // BhS_8.91 //
analyzed: pañca anye dvi bhuje daṇḍa daṇḍāḥ haste caturdaśa

original: taskaraṃ bhuktiśaktī ca dhanaṃ rājyaṃ klibādi ca /

anyaiḥ gandha yutaiḥ puṣpaiḥ vāsayitvā vidhānataḥ
suvarṇa ratna dhātūn ca nyasitvā mantra vittamaḥ

original: govālakuśadarbhaiśca kṛtaṃ kūrcaṃ tu nikṣipet // BhS_12.12 //
analyzed: go vāla kuśa darbhaiḥ ca kṛtam kūrcam tu nikṣipet

original: atha vā nikṣipet kūrcaṃ kṛtaṃ darbhaistu kevalaiḥ /
analyzed: atha vā nikṣipet kūrcam kṛtam darbhaiḥ tu kevalaiḥ

original: asthi ratnaṃ sirā stantur māṃso mṛtsnā prakīrtitā // BhS_12.13 //
analyzed: asthi ratnam sirā stantuḥ māṃsaḥ mṛtsnā prakīrtitā
śoṇitam jalam medaḥ tathā eva ca

original: śukrantu kūrcamityuktaṃ vastraṃ syāccarma vaiṣṭitam // BhS_12.14 //
analyzed: śukram tu kūrcam iti uktam vastram syāt carma vaiṣṭitam

original: sapta dhātava ityete kuṃbheṣu karakeṣu ca /
analyzed: sapta dhātavaḥ iti ete kuṃbheṣu karakeṣu ca
eteṣu ekam vinā kuryāt na asti tatra asya sannidhiḥ

original: devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve kuṃbhaṃ tatra niveśya ca /
analyzed: devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve kuṃbham tatra niveśya ca
alaṅkṛtaḥ tathā ācāryaḥ vastra ābharaṇa kuṇḍalaiḥ
sraj gandhaiḥ veṣṭitaḥ dhṛtmā mukhasya uṣṇīṣa bandhanam
kuṃbhasya dakṣiṇe bhāge prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ api vā
svastika āsanam āsthāya ṛju kāyaḥ samāhitaḥ
lalāṭa ādiṣu sthāneṣu keśava ādīn praṇamya ca
akāra ādi akṣaram sarvam nyasitvā sarva sandhiṣu
paścāt kuṃbham su saṃtpṛśya kramāt sūkta ādikam japet
ātma sūktam tatas japtvā pauruṣam sūktam eva ca

original: sūktamekākṣaraṃ japtvā viṣṇusūkta mataḥ param // BhS_12.20 //
analyzed: sūktam eka akṣaram japtvā viṣṇusūkta mataḥ param
śrī bhū sūktam tatas japtvā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ tu tatojaptvā dhyāyet samyaksamāhitaḥ // BhS_12.21 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam tu tatas japtvā dhyāyet samyak samāhitaḥ
prāṇāyāmam tatas kuryāt reca pūraka kuṃbhakaiḥ
etad phalam kramāt vakṣye trividham tad pṛthagvidham
tatra eva recakam pūrvam sarva pāpasya dāhakam

original: paścāttu pūrakaṃ kuryā damṛtāpyāyanaṃ tataḥ // BhS_12.23 //
analyzed: paścāt tu pūrakam kuryāt amṛta āpyāyanam tatas

original: tṛtīyaṃ kuṃbhakaṃ kuryā damṛtatvaṃ ca saṃsmaret /
analyzed: tṛtīyam kuṃbhakam kuryāt amṛta tvam ca saṃsmaret
tasmāt sarva prayatnena recaka ādīni kārayet

original: kuṃbhagantu jalaṃ smṛtvā vāruṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: jalam smṛtvā vāruṇam maṇḍalam budhaḥ

original: ardhacandrākṛtiṃ smṛtvā tasya bījākṣaraṃ nyaset // BhS_12.25 //
analyzed: ardhacandra ākṛtim smṛtvā tasya bīja akṣaram nyaset
tam oṅkāreṇa saṃveṣṭya bandha yuktam
tu niśmalam
āditya maṇḍala anta stham devam tatra eva ca āhvayet
ādi bījam suvarṇa ābham praṇavaiḥ pariveṣṭitam

original: paścāddevaṃ samabhyarcya kuryā darghyānta marcanam // BhS_12.27 //
analyzed: paścāt devam samabhyarcya kuryāḥ darghya anta marcanam

original: biṃbaṃ kuṃbhaṃ ca saṃgṛhya snānaśvabhre niveśayet /
analyzed: biṃbam kuṃbham ca saṃgṛhya snāna śvabhre niveśayet

original: śvabhrasya pūrvabhāge tu daṇḍapaṅktiṃ ca kārayet // BhS_12.28 //
analyzed: śvabhrasya pūrva bhāge tu daṇḍa paṅktim ca kārayet

original: devaṃ sarvatra saṃsnāpya dīpāntaṃ ca samarcayet // BhS_12.29 //
analyzed: devam sarvatra saṃsnāpya dīpa antam ca samarcayet
nairṛte viṣṭare nyasya namet devān samāhitaḥ

original: evaṃ devyau samādāya snāpaye datvaraṃ budhaḥ- // BhS_12.30 //
analyzed: evam devyau samādāya snāpaye budhaḥ
pādyam ācamanam da tvā devadevam praṇamya ca

original: pātraṃ tu taṇḍulaiḥ pūrṇaṃ gṛhītvātra viśeṣataḥ // BhS_12.31 //
analyzed: pātram tu taṇḍulaiḥ pūrṇam gṛhītvā atra viśeṣataḥ

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi kautukaṃ tatra nikṣipet /
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam vā api kautukam tatra nikṣipet

original: atha vā tantu māhṛtya nyasitvā taṇḍulopari // BhS_12.32 //
analyzed: atha vā tantu m āhṛtya nyasitvā taṇḍula upari
tāṃbūla sahite pātre
devasya agre nidhāya ca
puṇyāham vācya tad kāle svasti sūktam samuccaran
devasya dakṣiṇe haste vāma hastayoḥ
kautukam bandhayet kramāt
veda mantra jñaḥ ācāryaḥ rakṣā mantram samuccaran

original: ṣaḍdroṇaṃ dhānyamardhaṃ vā vedikopari cāstaret // BhS_12.35 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ droṇam dhānyam ardham vā vedikā upari ca āstaret
tad ardham taṇḍulān ca eva tad agdham tu tilān api

original: tadagdhaṃ yavamādāya tadardhaṃ tilvameva ca // BhS_12.36 //
analyzed: tad agdham yavam ādāya tad ardham tilvam eva ca
aṇḍa jam muṇḍa jam ca eva roma jam vāma jam tathā
carma jam ca āstaret pañca śayanam vedikā upari
alābhe tu tathā eta eṣām pañca vastrāṇi
mūrdhopadhānam kartavyam ūrdhve anaḥ tam samarcayet

original: devaṃ devyau samādāya yaddigdvāraṃ tathā śiraḥ /
analyzed: devam devyau samādāya yat diś dvāram tathā śiraḥ
śāyayet śayane vidvān yat vaiṣṇavam iti bruvan
devyoḥ ca api tathā kuryāt tat tat sūktam japet kramāt
uttara ācchādanam kuryāt gala antam tatra nikṣipet
śayyā vedyā astu paritas sarvān devān samarcayert
iśāna ādi kramāt devān samarcayet
śaṅkaram balirakṣam ca vāgdevīm bali śrakrakau

original: agniṃ pavitraṃ śailūṣaṃ prācyāṃ pratyaṅmukhān kramāt // BhS_12.42 //
analyzed: agnim pavitram śailūṣam prācyām pratyak mukhān kramāt

original: bhaumaṃ guhaṃ ca durgāṃ ca yamaṃ mandaṃ ca nairṛtim /
analyzed: bhaumam guham ca durgām ca yamam mandam ca nairṛtim
rohiṇīm sapta mātṝḥ ca dakṣiṇe ca uttarā mukhān
paścime nairṛta ādi ādīn arcayet tad anukramāt

original: vaiṣṇavīṃ puruṣaṃ caiva budhaṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_12.44 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavīm puruṣam ca eva budham jyeṣṭhām tathā eva ca
puṣparakṣaka vāyū ca prāc mukhān ca samarcayet
vāyavya ādi īśa paryastam dakṣiṇa abhimūkhān kramāt

original: śukraṃ caiva bhṛguṃ śāntaṃ tathā sapta ṛṣīnapi /
analyzed: śukram ca eva bhṛgum śāntam tathā sapta ṛṣīn api

original: bhāgīrathīṃ kuberaṃ ca candraṃ bhūtāni cār'cayet // BhS_12.46 //
analyzed: bhāgīrathīm kuberam ca candram bhūtāni
dvāre dvāre ca dhātṛ ādīn dvāradevān samarcayet
vimānam paritas bhyarcya nyakṣa ādīn arcayet kramāt
devasya agre prasanna ātmā pūjayet anapāyinaḥ

original: bhūtadvayaṃ tathā tārkṣyaṃ tathā caivāmitaṃ budhaḥ // BhS_12.48 //
analyzed: bhūta dvayam tathā tārkṣyam tathā ca eva amitam budhaḥ
cakra śaṅkha aravindāni devasya agreḥ acayet budhaḥ
vedān adhyāpayet dikṣu ṛcām prā acīḥ iti śrutiḥ
saṃbhāra vedyām āstīrya dhānyam
hema ādi pātre ratna ādīm t san nyasya eva adhidaivatam
viṣṇum abhyarcya vidhinā kārayitvā adhivāsanam
viṣṇusūktam samuccārya vastreṇa ācchādayet budhaḥ
paścāt hotāram āhūya yathā ukta guṇa saṃyutam
pādau prakṣālya ca ācamya kūrca yuktam samāhitam
alaṅkuryāt ca puṣpa ādyaiḥ pañcāṅga ucita bhūṣaṇaiḥ
sabhyasya pūrva bhāge tu paścima abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ
sabhya adhvaryum samīkṣya eva hotā praṇavam uccaret
hotarehi pade ukte tatas hotā samuccaret
adhvaryo deva tā iti uktvā pādau prakṣālya ca ācamet

original: pūrvavattatra casthitvā “oṃ namaḥ pravaktre' bruvan // BhS_12.55 //
analyzed: pūrvavat tatra ca sthitvā om namaḥ pravaktre bruvan

original: hotā ca nāma śarmāntaṃ saṃyojyaiva samuccaret /
analyzed: hotā ca nāma śarma antam saṃyojya eva samuccaret
bhūte bhaviṣyati iti uktvā brūyāt hiṃ'kāra pūrvakam
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ suvar iti eva prāc mukhaḥ ca pradakṣiṇam
adadhyāt samidhaḥ adhvaryuḥ prati oṅkāram tatas anale
hotrā agne mahā am iti ukte prabhauḥ pravaraḥ iṣyate

original: rājño vā rājapatmyā vā tathāmātyasya vā bhavet // BhS_12.58 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ vā rāja patmyāḥ vā tathā amātyasya vā bhavet
grāmaḥ ced yajamānaḥ tu vasiṣṭha pravaram vadet

original: atha vā kārayedvidvān kāśyapravaraṃ vadan // BhS_12.59 //
analyzed: atha vā kārayet vidvān kāśya pravaram vadan
vaiśyāt anyatra jātīyaḥ yajamānaḥ bhavet yadi

original: tasya tu pravaraṃ hitvā kāśyapapravaraṃ vadet // BhS_12.60 //
analyzed: tasya tu pravaram hitvā kāśyapa pravaram vadet
tatas āyātu bhagavān an uktvā paścima diś mukhaḥ

original: viṣṇvādi bhūta paryantaṃ sarvamūrtī stadāhvayet // BhS_12.61 //
analyzed: viṣṇu ādi bhūta paryantam sarva mūrtīḥ tat āhvayet
nanadhā uktena mārgeṇa pārṣadān āhvayet budhaḥ
āvāhana krameṇa eva nirupya ājya āhutīḥ yajet
sabhya agnim ca paristīrya prāṇāyāma ādi pūrvakam
hutvā tu tathā ca eva prajāpateḥ
agniḥ dhīmata'yā iti uktvā ādityebhyaḥ tathā eva ca
viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ ca eva marut gaṇebhyaḥ eva ca
bhūḥ agnaye a ca evamādyāḥ catasraḥ vyāhṛtīḥ yajet
daśabhiḥ sataśas tu etaiḥ sahasra āhutiḥ ucyate
sruveṇa srāvayan vidvān avicchinnam samācaret

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ samuccārya sūktaṃ pauruṣameva ca // BhS_12.66 //
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam samuccārya sūktam pauruṣam eva ca
śrīsūktam vaiṣṇavam
eka akṣara ādi sūktam tu viṣṇugāyatriyā yutam
etaiḥ tu saptabhiḥ sūktaiḥ catuḥ āvartya hūyatām
etat kartum aśaktaḥ ced sakṛt vā atra samācaret
aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa dvādaśa akṣarakeṇa vā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇugāyatrīṃ juhuyāditi ke cana // BhS_12.69 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇugāyatrīm juhuyāt iti ke cana
tatas ca āhāvanīya agnikuṇḍe samyak yathākramam
yajet puruṣasūktam tu ṣoḍaśa āvartya yatnataḥ
anvāha arva agnikuṇḍe tu viṣṇusūktam suhūyatām
brāhman ca vyāhṛtīḥ ca eva jaya ādīn juhuyāt kramāt
śrīsūktam vaiṣṇavam ca eva juhuyāt gārhapatyake
āvasadthye viśeṣeṇa vaiṣṇavam rudrasūktakam
mahīsūktam ca juhuyat sūktam eka akṣara ādikam
paiṇḍarīke tu juhuyāt pāramātmika saṃyutam
rakta abjam bilva patram ca śveta abjānām asaṃbhave
ghṛtena āplutya juhuyāt viṣṇugāyatriyā budhaḥ
samidh ājyam caruḥ lājāḥ sarṣapāḥ ca yavāḥ tathā

original: tilaṃ tilvaṃ tathā mudgā māṣāssakturguḍaṃ tathā // BhS_12.75 //
analyzed: tilam tilvam tathā mudgāḥ māṣāḥ saktuḥ guḍam tathā
madhu apūpāḥ dadhi kṣīram homa dravyam iti īritam
etaiḥ saptadaśa dravyaiḥ vaiṣṇavam juhuyāt budhaḥ
juhvā ca eva upajuhvā ca viṣṇusūktam suhūyatām

original: sabhye ca vaiṇḍarīke ca sviṣṭākāraṃ vinā caret // BhS_12.77 //
analyzed: sabhye ca vaiṇḍarīke ca su iṣṭa ākāram vinā caret
agniṣu āhavanīya ādiṣu anta homam samācaret
ṛc ādīn ca catur dikṣu vedān adhyāpayet kramāt
evam adhyayanam proktam ṛcām śrutiḥ
nṛttaigenyaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ ca rātri śeṣam nayat kramāt
tatas prabhāte dharma ātmā snātvā a snāna vidhānataḥ

original: brahmayajñaṃ ca kṛtvā tu japetsūktāni dvādaśa // BhS_12.80 //
analyzed: brahmayajñam ca kṛtvā tu japet sūktāni dvādaśa
pādau prakṣyālya ca ācamya devān uddhāpya mantravat

brahmasthāne viśeṣeṇa pīṭham samyak prakalpayet

original: tadūrdhve kalpayedvidvān navabhāgaṃ vibhajya ca // BhS_12.82 //
analyzed: tad ūrdhve kalpayet vidvān nava bhāgam vibhajya ca
pūrva uktena krameṇa eva ratna nyāse samācaret
sudhayā paripūrya eva kṣaumena ācchādayet budhaḥ
yajamānaḥ tu tad kāle ācārya ādīn praṇamya ca

original: sapādanavaniṣkaṃ ca gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // BhS_12.84 //
analyzed: sa pāda nava niṣkam ca gurave dakṣiṇām dadet
pratyekam sthāpaka ādīnām pañca niṣkam dadet tadā
sabhya adhvaryoḥ viśeṣeṇa hotuḥ ca api tathā eva ca
paiṇḍarīkasya ca adhvaryoḥ pratyekam pañca niṣkakam
anyeṣu āhavanīya ādiṣu adhvaryūṇām
ca adhvaryoḥ anyeṣām ca pṛthak pṛthak
niṣkam pāda adhikam dadyāt saṃpūrṇam iti paṭhyate
ācāryasya niyogena dakṣiṇā dānam īritam
yajamānaḥ svatantreṇa na kuryāt iti śāsanam
hanti alpa dakṣiṇaḥ yajñaḥ yajamānam viśeṣataḥ

original: adakṣiṇaṃ tu yajanaṃ niṣphalaṃ tviti śāsanam // BhS_12.89 //
analyzed: a dakṣiṇam tu yajanam niṣphalam tu iti śāsanam
muhūrte samanuprāpte vādya ghoṣa samanvitam

ācāryaḥ kuṃbham ādāya vrajet pūrvam tatas kramāt
paścāt devam depī ādi saṃyutam
pradakṣiṇam śanais gantvā devāgāram praviśya ca

original: pīṭhasya dakṣiṇe bhāge dhānyapīṭhe prakalpite // BhS_12.92 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya dakṣiṇe bhāge dhānya pīṭhe prakalpite

original: kautukaṃ brahmasthāne tu sthāpayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ // BhS_12.93 //
analyzed: kautukam brahmasthāne tu sthāpayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
bhūḥ asi bhūm iti uktvā pīṭhe devam

original: tasya dakṣiṇapāśenv tu śrīdevīṃ sthāpayedbudhaḥ // BhS_12.94 //
analyzed: tasya dakṣiṇa pāśenu tu śrīdevīm sthāpayet budhaḥ
tathā eva tu bhūmim kuryāt pratiṣṭhitām
devasya vāma bhāge tu sthāpayet biṃbam otsavam

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ ca japtyaiva puruṣasūktayutaṃ tathā // BhS_12.96 //
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam ca japtyā eva puruṣasūkta yutam tathā

original: dhruvasūktaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca devībhyāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: dhruvasūktam vaiṣṇavam ca devībhyām ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: śrībhūsūktaṃ pṛthak japtvā paścānnyāsaṃ samācaret // BhS_12.97 //
analyzed: śrī bhūsūktam pṛthak japtvā paścāt nyāsam samācaret
su vabhun vabhūn iti uktvā ca akṣarāṇi viśeṣataḥ
pādayoḥ antare vidvān yakāram vinyaset tatas
biṃbasya hṛdaye samyak nyaset bīja akṣaram param
rukma ābham paramam bījam sarva kāraṇa kāraṇam
taruṇa arka sahasra ābham brahma īśābhyām namaskṛtam
padmāsana stham deveśam śrīvatka alaṅkṛta urasam
śaṅkha cakra dharam saumyam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
o o miti ekākṣaram brahma praṇavaḥ paripaṭhyate
śrī akāram śriye iti uktvā la akāram bhuvaḥ iti api
kūrcena ādāya tat toyam kuṃbha stham śakti saṃyutam
idam viṣṇuḥ samuccārya samādāya samāhitaḥ
āyātu bhagavān an uktvā adhruvaberasya mūrdhavi
viṣṇum ca puruṣam satyam acyutam ca aniruddhakam

original: acale devadeveśo vyāpya tiṣṭhatīti śrutiḥ // BhS_12.104 //
analyzed: acale devadeveśaḥ vyāpya tiṣṭhati iti śrutiḥ
śriye mantreṇa śriyam āvāhayet budhaḥ
ca mantreṇa hariṇīm samyak āhvayet
kautuke ca autsave ca eva snāpane baliberake
praṇidhim uddhṛtya tad kāle dīpāt dīpam iva kramāt
dhruva berāt samāvāhya kūrcena āvāhayet kramāt
navadhā mārgam ālokya yathā iṣṭam kartuḥ icchayā
avicchinna ār'canam nityam vidhinā eva prakalpayet
aśaktaḥ ced tathā kartum pratiṣṭhām na eva kārayet
āḍhyaḥ sarva samaḥ tyāgī cikīrṣuḥ viṣṇu mandiram

original: svārthaṃ kṛtvā tridhaikāṃśaṃ kuṭuṃbārthe vidhāya ca // BhS_12.109 //
analyzed: sva artham kṛtvā tridhā eka aṃśam kuṭuṃba arthe vidhāya ca

original: āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ na druhyedātmane budhaḥ // BhS_12.110 //
analyzed: āpadi api ca kaṣṭāyām na druhyet ātmane budhaḥ

original: tathā prakalpayedvidvān bhūmibhogena vai sthitim // BhS_12.111 //
analyzed: tathā prakalpayet vidvān bhūmi bhogena vai sthitim
arcakasya ar'canā ar'tham ca kuṭuṃba artham ca yatnataḥ

analyzed: evam garbhagṛhe proktam vidhinā kārayet budhaḥ

analyzed: uttare bhitti pārśve tu vāsukīm ca prakalpayet

original: anastaṃ' ca samuccārya śeṣasyāvāhanaṃ caret // BhS_14.45 //
analyzed: ca samuccārya śeṣasya āvāhanam caret

iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām

atha pañcadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
daśāvatāra kalpaḥ rāmaḥ bhārgavaḥ
atas paraśurāmasya sthāpanam vakṣyate adhunā
bahubhiḥ balavadbhiḥ tu rājabhiḥ dharaṇī hatā
tad vadhāya kṛta udyogaḥ jamadagni sutaḥ hariḥ

original: paraśuṃ ca gṛhītvorvyāṃ nṛpān sarvān pragṛhya ca /

original: śrīpratiṣṭhitake caiva aṅganākāra eva ca // BhS_15.4 //

original: rāvaṇo bahubhiḥ krūrai rākṣasaiśca mahābalaiḥ // BhS_15.10 //

original: antenai va tu māsena sītāyāstūcchrayo bhavet // BhS_15.18 //
analyzed: tu māsena sītāyāḥ tu ucchrayaḥ bhavet

mukha āyāmam catur mātram liṅgam pañca aṅgula āyatam

original: lakṣmaṇasyātha vāme tu sthitau bāṇadhanurdharau // BhS_15.50 //

original: dakṣiṇe nābhayaṃ hastaṃ vāmaṃ kaṭikamucyate // BhS_15.52 //

original: “tanmā yaśogra' mantreṇa bharatasya ca hūyate // BhS_15.59 //

original: evaṃ tu sāyudhaṃ kuryādvakṣye 'haṃ tu nirāyudham // BhS_15.68 //

analyzed: cakram śaṅkham ca khaḍgam ca dadhānam kheṭakam tathā
athavā kalpayet devam aśva ārūḍham dvi bāhukam
śuddha sphacika saṃkāśam khaḍga kheṭaka dhāriṇam
atra eva kautukam kuryāt viṣṇu rūpam caturbhujam
pūrva ukta yāga śālāyām pañca agnīn parikalpya ca
paiṇḍarīke pradhāna agnau hautra śaṃsanam ācaret
karkiṇam kāmarūpam ca viṣṇum saṃhāra kāraṇam
evam āvāhya vidhinā nirupya ājya āhutīḥ yajet
dhūḥ naḥ vahantām iti uktvā śatam aṣṭa adhikam yajet
utsava snapana ādīni viṣṇoḥ iva samācaret
viṣṇoḥ daśa avatārāṇām evam proktam tu lakṣaṇam
anādiḥ bhagavān kālaḥ na asya ca antaḥ api dṛśyate
cakra vat parivartante sṛṣṭi sthiti anta saṃyamāḥ
avatārāḥ ca kīrtyante bhūyāṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ
dharma saṃrakṣaṇa arthāya duṣṭa saṃśikṣaṇāya ca
sadyas āvirbhavet viṣṇuḥ yatra bhakta anukaṃpayā
āvirbhāvam tu tam vindyāt prādurbhāvam atha itarat
matsya ādyāḥ pañca pañca itarāḥ smṛtāḥ
gaja indra mokṣaṇa ādīn api āvirbhāvān pracakṣate
antarāle tathā viṣṇoḥ dakṣiṇa uttara pārśvayoḥ

original: kalpayedrāmakṛṣṇau tu mukhamaṇḍapa eva vā // BhS_16.115 //
analyzed: kalpayet rāma kṛṣṇau tu mukha maṇḍape eva vā
atha antar maṇḍape vā api tathā āvaraṇa maṇḍape

original: saṃsthāpya kautukaṃ beraṃ dvayameveti ke ca na // BhS_16.116 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya kautukam beram dvayam evā iti ke ca na

original: nārasiṃhaṃ varāhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ ca trivikramam /
analyzed: nārasiṃham varāham ca vāmanam ca trivikramam

original: dhruvaberaṃ vinā kṛtvā kautukaṃ lakṣaṇānvitam // BhS_16.117 //
analyzed: dhruva beram vinā kṛtvā kautukam lakṣaṇa anvitam
sthāpayitvā tathā viṣṇoḥ pūjayet agra maṇḍape
matsya kūrma varāhāṇām vāmanasya viśeṣataḥ
kautukam viṣṇu rūpam tu kuryāt ca eva caturbhujam
dhruva rūpam na kurvīta yathā iṣṭam itaratra tu
iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām
saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre ṣoḍaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha saptadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha saptadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ adimūrtikalpaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa keśava ādi vinirṇayam

original: keśavaṃ tu prakurvīta saumyarūpaṃ caturbhujam // BhS_17.1 //
analyzed: keśavam tu prakurvīta saumya rūpam catur bhujam
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma dharam ca
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktam muktā hāra vibhūṣitam
sthitam evam prakurvīta devībhyām sahitam prabhum
nārāyaṇam prakurvīta ghanaśyāmam catur bhujam
śaṅkha padma dhakam devam bibhrantam ca gadām asim
bhūṣitam maṇi bhūṣābhiḥ vīta vāsasam acyutam
prakuryāt ca viśeṣeṇa lakṣmīnārāyaṇam śubham
uttamam daśa tālena māna unmāna pramāṇataḥ
siṃhāsane samāsīnam dakṣiṇa aṃghrim prasārya ca

original: āsane nihitaṃ vāmaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvavattathā // BhS_17.6 //
analyzed: āsane nihitam vāmam lakṣaṇam pūrvavat tathā
lakṣmīm sannyasya vāma ūrau mukhe harṣa samanvitām
prasārita karām devīm pañca tāla pramāṇataḥ
prāñjalīkṛta hastām tām sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
vāmena tām pariṣvajya dakṣiṇena abhaya pradam

original: anyābhyāṃ ca karābhyāṃ ca śaṅkhacakradharaṃ param /
analyzed: anyābhyām ca karābhyām ca śaṅkha cakra dharam param

original: tārkṣyaṃskandhāsanasthaṃ vā anyatsarvaṃ ca pūrvavat // BhS_17.9 //
analyzed: tārkṣyam skandhāsana stham vā anyat sarvam ca pūrvavat
tārkṣyam nava ardha tālena ardha īṣat bhṛkuṭim mukham
dakṣiṇa ūrau sthitām lakṣmīm kecid icchanti sūrayaḥ
nāgabhoge samāsīnam evam kuryāt tu vā harim
saptabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ vā api phaṇaiḥ vistāritaiḥ yutam
śeṣam samyak prakurvīta samuttuṅga śarīriṇam
mādhavam ca utpala nibham cakra cāva gadā asibhiḥ
catur bhuja dharam kuryāt citra mālya aṃbaram harim

original: govindaṃ pāṇḍurābhaṃ ca caturbhujadharaṃ harim // BhS_17.13 //
analyzed: govindam pāṇḍura ābham ca catur bhuja dharam harim
gadā śaṅkha ari padmāni bibhrantam kārayet budhaḥ
viṣṇum śaṅkha ari abja gadā bhṛtam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam pīta vāsasam acyutam

original: raktotpalābhaṃ kurvīta devaṃ tu madhusūdanam // BhS_17.15 //
analyzed: rakta utpala ābham kurvīta devam tu madhusūdanam
śaṅkha āri abja gadā pāṇim catur bhujam anāmayam
trivikramam nīla varṇam śaṅkha āri abja gadā bhṛtam
catur bhuja dharam devam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam

original: vāmanaṃ meghavarṇaṃ tu caturbāhuṃ mahābalam // BhS_17.17 //
analyzed: vāmanam megha varṇam tu catur bāhum mahā balam
gadā śaṅkha ari padmāni bibhrantam chala rūpiṇam

original: atha vā kārayetkuṃbhaṃ dadhyannaṃ ca karadvaye // BhS_17.18 //
analyzed: atha vā kārayet kuṃbham dadhi annam ca kara dvaye
dadhivāmanam āhuḥ tam śveta ābham dvi bhujam harim

original: atha vā vaṭurūpaṃ tu dhṛtvā daṇḍakamaṇḍalū // BhS_17.19 //
analyzed: atha vā vaṭu rūpam tu dhṛtvā daṇḍa kamaṇḍalū
svarṇa chami bāla rūpam dvi bhujam kārayet harim

original: sitāsitābhaṃ kurvīta śrīdharaṃ tu caturbhujam // BhS_17.20 //
analyzed: sita asita ābham kurvīta śrīdharam tu catur bhujam
kaumodakī śaṅkha cakra padma dhāriṇam īśvaram

original: hṛṣīkeśaṃ prakurvīta śyāmābhaṃ ca caturbhujam // BhS_17.21 //
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam prakurvīta śyāma ābham ca catur bhujam
gadā śaṅkha ari padmāni bibhrantam harim avyayam
sita mecaka varṇam tu padmanābham prakalpayet
kaumodakī cakra padma śaṅkha pāṇim ramādhavam
dāmodaram prakurvīta sita gaura ābham īśvaram
padma śaṅkha gadā cakra dharam devam caturbhujam

original: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tu kurvīta śvetavarṇaṃ caturbhujam // BhS_17.24 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇam tu kurvīta śveta varṇam catur bhujam
śaṅkha āri abja gadā pāṇim sarva ādhāram sanātanam
vāsudevam prakurvīta taruṇa āditya sannibham
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma dharam sarva dharam vibhum
candra ābham nava kunda ābham atha vā kālayet harim
pradyumnam tu suvarṇa ābham kuryāt devam catur bhujam
cakra śaṅkha gadā padma dharam devam mahā balam
aniruddham hiraṇya ābham sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
śaṅkha cakra dhanuḥ khaḍga dharam deveśvara īśvaram
sita asita ābham kurvīta deveśam puruṣottamam
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma dharam devam caturbhujam
atha ukṣajam prakurvīta śaṅkha ābham ca catur bhujam
cakra śaṅkha gadā padma dharam bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitam
nārasiṃham tu megha ābham sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
śaṅkha padma gadā cakra dharam bhakta abhaya pradam
sita mecaka varṇam tu kurvīta vibhum acyutam
gadā abja cakra śaṅkha aṅkam catur bhuja virājitam
janārdanam udāra aṅgam nīla varṇam samācaret
cakra śaṅkha gadā padma dharam devam sanātanam
atha vā kaṭi vinyasta vāma hastam prakalpayet
upendram ghana kṛṣṇa ābham sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma dharam devam jagatprabhum
harim pāṇḍura kṛṣṇa ābham sarva alaṅkāra śobhitam
śaṅkha padma gadā cakra dharam kuryāt manoharam
kṛṣṇam tu nīrada śyāmam puṇḍarīka nibha īkṣaṇam
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma dharam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
sarveṣām tu vimānāni viṣṇoḥ ukta vat ācaret

original: sabhyakuṇḍe pradhānāgnau hautraṃ tatra praśaṃsya ca /
analyzed: sabhya kuṇḍe pradhāna agnau hautram tatra praśaṃsya ca
keśavam kleśa saṃhāram viṣṇum ca eva parātparam
nārāyaṇam naram viṣṇum naraka antakam iti api
mādhavam puṇḍarīkākṣam viṣṇum sarva ātmakam tu iti
govindam parama ānandam viṣṇum ca eva sanātanam
viṣṇum vyāpinam īśānam sarva loka adhipam tathā
madhusūdanam udyogam mahāntam viṣṇu iti api
trivikramam triloka īśam loka ādhāram sanātanam
vāmanam vara dam ca eva kāśyapim ca aditi priyam
śrīdharam puruṣam ca iti viṣṇum śrīvatsa vakṣasam
hṛṣīkeśam jagannātham viṣṇum viśva mayam tathā

original: “padmanābhaṃ sureśaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ caiva jagatpatim.' // BhS_17.43 //
analyzed: padmanābham sureśam ca viṣṇum ca eva jagatpatim
dāmodaram sat ādhāram viṣṇum praṇava rūpiṇam
saṃkarṣaṇam yadu varam viṣṇum
vāsudevam puṇya mūrtim bhadra īśam puṇya rūpiṇam
pradyumnam jagat īśānam viṣṇu puṇya ātmakam tathā
aniruddham mahāntam ca vairāgyam sarva tejasam
puruṣottamam ānandam viṣṇum pañca ātmakam tathā
adhokṣajam anādim ca viṣṇum vyāpakam iti api
nārasiṃham tapaḥ nātham mahā viṣṇum mahā balam
acyutam ca aparimitam aiśvaryam śrīpatim tathā
janārdanam anādyantam viṣṇum tejaḥ mayam tathā
upendram indra avarajam viṣṇum vaikuṇṭham iti api
harim pāpa haram ca iti viṣṇum maṅgala vigraham
kṛṣṇam nārāyaṇam puṇyam tridaśādhipa iti api
āvāhya tu krameṇa eva nirupya ājya āhutīḥ yajet
viṣṇoḥ nukā adabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ atodevā adabhiḥ tathā
keśava ādi dvādaśānām mantraiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ hunet
nārasiṃhasya kṛṣṇasya mantraḥ pūrvam udīritaḥ

original: itareṣāṃ daśānāṃ tu daśamantrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhS_17.52 //
analyzed: itareṣām daśānām tu daśa mantrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
viṣṇuḥ sarveṣām ityādi yam yajñaiḥ īritāḥ

original: taṃ taṃ devaṃ samuddiśya tattanmantreṇa cātvaraḥ // BhS_17.53 //
analyzed: tam tam devam samuddiśya tad tad mantreṇa cātvaraḥ
śatam aṣṭa adhikam hutvā śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret

original: evaṃ sarvatra kurvīta devībhyāṃ sahitaṃ vibhum // BhS_17.54 //
analyzed: evam sarvatra kurvīta devībhyām sahitam vibhum
tad rūpam kautukam kuryāt sarva lakṣaṇa lakṣitam
karṣaṇa ādi kriyāḥ sarvāḥ samācaret
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa lakṣmī sthāpanam uttamam

original: aṣṭadhā procyate lakṣmīḥ prathamā tvanapāyinī // BhS_17.56 //
analyzed: aṣṭadhā procyate lakṣmīḥ prathamā tu anapāyinī
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutā
dakṣa stanasya ūrdhva bhāge vahni aśredivya maṇḍale
padma madhye samāsīnām padma dvaya kara āñcitām
vara da abhaya hastām ca manda smita mukha aṃbujām
evam rūpām prakurvīta yoga lakṣmīḥ tu sā matā
yoga lakṣmīm pratiṣṭhāpya śrī kāmaḥ samyak arcayet
deveśena samam kuryāt asya asthi cāpanam uttamam
kāla antare prakuryāt cheddhema rūpya ādinā punar
kṛtvā śrīvatsa rūpam tu dhārayet viṣṇum avyayam
tad tad biṃba anurūpam ca kuryāt śrīvatsa lakṣaṇam
bhoga lakṣmyaḥ samākhyātā śśrī bhūnīlāḥ kramāt imāḥ

original: dhruvādiṣu tu bereṣu śrībhūmyau devapāśanvge // BhS_17.62 //
analyzed: dhruva ādiṣu tu bereṣu śrī bhūmyau
vaikuṇṭha mārga saṃcārā nīlā nitya samāśritā
pūrvam deveśena saha uditam
devībhyām rahite deve kuryāt kāla antare punar
pṛdhak pratiṣṭhām śrī bhūmyoḥ kuryāt āṅgirasa ukti vat
vīralakṣmīḥ iti proktā pṛthak ālaya saṃgatā
alayāt dakṣiṇe pārśve kuryāt tu pṛthak ālayam
daśa tālena mānena kuryāt devī na sa lakṣaṇām
padma dvaya karām ca eva vandā bhaya dhāriṇīm
kirīṭa mukuca upetām sarva alaṅkāra śobhitam
padmāsane samāsīnām hema ābhām sarva maṅgalām
godām anyām prakurvīta lakṣmīm tu vijayā abhidhām
mānena kuryāt anya ālaya āśritām

original: dakṣiṇena tu hastena kalhāraṃ dadhatīṃ tathā /
analyzed: dakṣiṇena tu hastena kalhāram dadhatīm tathā
prasārita itara karām baddha dhammilla śobhinīm
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktām tiṣṭhantīm eva kārayet
godā bhūmi aṃśa jā proktā tad mantreṇa ācaret kriyāḥ
pāka lakṣmīḥ samākhyātā pacana ālaya saṃgatā
aṣṭa tālena mānena kuryāt tām pacana ālaye
padma dvaya āñcita karām vara da abhaya dhāriṇīm
āsīnām vā atha tiṣṭhantīm kuryāt bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitām
dvitīya maṇḍapa dvāre dvāra lakṣmīm samācaret
pataṅga paṭṭikā madhye sarva alaṅkāra śobhitām
padma dvaya āñcita karām vara da abhaya dhāriṇīm
padmāsane samāsīnām kirīṭa ādi vibhūṣitām
tu pāśa nvyoḥ kuryāt hema kuṃbha karau punar
siṃcantau tau mahā lakṣmīm kuryāt kuṃbha jalaiḥ tathā
śrī bhūmyoḥ vīravijaya lakṣmyoḥ eva vidhīyate
dhrava bera anurūpeṇa bera antara samarcanam
tad rūpam kautukam kuryāt utsava ādi yathā icchayā
anyāsām na eva kurvīta dhruva arcām eva kārayet

original: paiṇḍarīke pradhānāgnau hautraṃ tatra praśaṃsya ca /
analyzed: paiṇḍarīke pradhāna agnau hautram tatra praśaṃsya ca
śrī bhūmyoḥ mūrti mantraiḥ ca krameṇa āvāhana ādikam
godām kṛṣṇapriyām lakṣmīm rukmiṇī iti ca āhvayet
āvāhana krameṇa eva tad mantraiḥ juhuyāt
pratiṣṭhā ukta krameṇa eva sarvam pūrvavat ācaret
nava ṣaṣ pañca mūrtīnām vimānasya ālayasya ca
dvimūrti sthāpanam tadvat trimūrta sthāpanam tathā
anyeṣām parivārāṇām sthāpanam vidhivat caret
yat yat samarpyate vastu deveśasya tu mandire
tat tat sarvam vidhānena pratiṣṭhāpya samarpayet

original: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu na grāhyaṃ na taddevapriyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: a saṃskṛtam tu na grāhyam na tat deva priyam bhavet

original: bhūṣaṇāni ca vā sāṃsi pātrāṇyanyatparicchadam // BhS_17.83 //
analyzed: bhūṣaṇāni ca vā sāṃsi pātrāṇi anya paricchadam
bera alaṅkāra yogyāni dhāma alaṅkaraṇāni ca
yathā ahan saṃskṛtāni eva gṛhṇīyāt saphalam bhavet
tad tad dravya adhidaivatyam devatā mūrti mantrakam
juhuyāt sarvam anyat ca pratiṣṭhā ukta vat ācaret
dravya adhidevatā kalbaḥ samyak uktaḥ mayā akhile
iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛsu proktāyām
saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre saptadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha aṣṭādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ arcanam uttamam
śrutibhiḥ vihitam tathā
yat ca uktam guruṇā sūtre samāsena mahā ṛṣiṇā

original: tenaiva vivṛtaṃ śāstre sārdhakoṭī pramāṇataḥ // BhS_18.2 //
analyzed: tena eva vivṛtam śāstre sārdha koṭī pramāṇataḥ
asmābhiḥ tu su saṃkṣiptam cāturlakṣa pramāṇataḥ
tad arcana kramam vakṣye śruṇudhvam ṛṣi sattamāḥ
vaikhānasena sūtreṇa niṣeka ādi kriyā anvitaḥ
ṛtvij ukta guṇa upetaḥ su puṣṭa aṅgaḥ samāhitaḥ
gṛhasthaḥ brahmacārī vā bhaktyā eva ar'canam ācaret
dravyaiḥ anekaiḥ saṃpādyam tathā ananta upacārakaiḥ
āśakyam vidhivat kartum brahma ādyaiḥ api pūjanam
manuṣyaiḥ kim uvaktavyam daridraiḥ adṛḍha ātmabhiḥ
yathāśakti tatas kuryāt tasmāt bahubhiḥ arcakaiḥ
bahubhiḥ paricāraiḥ ca vā anya padārthibhiḥ
nirvartyam pūjanam viṣṇoḥ śraddhā bhakti samanvitaiḥ
tasmāt navavidhāḥ grāhyāḥ arcakāḥ paricārakāḥ
uttame tu uttamam proktam arcakānām tu viṃśatiḥ
aśītiḥ paricārāṇām uttame madhyamam tatas
paricārāṇām catuḥṣaṣṭi darcakāḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ

original: uttame tvadhamaṃ proktamarcakā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // BhS_18.10 //
analyzed: uttame tu adhamam proktam arcakāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
pañcāśat paricārāḥ ca madhyame ca uttamam punar
catvāriṃśat paricarāḥ pūjakāḥ ca aṣṭa kīrtitāḥ
madhyame madhyamam proktam acankāḥ ṣaṭ udīritāḥ
pañcaviṃśat paricarāḥ madhyame tu adhamam punar
catvāraḥ pūjakāḥ tatra paricārāḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
trayoḥ acakāḥ paricarāḥ nava syuḥ adhama uttame
pūjakau dvau paricarāḥ catvāraḥ adhama madhyame
paricarau dvau proktau adhama adhame
ācāryaḥ syāt upadraṣṭā devaḥ sānnidhya kārakaḥ
arcana ādi akhilam kāryam tad niyogena kārayet
sa hi kāryasya nirṇetā goptā adharmasya deśikaḥ
arcakaḥ devadevasya kuryāt mantra āsana ādiṣu
upacārān anantān ca vidhinā śāstra coditān
arcakasya sahāyantu kiṅkaraḥ paricārakaḥ
bahu kārya karāḥ ca ete grāhyāḥ tu paricārakāḥ
sammājanna karaḥ ca eva tathā syāt upalepakaḥ
potra śodhana kārakaḥ
pānīya vāhakaḥ ca eva puṣpa apacaya kārakaḥ
dhūpa dīpa ādi kartā ca gandha peṣaṇa tatparaḥ
tad tad paricchada āhartā tathā eva balivāhakaḥ
evamādīni kāryāṇi kurvanti paricārakāḥ
pācakaḥ paricāraḥ syāt pacana ālaya saṃgataḥ
haviṣpāka vidhāna jñaḥ śauca ācāra parāyaṇaḥ
etān vaikhānasān eva vṛṇet sarvān padārthinaḥ
alābhe tatra sarveṣām ācāryam ca arcakān pusaḥ
vaikhānasān eva vṛṇan aki udaryāt anya sūtriṇaḥ
vipraḥ tu pūjayet ālaye harim

original: sa vai devalako nāma sarva karmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // BhS_18.24 //
analyzed: sa vai devalakaḥ nāma sarva karma bahiṣkṛtaḥ
paricārān tu vṛṇuyāt alābhe tu anya sūtriṇaḥ
dīkṣita aneva sat vṛttān āgama ukta vidhānataḥ
dhanī sarva samaḥ tyāgī bhakti yuktaḥ prasanna dhīḥ
śāstra uktena vidhānena viṣṇu lāñchana lāñchitaḥ
devasya nitya pūjā artham utsava artham viśeṣataḥ
tathā anya vibhava artham ca dāpayet dhana saṃcayam
ācārya ājñā pratīkṣaḥ syāt ṝjake hita cintakaḥ
paricāre prasannaḥ ca kiṅkareṣu dayā paraḥ
tīrtha prasāda sevī ca nirmālyeṣu kṛta ādaraḥ
iti lakṣaṇa saṃpannāḥ prabhavanti ālaya arcane
atha arcakaḥ pramanna ātmā pañca kāla parāyaṇaḥ
brāhme muhūrte ca udthāya nārāyaṇam anusmaret
kṛtvā sūtra ukta vidhinā śauca ādīni yathāvidhi
snātvā snāna vidhānena dhṛtvā dhauta aṃbare punar
ūrdhva puṇḍrāṇi saṃdhārya vidhinā keśava ādibhiḥ
dhṛtvā pavitra padma akṣa tulasī maṇi mālikāḥ

original: dhṛtvobhayapavitre ca tathā sandhyāmupāsya ca // BhS_18.33 //
analyzed: dhṛtvā ubhaya pavitre ca tathā sandhyām upāsya ca
uṣṇīṣeṇa ca
samāpya nityakarmāṇi mahā mantra ādikam japan
aruṇam tu japitvā eva nārāyaṇam atas param

original: praṇamya yantrikāñcaiva karābhyāṃ parigṛhya ca // BhS_18.35 //
analyzed: praṇamya yantrikān ca eva karābhyām parigṛhya ca

original: bāhvośśirasi vā nyasya bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ /
analyzed: bāhvoḥ śirasi vā nyasya bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
saṃgataḥ paricāraiḥ ca yajamānena sa ādaram
sarva vādya samāyuktaḥ sarva maṅgala śobhitaḥ
kramamāṇaḥ śanais vidvān devāgāram prati vrajet
pratadviṣṇuḥ iti procya ca ālayam paritas kramāt
yugma pradakṣiṇam kuryāt deva devam anusmaran
yugma pradakṣiṇam kuryāt ayugmam tu ābhicārikam

original: āyugmaṃ tu parītyāpi tathāyugmaṃ praṇamya ca // BhS_18.39 //
analyzed: āyugmam tu parītya api tathāyugmam praṇamya ca
prekṣeta udyantam ādityam japet dvādaśa sūktakam
na tatra syāt pradakṣiṇe
devāgāram praviśya eva tat tat mantram anusmaran
dvāradevān praṇamya atha nirastam rakṣam astrataḥ
gṛhītvā yantrikām ca eva hiraṇyapāṇi muccaran

original: kavāṭe tu susaṃyojya “divaṃ' vīti samuccaran // BhS_18.42 //
analyzed: kavāṭe tu su saṃyojya divam vīti samuccaran
kavāṭa udghāyanam kṛtvā praviśet antaram budhaḥ

original: “ato devā' itiprocya devaṃ vīkṣyapraṇamya ca // BhS_18.43 //
analyzed: atas devāḥ iti procya devam vīkṣya praṇamya ca
paricārakam āhūya dīpān uddīpayet kramāt

original: praṇavaṃ mantramuccārya tatra kāryaṃ samācaret // BhS_18.44 //
analyzed: praṇavam mantram uccārya tatra kāryam samācaret
tris saṃprahārya pāṇibhyām śāmyantu ityādi ca uccaran

original: ādarśaṃ gāśca kanyāśca hastyaśvādīn śubhodayān // BhS_18.45 //
analyzed: ādarśam gāḥ ca kanyāḥ ca hasti aśva ādīn śubha udayān
brāhmaṇān veda viduṣaḥ nartakān ca eva gāyakān
devasya mukhamaṇḍape evacā
pracchanna paṭam udvāsya kṛtvā nīrājanam tathā
sarva vādya samāyuktam darśayet haraye mudā
dhāroṣṇam ca eva go kṣīram navanītam sa śarkaram
deveśāya nivedya atha kuryāt yavanikām punar
bhūḥ prapadye samuccārya deveśam praṇamet muhur
param raṃ'hi iti mantreṇa śayana stham śriyaḥpatim
bhūḥ asī bhūḥ iti procya jīvasthāne niveśayet

original: tasmin kāletu ye bhaktyā sevante puruṣottamam // BhS_18.50 //
analyzed: tasmin kāle tu ye bhaktyā sevante puruṣottamam

original: teṣāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyaṃ tridaśairapi /
analyzed: teṣām puṇya phalam vaktum na śakyam tridaśaiḥ api
tatas śiṣyam samāhūya vinaya anvitam ādarāt
sammārjana ādi karmāṇi guruḥ tasmai samādiśet
ava dhūti iti procya garbha geha ādi sarvatas
mārjanyā mārjayet śiṣyaḥ prādakṣiṇya krameṇa vai

original: pāṃsvādīn parihṛtyāpi prākārāntaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // BhS_18.53 //
analyzed: pāṃsu ādīn parihṛtya api prākāra antam ca sarvaśas
āśā asu iti samuccārya gomayena upalepayet
pañcagavyaiḥ tu saṃprokṣya raṅga vallīḥ samācaret
ā mā vājasya mantreṇa yathā uktena vidhānataḥ
sarvaṇi api ca pātrāṇi śodhayet su manorame

original: to yasaṃgrahaṇārthaṃ tu niyuktaḥ pūjakena tu /
analyzed: taḥ ya saṃgrahaṇa artham tu niyuktaḥ pūjakena tu
ghaṭam ādāya śiṣyaḥ tu duhatām
nadī taṭāka kūpānām pūrva alābhe param vrajet

original: upasthāya jalaṃ smṛtvā jāhnavīṃ lokapāvanīm // BhS_18.57 //
analyzed: upasthāya jalam smṛtvā jāhnavīm loka pāvanīm
ājyam abhigṛhṇāmi iti ca ap pavitreṇa vāsasā
gṛhītvā utpūtam ādhāvam gāyatrīm uccaran punar
alaṅkṛtya ghaṭam samyak kṣaumena ācchādya tad mukham

original: gaje śirasi vā kṣiptvā sarvavādyasamāyutam // BhS_18.59 //
analyzed: gaje śirasi vā kṣiptvā sarva vādya samāyutam
punar ālayam āviśya kṛtvā ca eva pradakṣiṇam

original: somaṃ rājānamuccārya garbhagehe tu dakṣiṇe // BhS_18.60 //
analyzed: somam rājānam uccārya garbha gehe tu dakṣiṇe
vinyaset ca tatas kuṃbham tri pāda upari śobhite
elā uśīra ādi ca āhṛtya gandha dravyam yathāvidhi
dadyāt arcaka haste tu gṛhītvā tat tu pūjakaḥ
pūrṇa kuṃbhe tu nikṣipya toyam tat adhivāsayet
alābhe kuśa dūrvaiḥ vā tulasī dala miśritaiḥ
abhimṛśya tatas kuṃbham idam āpaḥ śivāḥ aiti
sūtra ukta vidhinā kṛtvā puṇyāham vidhivat tadā
śuci vaḥ havya mantreṇa saṃbhārān prokṣayet kramāt
śodhayitvā tu nirmālyam naśyaḥ tu
aham evā idam muktvā tu pīṭha puṣpam ca śodhayet
pūtaḥ tasya samuccārya vedimadbhiḥ su śodhayet
dhruvasya pāda puṣpaḥ tu viṣṇugāyatriyā tathā

original: pañcabhirmūrti mantraiśca datvā devaṃ praṇamya ca /
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ mūrti mantraiḥ ca da tvā devam praṇamya ca
deva nirmālya śeṣeṇa viṣvaksenam vibhūṣya ca
anyat nirmālyam ādāya śuci sthāne apsu vā kṣivet
pūjana arthān ca saṃbhārān yathāśakti su saṃbharet
tatas samāhitaḥ bhūtvā a saṃbhāra arcanam ārabhet
pātrāṇi yathārham sthāpayet budhaḥ
snāna artham agnikoṇe syāt arghi artham nairṛte api ca
pādya artham vāyu deśe syāt ācama artham atha īśake
śuddhi artham ekam madhye tu pañca pātram idam kramāt
tri pāda upare nikṣipte viśāle tāmra bhājane
agniḥ śu ci iti mantreṇa sthāpayet ca harim smaran
kuryāt ca pātra saṃskāram śoṣaṇa ādi yathāvidhi
uddhariṇyām gṛhītvā tu praṇavena jalam tadā

original: nikṣipya tulasīṃ tasyāṃ puṣpaṃ vā dhāraṇaṃ caret // BhS_18.73 //
analyzed: nikṣipya tulasīm tasyām puṣpam vā dhāraṇam caret
vāri kuṃbha mukhe brahmā tad adhas rudraḥ īritaḥ

original: varuṇastu jale dhyeyastathai vāvāhanaṃ caret // BhS_18.74 //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ tu jale dhyeyaḥ tathā vā āvāhanam caret
tri pāde candram āvāhya ca ādityam ca ūrdhva bhājane
vasiṣṭha soma yajña aṅgān indum mandram krameṇa vai
āgneya ādi krameṇa eva pañca pātreṣu ca āhvayet
karpūra uśīrakam ca eva gandhānelā lavaṅgakam
snāna dravyam idam proktam snāna pātre

original: viṣṇuparṇaṃ padmadalaṃ dūrvāṃ śyāmākameva ca // BhS_18.77 //
analyzed: viṣṇuparṇam padma dalam dūrvām śyāmākam eva ca
prādya dravyāṇi saṃpādya pādya pātre tu nikṣipet
kuśa akṣata tila vrīhi yava māṣān tathā eva ca
priyaṅgūn ca eva siddhārthān arghya pātre tu nikṣipet
elā uśīra lavaṅga ādim stakkolāni iti ca kramāt
kṣipet ācāma pātre tu śuddha toye tatas kramāt
puṣpāṇi gandhān vinyasyet yathālābham atha api vā
alābha itas tat uccārya tulasīm vā vinikṣipet
dhārā asu iti ca mantreṇa pātrāṇi adbhiḥ prapūrayet
procya surabhi mudrām pradarśya ca
pātra abhimantraṇam kuryāt dasa diś bandhanam caret
viṣṇugāyatrīm uccārya tatra kāryam samācaret

original: ghaṇṭāyāṃ caiva brahmāṇaṃ nāde vedānsamarcayet // BhS_18.83 //
analyzed: ghaṇṭāyām ca eva brahmāṇam nāde vedān samarcayet
tad jihvāyām ṣaṣ āsyaḥ tu sūtrena āgān samarcayet
ca śaṅkha ārī pārśvayoḥ tasya ca arcayet
nāle ca eva mahādevam iti ghaṇṭā adhidevatāḥ
tripādasya uttare sthāpya vimalan tu patadgrahe

original: varuṇaṃ śaṅkhakukṣau tu mūle tu pṛthivīṃ tathā /
analyzed: varuṇam śaṅkha kukṣau tu mūle tu pṛthivīm tathā

original: dhārāyāṃ sarvatīrthāṃśca śaṅkhe candraṃ samarcayet // BhS_18.86 //
analyzed: dhārāyām sarva tīrthān ca śaṅkhe candram samarcayet
uddhariṇyām ca pānīya pātre somam atha arcayet
āsane dharmam āvāhya plote tvaṣṭāram eva ca
aṃbare sūryam āvāhya ca uttarīye niśākaram

original: bhūṣaṇe ṣaṇmukhaṃ caiva yajñasūtre niśākaram // BhS_18.88 //
analyzed: bhūṣaṇe ṣaṇmukham ca eva yajñasūtre niśākaram

original: puṣpe pullaṃ tathā gandhe mukhavāse ca medinīm /
analyzed: puṣpe pullam tathā gandhe mukha vāse ca medinīm
akṣate kāśyapam dhūpe bṛhaspatim adha āhvāyet
dīpe śriyam ghṛte sāma taile pitṝn samarcayet
upadhāne tathā chatre pāduke śeṣam arcayet
yantrikāyām ca mārtāṇḍam siddhārthe somam arcayet

original: kuśāgre jāhnavīṃ caiva tileṣu pitṛdevatāḥ // BhS_18.91 //
analyzed: kuśa agre jāhnavīm ca eva tileṣu pitṛ devatāḥ
taṇḍule ravim āvāhya dadhni ca āvāhayet yajuḥ
kṣīre atharvāṇam āvāhya madhuparke ṛcam tathā
