original: haviṣṇu padmagarbhaṃ ca pānapātre niśākaram // BhS_18.93 //
analyzed: haviṣṇu padmagarbham ca pāna pātre niśākaram
upahāra ādi pātreṣu divākaram atha arcayet
jyeṣṭhām āvāhya mārjanyām nartakeśarvam arcayet
gāyake sāmavedam ca nandīśam

original: pāñcajanyaṃ ca śaṅkhe tu gaṇikāsvapcarastsriyaḥ // BhS_18.95 //
analyzed: pāñcajanyam ca śaṅkhe tu gaṇikāsu ap caraḥ tsriyaḥ
garuḍam paricāreṣu samāvāhya tatas kramāt

original: anukteṣu tu dravyeṣu viṣṇumāvāhya kārayet // BhS_18.96 //
analyzed: an ukteṣu tu dravyeṣu viṣṇum āvāhya kārayet
tad tad dravya adhipe smṛtvā tad tad dravya samīpataḥ
tad tad dravya dhara tvena caturbhiḥ vigrahaiḥ yajet
tat tat karmasu kāle vai yathārham upayojayet

original: tatkāle pyatha vāvāhyatasmin karmaṇi yojayet // BhS_18.98 //
analyzed: tad kāle pi atha vā āvāhya tasmin karmaṇi yojayet
tatas acakaḥ prasanna ātmā a dhyātvā ātmānam janārdanam
devasya dakṣiṇe bhāge kūrmapīṭhe samāhitaḥ

original: biṃbārhaṃ saṃsthito vāpi samāsīno 'tha vā punaḥ /
analyzed: biṃba arham saṃsthitaḥ vā api samāsīnaḥ atha vā punar
dhyātvā dhyāna vidhānena japtvā ācārya palaṃparām
prāṇāyāma ādikam caret
bhūtaśuddhim vidhāya ādau nyāsān anyān samācaret
akāra ādi kṣakāra antam akṣarāṇi yathāvidhi

original: sarvatra sandhiṣu nyasya brahmanyāsaṃ samācaret // BhS_18.102 //
analyzed: sarvatra sandhiṣu nyasya brahmanyāsam samācaret
brahma brahma antarātme ati hṛdayam ca abhimarśayet
dyauḥ dyaiḥ asi iti ca uccārya mūrdhānam ca abhimarśayet
śikhe udvartaya ami iti spṛśet ca eva śikhām tathā
devānām āyudhaiḥ ruktvā kavacam bandhayet tatas
nārāyaṇāya vidmahe iti daśa digbhandhanam caret
sudarśanam abhi iti uktvā dakṣiṇe tu sudarśanam
vāme ca śaṅkham ca bibhṛyāt kare
sūryaḥ asi ca draḥ asi iti uktvā netrayoḥ dakṣa vāmayoḥ
sūryācandramasoḥ ca eva maṇḍale san nyaset budhaḥ
ahuraṇyam vidhim yajñam brahmāṇam deva indra iti api
aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam kara nyāsam samācaret
antarasmin ime iti brahmāṇam ca hṛdi nyaset
prāṇān āyamya saṃkalpya tithi vāra ādi kīrtayet

original: tato mantrāsanaṃ vidvān saṃkalpya ca yathāvidhi // BhS_18.109 //
analyzed: tatas mantra āsanam vidvān saṃkalpya ca yathāvidhi
iti tathā astu āsanam iti api
puṣpa dabhan kuśeṣu ekam pīṭha ante ca āsanam dadet
viśva adhikānām iti uktvā svāgatam tu samācaret
manaḥ abhimantā amantreṇa deveśam anumānya ca
trīṇi mantreṇa dadyāt pādyam pada dvaye
pradāya ca
devasya dakṣiṇe haste spṛśyam ssṛśya aghanī mucyate
procya dadyāt ācamanīyakam
devasya atvā iti mantreṇa ca ādarśam darśayet tatas
annādyāya samuccārya dantadhāvanam ācaret

original: hiraṇmayaṃ vā raupyaṃ vā dantakāṣṭhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulam /
analyzed: hiraṇmayam vā raupyam vā dantakāṣṭham ṣaṣ aṅgulam

original: jauduṃbaraṃ vā saṃpādya yathālābhaṃ samācaret // BhS_18.115 //
analyzed: jauduṃbaram vā saṃpādya yathālābham samācaret
idam bra'hma iti mantreṇa jihmā śodhanam ācaret
yat me garbhe a samuccārya gaṇḍūṣam kṣālanam tathā
procya dadyāt ācamanam tatas
vicakrame nam uccārya mukha vāsam pradāpayet
pūrva vastram visṛjya eva paridhāpya anya vāsasā
grīvāyāḥ pṛṣṭhatas kuryāt avakuṇṭhanam ādarāt
keśān vikīrya mantra jñaḥ vāma bhāge ca susthitaḥ
procya purastāt pāduke nyaset
bhūḥ prapadye samuccārya praṇamya jagatām patim

original: “para bra'hmeti mantreṇa samādāya tu kautukam // BhS_18.120 //
analyzed: para bra'hma iti mantreṇa samādāya tu kautukam
svasti sūktam tatas japtvā bruvan
snāna pīṭhe su saṃsthāpya pādyam ācamanam dadet
atas deva ādi mantraiḥ tu tailam ālipya mūrdhani
tathā eva viṣṇugāyatṣā sarva aṃgāṇi anulepayet
parilikhitam iti mantreṇa sarva aṅgam api śodhayet
āmlena khaṇḍaśīkena śarkarābhiḥ yathocitam
kuryāt
śāli piṣṭena gandha ādyaiḥ aṅga śodhanam ācaret
viśadam śodhayitvā tu saṃsnāpya uṣṇena vāriṇā
vārīḥ catasraḥ iti uktvā śuddha udaiḥ abhiṣecayet
namaḥ varuṇa iti uktvā go kṣīraiḥ abhiṣecayet
snāpayet gandha vāriṇā
agnimīle a samuccārya madhunā snānam ācaret
sīnīvā alī iti mantreṇa hāridra udaka secanam
tad tad dravya antare ca eva bhavet śuddha udaka āplapaḥ
punar gandha udakena eva ca
snāpayet devadeveśam tūrya ghoṣa purassaram
catur veda ādi mantraiḥ ca śuddhaḥ udaiḥ snāpayet punar
mitraḥ suparṇaḥ iti uktvā vimṛjya plota vāsanā
pūrva vastram visṛjya epa parīdhāpya tathā itarat
pādyam ācamanam dadyāt pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
praṇamya devadeveśam tatas
bhūḥ asi bhū riti uccārya jīvasthāne niveśayet
tris deva mantram uccārya samarpayet
tatas prokṣya dhruva sthānam gāyatrī mantram uccaran
saṃyuktam eta t uccārya
saṃbandha artham nyaset kūrcam kautuka agram vidhānataḥ

original: gāyatṣā dhruvapīṭhantu prokṣya śuddhena vāriṇā // BhS_18.134 //
analyzed: prokṣya śuddhena vāriṇā
viṣṇave namaḥ iti uktvā devadevam anusmaran
dhruvasya pādayoḥ madhye puṣpa nyāsam samācaret
prāc ādi ca nyaset tatra pādakṣiṇya krameṇa vai
caturthī antena puṣpāṇi puruṣam satyam acyutam
aniruddham iti rocya mahā dikṣu caturṣu ca

original: āgneyādi tathā nyanyedvidikṣu ca krameṇa vai // BhS_18.137 //
analyzed: āgneya ādi tathā nyanyet vidikṣu ca krameṇa vai

original: kapilaṃ caiva yajñaṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ puṇyameva ca /
analyzed: kapilam ca eva yajñam ca nārāyaṇam puṇyam eva ca
prathama āvaraṇam ca etat dvitīya āvaraṇe tatas
pūrva uktena krameṇa eva vārāham nārasiṃhakam

original: vāmanaṃ trivikramaṃ caiva subhadraṃ ca tataḥ param // BhS_18.139 //
analyzed: vāmanam trivikramam ca eva subhadram ca tatas param
īśitā ātmānam iti uktvā sarva udvaham atas param
sarva vid vā īśvaram ca iti samabhyarcyet bahirmukhān
tṛtīya āvaraṇe tad tad digīśān ca samarcayet
śrī phūmyoḥ mūrti mantraiḥ ca devyoḥ api samācaret

original: evaṃ dhruvasya pīṭhe tu puṣpanyāsa udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: evam dhruvasya pīṭhe tu puṣpa nyāsaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: atha kautukapīṭhe tu pūrvoktena krameṇa vai // BhS_18.142 //
analyzed: atha kautukapīṭhe tu pūrva uktena krameṇa vai
prācyām subhadram āvāhya haya ātmakam atas param

original: rāmadevaṃ puṇyadevaṃ sarvaṃ caiva sukhāvaham // BhS_18.143 //
analyzed: rāmadevam puṇya devam sarvam ca eva sukha āvaham
saṃvaham suvaham ca iti

original: dvitīyāvaraṇe tadvanmitra matriṃ śivaṃ tataḥ // BhS_18.144 //
analyzed: dvitīya āvaraṇe tadvat mitra matrim śivam tatas
viśvam sanātanam ca eva sanarthanam atas param
sanatkumāram sanakam arcayet ca bahirmukhān
tṛtīya āvaraṇe tadvat lokapālān samarcayet

original: praṇavādi namo 'ntaṃ syādarcanaṃ nyāsa ucyate // BhS_18.146 //
analyzed: praṇava ādi namaḥ antam syāt arcanam nyāsaḥ ucyate
ekādaśabhiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ upacāraiḥ tathā arcayet
tatra devyoḥ ca vidhinā
mārkaṇḍeyam bhṛgum ca eva deva dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ
brahmāṇam śaṅkaram tadvat bhitti pārśve samarcayet
deveśa abhimukhān etān yathāvidhi samarcayet
dvāra arcanam samārabhya śiṣyaḥ kuryāt guru uditaḥ
dvāre dvāre dvāradevān dvārapālān samarcayet
vimāna pālān lokeśān tathā ca eva anapāyinaḥ
parivārān tathā anyān ca viṣṇu bhūta antam eva ca
tad tad nāmnā samabhyarcya mantrataḥ
dvāra prakṣālanam kṛtvā dakṣiṇe madhya vāmayoḥ
dharmam jñānam atha aiśvarya mā āvāhya su samarcayet
sarvatra dvāra vāme tu rakṣā artham śāntam arcayet
tatas yavanikām kuryāt dvāre kṣauma ādi nirmitām
patitāḥ pāṣaṇḍāḥ veda nindakāḥ
devatā antara bhaktāḥ ca pāpa roga ādi pīḍitāḥ
abhiśastāḥ ca ye pāpāḥ śāstreṣu tu vininditāḥ

original: pūjākāle tu nārhanti sevituṃ harimavyayam // BhS_18.155 //
analyzed: pūjā kāle tu na arhanti sevitum harim avyayam
dhyānam āviśya tad kāle pūjakaḥ su samāhitaḥ
ātma sūktam japitvā eva sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ bhavet
viṣṇum vyāpinam ātmānam akhaṇḍa ānanda cit mayam
rukma ābham rakta netra āsya pāṇi pādam sukha udvaham
kirīṭa hāra keyūra kuṇḍala aṅgada bhūṣitam
śaṅkha cakra dharam devam vara da abhaya cihnitam
śrīvatsa aṃkam mahā bāhum kaustubha udbhāsita urasam
śuka piñcha aṃbara dharam pralaṃba brahmasūtriṇam
divya āyudha parīvāram divya bhūṣā vibhūṣitam
devībhyām parivāraiḥ ca sevyamānam jagatpatim
dhyāyet sannihitam biṃbe nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: yathāberaṃ tathā thātvā nyāsakarma tataścaret // BhS_18.161 //
analyzed: yathā beram tathā nyāsa karma tatas caret

original: suvarbhuvarbhūr ityuktvā mūrdhni nābhau ca sādayoḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā mūrdhni nābhau ca sādayoḥ
biṃbasya vyāhṛtīḥ nyasyet vyāhṛtinyāsaḥ ucyate
pādayoḥ antare pīṭhe yakāram ca tatas nyaset
akāram hṛdaye nyasya ca ādi bījam tatas punar
āveṣṭya praṇavena etān praṇāmam punar ācaret
puṣpa gandha akṣataiḥ yuktam śuddha udaiḥ abhipūritam
praṇidhim ca ūrdhvam uddhṛtya dīpāt dīpam iva kramāt
idam viṣṇuḥ iti procya ca āyātu bhagavān iti
praṇava ātmakam avyaktam divya maṅgala vigraham
dhruvāt praṇidhi toye tu kūrcā iva āvāhayet harim

original: tadvyāptaṃ to yamādāya kautukasya tu mūrdha ni /
analyzed: tat vyāptam yam ādāya kautukasya tu mūrdha
praṇavena samāsrāvya kūrcā iva āvāhayet guruḥ
mūrti mantrān samuccārya tatra kāryam samācaret
devyau ca eva tathā āvāhya samyak abhyarcayet budhaḥ
tathā eva āvāhayet vidvān vidhinā ca utsava ādiṣu
kaitukāt baliberasya kecid āvāhanam viduḥ
alaṅkāra āsanam paścāt saṃkalsya ca yathāvidhi
asanam mantravat dadyāt deveśam anumānayet
pādyam ācamanam ca api dadyāt pūrva ukta mantrataḥ
vastram kṣauma ādi ca arpayet
bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu mantreṇa bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca vibhūṣya ca
somasya tanūḥ asi iti uktvā ādhārayet uttarīyakam
aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa ca ūrdhva puṇḍram ca dhārayet
agnim dūtam iti procya yajña sūtram samarpayet
tat viṣṇoḥ iti mantreṇa puṣpa ādyaiḥ pūjayet tatas
mūrti mantrān samuccārya keśava ādibhiḥ eva vā
aṣṭottaraśataiḥ tadvat aṣṭottarasahasrakaiḥ
pūjyaḥ ananta nāmā bhavān hariḥ
tat viprāsa iti procya candanena anulepayet
paromātra'yā iti uccārya dhūpam āghrāpayet tatas
viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi mantreṇa dīpam tasmai pradarśayet
tris devaḥ iti mantreṇa dadyāt agham ca pūrvavat
upacāreṣu sarveṣu hareḥ smṛtam
tasmāt nivedayet dhīmān madhupaka unpamam śubham
tasya ante pūrva mantreṇa kārayet
droṇa taṇḍulam ādāya tad ardham pādam eva vā
taṇḍula artha tilaiḥ yuktam mukha vāsa phala anvitam

original: gṛhītvā kāṃsyapātretu devasyāgre nidhāya ca // BhS_18.180 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā kāṃsya pātre tu devasya agre nidhāya ca
somam
deva arpitaiḥ tu nirmālyaiḥ pūjayitvā ṛcakam tatas
mantreṇa hareḥ
arcakāya pradeyam syāt mātrādānam iti smṛtam
bahuśas dakṣiṇām dadyāt dāna sādguṇya siddhaye
devasya atvā iti mantreṇa parigṛhya tad arcakaḥ
upayuñjyāt kuṭuṃba arthe sa hi dāya haraḥ hareḥ
deva dravya uvabhoge tu īritaḥ
vaikhānasānām tad doṣā na asti deva prasādataḥ
praṇamya devadeveśam mantraiḥ veda ādi saṃbhavaiḥ
strotraiḥ ca vividhaiḥ sutvā pāde puṣpa añjalim kṣipet
dīpān mantreṇa tatra tu
kuṃbha dīpam samādāya deva agre tu vinikṣipet

original: vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca cāmanaṃ ca trivikramam // BhS_18.187 //
analyzed: vārāham nārasiṃham ca cāmanam ca tri vikramam
daleṣu abhyarcya vidhinā dīpe lakṣmīm samarcayet

original: vartikāyāṃ śriyaṃ caiva dhūme 'bhyarcyabhavaṃ tathā // BhS_18.188 //
analyzed: vartikāyām śriyam ca eva dhūme abhyarcya bhavam tathā
prokṣya upacāraiḥ abhyarchya puṣpa gandha ādibhiḥ kramāt

original: “śubhrā jyoti'riti procya karābhyāṃ parigṛhya ca, // BhS_18.189 //
analyzed: śubhrā jyotiḥ iti procya karābhyām parigṛhya ca
pradakṣiṇam tri vāram tu darśayan bhrāmayet harim

original: sarvavādyasamāyuktaṃ taṃ dīpaṃ parigṛhya ca // BhS_18.190 //
analyzed: sarva vādya samāyuktam tam dīpam parigṛhya ca

original: śiṣyo vā gaṇikā vāpi devāgāraṃ parītya ca /
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ vā gaṇikā vā api devāgāram parītya ca

original: visṛjeccaiva taṃ dīpaṃ pṛṣṭhe yūthādhipasya ca // BhS_18.191 //
analyzed: visṛjet ca eva tam dīpam pṛṣṭhe yūtha adhipasya ca
tad dīpa darśanāt nṝṇām āyuḥ śrī putra saṃvadaḥ

original: saṃbhavanti na sandeho viṣṇornī rājanaṃ hī tat // BhS_18.192 //
analyzed: saṃbhavanti na sandehaḥ viṣṇoḥ niḥ rājanam hi tat
citraiḥ cavāla vyajanaiḥ tad kāle vījayet guruḥ

original: darbaṇaṃ cāmaraṃ chatraṃ vyajanaṃ caturaṅgakam // BhS_18.193 //
analyzed: darbaṇam cāmaram chatram vyajanam caturaṅgakam

original: nṛttaṃ gītaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ mantramuccaran /
analyzed: nṛttam gītam ca vādyam ca vaiṣṇavam mantram uccaran
devasya darśayitvā tu stotram vedaiḥ kramāt caret
tathā nānāvidhaiḥ stotraiḥ śrāvayet acyutam harim
anuktam ca eva yat sarvam ūhayitvā samācaret
śrī bhūmyoḥ hṛd daye nyasya tat tat bīja akṣaram pṛthak
tad sūktābhyām ṣoḍaśa upacāraiḥ abhyarcayet kramāt
utcava ādeḥ ca pūrva uktam sarvam arcanam ācaret

original: tatobhojyānanaṃ caiva saṃkalpya ca yathāvidhi // BhS_18.197 //
analyzed: tatas bhojya ānanam ca eva saṃkalpya ca yathāvidhi

original: ghṛtaṃ madhu guḍaṃ caiva payo dadhi samanvitam /
analyzed: ghṛtam madhu guḍam ca eva payaḥ dadhi samanvitam
prastha mātram tu saṃgrāvyām
yat madhunā iti mantreṇa madhu pākam nivedayet
paścāt ācamanam da tvā śiṣyam kārye niyojayet
atha avanīda mantreṇa śodhayitvā sthalam tatas
maṇḍalam caturaśram ca kārayet baricārakaḥ

original: haviḥ pātrāṇi saṃśodhya ravimabhyarchya teṣu vai /
analyzed: haviḥ pātrāṇi saṃśodhya ravim abhyarchya teṣu vai

original: abhighārya ghṛtenaiva havistatra tu nikṣipet // BhS_18.201 //
analyzed: abhighārya ghṛtena eva haviḥ tatra tu nikṣipet
amṛtopastaraṇam asi iti atra kāryam samācaret

original: upadaṃśādikaṃ tatra guḍaṃ dadhi phalāni ca // BhS_18.202 //
analyzed: upadaṃśa ādikam tatra guḍam dadhi phalāni ca
nikṣipya viṣṇu gāyatṣā pṛthak pātreṣu asaṃkaram
yat te su sīma mantreṇa go ghṛtena abhighārya ca
devasya agre tu nikṣipya tri pādeṣu yathāvidhi

original: havirarpaṇakāle tu na sevyo harirucyate // BhS_18.204 //
analyzed: haviḥ arpaṇa kāle tu na sevyaḥ hariḥ ucyate
tasmāt vaikhānasān hitvā brāhmaṇāḥ anya sūtriṇaḥ

original: na viśeyustathānye ca tatkāle viṣṇumandiram // BhS_18.205 //
analyzed: na viśeyuḥ tathā anye ca tad kāle viṣṇu mandiram
kavāṭam bandhayet paścāt ghaṇṭā nādam ca kārayet
tūrya ghoṣa ādikam kuryāt mṛḍu vādya priyaḥ hariḥ
tatas acakaḥ prasanna ātmā devadevam anusmaran
haviḥ pātreṣu tulasīm nikṣipya aṣṭa akṣareṇa tu
puṣpaiḥ abhyarcya saṃprokṣya praṇavaiḥ pariṣicya ca
abhimṛśya anna sūktena surabhi mudrām pradarśya ca
tat asya priyam iti uktvā haviḥ uṣṇam nivedayet
subhūḥ svayaṃbhūm iti uktvā apūpam ca nivedayet
pṛthuka ādīni ca anyāni viśvabheṣaja amantrataḥ

original: apakvāni ca vastūni sarvamaṣṭākṣareṇa tu // BhS_18.210 //
analyzed: apakvāni ca vastūni sarvam aṣṭa akṣareṇa tu
idam viṣṇuḥ samuccārya pānīyam svādu śītalam
nivedayitvā gaṇḍūṣam pādyam ācamanam dadet
mantreṇa mukha vāsam pradāpayet
viṣṇugāyatrīm uccārya dadyāt puṣpa añjalim tatas

original: nityāgnikuṇḍe chullyāṃ vā pariṣicya ca pāvakam /
analyzed: nitya agnikuṇḍe chullyām vā pariṣicya ca pāvakam
caruṇā ājyena juhuyāt mūrti mantraiḥ kramāt budhaḥ
devī ādibhyaḥ tathā hutvā vaiṣṇavam ca yajet kramāt
puṣpa nyāsa ukta devebhyaḥ pāṣandānām tathā eva ca
tri kāleṣu uttamam proktam adhamam prātar eva hi
prātar madhyāhnayoḥ ca eva madhyamam homa lakṣaṇam
rakṣet agnim avicchinnam aśaktaḥ yaḥ ca rakṣitam
samidhi ātmani vā āropya praṇīya aharahar yajet
tatas yātrā āsanam vidvān saṃkalpya vidhinā budhaḥ

original: prokṣyālaṅkṛtya cādāya rathaṃ vā caturantaram // BhS_18.217 //
analyzed: prokṣya alaṅkṛtya ca ādāya ratham vā catur antaram
baliberam samāropya sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
rathantaram samuccārya tatra kāryam samācaret
yogeśam paraṃbrahmāṇam paramātmānam iti api
bhakta vatsala miti uktvā mūrti mantraiḥ tathā harim
nārāca rajjvā bandhayet rahasi kramāt
viṣṇuḥ tvā am iti mantreṇa pādau sṛṣṭvā namet muhur
somam rājānam uccārya chatram mūrdhani dhārayet
marutaḥ paramā ātmā iti pārśvayoḥ cāmare dadet
mantreṇa vyajanaiḥ vījayet harim
tathā anyaiḥ su mahā hainaḥ ca yuktaḥ divya paricchadaiḥ
ghaṇṭā raveṇa saṃyuktam śaṅkha bherī nināditaiḥ
bherī mṛdaṅga paṇava nissālaiḥ kāhalaiḥ api
mardalaiḥ divya vādyaiḥ ca laya śruti samanvitaiḥ
upatiṣṭhet jagadyonim nārāyaṇam anāmayam
śiṣyam āhūya tad kāle sa uṣṇiṣam sa uttarīya karma

original: ūrdhvepuṣpaṃ ca sannyasya prokṣayitvā ca mantrataḥ // BhS_18.225 //
analyzed: ūrdhve puṣpam ca sannyasya prokṣayitvā ca mantrataḥ
tasya uṣṇīṣa upari sthāpya bali pātram vicakṣaṇaḥ
alaṅkṛtya ca mālya ādyaiḥ pūjayet tākṣanī vat smaret

original: vāhayitvā baliṃ tena balipātreṇa caiva hi /
analyzed: vāhayitvā balim tena bali pātreṇa ca eva hi
sarva dvāreṣu sarvatra puṣpa nyāsa uktam āgantaḥ
pūrva antam uttara antam ca nikṣipet tu balim kramāt

original: toyaṃ puṣpaṃ baliṃ toyaṃ catvārastatra vigrahāḥ // BhS_18.228 //
analyzed: toyam puṣpam balim toyam catvāraḥ tatra vigrahāḥ
tatas devam samānīya kramamāṇāḥ śanais sanaiḥ
vāhakāḥ vāhayeyuḥ tam ratham sarvaṅga sundaram
krameṇa namra kāyaḥ tu kṣipet śiṣyaḥ balim kramāt

original: baliṃ datpāgrato gaccheddevena saha vā pṛthak // BhS_18.230 //
analyzed: balim datpa agratas gacchet devena saha vā pṛthak
tatas devam kramāt nītvā prādakṣiṇya krameṇa vai
tad kāle tu baliḥ deyaḥ stad kramaḥ tu pravakṣyate
maṇikam ca tatas sandhyām pradhama dvārapālakau

original: tāpasaṃ siddhidaṃ caiva dvitīya dvārapālakau // BhS_18.232 //
analyzed: tāpasam siddhidam ca eva dvitīya dvārapālakau
nyakṣa indrau antarāle ca yathāvidhi samarcayet
prathama āvaraṇa dvāre kiṣkindham tīrdham eva ca
dditīya āvaraṇa dvāre gaṇeśam śeṣam arcayet
tṛtīya āvaraṇa dvāre śaṅkha padma nidhī tathā

original: tuhiṇaṃ ca balindaṃ ca caturthāvaraṇe tathā /
analyzed: tuhiṇam ca balindam ca caturtha āvaraṇe tathā

original: pañcamāvaraṇe caiva khaḍgaṃ śāṅkhaṃ samarcayet // BhS_18.235 //
analyzed: pañcama āvaraṇe ca eva khaḍgam śāṅkham samarcayet
ṣaṣṭhe ca āvaraṇa śaṅkha cakracūḍau samarcayet

original: caṇḍaṃ tathā pracaṇḍaṃ ca saptamāvaraṇer'cayet // BhS_18.236 //
analyzed: caṇḍam tathā pracaṇḍam ca
sopāna madhye śrī bhūtam garuḍam ca samarcayet
havīrakṣakam agnim ca āgneyyām samyak arcayet
vimāna dakṣiṇe pārśve vivasvantam yamam tathā

original: nairṛtyāṃ vādya'rakṣaṃ ca nirṛtiṃ ca samarcayet // BhS_18.238 //
analyzed: nairṛtyām ca nirṛtim ca samarcayet
paścime mitram abhyarcyet tathā varuṇam eva ca
vāyavyām arcayet ca eva puṣpeśa marutau tathā

original: uttarasyāṃ tu kṣattāraṃ kuberaṃ ca samarcayet /
analyzed: uttarasyām tu kṣattāram kuberam ca samarcayet

original: īśānaṃ bhāskaraṃ caiva tathaiśānye samarcayet // BhS_18.240 //
analyzed: īśānam bhāskaram ca eva tathā aiśānye samarcayet

original: bhūtapīṭhe samabhyarcya cakraṃ caiva dhvajaṃ tathā /
analyzed: bhūtapīṭhe samabhyarcya cakram ca eva dhvajam tathā

original: śaṅkhaṃ yūthādhipaṃ caiva akṣahantaṃ tathārcayet // BhS_18.241 //
analyzed: śaṅkham yūthādhipam ca eva akṣahantam tathā arcayet

original: pīṭhasya dakṣiṇe bhāge “ye bhūtā' iti mantrataḥ /
analyzed: pīṭhasya dakṣiṇe bhāge ye bhūtāḥ iti mantrataḥ
bhūta yakṣa piśācebhyaḥ bali śeṣam tu nirvapet

original: pādau prakṣālya cācamya tatra kāryaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: pādau prakṣālya ca ācamya tatra kāryam samācaret
nṛtta geya ādi yuktam tu divya stotraiḥ samanvitam
pradakṣiṇa trayam kṛtvā bhrāmayitvā jagadgurum

original: sopānamadhye saṃsthāpya rajjubandhaṃ visṛjya ca // BhS_18.244 //
analyzed: sopāna madhye saṃsthāpya rajju bandham visṛjya ca
jaya śabdaiḥ tathā mantraiḥ dadyāt nī rājanam tatas

original: tato devaṃ samādāya svasthāne tu niveśayet // BhS_18.245 //
analyzed: tatas devam samādāya sva sthāne tu niveśayet
viṣṇusūktam samuccārya praṇāmam muhur ācaret
dadyāt puṣpa añjalim ca eva dvādaśa aṣṭa ṣaṣ akṣaraiḥ
pauruṣam sūktam uccārya praṇavam ca samuccaran

original: mukhavāsaṃ samarpyaiva śaktito dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // BhS_18.247 //
analyzed: mukha vāsam samarpya eva śaktitas dakṣiṇām dadet
tatas patadgrahāt tīrtham ādāya eva tu pūjakaḥ
tris pibet niyataḥ bhūtvā tulasīm api bhakṣayet
pratyūṣaḥ ca prabhātaḥ ca madhyāhnaḥ ca aparāhmakaḥ

original: sāyaṅkālo niśīthaśca pūjākālāntu ṣaṭ smṛtāḥ // BhS_18.249 //
analyzed: sāyaṅkālaḥ niśīthaḥ ca ṣaṭ smṛtāḥ
prātaḥkāla īrcanam kuryāt japa homa abhivṛddhaye
rāja rāṣṭra abhivṛddhi artham madhyāhna arcanam iṣyate
ca eva sarva sasya abhivṛddhaye
uṣaḥ kāla ar'canam proktam prajā paśu vivṛddhaye
aparāhṇa arcanam ca eva daitya nāśana hetave
ardharātra ar'canam proktam catuṣpād abhivṛddhaye
evam ṣaṭkāla pūjāyām phalam uktam viśeṣataḥ

original: ṣaṭkālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vā dvikālaṃ kālameva vā // BhS_18.253 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ kālam vā tri kālam vā dvi kālam kālam eva vā
pūjanam devadevasya tu aihika āmuṣmika pradam
ṣaṭkāla pūjane kuryāt ādāvāhanaṃbudhaḥ
tathā antya velā arcanāyām kuryāt udvāsanam param
upasandhyāsu deveśam āsana ādi aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ
samabhyarcya haviḥ dadyāt vinā homam balim tathā

original: puṣpanyāsaṃ ca homaṃ ca parivārārcanaṃ balim // BhS_18.256 //
analyzed: puṣpa nyāsam ca homam ca parivāra arcanam balim
nitya yātrā utsavam ca eva iti upasandhyāsu varjayet
tri kālam arcane anyatra mnapanam prātar eva
prokṣaṇam ca anya kāle tu mantreṇa iti āha pūjanam
śiṣyāṇām api abhāve tu varṣa ādi upahatau tathā
tathā vādya ādi abhāve vā bali kāle samāgate
tadā devān samāvāhya dvāra agre nikṣipet balim
sūryaḥ tu āmantram uccārya kavāṭam bandhayet tatas

original: madhyāhne caiva sāyāhne kāle kāle tathācaret // BhS_18.260 //
analyzed: madhyāhne ca eva sāyāhne kāle kāle tathā ācaret
tathā eva udghaṭayet kāle sarvam pūrvavat arcanam

original: puṣpaṃ dvārārcitaṃ śodhya punardvāre samarcayet // BhS_18.261 //
analyzed: puṣpam dvāra arcitam śodhya punar dvāre samarcayet
dhruva pīṭhe tu puṣpāṇi na śodhyāni punar punar
tāni puṣpāṇi an uddhṛtya tad ūrdhve nyāsam ācaret

original: sāyārcane tu tāni syuninrmālyāni na cānyataḥ /
analyzed: sāya arcane tu tāni syuḥ inrmālyāni na ca anyatas
kautuka ādi arcitam puṣpam ādāya vidhinā budhaḥ
pīṭhe pārśve nidhāya anyaiḥ arcayet tu navaiḥ navaiḥ
antya velā arcana ante tu saṃkalbya śayana āsanam
vimucya vastra mālya ādīn sūkṣma vastram samarpya ca
abhyarcya puṣba gandha ādyaiḥ devadevam śriyaḥpatim
sarva oṣadhi vimiśram ca kaṣāyam toyam eva ca
nivedya devadevasya
yat vaiṣṇavam iti procya mṛdu vādyaiḥ manoramaiḥ
divya upadhāna sahite divya alaṅkāra śobhite
pariṣkṛte vitāna advaiḥ divya dhūpaiḥ su dhūpite
śayane śāyayet harim
śrī bhūmyau ca samādāya tad mantrābhyām kramāt guruḥ
śāyayet deva pāśena tu ca uccaret
aricitaḥ suṣṭutaḥ ca asi suparṇa garuḍa dhvaja

original: cakrapāṇe mahābāho yatheṣṭaṃ vasa oṃ namaḥ' // BhS_18.270 //
analyzed: cakrapāṇe mahā bāho yatheṣṭam vasa om namaḥ

original: iti mantraṃ samuccārya bhaktyā paramāyā yutaḥ /
analyzed: iti mantram samuccārya bhaktyā paramāyāḥ yutaḥ
prātar āvāhitām śaktim dhruva bere avaropayet

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā mantreṇa deśikaḥ /
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam praṇāmam ca kṛtvā mantreṇa deśikaḥ
stutvā puruṣasūktena viṣṇugāyatriyā tathā
vyāpaka traya mantraiḥ ca tathā
atas deva ādibhiḥ mantraiḥ mantraiḥ anyaiḥ ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ
eka akṣara ādi sūktaiḥ ca dvādaśa aṣṭa ṣaṣ akṣaraiḥ
muhur puṣpa ājalim da tvā kṣāmayet doṣa saṃcayam
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa pūjanam ca autsava ādiṣu
brahmasthānam kautukasya pūrvam eva samīritam
sthāpayet snāpana autsavau
uttare kautukasya eva baliberasya saṃsthitiḥ
garbha ālayasya saṃkoce tu atha vā mukhamaṇḍape
antarāle atha vā sthāpya pūjayet snāpana autsavau
snāpana autsavayoḥ kuryāt pūrva ukta arcanam uttamam
āsana ādi upacārān ca kalpayet ṣoḍaśa atha vā
trayodaśa upacāraiḥ ca śāntam samyak samarcayet
nava upacāraiḥ abhyarcyet anapāyi gaṇān tathā
dvāradevān dvārapālān lokapālān tathā eva ca
aṣṭa upacāraiḥ abhyarcyet mūrtimantraiḥ samācaret
itarān parīvārān ca yajet ṣoḍaśa vigrahaiḥ
tathā eva pākalakṣmyāḥ ca dvāralakṣmyāḥ ca kārayet
śrīvatsa lakṣmyāḥ ca tathā devena saha ca ācaret
avatāra pratiṣṭhāyām dhruva ṛcām vā atha kārayet
trivikrama pratiṣṭhāyām dhruvā arcām arcayet tatas

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre 'ṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre aṣṭādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ekonaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ekonaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atas ūrdhvam dhruva arcāyām arcanam saṃpravakṣyate
mūrdha ādi pīṭhāt sannyasta puṣpa ādīni api śodhayet
yogavīra arcanam syāt ced tri kālam snānam ācaret
prātar madhyāhnayoḥ vā atha yogapīṭhe dhruva ar'canam
bhogam eva dhruva arcāyām prātar madhyāhna yoḥ api

original: trikālaṃ vātha saṃsnāpya dhruvārcāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ // BhS_19.3 //
analyzed: tri kālam vā atha saṃsnāpya dhruva arcāyām viśeṣataḥ
vastra ādīni api saṃśodhya puṣpa nyāsam ca pūrvavat
śiva ādīn arcayitvā tu pāda pīṭhe samantataḥ
tathā āsana ādyaiḥ sarvaiḥ ca trisaṃdhyam ca arcayet budhaḥ

original: ardhayāme tu pūrvāntamarcayitvā ca pūrvavat // BhS_19.5 //
analyzed: ardha yāme tu pūrva antam arcayitvā ca pūrvavat
haviḥ ni vedayet ca eva an uktam asyat ca pūrvavat
āvāhana visargau tu na kuryāt iti śāsanam
atha vakṣyeḥ acana ante tu vidhānam prati karmaṇām

original: sauvarṇamuttamaṃ pātraṃ rājataṃ madhyame bhavet // BhS_19.7 //
analyzed: sauvarṇam uttamam pātram rājatam madhyame bhavet

original: adhamaṃ tāmrapātraṃ tu trividhaṃ pātra mucyate /
analyzed: adhamam tāmra pātram tu trividham mucyate

original: tritālamuttamaṃ proktaṃ dvitālaṃ madhyamaṃ bhavet // BhS_19.8 //
analyzed: tri tālam uttamam proktam dvi tālam madhyamam bhavet
adhamam tu eka tālam syāt trividham pātra vistaram
vistāreṇa samākhyātam tayoḥ madhyama madhyamam
tasya madhye tri bhāga ekam karṇikā aṃgulam ucchrayam
paretaḥ aṣṭadalam kuryāt karṇikā ucchraya mānataḥ
dvi aṅgulam mūlanāham syāt tad agram tu ardhanāhakam
kiñcid phala aṃbuja ākāram agram kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
dvi prastha taṇḍulaiḥ pakvam annam tatra eva nikṣipet
abhighārya ghṛtena eva aṣṭa aṃgula samunnatam
daśa aṅgulam vā utsedham dvādaśa aṃgulam eva vā

original: tatpātrañca samādāya kautukāgre nidhāya ca // BhS_19.13 //
analyzed: tat pātram ca samādāya kautuka agre nidhāya ca
kautukāt śaktim ādāya ca arcayet aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ
para brahmāṇam iti uktvā paramātmānam iti api
bhakta vatsalam yogeśam catur mūrtibhiḥ arcayet
sāye tu arghya balim kuryāt pūrvam eva pracoditam
taṇḍulaiḥ kuḍubaiḥ ca api yathālābham atha api vā
śrutam ca arghya balim kuryāt puṣbam tu catur aṅgulam
śiṣyam āhūya tad kāle sa uṣṇīṣam sa uttarīyakam
śiṣyam garuḍa vat smṛtvā pātram uddhṛtya tatra vai
mantreṇa śiṣyaḥ tad śirasi nyaset
pradakṣiṇam tatas kuryāt kuḥ yāt śabda ravaiḥ yutam
vitāna chatra saṃyuktam piñcha cāmara saṃyutam
dhūpa dīpa samāyuktam śanais kuryāt pradakṣiṇam
pradakṣiṇa trayam kṛtvā praviśet ālayam bhudhaḥ
bhūta pīṭha antare tiṣṭhet gṛhṇīyāt tu tad arcakaḥ
kautuka agre tu san nyasya oṅkāreṇa niveśayet
bali agram khaṇḍayitvā tu seneśāya nivedayet

original: taccheṣaṃ sodakaṃ caiva bhūtapīṭhe tu nikṣipet // BhS_19.22 //
analyzed: tad śeṣam sa udakam ca eva bhūtapīṭhe tu nikṣipet
utsavam kartu kāmaḥ ced tri saṃdhiṣu evam uttamam

original: sāyaṃ prātarmadhyamaṃ syātsāyaṃ caivādhamaṃ bhavet // BhS_19.23 //
analyzed: sāyam prātar madhyamam syāt sāyam ca eva adhamam bhavet

original: baliṃ ca baliberaṃ vā kārayediti ke ca na /
analyzed: balim ca baliberam vā kārayet iti ke ca na
bali artham klapta devasya ca ūrdhva mānam udāhṛtam
mahāberasya hastena ca ekaviṃśatika aṃgulam
saptadaśa aṅgulam vidyāt dvādaśa aṃgulam eva vā
śreṣṭha madhya kaniṣṭhāni trividham mānam ācaret
arcā bera tri bhāgaiḥ kam uttama pratimā bhavet
tad mānasya daśa aṃśena tu ekonam madhyamam bhavet
madhyamasya daśa aṃśena tu ekonam adhamam bhavet
mahataḥ mūlaberasya mukha āyāmam praśasyate

original: balyarthaṃ pratimāṃ kuryātsarveṣāṃ sthāpanaṃ bhavet // BhS_19.28 //
analyzed: bali artham pratimām kuryāt sarveṣām sthāpanam bhavet
sauvarṇam rājatam tāmram śreṣṭha madhyama gauṇataḥ
ratna ja pratimām kuryāt māna unmānam na vidyate
uṣṇīṣam golakam jñeyam śiraḥ mānam tri mātrakam
keśānta arcā samam bhāgam saṃgamāt puṭa sūtrakam
puṭa sūtrāt dhanu paryantam ekam ekam tu bhāgaśas
galam ardha aṅgulam vindyāt mātrā ardham grīvam ucyate
hikkā hṛdaya paryantam mukham mātrā adhikam bhavet

original: hṛdayaṃ nābhi tathaivoktaṃ tadadhastāttu tatsamam // BhS_19.32 //
analyzed: hṛdayam nābhi tathā eva uktam tad adhastāt tu tat samam
ūrū ca dvi mukha āyāmam golaka utsedham iṣyate

original: caraṇaṃ jānumānaṃ ca kālāyapurato param? // BhS_19.33 //
analyzed: caraṇam jānu mānam ca param
hikkā sūtrāt adhastāt tu bāhu dvi mukha netrakam

original: prakoṣṭhaṃ mukhabandhaṃ ca mukhamardhādhikaṃ bhavet // BhS_19.34 //
analyzed: prakoṣṭham mukhabandham ca mukham ardha adhikam bhavet
maṇibandha aṅgulasya agre mukha yāmam praśasyate

original: caturbhujaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mānamevamudāhṛtam // BhS_19.35 //
analyzed: catur bhujam ca kṛtvā tu mānam evam udāhṛtam
vakuryāt padma ākāram tu golakam

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa haviṣpākaṃ vidhānataḥ // BhS_19.36 //
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa haviṣpākam vidhānataḥ
paktvā vitta anusāreṇa havīṃṣi api ca kalpayet

original: alpe mahati vā tulyaṃ phalamāḍhyadaridrayoḥ // BhS_19.37 //
analyzed: alpe mahati vā tulyam phalam āḍhya daridrayoḥ
nivedayitvā deveśam kalyāṇam kārayet budhaḥ
avadatvā ghṛtam yat tu kalyāṇam aśubhāyavai

original: alābhe caiva sarveṣāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ taṇḍulāṃ ḥs tathā /
analyzed: alābhe ca eva sarveṣām vrīhīṇām tathā
śata dvayam pañcaviṃśat vrīhibhiḥ pūritam tu yat

original: śuktimātramiti khyātaṃ mānaṃ tenaiva kārayet // BhS_19.40 //
analyzed: śukti mātram iti khyātam mānam tena eva kārayet
tad dvayam tilam iti uktam prakuñcam syāt tila dvayam

original: pātraṃ prasthadvayaṃ proktamāḍhakaṃ taddvayaṃ bhavet // BhS_19.42 //
analyzed: pātram prastha dvayam proktam āḍhakam tad dvayam bhavet
catur āḍhaka saṃyuktam droṇam iti abhidhīyate
bhavet
droṇa taṇḍula saṃyuktam uttamam haviḥ ucyate
tad ardham madhyamam proktan tad ardham adhamam bhavet
uttamottamam iti uktam aṣṭa droṇaiḥ tu taṇḍulaiḥ
adhikam yat bhavet tasmāt proktam sarvam mahāhaviḥ
tad ardhaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ siddham madhyamam haviḥ ucyate
ṣaṣ droṇaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ siddham haviḥ uttama madhyamam
droṇa hīnam bhavet tasmāt uttama adhamam ucyate
madhyama uttamam iti uktam catur dreṇaiḥ tu taṇḍulaiḥ
droṇa trayam bhavet yatra kṛtam madhyama madhyamam
madhyama adhamam iti uktam droṇa dvaya kṛtam haviḥ
droṇena taṇḍulena eva nivedya am adhama uttamam
tasya madhyamam iti uktam āḍhaka dvaya sammitam
āḍhakena tu

original: taṇḍulānāḍhakārdhaṃ tu devīnāṃ tu prakalpayet // BhS_19.50 //
analyzed: taṇḍula an āḍhaka ardham tu devīnām tu prakalpayet
caru prastha dvayam proktam haviḥ āḍhakam ucyate
prastham kuḍuba saṃyuktam piśācānām baliḥ bhavet
gandha varṇa rasaiḥ juṣṭāḥ pragrāhyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ tathā

original: prakṣālya taṇḍulān samyak niṣbīḍya ca punaḥpunaḥ // BhS_19.52 //
analyzed: prakṣālya taṇḍulān samyak niṣbīḍya ca punaḥpunar
catuḥ prakṣālanam kṛtvā prajā sthā alī iti mantrataḥ
ūrjasvati iti mantreṇa pātre prakṣipya taṇḍulān

vācaspati iti mantreṇa haviḥ svinnantu pācayet
dhūma gandha rasam svinnam atipakvam ca śītalam

mudgam ca eva mahāmudgam kūṭastham rājamāṣakam

original: kadalī panasaṃ caiva kūśmāṇḍaṃ bṛhatī tathā // BhS_19.56 //
analyzed: kadalī panasam ca eva kūśmāṇḍam bṛhatī tathā

guḍam dadhi samāyuktam ājya yuktam
haviḥ kṛtvā caturbhāgam ūrdhva bhāge nivedayet
adhastāt eka bhāgena homa artham balaye tathā
yad aṃśam pātra saṃśiṣṭam pūjāya eva ca nirmitam

original: sauvarṇe rājate pātre kāñcye tāmre nivedayet // BhS_19.59 //
analyzed: sauvarṇe rājate pātre kāñcye tāmre nivedayet

original: agni kāryāvaśiṣṭaṃ ca baliśiṣṭaṃ ca yaddhaviḥ /
analyzed: agni kārya avaśiṣṭam ca bali śiṣṭam ca yat haviḥ
tat sarvam pūjakāya eva proktam evam manīṣibhiḥ

original: arcakasya gṛhe vāpi pācayitvā nivedayet // BhS_19.61 //
analyzed: arcakasya gṛhe vā api pācayitvā nivedayet

arghya pradāna pātram ca kuḍubena prapūritam

original: pānīyadānapātraṃ ca kāṃsyaṃ śuktijameva vā // BhS_19.63 //
analyzed: pānīya dāna pātram ca kāṃsyam śuktijam eva vā

original: tāṃbūladāne pyevaṃ syātsauvarṇaṃ kāṃsyameva hi // BhS_19.64 //
analyzed: tāṃbūla dāne pi evam syāt sauvarṇam kāṃsyam eva hi
dapanṇam ca pradātavyam dhruva ānasa samam bhavet

kaluṣam kṛmi śaivāla yuktam sūtra vivarjitam

agrāhyam udakam grāhyam ebhiḥ deṣaiḥ vivarjitam
uttamam triguṇaiḥ adbhissānam ca athamam ucyate

original: abhiṣeko nadībhnantu madhyame madhyamaṃ bavet // BhS_19.68 //
analyzed: abhiṣekaḥ madhyame madhyamam
uśīra candana upetam yat jalam pādyam ucyate
elā lavaṅga takkola jātīphala samanvitam

original: candanaṃ cāguruścaiva kuṅkumaṃ gandha ucyate, // BhS_19.71 //
analyzed: candanam ca aguruḥ ca eva kuṅkumam gandhaḥ ucyate

original: ekaṃ dvayaṃ trayaṃ vāpi karbūreṇa catuṣṭayam /
analyzed: ekam dvayam trayam vā api karbūreṇa catuṣṭayam
uśīra canṭana upetam ghṛta yuktam ghṛta āplutam

dīpam madhyamam dīpam ucyate
adhamam tu bhavet dīpam aṅgula dvaya sammitam

original: tāmasaṃ tu bhaveddīpaṃ māhiṣeṇa tu sarpiṣā // BhS_19.76 //
analyzed: tāmasam tu bhavet dīpam māhiṣeṇa tu sarpiṣā
vṛkṣa bīja udbhava sneha dīpam paiśācam ucyate

original: daśahastāyataṃ caiva vistāraṃ tu dvihastakam // BhS_19.78 //
analyzed: daśa hasta āyatam ca eva vistāram tu dvi hastakam

mucyate

original: mauktikaṃ tu bhavecchatraṃ vastreśāpi hitaṃ tathā /

original: vastreṇa vā tathā kuryāttālapatramathāpi vā // BhS_19.84 //
analyzed: vastreṇa vā tathā kuryāt tālapatram atha api vā

original: chatraṃ tvadhomukhaṃ proktaṃ daṇḍaṃ piñchasya daṇḍavat /

original: mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ caiva hāraṃ kaiyūrakaṃ tathā /

a yāma dviguṇam bhavet

original: prapāṃ saṃyojya deveśaṃ dhyānenaiva tu sannayet // BhS_20.77 //
analyzed: prapām saṃyojya deveśam dhyānena eva tu san nayet

original: mahāhaviḥ prabhūtaṃ vā yathāśakti nivedayet // BhS_20.78 //

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā viṣṇuloke mahīyate
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute bhaktyā viṣṇu loke mahīyate
iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre
bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre

antha ekaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi viṣṇupañcadināni ca

original: śravaṇaṃ dvādaśī śukle kṛṣṇe cārdhe ca dvādaśī // BhS_21.1 //
analyzed: śravaṇam dvādaśī śukle kṛṣṇe ca ardhe ca dvādaśī
pūrṇimā ca api amāvāsyā pañca etāni dināni vai

saṃsthāpya caturaḥ vedān krameṇa adhyāpayet sadā

ekādaśīm upopya eva mahāpātaka nāśinīm

original: mṛṇmayāni tu bhāṇḍāni purāṇāni parityajet // BhS_21.7 //
analyzed: mṛṇmayāni tu bhāṇḍāni purāṇāni parityajet

original: arcayitvātu deveśaṃ gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ nivedayet // BhS_21.12 //
analyzed: arcayitvā tu deveśam gavyam kṣīram nivedayet

analyzed: grāmam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā snāpayitvā nivedayet

original: māghamāse tu pañcamyāṃ pūrvapakṣe viśeṣataḥ // BhS_21.15 //
analyzed: māgha māse tu pañcamyām pūrvapakṣe viśeṣataḥ

original: havīṃṣyapi nivedyaiva baddhvā pratisaraṃ punaḥ // BhS_21.16 //
analyzed: havīṃṣi api nivedya eva baddhvā pratisaram punar
pūrvavat chāyayitvā eva rātri śeṣam nayet kramāt

original: maṇḍapaṃ vātha kūṭaṃ vā prapāṃ vātha yathocitam /
analyzed: maṇḍapam vā atha kūṭam vā prapām vā atha yathocitam
gomayena upalipya eva pañca varṇaiḥ alaṅkṛtam

pramukhe dhānya rāśau tu dvi hasta āyata vistṛte

aṣṭabhiḥ ca dalaiḥ yuktam tila padmam samālikhet
tri niṣkena tad ardhena niṣka mātreṇa vā punar

original: svarṇapadmaṃ ca kṛtvātu tilapadme tu vinyaset // BhS_21.22 //

indra ādi īśāna paryantam śāli rāśi upari nyaset

original: paścime dadhimannyasya devadevaṃ praṇamya ca // BhS_21.24 //
analyzed: paścime dadhimat nyasya devadevam praṇamya ca

ekādaśa upacāraiḥ ca pūjayitvā yathārhakam
indra ādi aiśa antam āvāhya dek devān arcayet tata
atodevā ādi saṃyuktam viṣṇusūktam japet punar

original: stotrairgeyaiśca vādaiśca stutvā devaṃ samarcayet // BhS_21.31 //
analyzed: stotraiḥ geyaiḥ ca vādaiḥ ca stutvā devam samarcayet

original: phālgune māsi phalgunyāṃ śriyā sārthaṃ janārdanam /
analyzed: phālgune māsi phalgunyām śriyā sārtham janārdanam

bhaddhvā pratisaram tatra deveśāya nivedayet

prabhāte devam uddhāpya snāpayitvā ār'cayet tathā

original: jyeṣṭhe tu snāpayeddevaṃ navavastraṃ pradāpayet // BhS_21.40 //

original: śrāvaṇe māsi sakṣatre śravaṇe tu viśeṣataḥ /

original: so 'pi saṃvatsaraphalaṃ prāpya gacchetparaṃ padam // BhS_21.107 //

original: grahaṇaṃ saṃkramo hasticchāyā ca viṣuvādikam // BhS_21.113 //

vāsukiḥ yajña sūtrantu kaṭī sūtrantu takṣakam

original: hāraṃ karkoṭakaṃ caiva padmaṃ dakṣiṇakarṇake // BhS_24.60 //
analyzed: hāram karkoṭakam ca eva padmam dakṣiṇa karṇake

original: mahāpadmaṃ vāmakarṇe śaṅkha ca śirasi kramāt /
analyzed: mahāpadmam vāma karṇe śaṅkha ca śirasi kramāt
gulikam dakṣiṇe haste kramāt sarva vibhūṣaṇam
mūrdhnaḥ ca upari kartavyam śveta chatram tu sundaram
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca api cāmara dvaya saṃyutam
pāda pārśva dvaye ca eva dīpa dvaya samanvitam

original: pūrṇakuṃbhaṃ tayormadhye likhitvā tu viśeṣataḥ, // BhS_24.63 //
analyzed: pūrṇa kuṃbham tayoḥ madhye likhitvā tu viśeṣataḥ
tasya adhas śaṅkha cakre ca samālikhya viśeṣataḥ
muktā dāma ādi alaṅkṛtya pārśvayoḥ kadalīkṛtam
pūrvasmin eva divase kṛtvā nayana mokṣaṇam
devālayasya abhimukhe prapāyām vā
pañca varṇaiḥ alaṅkṛtya vitāna staṃbha veṣṭanaiḥ

original: śālirāśiṃ ca kṛtvaiva tatpaṭantu susannyaset // BhS_24.66 //
analyzed: śāli rāśim ca kṛtvā eva tad paṭam tu su sannyaset
vāstu homam tatas kṛtvā paryagnīkaraṇam caret
puṇyāham vācayitvā eva prokṣayet pañcagavyakaiḥ
aiśānyām agnikuṇḍe tu cauva āsana vidhānataḥ

original: āghāraṃ vidhivaddhutvā vaiṣṇavaṃ ca suhūyate // BhS_24.68 //
analyzed: āghāram vidhivat hutvā vaiṣṇavam ca suhūyate
haima pātra stha varṇena haima tūlyāḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: tanmantraṃ ca samuccārya nayanonmilanaṃ caret // BhS_24.69 //
analyzed: tat mantram ca samuccārya nayana unmilanam caret
aṅga homam tatas kṛtvā darśanīyaiḥ ca darśayet

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ ca hutvātu tathā puruṣasūktakaiḥ // BhS_24.70 //
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam ca hutvā tu tathā puruṣasūktakaiḥ

original: vyāhṛtyaṃntaṃ ca hutvātu tataḥ kuṃbhaṃ pragṛhyaca /
analyzed: vyāhṛti antam ca hutvā tu tatas kuṃbham pragṛhya ca

original: tantunā pariveṣṭai va kūrcayuktaṃ sahākṣatam // BhS_24.71 //
analyzed: tantunā kūrca yuktam saha akṣatam

iṣe tvā ūrjye tvā ādi japan āpaḥ undantu iti kramāt

original: tataḥ puruṣasūktaṃ ca mantrānapi ca vaiṣmavān /
analyzed: tatas puruṣasūktam ca mantrān api ca vaiṣmavān
kūrcena eva tu tat toyam abhimṛśya samāhitaḥ

apaḥ hiraṇya varṇābhiḥ pavamāna ādibhiḥ tribhiḥ
śat naḥ devī arabhi iti uktvā puruṣasūktena vaiṣṇapaiḥ

original: śuddhyarthaṃ prokṣayitvā tu puṇyāhamapi vācayet // BhS_24.75 //
analyzed: śuddhi artham prokṣayitvā tu puṇyāham api vācayet
pariṣicya pāvakam paścāt tad mantreṇa suhūyatām

śayane śāyayet ca eva deva vāde śiraḥ tathā

original: hautraṃ praśaṃsya tatkāle hotā hautrakrameṇa vai // BhS_24.78 //
analyzed: hautram praśaṃsya tad kāle hotā hautra krameṇa vai
vainateyasya mantreṇa tad mūrti āvāhanam caret

original: vyāhṛtyantaṃ ca kṛtvā tu rātriśeṣaṃ vyapohya ca /
analyzed: vyāhṛti antam ca kṛtvā tu rātri śeṣam vyapohya ca

original: āgneyyāṃ nyasya bheryāṃ ca nandikeśvaramāhvayet // BhS_24.81 //
analyzed: āgneyyām nyasya bheryām ca nandikeśvaram āhvayet
punar prabhāte

original: muhūrte samanuprāpte hṛdi bījākṣaraṃ nyaset // BhS_24.82 //
analyzed: muhūrte samanuprāpte hṛdi bīja akṣaram nyaset
kuṃbhāt śaktim vidhānataḥ
puṇyāham vācayitvā eva samabhyarca vivedayet
agnim prajvālya tad mantraiḥ juhuyāt daśaśas kramāt
anta homam vācayitvā eva samabhyarcya nivedayet

dhūpa dīpaiḥ alaṅkṛtya śālipīdham prakalpayet

original: śālyardhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ proktaṃ tadardhaṃ tilamāharet // BhS_24.86 //
analyzed: śāli ardham taṇḍulam proktam tad ardham tilam āharet
cakram paścimatas nyasya dhānya pīṭha upari sthitam

original: tasyaivot tarataḥ pārśveviṣvaksenaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_24.87 //
analyzed: tasya eva ud tarataḥ pārśve viṣvaksenam tathā eva ca
dhānya pīṭhe su saṃsthāpya garuḍam paścimā mukham

original: nyasya bherīṃ ca pārśve yaṣṭiṃ susannyaset // BhS_24.88 //
analyzed: nyasya bherīm ca pārśve yaṣṭim su sannyaset

original: dviguṇaṃ havirevoktaṃ devībhyāṃ ca tathā bhavet // BhS_24.89 //
analyzed: dviguṇam haviḥ eva uktam devībhyām ca tathā bhavet
cakra ādīnām pṛthakkuryāt āsana ādīn pṛthak pṛthak
nandīśvaram tathā abhyarcya havirbhiḥ ca nivedayet

original: “upa śvāsaya' mantraṃ ca japtvā bherīṃ sutāḍayet // BhS_24.91 //
analyzed: upa śvāsaya mantram ca japtvā bherīm su tāḍayet
vādakaḥ tu śuciḥ bhūtvā vastra mālya ādi alaṅkṛtaḥ
sarva vādya samāyuktam bherīm ādāya śāstra vid
śāstra uktena vidhānena cakra agre tāḍayet tadā
droṇaiḥ dreṇa ardhakaiḥ vā api āḍhakaiḥ vā atha taṇḍulaiḥ
pācayitvā prakṣipet balim uttamam
mudga niṣpāva tilvān ca ca

original: kaṭāhe tu susannyasya śiṣyastaṃ śirasā vahet /
analyzed: kaṭāhe tu su sannyasya śiṣyaḥ tam śirasā vahet
abhivandya dhvacam pūrvam ādāya samalaṅkṛtam

original: rathe vā śibikāyāṃ vā mantreṇāropya maṅgalaiḥ /
analyzed: rathe vā śibikāyām vā mantreṇa āropya maṅgalaiḥ

original: saha puṣpaṃ baliṃ pātre saṃgṛhyānugataṃ punaḥ // BhS_24.96 //
analyzed: saha puṣpam balim pātre saṃgṛhya anugatam punar
cakravīśā mitān paścāt nātha vat gamayet tadā

original: dvāreṣu dvārapālebhyo dhāmapālebhya eva ca // BhS_24.98 //

original: yasyāṃ diśi bhaveddhāma taddigādi baliṃ kṣipet // BhS_24.100 //

original: arghyāntaṃ ca samabhyarcya muṣṭyannaṃ nāmabhirdadet // BhS_24.102 //

original: devebhyo dakṣiṇe paścā drākṣanebhyaśca paścime // BhS_24.103 //

original: “ye bhūtā'iti mantreṇa pūrvaṃ dadyājjalaṃ punaḥ // BhS_24.104 //

original: tatodikpālakānāṃ ca tathā bhūtabaliṃ kṣipet // BhS_24.107 //

original: mantreṇa matimān paścātprāṅmukho vā pyudaṅmukhaḥ // BhS_24.125 //

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayetpaścānmudgānnaṃ tu dhvajasya ca // BhS_24.127 //

original: vighnāni jahi sarvāṇi ātmasātkuru māmapi.' // BhS_24.139 //

haviḥ samyak nivedya eva saptaviṃśati vigrahaiḥ

original: śiṣyeṇa guruṇā cātha cakrasyābhimukhe tathā // BhS_24.146 //

original: nityaṃ rātrau viśeṣeṇa tathā bhūtabaliṃ kṣipet /

original: vīśāmitau vinā dhīmān tīrthāntaṃ sarvarātriṣu // BhS_24.147 //

original: dhvajasyārohaṇaṃ rātrāvapi kurvanti ke ca na /

gaccheyuḥ atha vā tīrthe nivarteyuḥ asaṃśayam

original: bahirvīthyāṃ tu tadgrāme janāssarve tathaiva ca /

original: devādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sthānaṃ pravakṣyate // BhS_24.153 //
analyzed: deva ādīnām ca sarveṣām teṣām sthānam pravakṣyate

original: ete devāstrayastriṃśāḥ kathitā brahmaṇā purā // BhS_24.155 //
analyzed: ete devāḥ trayastriṃśāḥ kathitāḥ brahmaṇā purā
