aṣṭādaśa gaṇānām tu bhuta pīṭhasya dakṣiṇe
devāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ sarve pitaraḥ daitya dānavāḥ
asurāḥ ca eva gandharvāḥ stathā eva apsarapā aṅgaṇāḥ
yakṣāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ ca eva nāgāḥ bhūtāḥ piśācakāḥ
anāvṛṣṭi gaṇāḥ ca eva tathā amṛta mucām gaṇāḥ
mātaraḥ ca eva rohiṇyaḥ sūryāḥ aṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ
aṣṭādaśa gaṇāḥ ca ete proktāḥ vai devayonayaḥ
an uktān anya devān ca indra pārśve samarcayet

original: devānāṃ caiva patnīśca tattatpārśve samarcayet // BhS_24.161 //
analyzed: devānām ca eva patnīḥ ca tad tad pārśve samarcayet

original: skando vighnaśca durgā ca jyeṣṭhā caiva sarasvatī /
analyzed: skandaḥ vighnaḥ ca durgā ca jyeṣṭhā ca eva sarasvatī

original: tadālaye baliṃ dadyātprākāre cottare 'pi vā // BhS_24.162 //
analyzed: tad ālaye balim dadyāt prākāre ca uttare api vā
parivāra ukta deśe tu rohiṇyaḥ mātaraḥ tathā
ṛṣi patnīḥ ca tāḥ sapta ṛṣibhiḥ saha
siddhān vidyādharān ca eva garuḍa gandharva kinnarān

original: kipūruṣāṃś cāraṇān devān mahādikṣu samarcayet // BhS_24.164 //
analyzed: kipūruṣān cāraṇān devān mahā dikṣu samarcayet
bhūtebhyaḥ ca atha yakṣebhyaḥ piśācebhyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: rākṣasebhyaśca nāgebhyassaṃdhau saṃdhau baliṃ dadet // BhS_24.165 //
analyzed: rākṣasebhyaḥ ca nāgebhyaḥ saṃdhau saṃdhau balim dadet
rāja veśma aṅgaṇe madhye indram ca eva samarcayet
tasya dakṣiṇa pārśve tu jaya śrī kīrtīḥ samarcayet
utsava artham viśeṣeṇa saṃbhārān āharet tatas

original: rathaṃ ca śibikāṃ caiva yantraḍolādikāṃs tathā // BhS_24.167 //
analyzed: ratham ca śibikām ca eva yantra ḍolā ādikān tathā

original: kārayitvā ca śilpoktaṃ dīpānanyān pragṛhya ca /
analyzed: kārayitvā ca śilpa uktam dīpān anyān pragṛhya ca
bherī ādīni api vādyāni śaṅkha kāhalakāni ca
tālavṛntam dhvajān anyān chatra cāmara barhiṇaḥ
nartakān gāyakān anyān yathoktam pūrvam āharet
ālayam samalaṅkṛtya toraṇa ādyaiḥ vibhūṣya ca
paricārān samāhūya sva sva karma nivedayet
maṇṭapādīni sarvāṇi prapādīni ca sarvaśas
āstāna artham ca nṛtya artham kārayet śilpa śāstra vid
ava mantreṇa grāma vīthīḥ viśeṣataḥ
viprāḥ veda vidaḥ śuddhāḥ śodhayeyuḥ manoramam
āśāsu sapta iti uktvā gavya ādyaiḥ sarvatas śubham
samabhyukṣya upalipya eva taṇḍulān avakīrayet
kadalī pūga kuṃbha ādyaiḥ alaṅkuryāt gṛha aṃgaṇam
vitāna ādyaiḥ viśeṣeṇa phūṣayet sarvatas śubham
tad grāma vāsinaḥ sarve alaṅkṛtāḥ na anya tatparāḥ
naimittika ādikam hitvā dhyāyeyuḥ manasā harim
tad grāma sīmani antasthsā nityakarma kriyām vinā
naimittikāni kāmyāni tīrtha antam na ācaret budhāḥ
pravṛtte ca utsave viṣṇoḥ saumya mārgeṇa vāstuṣu
anyat eva utsavam tatra na ācaret iti śāsanam
asmin deva utsave yāge tad vāstuṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: saṃkalpya cottarāṃ vediṃ pravṛtte 'nyāni nācaret // BhS_24.178 //
analyzed: saṃkalpya ca uttarām vedim pravṛtte anyāni na ācaret
yadi ced sarva nāśaḥ syāt kartā a bhartā vinaśyati
tasmāt pariharet dhīmān tīrtha antam teṣu vāntuṣu
utsava ādi dināt pūrvam saptame pañcame atha vā
saṃsnāpya devadeveśam aṅkurār'paṇam ācaret

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāste bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre caturviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāste bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre caturviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha pañcaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha utsava vidhim vakṣye devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ
āraṃbha divasāt pūrvam yajamānaḥ mud nvitaḥ
pūrva ukta guṇa saṃpannam varayitvā gurum tathā
dviguṇa ārādhanāya ekam ekam kuṃbha arcanāya ca
homa artham bali dāna artham tathā sthāna arcanāya ca
vṛṇet padārthinaḥ pañca tāvataḥ paricārakān
ācāryam upasaṃgamya saṃpūjya ca vidhānataḥ
karma idam me yācayet vinaya anvitaḥ
ācāryaḥ saha śiṣyaiḥ tu kṛtvā keśādi vāpanam

original: snātvā snānavidhānena dhṛtvā dhautaṃ yathāvidhi // BhS_25.5 //
analyzed: snātvā snāna vidhānena dhṛtvā dhautam yathāvidhi
ūrdhva puṇḍra dharaḥ samyak saṃdhyā ādīn samupāsya ca

original: brahmayajñaṃ ca kṛtvaiva tathā devarṣi tarpaṇam // BhS_25.6 //
analyzed: brahmayajñam ca kṛtvā eva tathā devarṣi tarpaṇam
japet dvādaśa sūktāni nārāyaṇam atha aruṇam

original: ālaye saṃpraviśyaiva deveśaṃ saṃpraṇamya ca // BhS_25.7 //
analyzed: ālaye saṃpraviśya eva deveśam saṃpraṇamya ca
devam viśeṣataḥ abhyarcya kāryam tasmai nivedayet
yajamānaḥ api dharma ātmā nitya karma samāpya ca
devālayam pravis ca eva puṇyāham kārayet tatas
śrī vaikhānasa sūtra ukta madhuparma vidhānataḥ
ācāryam ṛtvijaḥ ca eva saṃpūjya vidhinā tatas
alaṅkuryāt ca gantha ādyaiḥ dhūpa dīpa ādibhiḥ tathā
nava vastra uttarīya ādyaiḥ tathā pañcāṅga bhūṣaṇaiḥ
pañcāṅga bhūṣaṇam vakṣye yathā kuryāt atandritaḥ
daśa niṣka pramāṇena kuṇḍala ābharaṇam pṛthak
ṣaṣ niṣka mānam kaṭakam aṅgadam ca aṃgulīyakam
ekaviṃśati niṣka āḍhyam kaṭī sūtram sa lakṣaṇam
tad ardha aṃśa pramāṇā iva grīvā alaṅkaraṇam pṛthak
aṣṭa niṣka pramāṇā iva yajña sūtram ca kārayet
anena vidhinā kuryāt guroḥ ardha ardham ṛtvijām
ācāryaḥ prokṣya ca ātmānam yajamānam atha ṛtvijaḥ
prāśnīyāt pañcagavyam ca padārthibhyaḥ ca sādaram
yajamānāya dadyāt ca mantra pūrvam viśeṣataḥ

original: tataḥ padmāgnimādhāya pariṣicya ca pāvakam // BhS_25.16 //
analyzed: tatas padma agnim ādhāya pariṣicya ca pāvakam
yaddeva ādi catur sūktāni ājyena juhuyāt guruḥ
vaiśvānareṇa sūktena ca upatiṣṭhet hutāśanam
kṣapayitvā tatas pāpam karma arhāḥ te bhavanti atas
kūśmāṇḍa homaḥ iti uktaḥ sarva pāpa praṇāśanaḥ
tad kāne dīkṣitāḥ sarve vidhi mantra purassaram
baddhvā pratisaram haste paścāt kuryuḥ kriyām api
tatas prabhṛti sarve te danta nakhāḥ tathā
haviṣya bhojinaḥ dāntāḥ stri kāla snāyinaḥ api ca
jita indriyāḥ bhaveyuḥ te tathā adhaśsāyinaḥ api ca
strī śūdrābhyām a saṃbhāṣya nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ
yāvatkālam bhavet dīkṣā tāvat śuddhāḥ ime smṛtāḥ

original: sūtake mṛtake vāpi teṣāṃ nāśauca iṣyate // BhS_25.22 //
analyzed: sūtake mṛtake vā api teṣām na āśaucaḥ iṣyate
mṛttikā grahaṇe vidhim

original: śānta cakre samabhyarcya havīṃṣyapi nivedya ca // BhS_25.23 //
analyzed: cakre samabhyarcya havīṃṣi api nivedya ca
viṣvaksenam samādāya yānam āropya nātha vat
ācāryaḥ puratas gacche dviṣṇuḥ mā am iti ca uccaran
cakrasya paścāt gaccheyuḥ ācāryeṇa samanvitāḥ
ādarśa hema kalaśa pūrṇa kuṃbha aṃkura ādibhiḥ
dhvaja traya ādikān sarvān puraskṛtya padārthinaḥ
prācyām sarva samṛddhiḥ syāt āgneyyām dhānya nāśanam
yāmye jana vināśaḥ syāt nairṛtyām dhana nāśanam
anāvṛṣṭiḥ ca vāruṇyām rāja kopaḥ ca pāvane
saumye putra samṛddhiḥ syāḥ daiśānyām sukha dam bhavet

original: etānāṃ tu diśāṃ madhye praśastāṃ śuddhamṛttikām // BhS_25.28 //
analyzed: etānām tu diśām madhye praśastām śuddha mṛttikām
ācāryaḥ sādhanaiḥ yuktaḥ diśam gatvā sa śiṣyakaḥ
grāma devālaya ādārāt ārāme atra manorame
nadī taṭāka tīre vā sīmām an atilaṅghya ca

original: prārdhya bhūdevatāmantrai śśuddhe deśe mṛdaṃ haret // BhS_25.30 //
analyzed: prārdhya bhū devatā mantraiḥ śuddhe deśe mṛdam haret

original: vīśāmitau ca cakraṃ ca sthāpayetprāṅmukhān budhaḥ /
analyzed: vīśā mitau ca cakram ca sthāpayet prāc mukhān budhaḥ
prāc mukhaḥ ca upalipya eva vṛtta ākāram samullikhet
tatra sthānam ca saṃprokṣya dadhi

original: bhūrūpaṃ tu likhitvaiva “bhūmirbhū'mneti ca bruvan // BhS_25.32 //
analyzed: bhū rūpam tu likhitvā eva ca bruvan
ūrdhva vaktrām ca śayitām aiśānyām nyasta maulikām

original: devīṃ mahīṃ tāmabhyarcya prokṣaṇaiḥ prokṣaṇaṃ caret // BhS_25.33 //
analyzed: devīm mahīm tām abhyarcya prokṣaṇaiḥ prokṣaṇam caret
ekādaśa upacāraiḥ ca mūrtimantraiḥ samarcayet
puṇyāham vācayitvā tu medinī ādi samuccaran
khanitre śeṣam abhyarcya vastra ādyaiḥ samalaṅkṛte
lalāṭe sarva doṣa ghnam bāhvoḥ bahu sukha pradam
stana dvaye vayaḥ vṛddhiḥ jaṭhare sarva saṃpadaḥ

original: adhobhāge mṛdaṃ tasyā nāhareta kadācana // BhS_25.36 //
analyzed: adhobhāge mṛdam tasyāḥ na āhareta kadācana

original: evaṃ saṃkalpya manasā medinyādi tadā bruvan /
analyzed: evam saṃkalpya manasā medinī ādi tadā bruvan

original: “tvāṃ khanā'mīti mantreṇa vārāhaṃ manasā smaran // BhS_25.37 //
analyzed: tvām khana ami iti mantreṇa vārāham manasā smaran
ubhābhyām ca eva hastābhyām khanitreṇa khanet budhaḥ
mahīm devīm anujñāpya khanitvā tāla mātrakam

original: apohyaiva ca tatsarvaṃ tadadhasthsāṃ mṛdaṃ haret /
analyzed: apohya eva ca tat sarvam mṛdam haret
vaiṣṇavam mantram uccārya tatra kāryam samācaret
pātra madhye su sannyasya pūrvavat śirasi nyaset

original: paścāddevīṃ samudvāsya cāpaṭaṃ tatra pūrayet // BhS_25.40 //
analyzed: paścāt devīm samudvāsya cāpaṭam tatra pūrayet
śirasā dhārayitvā tu purastāt cakra śāntayoḥ
grāmam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā devālayam upāvrajet
pūrvasmin uttare pārśve vāṃkurān arpayet tadhā
cakra ādīn abhiṣicya eva haviḥ samyak nivedya ca
tu saṃsthāpya paścāt yāgam samārabhet

original: alayābhimukhe vāpi dakṣiṇe vā manorame // BhS_25.43 //
analyzed: alaya abhimukhe vā api dakṣiṇe vā manorame
yama pāvakayoḥ madhye pāvaka aṃśe atha vā caret

original: aiśānyāṃ vātha vā kecitsomeśānāntare tathā // BhS_25.44 //
analyzed: aiśānyām vā atha vā kecid soma īśāna antare tathā
kalpayet yāga śālām ca pratiṣṭhā ukta vidhānataḥ

original: vediṃ tanmadhyame paṅktau vedimānena kārayet // BhS_25.45 //
analyzed: vedim tad madhyame paṅktau vedi mānena kārayet
pratiṣṭhā ādi ardha mānam vā ratni mātra udayam kramāt
pañca agnīn kalpayet dhīmān utsave ca uttame tathā
tretāgnīn kalpayet vidvān madhyame ca utsave kramāt
adhamam yadi ced sabhyam kalpayet pūrvavat sudhīḥ
tretāgni kalpanam yatra pradhānam gārhapatyakam
ubhayoḥ anyayoḥ sabhyam pradhānam kalpayet tathā
bhūmi yajñā iva sarvatra śodhayet ca yathāvidhi

original: devaṃ devyau samādāya snānaśvabhre gurūttamaḥ // BhS_25.49 //
analyzed: devam devyau samādāya snāna śvabhre guru uttamaḥ
param raṃ'ha iti mantreṇa sthāpayet ca viśeṣataḥ
nitya snāna ukta mārgeṇa snāpayitvā harim param
āsthāne viṣṭaram nyasya tad ūrdhve vastram āstaret

original: devaṃ devyau samādāya śvetavastrairvibhūṣya ca // BhS_25.51 //
analyzed: devam devyau samādāya śveta vastraiḥ vibhūṣya ca
kuṇḍala aṃgada hāra ādi bhūṣaṇaiḥ api bhūṣayet
śveta mālyaiḥ alaṅkṛtya śveta gandha anulepanaiḥ

original: pavitraṃ cottarīyañca gatvā devaṃ praṇamya ca /
analyzed: pavitram ca uttarīyam ca gatvā devam praṇamya ca
rāja vat ca upacāra ādīn ācaret deśika uttamaḥ
nava kubha āropaṇam
pūrva ukta vidhinā dhīmān nava kuṃbhān pragṛhya ca
indram naraḥ naḥ iti uktvā a tantunā veṣṭayet tathā
vedyām upari pūrva ukta dhānyāni āstīrya mantra vid
catur sūtraiḥ nava padam kṛtvā kuṃbhān ca vinyaset
kuṃbhān adbhiḥ ppapūrya eva kuśa kūrca akṣata ādikān

original: maṅgalānyāyudhaṃ ratnaṃ pratikuṃbhaṃ pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_25.56 //
analyzed: maṅgalāni āyudham ratnam pratikuṃbham pṛthak pṛthak
ca eva nikṣivya madhya kuṃbhe viśeṣataḥ
dvi aṅgulena pramāṇena sruc ādīni api pūrvavat
hānakena eva kṛtvā tu viṣṇusūktena nikṣipet

original: āveṣṭya vastrayugmena sarvānapi pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_25.58 //
analyzed: āveṣṭya vastra yugmena sarvān api pṛthak pṛthak
vedyāḥ m adhastāt pūrvā itu vīśam vai paścimā mukham
sannyasya dakṣiṇe paścāt cakram ca eva uttarā mukham
paṅktīśam prāc mukham paścāt paścime ca uttare atha vā
dakṣiṇa abhimukham śāntam sthaṇḍila upari san nyaset

original: abhāve garuḍādīnāṃ sthāne tatra ca tatra ca /
analyzed: abhāve garuḍa ādīnām sthāne tatra ca tatra ca
kuṃbhān sannyasya tad madhye dhyātvā eva āvāhayet kramāt
yāvat tīrtha avasānam syāt tāvat kuṃbhetu pārṣadān
sāyam prātar viśeṣeṇa pūjayet vidhivat sudhīḥ
paścāt sabhya agnikuṇḍe tu vidhinā āghāra mācaret
uttara abhimukhaḥ stiṣṭhan kuruḥ vedyāḥ tu dakṣiṇe
prāṇāyāmam tatas kṛtvā pūrvavat dhyānam ācaret

original: pradhānakuṃbhamadhye tu viṣṇuṃ devyau ca sānvayau // BhS_25.64 //
analyzed: pradhāna kuṃbha madhye tu viṣṇum devyau ca sa anvayau
dhruvāt āvāhayet mantrī prāc ādiṣu yathākramam

original: puruṣaṃ kapilaṃ satyaṃ yajñamacyutameva ca // BhS_25.65 //
analyzed: puruṣam kapilam satyam yajñam acyutam eva ca
nārāyaṇam ca aniruddham tatas puṇyam samarcayet

original: taṃ rukmavarṇaṃ raktāsyaṃ raktanetraṃ sukhodvaham // BhS_25.66 //
analyzed: tam rukma varṇam rakta āsyam rakta netram sukha udvaham
kirīṭa hāra keyūra laṃba yajña upavītinam
kaustubha udbhāsita uraskam śrīvatsa aṃkam catur bhujam
dakṣiṇena eka hastena bhaktānām abhaya pradam
vāmena api anya hastena sva kaṭyām avalaṃbitam

original: parābhyāṃ tu karābhyāṃ tu śaṅkhacakradharaṃ param /
analyzed: parābhyām tu karābhyām tu śaṅkha cakra dharam param
śuka piñcha aṃbara dharam viṣṇum praṇava rūpiṇam
tapta hāṭaka saṃkāśām padma patra āyata īkṣaṇām
tisṛbhiḥ puṣpa cūḍūbhiḥ lalāṭa upari śobhitām
sa padma vāma hasta antām kakṣyā baddha ghana stanīm
prasārita itara karām prasanna indu nibha ānanām
śrīvatsa aṃkita bīja antām
viṣṇoḥ dakṣiṇa pārśva sthām haṃsaniryā ākhya vāhinīm
vāma bhāge mahīm śyāmām sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
vaiśākhe revatī jātām dadhatīm dakṣiṇe aṃbujam
prasārita itara karām prasanna indu nibha ānanām
mahā cātakam ārūḍhām lakṣnī pūrva akṣara anvitām
puruṣaḥ prāc mukhaḥ accha ābhaḥ pīta vāsāḥ catur bhujaḥ
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ śrīmān sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
kapilaḥ prāc mukhaḥ accha ābhaḥ rakta vastraḥ aṣṭa bāhu yuj
dakṣiṇena eka hastā iva bhaktānām abhaya pradaḥ
anyaiḥ cakra asi halabhṛt sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
vāmena api anya hastena sva kaṭyām avalaṃbya ca
anyaiḥ saṃkha dhanuḥ daṇḍa dharaḥ suṃdara vigrahaḥ

original: āgneyyāṃ diśi gāyatṣā sāvitṣā ca yuto hariḥ /
analyzed: āgneyyām diśi gāyatṛā sāvitṛā ca yutaḥ hariḥ
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ yaumyaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
vara daḥ abhaya daḥ sādhu rakta vāsāḥ mahā hanuḥ
devībhyām dhṛti pauṣṇībhyām yutaḥ yāmya diśi prabhuḥ
yajñaḥ paścima diś vaktraḥ tapta cāmīkara prabhaḥ
sapta hastaḥ catur śruṅgaḥ rakta vāsāḥ dvi śīrṣakaḥ
śaṅkha cakra ājya pātra sruc sruva an upabhṛtam juhūm
bibhrat tri pādaḥ nairṛtyām devaḥ svāhā svadhā yutaḥ
acyutaḥ paścimāśāsyaḥ kanaka ābhaḥ catur bhujaḥ
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ śrīmān sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
yuktaḥ pavitrī kṣoṇībhyām pratīcyām śyāmala aṃbaraḥ
nārāyaṇaḥ paścima āsyaḥ sphaṭika ābhaḥ catur bhujaḥ
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ śrīmān sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
vara daḥ abhaya daḥ śyāma aṃbaraḥ śrīvatsa cihnitaḥ
saṃyutaḥ kamala ilābhyām vāyavyām jagatām patiḥ
aniruddhaḥ udīcya āsyaḥ pravāla ābhaḥ catur bhujaḥ
ananta utsaṃge āsīnaḥ puṣpa aṃbara dharaḥ hariḥ
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ śrīmān sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
dadhat sva dakṣiṇe vāme pramoda ādāyinīm mahīm
vara daḥ abhaya daḥ devaḥ udīcyām sarva siddhi daḥ
puṇyaḥ prāc ānanaḥ śrīmān staruṇa āditya sannibhaḥ
catur bhujaḥ śaṅkha cakra vara da abhaya cihnitaḥ
śveta vastra uttarīya upavīta ādyaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaḥ
indirā dharaṇī nāthar iśānyām puṇya pūruṣaḥ
etān devān samāvāhya samabhyarcya aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ
vīśāna sāyi paṅktīśa śāntān dikṣu arcayet kramāt
sāyam prātar vinā kuṃbhaiḥ devam vīśa amitaiḥ saha

original: vedyāmeva pratiṣṭhāpya pūjayediti ke ca na /
analyzed: vedyām eva pratiṣṭhāpya pūjayet iti ke ca na
hotra praśaṃsanam
hotā paścāt pradhāna agnau hautra śaṃsanam ācaret
pratiṣṭhā ukta krameṇa eva tad ālaya gatān surān
avāhya tad krameṇa eva nirupya ājya āhutīḥ yajet
pariṣicya pāvakam paścāt vaiṣṇavam juhuyāt kramāt

original: vedyāntu paścime vātha vāyavyāṃ vā viśeṣataḥ // BhS_25.96 //
analyzed: vedyām tu paścime vā atha vāyavyām vā viśeṣataḥ
sthiṇḍilam kalpayitvā atra ca āstaret aṇḍaja ādikān
yajamāna samāyuktaḥ guruḥ devam praṇamya ca
kusuma añjali m utsṛjya bruvan
devībhyām saha deveśam ādāya sthaṇḍila upari
prāc mukham ca eva saṃsthāpya pūjayet aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ
utsava pratimā abhāve snāpane vā viśeṣataḥ
snapanasya avyabhāve tu kautuke ca ācaret tu vā

original: kautuke yadi ceddevyau naivādāya tathā caret // BhS_25.100 //
analyzed: kautuke yadi ced devyau na eva ādāya tathā caret
na ādaret nitya vaikalyam visarga āvāhane tathā
ācaret utsavam vidvān nitya arcān tu yathākramam
kuryāt ced nitya vaikalyam sarva nāśaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: snāpayedyadi cedvidvān madhyame cotsavasya tu // BhS_25.102 //
analyzed: snāpayet yadi ced vidvān madhyame ca utsavasya tu

original: snapane yadi saṃprāpte kautuke snapanaṃ caret /
analyzed: snapane yadi saṃprāpte kautuke snapanam caret
snāpana pratimā abhāve snapanam yadi ca utsave

original: saṃprāste snapane cātra kautuke cotsavaṃ vinā /
analyzed: saṃprāste snapane ca atra kautuke ca utsavam vinā
a caret eva sāṃkaryam na ācaret ubhayoḥ api

original: utsave vartamāne tu kautuke snapanaṃ yadi /
analyzed: utsave vartamāne tu kautuke snapanam yadi

original: saṃbhaveduktakāle tu karmaṇī dve samācaret // BhS_25.105 //
analyzed: saṃbhavet ukta kāle tu karmaṇī dve samācaret
purā pravṛtta kārye tu doṣaḥ na anena saṃbhavet
kātuke ced yathā ka agnau bahu karma vat ācaret
gṛhe tretāgni vat nityam praṇīya āropaṇam vinā

original: snāpanotsavabhede tu kautukena dinaṃ dinam // BhS_25.107 //
analyzed: snāpana utsava bhede tu kautukena dinam dinam
arohaṇam yadi bhavet druve tat karma pūrvatas

original: āvāhya karmamāmante tathā sāye visarjayet // BhS_25.108 //
analyzed: āvāhya tathā sāye visarjayet
nityam arcana ādau viśeṣataḥ

original: visargaṃ sāyamarcānte kautuke tu yathā tathā // BhS_25.109 //
analyzed: visargam sāyam arcā ante kautuke tu yathā tathā
tathā eva autsava dīkṣā ante samāvāhya dhruvāt sudhīḥ
visargam na ācaret madhye dīkṣā ante tu samācaret
arcana ante viśeṣeṇa puṇyāham api vācayet

original: hemapātre tu sauvarṇaṃ kautukaṃ taṇḍulopari // BhS_25.111 //
analyzed: hema pātre tu sauvarṇam kautukam taṇḍula upari
sannyasya pūrvavat dhīmān bandhayet dakṣiṇe kare

original: kuṃbhān devyauca cakrādīn samābaddhya samarcayet // BhS_25.112 //
analyzed: kuṃbhān devyau ca cakra ādīn samābaddhya samarcayet
pariṣicya pāvakam paścāt vaiṣmavam viṣmusūktakam
juhuyāt pauruṣam sūktam śrī bhū sūkta samanvitam
dina saṃdhyā adhidaivatyam tithi vāra ṛkṣa daivatam

original: tathā māsādhidai vatyamabdadai vatyameva ca // BhS_25.114 //
analyzed: tathā māsa adhi dai vatyam abda dai vatyam eva ca
tad ālaya gatānām ca juhuyāt mūrtibhiḥ kramāt
vyāhṛti antam pradhāne syāt tatas āhavanīyake

original: nṛsūktaṃ dakṣiṇāgnau ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_25.116 //
analyzed: nṛsūktam dakṣiṇāgnau ca vaiṣṇavam tathā
avasathye mahī sūktam eka akṣaram atas yajet
juhuyāt paiṇḍarīkāgnāvataḥ deva ādi vaiṣṇavam
viṣṇusūktam puruṣasūktam yat deva ādi a samanvitam

original: pāramātmika mantrāṃśca brāhmamaindraṃ ca vāruṇam // BhS_25.118 //
analyzed: pāramātmika mantrān ca brāhmam aindram ca vāruṇam
juhuyāt viṣṇu gāyatṣā śveta abjam ca ghṛta āplutam
aṣṭottaraśatam ca eva sarva doṣa upaśāntaye
eka agnim atha vā ādhāya juhuyāt adhama adhamam

original: sabhya homaṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ vaiṣṇavādi vidhānataḥ // BhS_25.120 //
analyzed: sabhya homam ca pūrva uktam vaiṣṇava ādi vidhānataḥ
atha utsava ādhidaivatyam viśeṣeṇa pravakṣyate

original: brāhmamārṣaṃ tathā raudramaindraṃ saumyaṃ ca vaiṣmavam // BhS_25.121 //
analyzed: brāhmam ārṣam tathā raudram aindram saumyam ca vaiṣmavam
sarva daivatya yāmye ca vāruṇam ca nava āhnike

original: āgneyaṃ prājāpatyaṃ ca kauberaṃ vaighnameva ca // BhS_25.122 //
analyzed: āgneyam prājāpatyam ca kauberam vaighnam eva ca
śrīdaivatyam ca kaumāram ādityam raudram eva ca

original: daurgamaindraṃ tathā yāmyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ skāngameva car // BhS_25.123 //
analyzed: daurgam aindram tathā yāmyam vaiṣṇavam skāngam eva
iśānyam saumyam iti etat tithi daivatyam ucyate
tad tad dvāre tu juhuyāt matraiḥ dvārādhipa ucitaiḥ
tathā nakṣatra daivatyam juhuyāt vidhinā budhaḥ

original: trisaṃdhiṣu hunedaindraṃ sauraṃ bārhaspataṃ kramāt // BhS_25.125 //
analyzed: tri saṃdhiṣu hunet aindram sauram bārhaspatam kramāt
māsa ṛkṣa adhipa daivatyam māsa daivatyam ucyate

original: yāmyaṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ saumyaṃ brāhmaṃ bārhaspataṃ tathā // BhS_25.126 //
analyzed: yāmyam ca vaiṣṇavam saumyam brāhmam bārhaspatam tathā
saumyam aindram vāruṇam ca śeṣa agni āditya bhautikam

original: mārutaṃ bhṛgudaivatyaṃ vāruṇaṃ vaighnameva ca // BhS_25.127 //
analyzed: mārutam bhṛgu daivatyam vāruṇam vaighnam eva ca

original: raudraṃ kauberakaṃ tvāṣṭraṃ maitraṃ kaumārameva ca /
analyzed: raudram kauberakam tvāṣṭram maitram kaumāram eva ca

original: sāvitrīṃ śrīdaivatyaṃ caiva gaurīdaivatyameva ca // BhS_25.128 //
analyzed: sāvitrīm śrī daivatyam ca eva gaurī daivatyam eva ca
ādityam paitṛkam ca eva aditi daivatyam eva ca
yoga daivatyam etat kyāt juhuyāt vidhinā budhaḥ

original: aindraṃ ca prājāpatyaṃ ca maitramāryamaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: aindram ca prājāpatyam ca maitram āryamaṇam tathā
bhūta śrī yāmi adaivatyam bhārgavam vṛṣa daivatam
kauberam vāyu daivatyam juhuyāt karaṇeṣu vai
devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca iti pakṣayoḥ śukla kṛṣṇayoḥ
sauram cāndram ca juhuyāt kramāt ayanayoḥ dvayoḥ
madhuḥ ca mādhavaḥ ca iti juhuyāt ṛtuṣu kramāt
viṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ śūlī vighneśaḥ sapta ca ṛṣayaḥ

original: aṣṭau lokādhipāḥ pañca bhūtā viśvaṃbharādayaḥ // BhS_25.133 //
analyzed: aṣṭau loka adhipāḥ pañca bhūtāḥ viśvaṃbhara ādayaḥ
vasavaḥ aṣṭau ca rohiṇyaḥ sapta śrīḥ caṇḍikā guhaḥ
sūryaḥ somaḥ cirañjīvī kāśīvīśa purardarāḥ
cakraḥ śāntaḥ guruḥ bhauma budha śukra śanaiścarāḥ

original: haviḥpālo hyanastaśca gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā ca mātaraḥ // BhS_25.135 //
analyzed: haviḥpālaḥ hi anastaḥ ca gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā ca mātaraḥ
prabhava ādi kramāt ete vijñeyāḥ vatsara adhipāḥ
tathā utsava ādhidaivatyam tithi vāra ṛkṣa daivatam
catur daivatya mātram tu juhuyāt iti ke ca na
palāśa bilva śāmīlanyaḥ grotha uduṃbarāḥ tathā
aśvaddha khadira pla kṣa brahmavṛkṣāḥ kramāt ime

original: samidhāṃ grāhya vṛkṣāntu parṇamaśvadthameva vā // BhS_25.138 //
analyzed: samidhām grāhya vṛkṣāntu parṇam aśvadtham eva vā

original: padmaṃ ca bilvapatraṃ ca karavīraṃ kumudaṃ tathā /
analyzed: padmam ca bilva patram ca karavīram kumudam tathā

original: nandyāvartaṃ ca tulasī tathaiva sthalapaṅkajam // BhS_25.139 //
analyzed: nandyāvartam ca tulasī tathā eva sthalapaṅkajam
viṣṇu krānta aravinde tu puṣpāṇi etāni anukramāt

original: alābhe tulasīṃ vātha karavīraṃ ca paṅkajam // BhS_25.140 //
analyzed: alābhe tulasīm vā atha karavīram ca paṅkajam

original: mudgaṃ niṣpāvakaṃ caiva kuluddhaṃ māṣayeva ca /
analyzed: mudgam niṣpāvakam ca eva kuluddham māṣayā iva ca

original: tilānapūpān lājāṃśca yavān saktūn yathākramam // BhS_25.141 //
analyzed: tilān apūpān lājān ca yavān saktūn yathākramam
bali dravyāṇi ca uktāni sarva abhāve tu maudgikam
evam eva vidhānena dvi kālam homam ācaret
prātassaṃdhyā avasāne tu sāyam arcā avasānake

original: homaṃ kṛtvā baliṃ dadyāddvikālaṃ cotsavaṃ caret // BhS_25.143 //
analyzed: homam kṛtvā balim dadyāt dvikālam ca utsavam caret
utsava bhramaṇam vakṣye devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ
bali nirvāpaṇa ante tu sāyam prātar viśeṣataḥ
devadevam alaṅkṛtya vastra ādyaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ
sugandhi puṣpa mālābhiḥ gandhaiḥ api manoharaiḥ

original: rathe vā śibikāyāṃ vā vīśaskandhe 'pi vā tathā /
analyzed: rathe vā śibikāyām vā vīśa skandhe api vā tathā
gaja aśva āṃdolikā ādau vā vāhane samalaṅkṛte
aham eva idam amantreṇa devam āropya niścalam
aṣṭa upacāraiḥ abhyarcya lāja apūpa ādikān tathā
saṃkkṛtān guḍa saṃmiśrān nivedya mukhavāsakam
da tvā vādyaiḥ samāyuktam sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
dāsībhiḥ vāda kaiśya eva nṛtta geya samanvitaiḥ
brāhmaṇaiḥ veda vidbhiḥ ca samāyuktam śanais sanaiḥ
dhvajaiḥ catraiḥ ātapatraiḥ toraṇaiḥ ca tathā eva ca
saṃbhṛtaiḥ saṃyutam ca anyaiḥ sarvaiḥ śṛṅgāra lakṣmabhiḥ
vāla vyajana hastābhiḥ dāsībhiḥ pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ
vījyamānam viśeṣeṇa tathā bhakta varaiḥ api
vāhaye yuḥ dvijāḥ devam brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ
dīpaiḥ udagraiḥ bahubhiḥ pariṣiktaiḥ ghṛta ādinā
paras sahasraiḥ sarvatra dīpayet ca śata avaraiḥ
vipraiḥ trayīm adhīyānaiḥ japa stuti parāyaṇaiḥ
nṛtyatā gāyatā mā api gāṇikyena su sevitam
vīṇā ādi vādibhiḥ ca eva vandibhiḥ ca tathā paraiḥ
ṣaḍja ādi gīta nipuṇaiḥ vādya vādaka kovidaiḥ

original: gadyaṃ padyaṃ tathā miśraṃ pathadbhistsotramujjvalam // BhS_25.155 //
analyzed: gadyam padyam tathā miśram pathadbhiḥ tsotram ujjvalam
vai taṇḍikaiḥ tathā jalpaiḥ nipuṇaiḥ vāda śikṣitaiḥ
tathā tattva kathā niṣṭhaiḥ padārdha jñaiḥ ca tārkikaiḥ
mīmāṃsakaiḥ yājñikaiḥ ca chāndasaiḥ sāṃkhya kovidaiḥ
yoga jñaiḥ ca purāṇa jñaiḥ śābdikaiḥ tattva vedibhiḥ
mauhūrtikaiḥ ca gaṇaśas paraspara jīgīṣubhiḥ
tad tad śāstra uka mārgeṇa prameyam ca bahu sthitam
uccais bruvāṇaiḥ vidvadbhiḥ pañca kāla parāyaṇaiḥ
vāsudevasya māhātmyam kathayadbhiḥ ca sāttvikaiḥ
śāstreṣu naipuṇam sarvam pradarśayitum udyataiḥ
devasya puratas pṛṣṭhe pārśvatas ca sthitaiḥ janaiḥ
senayā sarvatas dikṣu catur aṅga bala āḍhyayā
devasya pārśvayoḥ pūrde lākṣā rañjita maskaraiḥ
yatraiḥ dāru mayaiḥ citraiḥ pakṣi ākāraiḥ itas tatas
devatā ākṛti yantraiḥ ca tathā yantraiḥ gaja ādibhiḥ
niṣādibhiḥ samārūḍhaiḥ strībhiḥ ca bharata uditaiḥ
mārgaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ nṛttam darśayantībhiḥ adbhutam
lekhāyantraiḥ tsriyā ārūḍhaiḥ yantraiḥ anyaiḥ tathā
gatāgatāni kurvāṇaiḥ anuyātam samākulaiḥ
śanais nayet jagannātham yathāśakti samanvitaiḥ
ārabhya āvaraṇāt ādyāt eṣā parivṛtiḥ bhavet
devena sārtham ācāryaḥ yānam āruhya tatra tu
rakṣā artham devadevasya dhyāyan upaviśet harim
arcakaḥ ca tathā āsīnaḥ samyak arcanam ācaret
ārohaṇe gaja indrasya devadevam viśeṣataḥ
vastra ābharaṇa puṣba ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtya yathārhakam
deveśam pūrvam āropya hastena ādāya ca aṃkuśam
niṣīdet gaja pṛṣṭhe tu deśikaḥ svayam atvaraḥ
arcakaḥ chatram ādāya tathā devasya dhārayet
toya dhārām puraskṛtya kuryāt bhramaṇam ācarāt

original: grāmaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryādbaliryena padhā kṛtaḥ // BhS_25.170 //
analyzed: grāmam pradakṣiṇam kuryāt baliḥ yena padhā kṛtaḥ
tad kāle devam āyāntam bhaktāḥ bhāgavatāḥ janāḥ
ca eva pratyudthāya punar punar
praṇamya ca upahārān ca dadyuḥ bahuvidhān bahūn

original: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ pūgaṃ nāgavallīdalānyapi // BhS_25.172 //
analyzed: patram puṣpam phalam pūgam nāgavallī dalāni api
dakṣiṇām ca viśeṣeṇa yathāśakti yathāruci
nīrājana ādi kuryuḥ ca bāla vṛddha āturāḥ tadā
tapobhiḥ bahubhiḥ gamye svayam eva parātpare
bhakta anukaṃpayā deve spa gṛha dvāram āgate

original: ko na nandati mūḍhātmā tasya kā niṣkṛtirbhavet /
analyzed: kaḥ na nandati mūḍha ātmā tasya kā niṣkṛtiḥ bhavet

original: tatkāle cārpitaṃ dravyaṃ yadapakvaṃ pragṛhya ca // BhS_25.175 //
analyzed: tad kāle ca arpitam dravyam yat apakvam pragṛhya ca
āmantram tu nivedya eva bhagavat priyam ācaret
upahāreṣu tatra ardham gṛhṇīyāt bhāgam arcakaḥ
sarvam arcaka sarva svam gṛhṇīyāt arcakaḥ svayam
tad kāle bhakti namrebhyaḥ saṃprāptebhyaḥ ca sannidhim
bhagadat pādukām dadyāt śirasi śraddhayā guruḥ
śirasā dhāraṇe martyaiḥ spṛṣṭi doṣaḥ na vidyate

original: na nayetpādukāṃ viṣṇordūrīkṛtya tu sannidhim // BhS_25.179 //
analyzed: na nayet pādukām viṣṇoḥ dūrīkṛtya tu sannidhim
na gṛha dvāra sīmāntam nayet tām gṛhiṇām guruḥ

original: iṣṭaṃ rājagṛhe strībhiḥ pādukādhāraṇaṃ yadi // BhS_25.180 //
analyzed: iṣṭam rāja gṛhe strībhiḥ pādukā dhāraṇam yadi
dehalīm an atikramya na iyāt tām dīpikā anvitām
tadā dīpaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ ca rāja arhaiḥ ca paricchadaiḥ

original: neyā syātpādukā viṣṇoḥ praṇidhissā yato hareḥ /
analyzed: neyā syāt pādukā viṣṇoḥ praṇidhiḥ sā yatas hareḥ

original: tassannidhimatikramya pūjakastu na jātu cit // BhS_25.182 //
analyzed: tad sannidhim atikramya pūjakaḥ tu na jātu cit
ādānāya upahārāṇām prayāyāt gṛhiṇām gṛhān
na api kārya antara āsaktaḥ pañca hastān ati kramet
eṣa śreṣṭha upacāraḥ syāt yatas sammānyate hariḥ

original: evaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ nītvā nivartetālayaṃ prati // BhS_25.184 //
analyzed: evam pradakṣiṇam nītvā nivarteta ālayam prati
gopura agre tu deveśam kṛtvā deva unmukham kramāt
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya nivedya pṛthuka ādikam
dhāma pradakṣiṇam nītvā punar āviśya ca ālayam

original: avaropya ca deveśaṃ sthāpya cāsthānamaṇḍape // BhS_25.186 //
analyzed: avaropya ca deveśam sthāpya ca āsthāna maṇḍape
pādyam ācamanam da tvā mukha vāsam pradāya ca
kautukam tu visṛjya eva śuddha udaiḥ snāpayet prabhum
vimṛjya plota vastreṇa samalaṅkṛtya pūrvavat
kautukam punar ābaddhya haviḥ paścāt nivedayet
kuryāt rāja upacārāṇi sa hi rājā jagat prabhuḥ
vinodam kārayet ca eva nṛtta gīta ādibhiḥ bahu
tatas praṇamya deveśam pūrva sthāne niveśayet
prathame ahani sāye tu kartavyam idam īritam
dvitīya ahar prabhṛti eva sāyam prātar ca nityaśas
nitya arcana ante dviguṇam arcayet ca nivedayet
kuṃbha devān samārādhya dhvaja deva arcanam caret

original: homaṃ baliṃ ca datvātu kārayedutsavaṃ tathā // BhS_25.192 //
analyzed: homam balim ca da tvā tu kārayet utsavam tathā
tṛtīye pañcaye avāhni prātar syāt garuḍa utsavaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhe 'hani tu madhyāhne devībhyāṃ sahitaṃ harim // BhS_25.193 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe ahani tu madhyāhne devībhyām sahitam harim
pīṭha madhye samāropya samabhyarcya aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ
jala kuṅkumam ādāya kārayet utsavam tathā
nava vastra ādikam da tvā pṛthukāni nivedya ca
da tvā tāṃbūlam ācāmam arcayet rāja vat prabhum
saptame prātar arcā ante kuryāt saptarṣi pūjanam
vṛṇuyāt ṛtvijaḥ sapta tad ācārya purassarān
dhyātvā saptarṣi vat tān tu svarṇam gām ājyam eva ca
taṇḍula udaka kuṃbha ādīn dūrvā agram kramukam tathā
dadyāt prabhūtam tebhyaḥ tu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
tat sāyam ca viśeṣeṇa kṛṣṇa gandha anulepanam

original: sadyaḥ pratisaraṃ baddhvā devāgre sthaṇḍilaṃ caret /
analyzed: sadyas pratisaram baddhvā deva agre sthaṇḍilam caret
kṛṣṇa aguru samādāya sarva vādya samāyutam
grāmam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā sthaṇḍila upari vinyaset

original: puṇyāhaṃ vidhivatkṛtvā śriyamāvāhya tatra ca // BhS_25.200 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vidhivat kṛtvā śriyam āvāhya tatra ca
saṃskṛtya vidhivat gandhān samabhyarcya harim tatas
gandha dvāre ati mantreṇa sarva aṅgam lepayet guruḥ
devī ādīnām tathā kuryāt tad tad mantraiḥ yathāvidhi
tad śeṣa gandham bhaktyā eva bhaktebhyaḥ dāpayet guruḥ
tad gandha dhāraṇāt nṝṇām bhadeyuḥ sarva saṃpadaḥ
sāyam arcā avasāne tu ratha yātrām samācaret
aṣṭame divase prāpte samāpte prātar utsave
alaṅkṛtya tu deveśam mṛgayā utsavam ācaret
madhyāhne devadevasya jala krīḍā utsavam caret

original: prapāṃ kṛtvā vidhānena nadyādīnāṃ taṭe budhaḥ // BhS_25.205 //
analyzed: prapām kṛtvā vidhānena nadī ādīnām taṭe budhaḥ
vitāna ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtya jala krīḍā artha maṇṭapam
biṃba adhyardha āyatām ardha vistārām biṃba daghnikām
jala droṇīm atha acchidrām nyasya loha mayīm ghanām
dhārāsu iti ca mantrataḥ
elā candana karbūraiḥ kuṅkumena adhivāsayet
kalhāra ketakī puṣpaiḥ uśīra agurubhiḥ tathā
āstīrya nava vastrāṇi veda aham iti mantrataḥ
puṇya tīrtham śivam puṇyam devāvāsam iti bruvan
adhidevam samāvāhya vigrahaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ yajet

original: maṇḍape paścimārdhe tu viṣṭare sottarachade // BhS_25.210 //
analyzed: maṇḍape paścima ardhe tu viṣṭare sa uttarachade
devadevam samāsthāpya śakunasūktam samuccaran
nava vastra uttarīya ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtya manoharam
pādya ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya sthāpagaiḥ sahitaḥ guruḥ

original: “bhūḥ prapadye'ti mantreṇa devadevaṃ praṇamya ca // BhS_25.212 //
analyzed: bhūḥ prapadye iti mantreṇa devadevam praṇamya ca
param mantreṇa devam ādāya ca ādarāt
pratat viṣṇuḥ tsavate iti jala droṇyām niveśya ca
indra ādīḥ ca jaya ādīḥ ca taṇḍulaiḥkj pta maṇḍale
samāvāhya samabhyarcyet jala droṇī abhitas guruḥ
apaḥ hi stha ādi strīn anuvākān samuccaran
idam āpaḥ śivā iti uktvā āpaḥ vai idam uccaran
jala droṇyām devadevam praṇamya ca

original: pauruṣaṃ sūktamuccārya viṣṇusūktaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // BhS_25.216 //
analyzed: pauruṣam sūktam uccārya viṣṇusūktam ca vaiṣṇavam
iṣe tvā ūrje a tu ādi japan bhūḥ anilaye iti api

original: maṅjayitvā jaladroṇyāṃ devaṃ prākchirasaṃ harim // BhS_25.217 //
analyzed: maṅjayitvā jala droṇyām devam prāc śirasam harim
adhivāsyatu yāma ardham yāma dvayam atha api vā

original: “paraṃ raṃ'heti mantreṇa tata uddhṛtyavai punaḥ // BhS_25.218 //
analyzed: param raṃ'hā iti mantreṇa tatas uddhṛtya vai punar
alaṅkṛtya ca vastra ādyaiḥ yathārham paripūjya ca
yānam āropya deveśam grāmam ālayam eva vā
pradakṣiṇam kramāt nītvā sarva alaṅkāla saṃyutam
grāma vīthyām upahṛtam upahālam a gṛhya ca
punar ālayam āviśya saṃsthāpya āsthāna maṇḍape
sugandhi tailena abhyajya devam saṃsnāpya pūrvavat
jīvasthāne samāsthāpya samabhyarcya nivedayet
tad rātrau utsava ante tu devam devī yutam harim
pratiṣṭhā ukta vidhānena baddhvā pratisaram tatas
adhivāsa vidhānena śayane śāyayet guruḥ
prabhāte devaḥ utthāpya pādya ādi arghya antam arcayet
tasmin tīrtha dine prātar hema ādyam prātar utsavam
kṛtvā haviḥ vinā devam abhyarcya ā sthāna maṇḍape

original: pramukhe garuḍaṃ paścāddakṣiṇe cakrameva ca // BhS_25.225 //
analyzed: pramukhe garuḍam paścāt dakṣiṇe cakram eva ca
amitam ca uttaredhīmān dhānya pīṭha upari nyaset
nitya pūjām haviḥ dānam dhruva bere samācaret
pūrva alaṅkṛta vastra ādīn visṛjya eva prayatnataḥ
anya vastrāṇi ca ācchādya yathārham bhūṣya bhūṣaṇaiḥ
aṣṭa upacāraiḥ abhyarcya devam cakra ādi devatāḥ
kṛtvā dvi hasta āyata vistṛtam

original: ulūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ sthāpya vastreṇa saṃyutam /
analyzed: ulūkhalam ca musalam sthāpya vastreṇa saṃyutam
tayoḥ īśau krameṇa eva brahya īśau arcayet budhaḥ
pātre haridrām saṃgṛhya sinīvālīm atha ār'cya ca

original: ulūkhale haridrāṃ ca tanmantreṇa vinikṣipet // BhS_25.230 //
analyzed: ulūkhale haridrām ca tad mantreṇa vinikṣipet
gṛhītvā vaiṣṇavaiḥ mantraiḥ ācāryaḥ musalam tathā
viṣṇusūktam samuccārya kiñcid tat avaghātayet
bhaktaiḥ vā devadāsībhiḥ cūrṇīkṛtya viśeṣataḥ
ekasmin vā a dvayoḥ vā atha triṣu vā
gandha uṣitam ca vāda elam āḍhakam parigṛhya ca

original: pidhāya ca pidhānaiśca sthaṇḍilopari vinyaset // BhS_25.233 //
analyzed: pidhāya ca pidhānaiḥ ca sthaṇḍila upari vinyaset
ācchādya nava vastreṇa somam taile samarcayet

original: sinīvālīṃ ca taccūrṇe cakrādīṃśca prapūjayet // BhS_25.234 //
analyzed: sinīvālīm ca tad cūrṇe cakra ādīn ca prapūjayet
devam abhyarcya puṇyāham vācayan vaiṣṇavam guruḥ
saṃsrāvya mūrthni tat tailam veda aham iti mantrataḥ
hāridra cūrṇaiḥ saṃsnāpya cakra ādīn snāpayet tatas
tat śiṣṭam dhārayan bhaktaḥ sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
atha yāne samāropya devam cakra ādibhiḥ saha
cūrṇa utsavam imam kṛtvā tīrtha utsavam atha ācaret
devakhātam yadi tīrtham tatra praśasyate

original: nadyāditīre saṃsthāpya devībhyāṃ saha vā vinā // BhS_25.238 //
analyzed: nadī ādi tīre saṃsthāpya devībhyām saha vā vinā

original: cakrādīn pūrvavat sthāpya pramukhe sthaṇḍilaṃ caret /
analyzed: cakra ādīn pūrvavat sthāpya pramukhe sthaṇḍilam caret
kalaśān gāyatrī mantram uccaran
madhye siddhārthakam nyasya prācyām syāt akṣata udakam

original: dakṣiṇe gandhatoyaṃ syātpaścime tu kuśodakam // BhS_25.240 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe gandha toyam syāt paścime tu kuśa udakam
japya udakam ca uttare syāt vidiśāsu ca madhyatas
upasnānāni vinyasya kramāt tad adhipān guruḥ
ādityān apsarasaḥ ca kāśyapam ca gurum tathā

original: ṛtūṃśca marutaścaiva munīṃ stakṣakameva ca // BhS_25.242 //
analyzed: ṛtūn ca marutaḥ ca eva munīm stakṣakam eva ca
mantrān vidyādharān ca eva krameṇa āvāhya ca arcayet
pūtaḥ taḥ asya iti mantreṇa imāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti api
abhi tvā śūra a catvāri a pūta stanye aticakramāt
kalaśaiḥ pañcabhiḥ snāpya tad tad dravya antare kramāt
vārīḥ catasraḥ iti uktvā ca upasnānam samācaret
śiṣṭābhiḥ kalaśa adbhiḥ ca cakra adhīn abhiṣicya ca

original: praviśya tu jalaṃ tatra varuṇaṃ cārcayetkramāt /
analyzed: praviśya tu jalam tatra varuṇam ca arcayet kramāt
hastābhyām cakram ādāya devam bhaktaiḥ samanvitaḥ
ācāryaḥ prathamam tīrthe cakram ssṛṣṭyā avagāhayet

original: nābhidaghnajale tatra jalamadhye tu susthitaḥ // BhS_25.247 //
analyzed: nābhi daghna jale tatra jala madhye tu su sthitaḥ

original: cakraṃ devaṃ hṛdi sthāpya hastābhyāṃ dhārayan dṛḍham /
analyzed: cakram devam hṛdi sthāpya hastābhyām dhārayan dṛḍham

original: “ye te śataṃ' samuccārya prāṅmukho vāpyudaṅmukhaḥ // BhS_25.248 //
analyzed: ye te śatam samuccārya prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ
nimajjayet tadā cakram sarva vādya yutam guruḥ

original: janāssarve ca tattīrthe snātvā vigatakalmaṣāḥ // BhS_25.249 //
analyzed: janāḥ sarve ca tad tīrthe snātvā vigata kalmaṣāḥ
bhaveyuḥ aśvamedhasya phalam ca samavāpnuyuḥ
tatas tīre pratiṣṭhāpya viṣṭare cakram uttame
kuryāt avabhṛthasnānam śuddha snāna ukta mārgataḥ

original: tato visṛjya vastrādīn devaṃ cānyairvibhūṣya ca // BhS_25.251 //
analyzed: tatas visṛjya vastra ādīn devam ca anyaiḥ vibhūṣya ca
tatra eva nasa snām bhārān saṃbhṛtya vidhinā guruḥ
devībhyām saha deveśam snāpayet pūrvavat prabhum
alaṅkṛtya viśeṣeṇa kuryāt arghya anta pūjanam
paścāt devam samādāya sarva alaṅkāra saṃyutam
śākunam sūktam uccārya nītvā grāmam pradakṣiṇam
devālayam praviśya atha sthāpya ca āsthāna maṇḍape
pādya ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya vedān adhyāpayet kramāt
muhur puṣpa añjalim da tvā jīva sthāne niveśayet
cakra ādīn api ca ādāya niveśya ca

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvātu prokṣaṇeḥ prokṣaṇaṃ caret // BhS_25.256 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu prokṣaṇeḥ prokṣaṇam caret
nitya pūjam samāpya eva haviḥ dadyāt viśeṣataḥ

original: yāgaśālāṃ samāsādya hutvāgniṣu ca vaiṣṇavam // BhS_25.257 //
analyzed: yāga śālām samāsādya hutvā agniṣu ca vaiṣṇavam
kuṃbha sthām śaktim ādāya dhruva bere avaropayet

original: antahomaṃ ca hutvāgniṃ nityakuṇḍepraṇīya ca // BhS_25.258 //
analyzed: anta homam ca hutvā agnim nitya kuṇḍe praṇīya ca

original: tadrātrau nityahomānte baliṃ datvā ca pūrvavat /
analyzed: tad rātrau nitya homa ante balim da tvā ca pūrvavat

original: paścāccakraṃ vinā dadyādbaliṃ śuddhānna kalpitam // BhS_25.259 //
analyzed: paścāt cakram vinā dadyāt balim śuddhāt na kalpitam
pūrva uktena eva mārgeṇa sarvatra balim ācaret

original: caityasthāne prapāyāṃ tu utyāne vṛkṣamūlake // BhS_25.260 //
analyzed: caitya sthāne prapāyām tu utyāne vṛkṣa mūlake
taṭāke nirjhare kūpa vāpī valmīka pārśvake

original: śmaśāne 'nyatra devāgre vīthyanteṣu ca nikṣipaset // BhS_25.261 //
analyzed: śmaśāne anyatra deva agre vīthi anteṣu ca
punar ālayam āviśya snātvā ca api agni sannidhau
dhvaja mūlam samāsādya sarva vādya
dhvaca avarohaṇam kuryāt dhvaja matram samuccaran

original: taddhvajaṃ tu samādāya prādakṣiṇyakrameṇa vai // BhS_25.263 //
analyzed: tad dhvajam tu samādāya prādakṣiṇya krameṇa vai
parītya mandiram paścāt praviśya abhyantaram punar

original: devasya pādamūle tu nyasya puṣpāñjaliṃ dadet // BhS_25.264 //
analyzed: devasya pāda mūle tu nyasya puṣpa añjalim dadet
kṣamā mantram samuccārya daṇḍa vat praṇamet bhuvi
phala śrutiḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktvā viṣṇorutsavamādarāt // BhS_25.265 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute bhaktvā viṣṇoḥ utsavam ādarāt
sarva pāpa viśuddha ātmā sarvān kāmān avāpya ca

original: ante vimānamāruhya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_25.266 //
analyzed: ante vimānam āruhya viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati
puṣpa yāgaḥ atas param pravakṣyāmi puṣpa yāgam sukha āvaham
dvitīya divase tīrthāt puṣpa yāgam samācaret

original: śāntidaṃ puṣṭidaṃ ceti kāmyadaṃ ca tridhā bhavet /
analyzed: śānti dam puṣṭi dam ca iti kāmya dam ca tridhā bhavet
prātar madhyāhna aparāhṇāḥ kramāt kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
nyūnam vā api adhikam ca etat doṣa upaśamanāya vai

original: āsthānamaṇḍape vātha snapanālaya eva vā // BhS_25.269 //
analyzed: āsthāna maṇḍape vā atha snapana ālaye eva vā
caturdiśam catur hastam ca
pañcaviṃśat padam kṛtvā ṣaṣ sūtraiḥ prāc udga gataiḥ
madhye nanapade padmam sa aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
ratna dhānya ādikaiḥ vā api taṇḍulaiḥ vrīhibhiḥ tilaiḥ
bahis teṣu padeṣu agre vīśam ekatra pūjayet

original: dakṣiṇe cakramabhyarcya paṅktīśaṃ paścime tathā // BhS_25.272 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe cakram abhyarcya paṅktīśam paścime tathā

original: udīcyāṃ śāntamabhyarcya śeṣeṣu ca padeṣu vai /
analyzed: udīcyām śāntam abhyarcya śeṣeṣu ca padeṣu vai
pūjā dravyāṇi saṃbhṛtya pratyekam vinyaset budhaḥ
daleṣu aṣṭasu padmasya suvarṇa śakala upari
lokapālān samabhyarcya vastra upari yathādiśam
niṣka traya suvarṇa iva kalpite karṇikā upari
āditya maṇḍalam tatra rājate candra maṇḍalam
tasmin suvarṇa rūpe tu maṇḍalam arcayet
viṣṭaram tatra saṃsthāpya tad antargata paṅkaje
tatra devam pratiṣṭhāpya yāvaddivasam utsavam
tāvatkṛtvas samabhyarchya saptaviṃśati vigrahaiḥ
tatra pūjā avasāne tu tad tad puṣpa añjalim dadet
paṅkajam tulasī bilvam karavīram atha utpalam
nandyāvartam ca kumudam apāmārgam tathā eva ca
viṣṇukrāntam ca dūrvām cakramāt etāni anukramāt
evam puṣpa ajalim da tvā ṛtvijaḥ saha taiḥ guruḥ
nṛttaiḥ geyaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ ca catur veda stavaiḥ api
parātparataram pāram guhyāt guhyataram gurum
sarva veda artha sāram tam dvādaśa āṣya akṣaram tathā
japantaḥ viṣṇugāyatrīm śatam aṣṭa uttaram tatas

original: dadyuḥ puṣpāñjali bhaktyā devadevasya pādayoḥ // BhS_25.282 //
analyzed: dadyuḥ puṣpa añjali bhaktyā devadevasya pādayoḥ
pañca agniṣu atha vā agnīn trīn paiṇḍarīkam atha api vā
devasya paritas kuryāt uttama ādi krame kramāt
uttame sabhya kuṇḍe tu madhye tu āhavanīyake
hautra praśaṃsanam kuryāt tad ālaya gatān surān
āvāhya ājyam nirūpya eva tad krameṇa āhutīḥ yajet

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca samyagghutvā viśeṣata // BhS_25.285 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca samyak hutvā viśeṣataḥ
tatas ca āhavanīya agnau nṛ sūktam vaiṣṇavam yajet

original: dakṣiṇāgnau viṣṇusūktaṃ śrīsūktaṃ ca yajetkramāt // BhS_25.286 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇāgnau viṣṇusūktam śrīsūktam ca yajet kramāt
juhuyāt gārhapatya agnau gāyatrīm
tu juhuyāt sūktam eka akṣara ādikam
ājyena samidhā tad tad haviḥ bhedaiḥ ca hūyatām
etat uttamam uddiṣṭam madhyamam tu pravakṣyate
yathā lābha pramāṇena pūrva ukta ardhena vā hareḥ
padma maṇḍala devānām kārayet pratimā ādikam

original: tattaddinārcanānte tu śuddhānnaṃ vā nivedya ca /
analyzed: tad tad dina arcana ante tu śuddha annam vā nivedya ca
sarva arcā ante pañca haviḥ dadyāt iti āha pūrvajaḥ
catur veda ādi ghoṣam ca catur dikṣu prakalpayet
abja homam krameṇa eva juhuyāt mantra vittamaḥ
puṣpa nyāsa krameṇa eva sarva vidyeśvara antakam
abhyarcya prathamam paścāt paṣpa yāga ukta pūjanam
kṛtvā yathā lābha haviḥ bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca
nivedya mukha vāsa ante parivāra balim kṣipet
iti evam madhyame proktam pravakṣyāmi adhame punar
vinā diśā ādibhiḥ bhedaiḥ hemaiḥ ca pṛthak arcanaiḥ
maṇḍale devam āropya pūjayitvā yadhāvidhi

original: havīṃṣi pañca coktāni nivedya ca tataḥ param // BhS_25.295 //
analyzed: havīṃṣi pañca ca uktāni nivedya ca tatas param
dadyāt puṣpa aṃjalim mantraiḥ samasta divasa uditaiḥ

original: jānvantaṃ ca tathorvantaṃ kaṭyantaṃ ca samarcayet // BhS_25.296 //
analyzed: jānu antam ca tathā ūru antam kaṭi antam ca samarcayet

original: nābhyantaṃ ca stanāntaṃ ca bāhyastamiti cakramāt /
analyzed: nābhi antam ca stana antam ca bāhya astam iti

original: grīvāntaṃ ca lalāṭāntaṃ maulyastamiti cakramāt // BhS_25.297 //
analyzed: grīvā antam ca lalāṭa antam maulyaḥ tam iti ca kramāt
tad tad pūjā avasāne tu haviḥ samyak ni vedayet
utsava ajñāta doṣāṇām prāyaścittam idam smṛtam
atas sarva prayatnena puṣpa yāgam samācaret
dvādaśa ārādhanam
kuryāt yathā ukta vidhinā dvādaśa ārādhanam tathā
dadyāt ācārya pūrvebhyaḥ dakṣiṇām vidhivat tatas
ekaviṃśati niṣkam tu dadyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām

original: padārthināṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tadardhaṃ syātpṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: padārthinām ca sarveṣām tad ardham syāt pṛthak pṛthak
go bhūmibhyām viśeṣeṇa da tvā ācāryam prasādayet
ācāryaḥ su prasanna ātmā sarva agniṣu yathākramam

original: antahomaṃ samāpyaiva devadevaṃ praṇamya ca // BhS_25.302 //
analyzed: anta homam samāpya eva devadevam praṇamya ca
jīvasthāne pratiṣṭhāpya deveśam samyak arcayet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet ca eva pradadyāt bhūri dakṣiṇām
puṣpa yāga utsavaḥ proktaḥ devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ
śāntika ādi vidhāne tu kuryāt aṅkura pūrvakam
evam yaḥ kurute bhaktyā puṣba yāgam hareḥ priyam
sarvān kāmān avāpya eva sarva aiśvaryam avāpya ca
sarvān śatrūn vijitvā eva prajā paśu samanvitaḥ
ante vimānam āruhya viṣṇu sāyujyam āpnuyāt

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre pañcaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ṣaḍviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ṣaḍviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
prāyaścittam
atas param pravakṣyāmi bhū parīkṣā ādi niṣkṛtim
nyūne atirikte vyāghāte prāyaścittam samācaret
prāyas doṣaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ cittam tasya nivāraṇam
prāyaścittam samākhyātam kuryāt karma samṛddhaye
prāyaścittam akurvāṇaḥ sati doṣe vinaśyati
tasmāt sarma prayatnena kuryāt yatnena niṣkṛtim
ālayasya ca nirmāṇam pūjā ādyāḥ tatra yāḥ kriyāḥ
asmāt śāstrāt atikramya niṣphalāḥ prabhavanti hi
tad doṣa śamanāya eva mahāśānti purassaram
sarvāḥ kriyāḥ krameṇa eva punar śāstra ukta vat caret
yat śāstra vidhim utsṛjya kriyate kāmakārataḥ

original: noktaṃ dadyātphalaṃ karma pratyutānarthadaṃ bhavet // BhS_26.6 //
analyzed: na uktam dadyāt phalam karma pratyuta anartha dam bhavet

original: śilpaṃ ca jyotiṣaṃ vāstu tada'nye cāgamāḥ pare /
analyzed: śilpam ca jyotiṣam vāstu tad a anye ca āgamāḥ pare

original: tāvatā hi pramāṇaṃ syādyāvadetena nāntaram // BhS_26.7 //
analyzed: tāvatā hi pramāṇam syāt yāvat etena na antaram
vaikhānasam idam śāstra manya śāstra an apekṣitam
praṇivāya abja jaḥ pūrvam sarva śāstra artha saṃgraham
mohāt ajñānataḥ vā api vicikitsā padeṣu yaḥ
śāstra anta ra anurodhena śāstram etat vimānayet
sa yāti narakam ghoram yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: tasmānniṣkāsya taṃ mūḍhaṃ śāstroktaṃ samyagācaret // BhS_26.10 //
analyzed: tasmāt niṣkāsya tam mūḍham śāstra uktam samyak ācaret
yat āgacchet bahirdvāram bhūmim samyak parīkṣitum
apatet antarāyaḥ ced prāyaścittam hunet budhaḥ
japet ca vaiṣṇavam vaighnam śataśas punar ācaret
durdarśane japet sauram hunet pūrva ukta vat budhaḥ

original: durvākye tu śrute brāhmaṃ japetsārasvataṃ tathā /
analyzed: durvākye tu śrute brāhmam japet sārasvatam tathā

original: tatkāle kalahe caiva śoṇitaprasrave tathā // BhS_26.13 //
analyzed: tad kāle kalahe ca eva śoṇita prasrave tathā
agni dāha ādike ca eva vaiṣṇavam saumya saṃyutam

original: vaiṣvaksenaṃ tathā saudarśanaṃ gāruḍameva ca // BhS_26.14 //
analyzed: vaiṣvaksenam tathā saudarśanam gāruḍam eva ca
laukika agnau hunet dhyātvā devam paścāt samācaret

original: bhūparīkṣaṇakāle tu yadi pāṃsukṣayo bhavet // BhS_26.15 //
analyzed: bhū parīkṣaṇa kāle tu yadi pāṃsu kṣayaḥ bhavet
pūrṇāhutim ca juhuyāt tathā mindāhutī budhaḥ
parīkṣitā yadā bhūmiḥ pūrvam eva anya vartmanā
aupāsana agnim ādhāya vyāhṛti antam tu vaiṣṇavam
juhuyāt daśaśas kuryāt tatas karmāṇi mantrataḥ
vṛṣabhasya aṅga hānau tu karṣaṇe doṣa śāntaye

original: raudraṃ brāhmaṃ ca juhuyāttato 'nyaṃ vṛṣamāharet // BhS_26.18 //
analyzed: raudram brāhmam ca juhuyāt tatas anyam vṛṣam āharet
hala ādīnām tu nirmāṇe yajñavṛkṣa itaraiḥ kṛte

original: tathā pramāṇahīne ca juhuyādvaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_26.19 //
analyzed: tathā pramāṇa hīne ca juhuyāt vaiṣṇavam tathā

original: saumyaṃ caiva tathāgneyaṃ prājāpatyaṃ ca deśikaḥ /
analyzed: saumyam ca eva tathā āgneyam prājāpatyam ca deśikaḥ

original: rajjabhede vāruṇaṃ ca sītābhedeśriyaṃ tathā // BhS_26.20 //
analyzed: rajjabhede vāruṇam ca tathā
dātṛ abhede tu juhuyāt jyeṣṭhā mantram vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: ṛṣibhede tu vāyavyaṃ kṣiṇīye vāsavaṃ tathā // BhS_26.21 //
analyzed: ṛṣi bhede tu vāyavyam kṣiṇīye vāsavam tathā

original: yuge nāgaṃ pratode tu yāmye vyāhṛtisaṃyutam /
analyzed: yuge nāgam pratode tu yāmye vyāhṛti saṃyutam
kapāla asthi tuṣa aṅgāra keśa valmīka kharparāḥ
dṛṣṭāḥ karṣaṇa kāle ced tat vyapohya avilaṃbitam
abhyukṣya pañcagavyena saumya āgneyau hunet kramāt
tatra ced arcane hīne śānta vīśāna pāyinām
vaiṣṇapam juhuyāt tad tad daivatyam ca ār'cayet punar
bīja āvāpana hīne tu juhuyāt vaiṣṇavam tathā

original: saumyaṃ hutvā ca vāyavyaṃ punarbījāni vāpayet // BhS_26.25 //
analyzed: saumyam hutvā ca vāyavyam punar bījāni vāpayet

original: gavāṃ nivedane hīne vaiṣṇapaṃ cāmitaṃ hunet /
analyzed: gavām nivedane hīne vaiṣṇapam ca amitam hunet
gāruḍam cakra mantram ca daśaśas su samāhitaḥ
palāla bhārān āhṛtya go gaṇebhyaḥ nivedayet
pada deva balau hīne hunet tat mantra pūrvakam

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ brāhmamaindraṃ ca yāmyaṃ vāruṇameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam brāhmam aindram ca yāmyam vāruṇam eva ca

original: kauberaṃ ca kramāddhutvā baliṃ tatra samarpayet // BhS_26.28 //
analyzed: kauberam ca kramāt hutvā balim tatra samarpayet
brahmapadma kriyā hānau vaiṣṇava brāhma vāruṇān

original: bhūdaivatyaṃ ca juhuyātpunaḥ kāryaṃ samācaret // BhS_26.29 //
analyzed: bhūdaivatyam ca juhuyāt punar kāryam samācaret
diś phariccheda hīne tu digdaivatyam ca vaiṣṇavam

original: sauraṃ caiva punarhutvā kuryāddiksādhanaṃ tataḥ // BhS_26.30 //
analyzed: sauram ca eva punar hutvā kuryāt diś sādhanam tatas
vimāna artham yadā bhūmiḥ khanyate tatra saṃbhave
śarkarā śalya loṣṭa ādau vaiṣṇavam brāhmam eva ca
pañcabhūta adhidai vatyam vyāhṛtīḥ ca hunet kramāt

original: hīne 'dhike vā māne tu śīlāyā iṣṭakasya vā // BhS_26.32 //
analyzed: hīne adhike vā māne tu śīlāyāḥ iṣṭakasya vā
vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca hutvā vidhivat ācaret

original: viparyāse tu vinyāse digdaivatyaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // BhS_26.33 //
analyzed: viparyāse tu vinyāse digdaivatyam ca vaiṣṇavam
hutvā yathā ukta vat kṛtvā japet veda ādikān manūn
ratna nyāsa vihīne tu hunet tad adhipān mamān
garbhanyāsa vihīne tu vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam
hutvā śrī bhūmi daivatyam garbhanyāsam punar caret
pramāṇa hīne tu vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam
sauram saumyam atha āgneyam yajet kuryāt vidhāvataḥ
nirmāṇa kāle dravyāṇām sthāpane

original: viparyāse ca saṃprāpte vaiṣṇavaṃ juhu yātkramāt /
analyzed: viparyāse ca saṃprāpte vaiṣṇavam juhu yāt kramāt
hutvā vidhivat ācaret

original: anuktadeśe nyāse ca viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣam /
analyzed: an ukta deśe nyāse ca viṣṇusūktam ca pauruṣam
hunet śrī bhūmi daivatyam niveśayet
apramāṇe śilāyām vā tathā mūrdheṣṭaka ādiṣu
juhuyāt niṣkṛtim vidvān ādya iṣṭaka vidhānataḥ
sthūpi kīle tad ādhāre pramāṇa parivarjite
alābhe ca ukta dārūṇām vaiṣṇavam saumya pāvake

original: bhūdaivatyaṃ ca hutvā tu vidhinā kālayedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: bhūdaivatyam ca hutvā tu vidhinā kālayet budhaḥ
vimāne nirmite paścāt sudhā karmaṇi akalpite

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca sūktaṃ pauruṣameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca sūktam pauruṣam eva ca
hunet śrī bhūmi daivatyam vidhinā punar ārabhet
āgneyam bhūmi daivatyam hutvā kāryam samācaret

original: hīne dhāmnaḥkavāṭādau dhātrādīn juhuyācca ṣaṭ // BhS_26.44 //
analyzed: hīne dhāmnaḥ kavāṭa ādau dhātṛ ādīn juhuyāt ca ṣaṭ

original: prākāre gopure hine doṣo bhūyānmahattaraḥ // BhS_26.45 //
analyzed: prākāre gopure doṣaḥ bhūyāt mahattaraḥ
vaṃśa hāniḥ dviṣat vṛddhiḥ artha nāśaḥ mahat bhayam
śānta īhine mahā āpad syāt kulam ca utsīdati dhruvam
bhūta pīṭha vihīne tu dhana dhānya āyuṣām kṣayaḥ
kūpa ārāma ha viśśāla puṣpa saṃcaya vāṭikāḥ
snāna pānīya śālā ca tathā eva āsthāna maṇḍapam
nṛtta gīta prapāḥ ca evam maṇḍapa ādau anirmite

original: saṃpadyeta mahān doṣaḥ kṛtaṃ syādakṛtaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: saṃpadyeta mahān doṣaḥ kṛtam syāt akṛtam punar
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet śaktitaḥ budhaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusuktaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ sūktameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusuktam ca pauruṣam sūktam eva ca
hutvā śrī bhūmi daivatyam tad tad daivatyam eva ca
yathoktam tu prakurvīta vitta śāṭhyam na kārayet
prathama iṣṭakām samārabhya sthūpi kīla avasānake
ānuktānām ca doṣāṇām iyam syāt sarva niṣkṛtiḥ
ālayāt puratas vā atha dakṣiṇe vā manorame
śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya padma agnau juhuyāt kramāt

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ sūktameva ca // BhS_26.53 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca pauruṣam sūktam eva ca

original: āgneyaṃ durgāsūktaṃ ca prājāpatyaṃ ca hāvayet // BhS_26.55 //
analyzed: āgneyam durgāsūktam ca prājāpatyam ca hāvayet

original: dhruvaberaṃ vinākṛtvā kautuke sthāpite yadi // BhS_26.56 //
analyzed: dhruva beram vinā kṛtvā kautuke sthāpite yadi
ābhicārikam etat syāt rāja rāṣṭra vināśanam
tad doṣa parihāra artham mahāśāntim caret
vaiṣṇavān ca su saṃpūjya bhojayet brāhmaṇān bahūn
kṣama asva iti namaskṛtya devadevam tu kautukam
bālālaye pratiṣṭhāpya dhruva beram samācaret
dhruva arcā beram atha vā kṛtvā sthāpanam ācaret

original: vimānasya samāptau tu māsādūrdhvaṃ tu tatra vai /
analyzed: vimānasya samāptau tu māsāt ūrdhvam tu tatra vai
dhruva sthāpana hīne tu vaiṣṇavam juhuyāt tatas

original: vāruṇaṃ bārhaspatyaṃ ca śrībhūdaivatyameva ca // BhS_26.61 //
analyzed: vāruṇam bārhaspatyam ca śrī bhū daivatyam eva ca
śāntim hutvā vidhānena dadyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvaiva pūjayitvā tu vaiṣṇavān // BhS_26.62 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā eva pūjayitvā tu vaiṣṇavān
dhruva beram pratiṣṭhāpya vidhinā samyak arcayet
evam māsa dvaye atīte dviguṇam niṣkṛtiḥ bhavet
māsa traye tu triguṇam eva māvatsaram bhavet

original: saṃvatsare vyatīte tu doṣo bhūyānmahattaraḥ // BhS_26.64 //
analyzed: saṃvatsare vyatīte tu doṣaḥ bhūyāt mahattaraḥ
sapta aham tu mahāśāntim hutvā abja agnau vidhānataḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt vidhinā sarvam ācaret
sapta varṣeṣu sapta aham prathama ādi krameṇa vai
kecid icchanti munayaḥ sapta aha antam idam caret
atas ūrdhvam karṣaṇa ādi punar saṃskāram ācaret
jala adhivāsanāt pūrvam aṅga hānau dhruvasya tu

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca sūktaṃ pauruṣameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca sūktam pauruṣam eva ca
hunet śrī bhūmi daivatyam dadbhyaḥ svāhā ādikam tathā
ācārya dakṣiṇām dadyāt beram samyak parīkṣayet
saṃdhāna yogyam saṃdadhyāt punar kāryam samācaret
śaktaḥ ced nūtanam beram āhṛtya tu samācaret
śilā grahaṇa saṃskāram a kṛtvā śilpinā kṛtam
beram ādāya juhuyāt śāntim vaiṣṇava mantrataḥ

original: bhūmau pidhāya tadberaṃ vāstuhomaṃ samācaret // BhS_26.71 //
analyzed: bhūmau pidhāya tat beram vāstu homam samācaret

original: paritaḥ pūrvavadgatvā baliṃ devaṃ samarcya ca // BhS_26.72 //
analyzed: paritas pūrvavat gatvā balim devam samarcya ca
paścāt sa mantrakam kṛtvā avidhinā sthāpayet budhaḥ
jala adhivāsanāt arvāk thsāpanāt pūrvam eva ca
devasya devī ādīnām vā aṅga hāniḥ bhavet yadi

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ sūktameva ca // BhS_26.74 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca pauruṣam sūktam eva ca

original: śrīsūktaṃ ca mahīsūktaṃ brāhmaṃ raudraṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: śrīsūktam ca mahīsūktam brāhmam raudram tathā eva ca
munyoḥ mantram atha anyeṣām tat tat matram suhūyatām
saṃdhāna yogyam saṃdadhyāt ayogyam vidhivat tyajet
saṃdhāya vā anyam ca āhṛtya punasthsāpanam ācaret
sthāpite tu mahābere māsāt ūrdhvam a saṃskṛte

original: abjāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva viṣṇusūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_26.77 //
analyzed: abja agnau vaiṣṇavam ca eva viṣṇusūktam tathā eva ca

original: sūktaṃ tu pauruṣaṃ hutvā śrībhūdaivatyameva ca /
analyzed: sūktam tu pauruṣam hutvā śrī bhū daivatyam eva ca

original: brāhmaṃ raudraṃ pārṣadaṃ ca hutvā kāryaṃ samācaret // BhS_26.78 //
analyzed: brāhmam raudram pārṣadam ca hutvā kāryam samācaret

original: māsadvaye tu dviguṇaṃ trimāse triguṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: māsa dvaye tu dviguṇam tri māse triguṇam bhavet

original: atīte dvādaśe varṣe karṣaṇādi punaḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: atīte dvādaśe varṣe karṣaṇa ādi punar kriyāḥ
śilā saṃgrahaṇa ādi anyat kṛtvā sthāpanam ācaret
atha vakṣye karṣaṇa ādau punar saṃskāra mācaret
tṛṇa gulma latā ādīni śodhayet pūrvam ālaye
kuryāt śilā iṣṭakā dāru prakṣepaṇa vidhim kramāt
sudhā varṇa anulepa ādīn samāpya guru tvaraḥ
alayasya uttare kuryāt vāstu haumam yathāvithi

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayedvidvān paryagniṃ caiva kārayet // BhS_26.83 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayet vidvān paryagnim ca eva kārayet
pañcagavyaiḥ samabhyukṣya tatas saṃkarpya karṣaṇam
ālaya abhimukhe kṛtvā budhaḥ
śānta anapāyinau vīśam ca abhyarca ca nivedayet

original: suvarṇena halaṃ kṛtvā garbhāgārādi sarvaśaḥ // BhS_26.85 //
analyzed: suvarṇena halam kṛtvā garbhāgāra ādi sarvaśas
gṛhītvā dakṣiṇe haste mantraiḥ viṣṇoḥ nu ka ādibhiḥ
karṣayitvā yathā uktāni bījāni āhṛtya deśikaḥ
abhyukṣya somam abhyarcya viṣṇugāyatrim uccaran
tatas bījān somam
sarvatra vāpanam kuryāt dūrvā ādīn ca āharet tṛṇān

original: āstīryopari tā ntṛrvān sūktaṃ gaudānikaṃ punaḥ // BhS_26.88 //
analyzed: āstīrya upari tāḥ sūktam gaudānikam punar

original: ālayaṃ tu susaṃśodhya brahmādīnāṃ dadedbalim // BhS_26.89 //
analyzed: ālayam tu su saṃśodhya brahma ādīnām dadet balim
droṇaiḥ tad ardhaiḥ vā paktvā taṇḍulaiḥ sa ghṛtam carum

original: pūrvaṃ toyaṃ tataḥ puṣpaṃ baliṃ to yaṃ samarpayet // BhS_26.90 //
analyzed: pūrvam toyam tatas puṣpam balim yam samarpayet
punar saṃśodhayet dhāma śānti homa purassaram
tad tad saṃskāra homam ca hutvā kuryāt kriyāḥ tatas
ādya iṣṭakā artham āsādya kuṇḍam aupāsanam budhaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ sūktameva ca // BhS_26.92 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca pauruṣam sūktam eva ca
degdaivatyam ca juhuyāt devam dhyāyan samāhitaḥ
japet veda ādi mantrān tu saṃspṛśya ādya iṣṭakā sthalam
kṛtvā antar pariṣekam ca pariṣicya analam punar
garbhanyāsa artham āgūrya vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam

original: puruṣasūktaṃ ca śrīsūktaṃ mahīsūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: puruṣasūktam ca śrīsūktam mahīsūktam tathā eva ca
dek daivatyam ca juhuyāt nāga rājāya asau iti api
sarva ratnebhyaḥ iti uktvā sarva dhātubhyaḥ iti api
sarva bījebhyaḥ iti uktvā sarva lohebhyaḥ iti ape
nadībhyaḥ pātālebhyaḥ ca nāgebhyaḥ ajuhuyāt tatas
diggajebhyaḥ viṣṇave ca svāhā antam juhuyāt kramāt
tatas ābhyantara dvāra dakṣiṇa ntaṃbha dakṣiṇe

original: medinīṃ tu samabhyarcya japetsūktaṃ tu pauruṣam // BhS_26.98 //
analyzed: medinīm tu samabhyarcya japet sūktam tu pauruṣam
medinī ādīn tatas spṛśet budhaḥ

original: kṛtvāntaḥ pariṣekantu tatra kāryaṃ samācaret // BhS_26.99 //
analyzed: kṛtvā antar tatra kāryam samācaret

original: naṣṭe garbhe ca hutvaivaṃ saṃpādya sthāpayetpunaḥ /

original: kriyāhīne viparyāse mantrāṇāṃ saṃkare 'pi vā // BhS_27.36 //
analyzed: kriyā hīne viparyāse mantrāṇām saṃkare api vā
vaiṣṇavam vyāhṛtīḥ ca eva vyāhṛti antam hunet kramāt
puṇyāha hīne puṇyāha mantrān dvādaśaśas japet
vāstu homa vihīne tu tad mantrān daśaśas hunet

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ pauruṣaṃ ca sūktaṃ hutvā samācaret /
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam pauruṣam ca sūktam hutvā samācaret

original: ratnapratinidhī rukmaṃ dhātūnāṃ pāradaṃ tathā // BhS_27.39 //
analyzed: ratna pratinidhiḥ rukmam dhātūnām pāradam tathā

original: bījānāṃ ca yavāḥ proktāḥ pūrvālābhe parassmataḥ /

analyzed: ratnānām praṇidhim gṛhya vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam

original: bījānāṃ praṇidhiṃ gṛhya vāyavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_27.41 //
analyzed: bījānām praṇidhim gṛhya vāyavyam vaiṣṇavam tathā

tat tyaktvā anyam samāhṛtya śrī daivatyam ca vaiṣṇavam

pramāṇa hīneṣu punar toraṇa ādiṣu

original: darbharajjvāṃ vihīnāyāṃ hunaidārṣaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam, // BhS_27.45 //
analyzed: darbha rajjvām vihīnāyām hunaidārṣam ca vaiṣṇavam

original: kuṃbhe pramāṇahīne vā doṣayukte 'pi vā tathā /
analyzed: kuṃbhe pramāṇa hīne vā doṣa yukte api vā tathā
vastrābhyām varṇa cihnaiḥ ca hīne na atra vaset hariḥ

original: puruṣasūktaṃ brāhmaṃ ca munimantrāṃśca pāvakam // BhS_27.47 //
analyzed: puruṣasūktam brāhmam ca muni mantrān ca pāvakam

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvaiva saṃpūjyaiva ca vaiṣmavān // BhS_27.50 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā eva saṃpūjya eva ca vaiṣmavān

original: spṛṣṭe tu sāthite kuṃbhe patitaiḥ kukkuṭādibhiḥ // BhS_27.51 //
analyzed: spṛṣṭe tu sāthite kuṃbhe patitaiḥ kukkuṭa ādibhiḥ
tat vyapohya āryat ādāya pūrvavat sādhayet tathā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.52 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣasūktam tathā eva ca

ācārya dakṣiṇām dadyāt vaiṣṇavān pūjayet vidhiḥ
sparśa duṣṭe tathā bere snapanam śāstrataḥ caret

original: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā paścātkāryaṃ samācaret // BhS_27.54 //
analyzed: pūrva uktām niṣkṛtim kṛtvā paścāt kāryam samācaret

original: śvakukkuṭādyaissaṃspṛṣṭe kuṇḍe taṃ taṃ vyapohya ca // BhS_27.55 //
analyzed: śva kukkuṭa ādyaiḥ saṃspṛṣṭe kuṇḍe tam tam vyapohya ca

original: darbhān kuśānvā samidho māsātītān pragṛhya ca // BhS_27.58 //
analyzed: darbhān kuśān vā samidhaḥ māsa atītān pragṛhya ca

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ brāhmamāgneyaṃ sauraṃ ca vyāhṛtīrhunet // BhS_27.60 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam brāhmam āgneyam sauram ca vyāhṛtīḥ hunet
an ukta deśāt ānītāḥ mṛdaḥ vā vālukāḥ tathā
agnikuṇḍa artham āhṛtya vāruṇam vaiṣṇave hunet
ārdram sa dhūmam durgandham lepa yuktam sa kaṇṭakam

anyat prakṣipya ca āgneyam vaiṣṇavam vyāhṛtīḥ hunet

original: vastrādidravye darbheṣu prapāyāṃ kūṭa eva vā // BhS_27.63 //

original: āgneyaṃ vaiṣṇavamiti pratyekaṃ daśaśo hunet // BhS_27.64 //
analyzed: āgneyam vaiṣṇavam iti pratyekam daśaśas hunet

original: hīne vā viparīte vā tatra hautrapraśaṃsane /

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca brāhmaṃ raundraṃ huneddaśa // BhS_27.69 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca brāhmam raundram hunet daśa

original: padmāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ sūktaṃ ca pauruṣam // BhS_27.70 //

analyzed: kurvatām tu puraścaryām ācāryasya ṛtvijām tathā

tri yaham tu mahā śāntiḥ stad doṣa vinivāriṇī
hanti alpa dakṣiṇaḥ yāgaḥ phalam dadyāt sa dakṣiṇaḥ

iyam tātkālikī jñeyā bhūmim agre pradāpayet
arcakasya arcana ardham ca kuṭuṃba artham viśeṣataḥ

original: āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ pūjāmetāṃ na lopayet // BhS_27.84 //

original: āsurī sā bhavedarcā kartā naivāpnu yātphalam // BhS_27.91 //

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tadhaiva ca // BhS_27.112 //

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣa sūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.129 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣa sūktam tathā eva ca

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.131 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣasūktam tathā eva ca
