analyzed: sabhya agnau vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam sūktam ca pauruṣam
hutvā śrī bhūmi daivatyam sarva daivatyam eva ca
kalaśaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ ca tvā ariṃśadbhiḥ snāpayet harim
viśeṣeṇa haviḥ dadyāt dvitīye dviguṇam tathā

original: tṛtīye triguṇaṃ caivaṃ vatsarānantu vardhayet // BhS_27.135 //
analyzed: tṛtīye triguṇam ca evam vatsarān antu vardhayet
atīte vatsare ca evam padma agnau sapta vāsaram

original: mahāśāntiṃ tu hutvaiva kṛtvā vaiṣṇavapūjanam // BhS_27.136 //
analyzed: mahāśāntim tu hutvā eva kṛtvā vaiṣṇava pūjanam
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā eva śata aṣṭa kalaśaiḥ punar
saṃsnāpya devadeveśam mācaret
akṣi unneṣa adhivāsau tu
hitvā anyat sakalam karma pūrvavat tu samācaret
haviḥ hīne janāḥ sarva etad grāma sthāḥ samīpa gāḥ
pīḍitāḥ kṣudh pipāsā ādyaiḥ bhaveyuḥ vyādhitāḥ api
tasmāt ati prayatnena haviḥ samyak nivedayet

original: hīne haviṣyeka kāle dvitīye dviguṇaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.140 //
analyzed: hīne dvitīye dviguṇam bhavet
tṛtīye triguṇam kuryāt ekasmin divase gate

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ śrīmahīmantrān mūrti homaṃ tathā hunet // BhS_27.141 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam śrī mahī mantrān mūrti homam tathā hunet
devam śuddha udakaiḥ snāpya prabhūtam tu nivedayet

original: sopadaṃśamapakvaṃ ca śītaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tathā // BhS_27.142 //
analyzed: sa upadaṃśam apakvam ca śītam paryuṣitam tathā
pātra antareṣu a nikṣiptam sa avaśeṣam ca laṅghitam

original: vivṛtaṃ srāvitaṃ caiva vikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭi dūṣitam // BhS_27.143 //
analyzed: vivṛtam srāvitam ca eva vikṛtam dūṣitam
a prokṣitam atha a spṛṣṭam ma gṛhītam a mudritam
haviḥ nivedayet ced tu vaiṣṇavam śrī mahī manūn

original: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ daśaśo hunet /
analyzed: āgneyam vāruṇam ca eva vāyavyam daśaśas hunet

original: dviguṇaṃ tu punaḥkṛtvā prabhūtaṃ tu nivedayet // BhS_27.145 //
analyzed: dviguṇam tu punar kṛtvā prabhūtam tu nivedayet
nivedya ca aśumi spṛṣṭam devam saṃsnāpya mantrataḥ
vaiṣṇavam viṣṇugāyatrīm trayastriṃśat kramāt hunet
juhuyāt vidhinā aśāntim prokṣaṇaiḥ api prokṣayet

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvaiva dviguṇaṃ cārcanaṃ haviḥ // BhS_27.147 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā eva dviguṇam ca arcanam haviḥ
vrīhi aṅgāra tuṣaiḥ yukte śarkarā ādi vimiśrite

original: nivedite tu haviṣi mantreṇāṣṭākṣareṇa tu // BhS_27.148 //
analyzed: nivedite tu haviṣi mantreṇa aṣṭa akṣareṇa tu
vaiṣṇapyā ca eva gāyatṣā mantraiḥ saṃstūya vaiṣṇavaiḥ
kṣama asva iti anumānya eva praṇamaya eva ca yācayet
makṣikā ādyaiḥ jantubhiḥ ca keśa ādyaiḥ api dūṣite

original: nivedite tu haviṣi śuddhodaissnāvyavai harim // BhS_27.150 //
analyzed: nivedite tu haviṣi harim
vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca śrī bhū daivatyam eva ca

original: aṣṭottaraśataṃ hutvā dviguṇaṃ tu nivedayet // BhS_27.151 //
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatam hutvā dviguṇam tu nivedayet
mahāhaviṣi saṃyukte tatra dūṣitam
puruṣa aśana mātram tu vyapohya tat anantaram
bhasma aṃbhasā kuśaiḥ hiraṇya pavamāna akaiḥ

original: prokṣya devaṃ susaṃprārdhya tadgṛhītvā nivedayet // BhS_27.153 //
analyzed: prokṣya devam su saṃprārdhya tat gṛhītvā nivedayet
pūrvam arka udayāt pakvam upadaṃśam atho haviḥ
koṣṇam ced arpayet prātar arcana antena doṣa bhāj
pūrva mastamayāt pakvam tathā sāyam nivedayet

original: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu tāṃbūlaṃ lepakeśānvitaṃ tathā // BhS_27.155 //
analyzed: a saṃskṛtam tu tāṃbūlam lepa keśa anvitam tathā
jantu spṛṣṭam nivedya eva vaiṣṇavam śrī mahī manun
hutvā saṃskṛtya tāṃbūlam punar anyat nivedayet
arcana aṃgeṣu ca anyeṣu padārtheṣu evam eva hi
dūṣiteṣu adha hīneṣu tasya tasya adhidaivatam
mantram sa vaiṣṇavam hutvā punar anyaiḥ samarcayet

original: alābhe caiva sarveṣāṃ puṣpaṃ toyaṃ pragṛhyaca // BhS_27.158 //
analyzed: alābhe ca eva sarveṣām puṣpam toyam pragṛhya ca
saṃkalpya eva pratinidhim tat tat smṛtvā samarcayet

original: nityahome vihīnetu vaiṣṇavaṃ daśaśo hunet // BhS_27.159 //
analyzed: nitya home vihīne tu vaiṣṇavam daśaśas hunet
yathā ukta homam dviguṇam ācaret tad anantaram
agni saṃrakṣaṇe aśaktāḥ vayante yaḥ anim uccaran
samidhya āropayet kuṇḍāt paścāt saṃsthāpya laukike
nyasya ca upāvaraḥ aha iti pratyaham juhuyāt kramāt
sura ṛṣi manujānām tu balam yasmāt
tasmāt baliḥ samākhyātaḥ tad artham pratyaham harim
ukta dravyeṣu ca āvāhya triṣu kāleṣu deśikaḥ
abhyarcya bhrāmayet evam aśaktaḥ kartum uttamam
yathā ukta pātre nikṣipya kevalam

original: tasyopari yathoktaṃ tu baliberaṃ ca vinyaset // BhS_27.164 //
analyzed: tasya upari yathoktam tu baliberam ca vinyaset

original: śirasā dhārayan pātraṃ trirdvirvā sakṛdeva vā /
analyzed: śirasā dhārayan pātram tris dvis vā sakṛt eva vā

original: dene tataḥ parīyācca devāgāraṃ pradakṣiṇam // BhS_27.165 //
analyzed: dene tatas parīyāt ca devāgāram pradakṣiṇam
atha hitvā bali dravyam śibikā ādau gaje athavā
a ropya yāne vidhivat kārayet ca pradakṣiṇam
prātar bhramaṇa hīne tu vaiṣmavam saura saumyakam
prājāpatyam ca juhuyāt hīne ca ukta pradakṣiṇe
vaiṣṇavam gāruḍam hutvā bali bhramaṇam ācaret

original: hīne prātarbalau kuryānmadhyāhne dviguṇaṃ balim // BhS_27.168 //
analyzed: hīne prātar balau kuryāt madhyāhne dviguṇam balim

original: tathā hīne ca madhyāhne rātrau triguṇamācaret /
analyzed: tathā hīne ca madhyāhne rātrau triguṇam ācaret

original: ekāhe tu balau hīne nityāgnau vā mahānane // BhS_27.169 //
analyzed: eka ahe tu balau hīne nitya agnau vā mahā ānane

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣasūktam tathā eva ca

original: digdaivatyaṃ ca hutvā tu pradakṣiṇanuthācaret // BhS_27.170 //
analyzed: digdaivatyam ca hutvā tu
deva alaṅkāra hīne tu śrī daivatyam yajet budhaḥ
chatra piñcha ādi alābhe tu vāruṇam juhuyāt tathā
alābhe ca amara ādīnām vāyavyam ca eva hūyate

original: dīpālābhe pāvakaṃ ca vyāhṛtyantaṃ yajettrayam // BhS_27.172 //
analyzed: dīpa alābhe pāvakam ca vyāhṛti antam yajet trayam

original: dvyahe tu dviguṇaṃ kurvāttṣahe triguṇameva ca /
analyzed: dvi ahe tu dviguṇam kurvāt tṣahe triguṇam eva ca
dvādaśa aha antam evam syāt dvādaśa ahe gate tatas
aupāsana agnim ādhāya vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam

original: puruṣasūktaṃ ca śrībhūmidaivatyaṃ brāhma meva ca // BhS_27.174 //
analyzed: puruṣasūktam ca śrī bhūmi daivatyam brāhmam m eva ca
raudram digdevatā mantram hutvā eva bhramaṇam caret

original: māne 'tīte tu padmāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktam // BhS_27.175 //
analyzed: māne atīte tu padmāgnau vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam
nṛ sūktam pāramātmīkam īṅkāra ādīm s tad ālaye
pariṣad deva mantrān ca hutvā bhramaṇam ācaret
dvi māse dviguṇam kuryāt tri māse triguṇam caret

original: vardhaye dvatsarāntaṃ cāpyatīte vatsare punaḥ // BhS_27.177 //
analyzed: vardhaye ca api atīte vatsare punar

original: sabhyaṃ saṃsādhya devābhimukhe vā dakṣiṇe nalam /
analyzed: sabhyam saṃsādhya deva abhimukhe vā dakṣiṇe nalam

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca sūktaṃ pauruṣameva ca // BhS_27.178 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca sūktam pauruṣam eva ca
śrī bhūmyoḥ ca eva daivatyam sarva daivatyam eva ca

original: hutvā cāryaṃ ca saṃpūjya balyuddharaṇamācaret // BhS_27.179 //
analyzed: hutvā cāryam ca saṃpūjya bali uddharaṇam ācaret

original: patite 'nnabalau bhūmyāṃ bhinne jīrṇe ca pūrvavat /
analyzed: patite anna balau bhūmyām bhinne jīrṇe ca pūrvavat

original: balimāpādya hutvā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ gāruḍaṃ tathā // BhS_27.180 //
analyzed: balim āpādya hutvā ca vaiṣṇavam gāruḍam tathā
prājāpatyam tu vidhinā tatas kuryāt pradakṣiṇam
bali uddharaṇa kāle tu vighnaḥ ced āpatet tadā

original: sauraṃ saumyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca hutvā punarathācaret /
analyzed: sauram saumyam vaiṣṇavam ca hutvā punar atha ācaret
pātra alābhe haviḥ pātram hunait ādāya vaiṣṇavam
pramāṇa hīne anna balau vaiṣṇavam ca prajāpatim
juhuyāt doṣa duṣṭe tu haviḥ niṣkṛtim ācaret
āvāhanam vinā ca anna balau tu bhramaṇekṛte

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.184 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣasūktam tathā eva ca
hutvā śrī bhūmi daivatyam vidhinā bhramaṇam caret
bali agra khaṇḍe vidhinā śāntāya tu anivedite

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ mūrtimantraṃ ca hutvaiva daśaśaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam mūrti mantram ca hutvā eva daśaśas kramāt
nivedya viṣvakcenāya pradāya mukhavāsanam
punar ca bali uddharaṇam vidhinā kārayet tatas

original: akṛte balidāne tu prāśya pādodakaṃ hareḥ // BhS_27.187 //
analyzed: a kṛte bali dāne tu prāśya pāda udakam hareḥ
prasādam ca api saṃprāśya punar dviguṇam arcayet

original: pravṛttāyāṃ tu pūjāyāṃ havirdānāntameva ca // BhS_27.188 //
analyzed: pravṛttāyām tu pūjāyām haviḥ dāna antam eva ca
tīrtha prasāda dānam vā pādukā grahaṇam tathā
naśaḥ tam anyathā kṛtvā śānti homam samācaret
pūjā ante pūjakāt pūrvam anyaḥ tīrtha ādikam pibet

original: prasādaṃ vāpi gṛhṇīyāttatpūjā niṣphalā bhavet // BhS_27.190 //
analyzed: prasādam vā api gṛhṇīyāt tad pūjā niṣphalā bhavet
mahāśāntim tathā hutvā punar pūjām samācaret

original: tīrthaṃ puṣpaṃ tataḥ kṣīraṃ gandhaṃ ca tadanantaram // BhS_27.191 //
analyzed: tīrtham puṣpam tatas kṣīram gandham ca tad anantaram
sarvāṇu api havīṃṣi atra nāgavallī dalāni api
yat yat niveditam deve dadyāt agreḥ ca
arcakaḥ tu hariḥ sākṣāt cara rūpaḥ yatas smṛtaḥ

original: nitye karmaṇi sarvatra pūjakaṃ pūrvamarcayet // BhS_27.193 //
analyzed: nitye karmaṇi sarvatra pūjakam pūrvam arcayet
ācārya marcakam vā atha tathā
yadi a vaikhānasaḥ vipraḥ kadāpi hari mandire
samicchet a grasat mānam tat devasya vimānanam
yajamānaḥ vipannaḥ syāt rāja rāṣṭram vinaśyati
ajñānāt atha vā mohāt ācale

original: dviguṇaṃ tu samabhyarcya cānyaddviguṇa mācaret // BhS_27.196 //
analyzed: dviguṇam tu samabhyarcya ca anyat dviguṇa mācaret
aśuciḥ vā api anācāraḥ sadā vaikhānasaḥ śuciḥ

original: pitā mṛṣyati putrāṇāṃ viśaṅkaṃ doṣasaṃcayam // BhS_27.197 //
analyzed: pitā mṛṣyati putrāṇām viśaṅkam doṣa saṃcayam

original: pitā hi bhagavān viṣṇuputrāssyuḥ pūjakā hareḥ /
analyzed: pitā hi bhagavān viṣṇu putrāḥ syuḥ pūjakāḥ hareḥ
tasmāt teṣu na kupyeta dīrgham āyuḥ jijīviṣuḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi niṣkṛtim snapana āśritām

original: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ trividhaṃ snapanaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.199 //
analyzed: nityam naimittikam kāmyam trividham snapanam bhavet
viṣuve ca ayana dvandve snapanam nityam ucyate
candra sūrya uparoge yat naimittikam iti smṛtam
śeṣeṣu snapanam yat tat kāmyam tu parikīrtitam
nitya snāpana hīne tu vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam
puruṣasūktam vāruṇam ca daśa kṛtvas hunet punar
snapanam vidhivat kuryāt ni tya snapana niṣkṛtiḥ
grahaṇe snapane hīne pūrvavat niṣkṛtim caret
kāmye ca pūrvavat kṛtvā śuddha udaiḥ abhiṣecayet
anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ yajamānaḥ vinaśyati
ālayāt puratas ca eva uttare vā manorame
uttamam snapanāgāram aiśānyām madhyamam bhavet
paścime dakṣiṇe ca evam adhamam saṃprakīrtitam
āgneyī ādiṣu koṇeṣu snapane vaiṣṇavam tathā

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca digīśānāṃ manuṃ hunet // BhS_27.206 //
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam nṛsūktam ca digīśānām manum hunet
snapanam kārayet paścāt eṣā vyatyaya niṣkṛtiḥ
saṃdhyā kāle tu saṃprāpte nimitta snapane tathā
naimittikam samāpya eva nitya pūjam samācaret

original: anyathā vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śatavāraṃ japetsudhīḥ // BhS_27.208 //
analyzed: anyathā vaiṣṇavam mantram śata vāram japet sudhīḥ

original: pūrvarātrau pratisare hīne ca śayane tathā /
analyzed: pūrvarātrau pratisare hīne ca śayane tathā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ śrīmahīmantrān hutvā saudarśanaṃ tathā // BhS_27.209 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam śrī mahī mantrān hutvā saudarśanam tathā
śayyā adhivāsanam hitvā bandhayet kautukam punar

original: emabere kautuke tu kartavye śayanaṃ vinā // BhS_27.210 //
analyzed: emabere kautuke tu kartavye śayanam vinā
baddhvā pratisaram sadyas snapanam samyak ācaret

original: kṛte 'ṃkurārpaṇe hīne snapane vaiṣṇapaṃ tathā // BhS_27.211 //
analyzed: kṛte aṃkura arpaṇe hīne snapane vaiṣṇapam tathā
saumyam śrī bhūmi daivatyam vaighnam hutvā abhiṣecayet
vinā aṃkura arpaṇam ca atha snāpayet iti kecana
pramāṇa hīne adhike vā paṅktau snāna avaṭe api ca

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ bhūmidaivatyaṃ paṅktīśasya manuṃ yajet // BhS_27.213 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam bhūmi daivatyam paṅktīśasya manum yajet

original: hīne śāntādyarcane ca vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /
analyzed: hīne śānta ādi arcane ca vaiṣṇavam śāntam eva ca

original: paṅktīśasyārcane hīne tanmantraṃ ca jayādīkān // BhS_27.214 //
analyzed: paṅktīśasya arcane hīne tad mantram ca jayādīkān
indra ādi arcana hīne tu tad mantram vaiṣṇavam hunet
kalaśeṣu apramāṇeṣu vaiṣṇavam vāyu daivatam
āgneyam juhuyāt mṛtsu hīnāsu atra ca vaiṣṇavam

original: bhūdaivatyaṃ ca juhuyānmṛtsu sarvāsvayaṃ vidhiḥ // BhS_27.216 //
analyzed: bhū daivatyam ca juhuyāt mṛtsu sarvāsu ayam vidhiḥ
vaiṣṇavam pāvakam hunet

original: dhānyeṣu vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.217 //
analyzed: dhānyeṣu vaiṣṇavam ca eva vāyavyam ca hunet budhaḥ
aṅkureṣu vihīneṣu vaiṣṇavam gāruḍam tathā
juhuyāt vyāhṛtīḥ ca eva yathārham saṃbharet punar
varṇa hīneṣu amāneṣu maṅgaleṣu tu vaiṣṇavam
aindram ca juhuyāt kuryāt yathārham saṃbharet api
pañcagavye mantra hīne vihīne yoga karmaṇi
juhuyāt vaiṣṇavam raudram mantreṇa eva
ukta pramāṇa hīneṣu pañcagavya ādiṣu kramāt
pradhāneṣu dravya adhipa manum tathā
vaiṣṇavena eva mantreṇa saha hutvā samācaret

original: prāśanaṃ prokṣaṃ vāpi śāstre 'smin yatra codyate // BhS_27.222 //
analyzed: prāśanam prokṣam vā api śāstre asmin yatra codyate
ayam eva vidhiḥ jñeyaḥ pañcagavyasya sarvatas
sādhite kalaśe bhinne tu anyam ādāya pūrvavat
āpūrya abhyarcya daśaśas vaiṣṇavam juhuyāt tatas
kalaśānām viparyāme tad hṛtena eva ca āplute
vaiṣṇavam dravya daivatyam hutvā saṃśodhya tat punar
śuddha udaiḥ snāpayet ca eva yathāvat ca punar nyaset
kṛte tu kalaśa nyāse śva kāka ādibhiḥ eva vā
aspṛśyaiḥ vā api saṃsparśe saṃsādhya anyat tu pūrvavat
śāntim vaiṣṇava mantrān ca hutvā kāryam samācaret
kṛmi kīṭa ādi patane tat tat dravyam parityajet
anyat ādāya juhuyāt vaiṣṇavam dravya daivatam

original: ratnālābhe vaiṣṇavaṃ tu hutvā svarṇaṃ tu nikṣipet // BhS_27.228 //
analyzed: ratna alābhe vaiṣṇavam tu hutvā svarṇam tu nikṣipet

original: vastrālābhe vaiṣṇavaṃ ca śrīdaivatyaṃ ca hāvayet /
analyzed: vastra alābhe vaiṣṇavam ca śrī daivatyam ca hāvayet

original: yathoktasnapane hīne kathaṃ citsnapanaṃ caret // BhS_27.229 //
analyzed: yathā ukta snapane hīne katham cit snapanam caret

original: atha vā kārayec chuddhasnapanaṃ vā vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: atha vā kārayet śuddha snapanam vā vidhānataḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittam atha utsave
kāla ādi bhedan teṣām ca lakṣaṇam ca purā uditam
puraskṛtya tithim kecid kecid nakṣatra pūrvakam
saṃkalpayanti avabhṛtham varam ṛkṣa apavargakam

original: akṛte niyate kālaṃ kṛte vāniyate tathā // BhS_27.232 //
analyzed: akṛte niyate kālam kṛte vā aniyate tathā
kāla utsave mahān doṣaḥ tatra kuryāt tu niṣkṛtim
utsavāt pūrvam uddisya mahāśāntim caret
vijñāpya devadeveśam tatas kāla utsavam caret

original: anyathā tu kṛtaṃ kāryamakṛtaṃ syādasaṃśayam // BhS_27.234 //
analyzed: anyathā tu kṛtam kāryam akṛtam syāt asaṃśayam

original: anyasmin vāpi māse tu na kuryādyadi cotsavam /
analyzed: anyasmin vā api māse tu na kuryāt yadi ca utsavam

original: eṣa eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ parasminvatsare kṛte // BhS_27.235 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ parasmin vatsare kṛte
evam tri vatsarebhyaḥ syāt atas ūrdhvam viśeṣataḥ

original: saptāhantu mahāśāntiṃ kṛtvā tūtsava mācaret // BhS_27.236 //
analyzed: sapta ahantu mahā śāntim kṛtvā tu utsava mācaret
eve dvādaśa varṣa antam tatas ca sthāpanam punar

original: tatra devo na ramate yo 'sāvutsava daivatam // BhS_27.237 //
analyzed: tatra devaḥ na ramate yaḥ asau utsava daivatam
yatra devālaye viṣṇuḥ sthsāpyate prathamam tatas
tena eva kārayet sarvam ācāryeṇa ār'cakena ca
tad abhāve tu tad putraiḥ pautraiḥ tad vaṃśa jaiḥ tathā
tad niyuktaiḥ tadīyaiḥ vā apūrva abhāve paraiḥ caret
anyathā kriyate ced tu yajamānaḥ vinaśyati
utsava ahaḥsu hīneṣu prāyaścittam samācaret
vardhayet vaiṣṇavam kāryam hrāsayet na kadā cana
pramādāt vā api aśaktau vā kṛtvā saṃprārthayet harim
mahāśāntim tu hutvā eva śeṣam kuryāt prayatnataḥ

original: eṣa eva vidhirvṛddhau sa tu śreyo 'bhivṛddhidaḥ // BhS_27.242 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ vṛddhau sa tu śreyaḥ abhivṛddhi daḥ
yadā tu avabhṛtha idaivāt kṛte vinimayena tu
asaṃkalpita vat kuryāt tatra pūrva ukta niṣkṛtiḥ
pramādāt buddhi pūrvam vā tad tad velā utsava ādiṣu

original: akṛteṣu yathāśāstraṃ kṛtvā tantreṇa vaipunaḥ // BhS_27.244 //
analyzed: a kṛteṣu yathāśāstram kṛtvā tantreṇa vaipunaḥ
mantreṇa vā punar sūkṣmam kāle avabhṛtham ācaret
yajñasya apabhṛthaḥ antaḥ syāt na utsavaḥ tad anantaram
akṛta utsava kāryāṇi yathoktam pūrvam ācaret
nitya utsavam hareḥ kuryāt nitya śrīḥ nitya maṅgalaḥ
hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ na alam devāḥ stam arcitum
ācārye yajamāne vā pūjake anya pada arthini
naṣṭe sadyas tadā anyantu varayitvā samācaret

original: na daivaṃ pratibadhnāti kāryaṃ yatkarma mānuṣam // BhS_27.248 //
analyzed: na daivam pratibadhnāti kāryam yat karma mānuṣam
deveśam anumānya atha mahāśāntim tu padmake
samṛtaḥ brahma medhāḥ arahaḥ pūtam tat gātram ucyate
sarve padārthinaḥ proktāḥ guru pūrvāḥ padārthinaḥ

original: grāmāntaraṃ prayāte tu dīkṣāmadhye padārthini // BhS_27.250 //
analyzed: grāma antaram prayāte tu dīkṣā madhye pada arthini
aspṛśya sparśa doṣeṇa surā pāna ādinā tathā
anukta doṣaiḥ vā duṣṭe rogāt śauca ādi asaṃbhave
śāva ādi āśausa yogye vā śava anugamane tathā
vāhane dāhane ca eva preta anna śrāddha bhoktari
śrāddhasya yājake śrāddha śiṣṭa bhoktari bhoktari
doṣaḥ syāt vidhinā tatra mahāśāntim atha ācaret

original: śrāddhakartiri no doṣa statra dātā bhavetsahi /
analyzed: no doṣaḥ statra dātā bhavet sahi

original: parānnena mukhaṃ dagdhaṃ hastau dagdhau pratigrahāt // BhS_27.254 //
analyzed: para annena mukham dagdham hastau dagdhau pratigrahāt
para strībhiḥ manaḥ dagdham brahma śāpaḥ kutas kalau

original: dīkṣāmadhye nānyadīkṣāṃ garbhadīkṣāṃ vinā caret // BhS_27.255 //
analyzed: dīkṣā madhye na anya dīkṣām garbhadīkṣām vinā caret

original: vidhure yajamāne tu dīkṣitaḥ puruṣo bhavet /
analyzed: vidhure yajamāne tu dīkṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ bhavet
sa dāraḥ vā dīkṣitaḥ syāt kalatravān
daṃpatī ced ayam abhyudayaḥ bhavet

original: anagnimatyadāre vā gurau taṃ tu na dīkṣayet // BhS_27.257 //
analyzed: anagnimati adāre vā gurau tam tu na dīkṣayet
anyasmin pada bhājī syāt yathāsaṃbhavam ādaraḥ

original: vaidhuryasaṃbhave tveṣāṃ madhye duṣyanti naiva te // BhS_27.258 //
analyzed: vaidhurya saṃbhave tu eṣām madhye duṣyanti nā eva te
vatsara āśaucam itarat ca āśaucam na pravartate
mātā pitroḥ mṛtau yat tu proktam abhyudaye punar
dhvaja ārohaṇa hīne tu kṛte niṣphalaḥ utsavaḥ
kṛtvā eva ārohaṇam tasmāt dhvajasya utsavam ācaret
dhvajasya ārohaṇam kṛtvā na ācaret yadi ca utsavam
ajñānāt artha lobhāt vā a māse a nyasmin samācaret
na kuryāt ced dvitīye tu māse kartā vinaśyati
tasmāt niṣkṛtim abja agnau hutvā tu utsavam ācaret

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ caiva gāruḍam /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca nṛsūktam ca eva gāruḍam

original: dhvājaṃ śāntaṃ ca cakraṃ ca tathaivotsavadaivatam // BhS_27.263 //
analyzed: dhvājam śāntam ca cakram ca tathā eva utsava daivatam

original: vyāhṛtyantaṃ ca hutvā tu vaiṣṇavān pūjya cācaret /
analyzed: vyāhṛti antam ca hutvā tu vaiṣṇavān pūjya ca ācaret

original: dhvajasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yena mānena kārayet // BhS_27.264 //
analyzed: dhvajasya lakṣaṇam vakṣye yena mānena kārayet
vimānena samam vā atha pādena ar'dhena vā adhikam

original: pādenārdhena hīsaṃ vā pañcadhāpi prakalpayet // BhS_27.265 //
analyzed: pādena ardhena hīsam vā pañcadhā api prakalpayet

original: ardhahīnaṃ na kurvīta tadevāgatikaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.266 //
analyzed: ardha hīnam na kurvīta tat eva āgatikam bhavet
tasmāt ca hīnam na eva syāt adhikam syāt tu śaktitaḥ
avakram ṛjum anyena asaṃbaddham kīlita ādibhiḥ
ślakṣṇam manoharam dāru gṛhītvā ākhaṇḍam uttamam

original: taṃ caturdaśadhā kuryāmmālāgre tena kārayet // BhS_27.268 //
analyzed: tam caturdaśadhā kuryām mālā agre tena kārayet
bhāgam ekam vihāya agre tatra kuryāt tri mekhalāḥ
mekhalānām atha āyāmaḥ tad bhāgena samaḥ bhavet
tri tāla vistṛtam kuryāt daṇḍa vistṛtam eva vā

original: antaraṃ ca samaṃ teṣāṃ tisraḥ kuryāttu yaṣṭikāḥ // BhS_27.270 //
analyzed: antaram ca samam teṣām tisraḥ kuryāt tu yaṣṭikāḥ
yaṣṭī dve puratas kuryāt paścāt ekā vidhīyate

original: sarvatra kiṅkiṇīnāṃ tu kuryācchatama śeṣataḥ // BhS_27.271 //
analyzed: sarvatra kiṅkiṇīnām tu kuryāt śatama śeṣatas

original: paścāccheṣaṃ tridhā kuryāccaturdhā vā dhvajaṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: paścāt śeṣam tridhā kuryāt caturdhā vā dhvajam budhaḥ

original: aṣṭāśraṃ ca ṣaḍaśraṃ ca caturaśraṃ ca vṛttakam // BhS_27.272 //
analyzed: aṣṭāśram ca ṣaḍaśram ca catur aśram ca vṛttakam
mūlāt ārabhya kurvīta caturdhā vihitam dhvajam

original: tridhā kṛte na kuryāttu ṣaḍaśraṃ śeṣamācaret // BhS_27.273 //
analyzed: tridhā kṛte na kuryāt tu ṣaḍaśram śeṣam ācaret

original: ādyaṃ bhāgaṃ tridhā kṛtvā kecidevaṃ prakurvate /
analyzed: ādyam bhāgam tridhā kṛtvā kecid evam prakurvate

original: śikharaṃ śira ityāhurardhena śikharaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.274 //
analyzed: śikharam śiraḥ iti āhuḥ ardhena śikharam bhavet
pramādāt patitam gṛhya śikharam sthāpayet vidhiḥ
spuṭitā iva atha bhinne vā biṃbasya ukta vat ācaret
adhiṣṭite tu śikhare dvijaiḥ gṛdhra ādibhiḥ sakṛt

original: viṣṭhādikaraṇe vāpi uṣite vā nirantaram // BhS_27.276 //
analyzed: viṣṭhā ādi karaṇe vā api uṣite vā nirantaram
vāstu homam ca hutvā eva paryagnikaraṇam caret

original: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto vimānaśikharādiṣu // BhS_27.277 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ vimāna śikhara ādiṣu
adhiṣṭhānena pādena prastareṇa ca saṃyutam
dhvaja mūle tu iṣṭakābhiḥ vedim kuryāt manoharām
na tām api adhitiṣṭheta naraḥ dīrgham jijīviṣuḥ
kim punar tatra vaktavyam ālayādi avarohaṇe
vimānam viṣṇu rūpam syāt na tat pādāt iva kramet
dhāma pradakṣiṇe pūrvam kuryāt tatra namastriyāḥ
na laṅghayet dhvaja chāyām pradakṣiṇa vidhim vinā
gopurasya vimānasya prākārasya ālayasya ca
pramādāt atilaṅghya eva prāṇāyāma śatam caret

original: śivadṛṣṭiṃ viṣṇuvṛṣṭhaṃ durgāyāḥ pārśvato dṛśam // BhS_27.282 //
analyzed: śiva dṛṣṭim viṣṇu vṛṣṭham durgāyāḥ pārśvatas dṛśam
vighneśasya ūrdhva dṛṣṭim ca tīkṣṇam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
yāvat śāvataret chāyā tāvatī doṣa bhūmikā
doṣa bhūmim parityajya nivāsam parikalpayet
tyāge saṃpad samṛddhiḥ syāt anyathā viparīta kṛt
radhi ādibhiḥ yathā bhūyāt antaram tat na doṣa kṛt

original: atha vā śatadaṇḍāntaṃ tyaktvānve vasatiṃ jaguḥ // BhS_27.285 //
analyzed: atha vā śata daṇḍa antam tyaktvā anve vasatim jaguḥ
yāvat dhāma āyatam dāvat pṛṣṭham vā mugham eva vā
tatas adhikam tat ca tat ca kecid āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
dhvajam nityam uśanti eke yatra ekaḥ hi anavāyiṣu
tatra ārohaṇa karma ādi na icchanti parama ṛṣayaḥ
autsavam dhvajam āsthāpya tatra kāryam prakurvate
dhvajam ekam tu sarvatra kecid āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dhvajadaṇḍe tu niṣkṛtim /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi dhvaja daṇḍe tu niṣkṛtim

original: pramādātpatite bhūmyāṃ dhvaje vātādinā dṛḍhe // BhS_27.289 //
analyzed: pramādāt patite bhūmyām dhvaje vāta ādinā dṛḍhe

original: abhagne vātha bhagne vā dhvajaṃ tatra pūnaḥ kṣipet /
analyzed: a bhagne vā atha bhagne vā dhvajam tatra pūnaḥ kṣipet

original: abhagne taṃ dhvajaṃ gṛhya kṛtvā mantreṇa takṣaṇam // BhS_27.290 //
analyzed: a bhagne tam dhvajam gṛhya kṛtvā mantreṇa takṣaṇam
adhivāsa ādikam kṛtvā sthāpayet budhaḥ

original: bhagne dhvaje na sagrāhyastamapsu vidhinā tyajet // BhS_27.291 //
analyzed: bhagne dhvaje na sa grāhyaḥ tam apsu vidhinā tyajet
tatas anyam dhvajam ādāya sthāpayet avilaṃbitam
cora ādyaiḥ buddhi pūrvam vā pātite pūrvavat vidhiḥ
tatra adhikam prakurvīta śilpibhiḥ takṣaṇam punar
a bhagna dhvaja vat kuryāt anyat pūrvavat atvaraḥ
bhāgena anupayuktasya dhvajasya tyājya tā eva hi
duṣṭa bhāgasya dānena na kadācid parigrahaḥ

original: atha vā sudṛḍaṃ gṛhya pratiṣṭhāṃ mahatīṃ caret /
analyzed: atha vā su dṛḍam gṛhya pratiṣṭhām mahatīm caret

original: duṣṭaṃ bhāgaṃ vyapohyaiva pramāṇaṃ lakṣayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.295 //
analyzed: duṣṭam bhāgam vyapohya eva pramāṇam lakṣayet punar
pramāṇam apramāṇam vā dhvajam na anyena dāruṇā

original: saṃyutāṃ vardhitāṃ kuryādeṣa sārvatriko vidhiḥ // BhS_27.296 //
analyzed: saṃyutām vardhitām kuryāt eṣa sārvatrikaḥ vidhiḥ
tāmra ādinā kuryāt lohena kavaca ādikam
bāla ālayam prakalpya eva tatrakāryam samācaret

original: sthitameva dhvajaṃ kuryānna tu taṃ cālayetkvacit /
analyzed: sthitam eva dhvajam kuryāt na tu tam cālayet kvacid

original: dagdhaṃ dhvajaṃ parityajya punaranyaṃ samāharet // BhS_27.298 //
analyzed: dagdham dhvajam parityajya punar anyam samāharet
dhvaje antya jātibhiḥ spṛṣṭe mahāśāntim atha ācaret
taiḥ samīpam upetaiḥ tu sahasra āhutim ācaret

original: patite vātyayā caivaṃ dhvajasya śikhare tathā /
analyzed: patite vā atyayā ca evam dhvajasya śikhare tathā

original: mekhalāsu ca tatsarvaṃ navīkṛtya yathāvidhi // BhS_27.300 //
analyzed: mekhalāsu ca tat sarvam navīkṛtya yathāvidhi
dhvaja daṇḍe tu saṃyojya pratiṣṭhām punar ācaret

original: dhvajasya calane cāpi pramādādvraścane tathā // BhS_27.301 //
analyzed: dhvajasya calane ca api pramādāt vraścane tathā
bhagna a bhagna dhvajasya ukta niṣkṛtim tu samācaret

original: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto daṇḍeṣvanveṣu sarvataḥ // BhS_27.302 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ daṇḍeṣu anu eṣu sarvatas
aśani ādi nipātena dhāmani antarite yadi

original: deve naṣṭe dhvaje susthe dhvajasyārādhanaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.303 //
analyzed: deve naṣṭe dhvaje susthe dhvajasya ārādhanam bhavet
ālayam ca punar kṛtvā tam eva ārādhayet dhvajam
nirīkṣya trīṇi varṣāṇi devāgāre tu anirmite

original: tatra devo na ramate taddhvajaṃ tu tyajetsudhīḥ /
analyzed: tatra devaḥ na ramate tad dhvajam tu tyajet sudhīḥ

original: atha vā yatra kutrāpi pratiṣṭhāpya samarcayet // BhS_27.305 //
analyzed: atha vā yatra kutra api pratiṣṭhāpya samarcayet
atha vakṣye dhvaja sthānam yathā śāstra viniścitam
piṭha gopurayoḥ madhye pañca bhāgam prakalpya ca
pīṭhāt tyaktyā catur bhāgam pañcame dhvaja saṃsthitiḥ

original: tatsaṃdhau tu praśastaṃ syādyathā saṃphavamācaret // BhS_27.307 //
analyzed: tad saṃdhau tu praśastam syāt yathā saṃphavam ācaret
yadi prākāra bāhye syāt dhvajaḥ śāstra vat ācaret
anukta sthāna nihitam tam ca śāstra vat ācaret
aśaktau punar anyam ca prākāram kārayet kramāt
deva dṛś viṣayam kuryāt dhvajam
yadā ca anya ālayaiḥ vā api gopura ādibhiḥ eva vā

original: abhyantaraṃ bhaveccettu chidraṃ kuryāttu dṛkpathe // BhS_27.310 //
analyzed: abhyantaram bhavet ced tu chidram kuryāt tu dṛkpathe
vṛkṣa ādyaiḥ patitaiḥ naṣṭe cālite avanate api ca
tat hi ajam pūrvavat kuryāt tri māsa abhyantare a tvaraḥ
kṛmi ādibhiḥ vihaṅgaiḥ vākoṭara ādau kṛte dhvaje
kṛtvā bāla ālayam paścāt samīkṛtya arcayet punar
rajju bandha ādi karaṇe dhvajasya ārohaṇe kṛte

original: bālālayaṃ na tatra syādvāstuśuddhiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.313 //
analyzed: bāla ālayam na tatra syāt vāstuśuddhim samācaret
prākṣayet pañcagavyaiḥ tu dhvaja mantreṇa hūyate
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi niṣkṛti varcana kramam

original: uktena vidhinā yatra naṣṭe duṣṭe 'pi vā dhvaje /
analyzed: uktena vidhinā yatra naṣṭe duṣṭe api vā dhvaje
kuryāt veṇu dhvajam śubham
atha vā kārayet vidvān suvarṇa rajata ādibhiḥ

original: dhvajaṃ tālonnataṃ sthāpya garbhagehe tu pūjayet // BhS_27.316 //
analyzed: dhvajam tāla unnatam sthāpya garbha gehe tu pūjayet
adhivāsa ādi tat sarvam pratiṣṭhā ukta vat ācaret
acalaḥ veṇudaṇḍaḥ syāt garbhagehe bhavet calaḥ
utsava ādau tu sarvatra veṇu daṇḍam samācaret
caladaṇḍaḥ veṇudaṇḍaḥ iti syāt utsavedvayam

original: utsavādau pravṛtte tu uktadoṣe tvayaṃ vidhiḥ /
analyzed: utsava ādau pravṛtte tu ukta doṣe tu ayam vidhiḥ
dhvaja stham garuḍam tasmāt avamucya samāhitaḥ
nītvā tu yāga śālāyām saṃsthāpya tu samarcayet
veṇu daṇḍam pratiṣṭhāpya sadyas tasmin prayojayet
mahāśāntim tathā kuryāt sahasra āhutim eva ca

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇudaivatyaṃ gāruḍaṃ dhvājameva ca // BhS_27.321 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇu daivatyam gāruḍam dhvājam eva ca
saudarśanam ca kūśmāṇḍān śatam aṣṭa adhikam yajet
tathā eva dīpa daṇḍasya bhavet sarvatra cakramaḥ
dhvaje nā āropayet dīpam dīpa daṇḍaḥ pṛthak bhavet

original: tatra dīpaṃ samāropya na labhetphalamavyayam // BhS_27.323 //
analyzed: tatra dīpam samāropya na labhet phalam avyayam

original: dhvaje dīpaṃ samāropya vaiṣṇavaṃ śataśo yajet /
analyzed: dhvaje dīpam samāropya vaiṣṇavam śataśas yajet
āpad kalpam pravakṣyanti dhvaje dīpa avarohaṇam
dīpa yukte dhvaje naṣṭe pūrvavat niṣkṛtim caret
vīśa pratiṣṭhā hīne tu dhvajasya ārohaṇe kṛte

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ dhvājameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca nṛsūktam dhvājam eva ca

original: gāruḍaṃ daśaśo hutvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.326 //
analyzed: gāruḍam daśaśas hutvā pratiṣṭhām punar ācaret
dhvajadevasya cakrasya śānta nandīśayoḥ tathā
vaiṣṇavam ca taddaivatya samanvitam
hutvā eva punar abhyarcya paścāt kāryam samācaret

original: bherītāḍanahīne ca raudraṃ ca vyāhṛtīstathā // BhS_27.328 //
analyzed: bherī tāḍana hīne ca raudram ca vyāhṛtīḥ tathā
hutvā mahāvyāhṛtīḥ ca bherī tāḍanam ācaret
arcana ādiṣu sarvatra yatra ghaṇṭā ninādanam

original: eṣa eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ prāyaścittaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ prāyaścittam samācaret

original: āropite tu garuḍe hīne caiva nivedane // BhS_27.330 //
analyzed: āropite tu garuḍe hīne ca eva nivedane

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ dhvaṃmetrau ca hutvā gāruḍameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam dhvam metrau ca hutvā gāruḍam eva ca
nivedayet tu dviguṇam kṣama asva iti anumānayet

original: mudgānne tu tathā hīne vaiṣṇavaṃ vāyudaivatam /
analyzed: mudga anne tu tathā hīne vaiṣṇavam vāyu daivatam
āgneya mīṅkāra ādīn ca gāruḍam dhvājam eva ca

original: hutvā yatnena bahuśo maudgikaṃ ca nivedayet /
analyzed: hutvā yatnena bahuśas maudgikam ca nivedayet
varṣa vāta ātapaiḥ samyak upaghāta ādi saṃbhave
viṣṭhā ādi upahate ca eva pakṣiṇām asakṛt sakṛt
rajju ādi truṭane ca eva pramādāt patane api ca
pātite buddhi pūrvam vā akāle api avaropite
śūdra ādyaiḥ anulomaiḥ vā spṛṣṭe dhvaja gate paṭe
aśucim śodhayitvā anyat samīkṛtya a samīkṛtam
utsava adhipa daivatyam ṣaṣ vāram juhuyāt guruḥ

original: gāruḍaṃ dhvajamantraṃ ca sahastaṃ caiva hūyatām /
analyzed: gāruḍam dhvaja mantram ca sa hastam ca eva hūyatām

original: tataśśeṣaṃ samāpyeta viparītaṃ na kārayet // BhS_27.337 //
analyzed: tatas śeṣam samāpyeta viparītam na kārayet
pramādāt buddhi pūrvam vā paṭe dagdhe anyam āharet

original: śāntiṃ pūrvoditāṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.338 //
analyzed: śāntim pūrva uditām kṛtvā pratiṣṭhām punar ācaret
avarohaṇam udvāsantam ca mantreṇa kārayet
avarohaṇa hīne tu mantreṇa udvāsanam bhavet
tatas śeṣam prakūrvīta aśaktau avarohaṇe

original: apramāṇaṃ paṭaṃ gṛhya mahāśāntiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.340 //
analyzed: apramāṇam paṭam gṛhya mahāśāntim samācaret
punar anyam samādāya karma śeṣam samācaret

original: hīne tu cotsavāraṃbhasnapane vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_27.341 //
analyzed: hīne tu ca utsava āraṃbha snapane vaiṣṇavam tathā

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva hūyate /
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam nṛsūktam ca vāruṇam ca eva hūyate
śuddhodadaiḥ abhiṣākaḥ syāt prāyaścitta vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: hīne kautukabandhe tu vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /
analyzed: hīne kautukabandhe tu vaiṣṇavam śāntam eva ca

original: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvā tu kautukaṃ bandhayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.343 //
analyzed: saudarśanam ca hutvā tu kautukam bandhayet punar
yajña āgāre kuṃbha vedya ahīne vā api adhike api vā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ pāvakaṃ bhūmidaivatyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.344 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam pāvakam bhūmi daivatyam ca hunet budhaḥ
toraṇānām alābhe tu hunet dauvārikān manūn
hīnāyām darbha mālāyām ārṣam hutvā itarān kriyāt
alaṅkāra vihīne tu śrīdaivatyam tadhā hunet

original: prātarbaliṃ tu nirvāpya hīne nityotsave tathā // BhS_27.346 //
analyzed: prātar balim tu nirvāpya hīne nitya utsave tathā
vaiṣṇavam śānta vīśau ca hutvā ca utsava daivatam

original: sāyaṃ kuryādutsavaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kārayetkramāt // BhS_27.347 //
analyzed: sāyam kuryāt utsavam tu dviguṇam kārayet kramāt
sāyam hīnam tu dviguṇam prātar utsavam ācaret
eka kāla utsavaḥ ced tu kṛtvā kāla dvayam balim
sāyāhne ca utsavam kuryāt kāla atīte api ayam vidhiḥ
digdevatāḥ samāvāhya prathame ahani pūjayet
prācī ādi bali dānam syāt īśāna antam pradakṣiṇam
deva āhvāne vyatyayaḥ syāt vyatīhāraḥ atha vā bhavet

original: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā dviguṇaṃ tu baliṃ dadet /
analyzed: pūrva uktām niṣkṛtim kṛtvā dviguṇam tu balim dadet

original: brahmaṇaśca digīśānāṃ balidānaṃ tu naityikam // BhS_27.351 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ ca digīśānām bali dānam tu naityikam

original: adāne niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaṃ ṣaḍguṇaṃ baliḥ /
analyzed: adāne niṣkṛtim kṛtvā pūrva uktam ṣaḍguṇam baliḥ
catuṣpatha adhidevānām vṛkṣa ādīnām atha icchayā
prathama āvāhanāt arvāk vyatyaye pūrva niṣkṛtiḥ

original: prathamaṃ vāstuśuddhissyādya vai dīyate baliḥ // BhS_27.353 //
analyzed: prathamam vāstu śuddhiḥ syāt adya vai dīyate baliḥ
antam śuddhi anti rathyāḥ tāḥ śurdhi anti samaye punar
a kṛtāyām vāstu śuddhau dadyāt rathyāsu ced balim
śāntim kṛtvā tu pūrva uktām vāstuśuddhim

original: antaśśace vāstuni tu na balibhramaṇaṃ caret // BhS_27.355 //
analyzed: antaśśace vāstuni tu na bali bhramaṇam caret
śavam uddhṛtya paścāt tu paryagni karaṇam bhavet
akāle bali dānam syāt asura prīti vardhanam

original: akāle tu baliṃ datvā kāle tu triguṇaṃ baliḥ /
analyzed: akāle tu balim da tvā kāle tu triguṇam baliḥ
bali bhramaṇa deśaḥ syāt devasya bhramaṇāya hi
na anyatra caryā devasya

original: na hi śraddhotsave doṣamuśantyenaṃ sa hītaraḥ // BhS_27.358 //
analyzed: na hi śraddhā utsave doṣam uśanti enam sa hi itaraḥ
vāstu vṛddhau tathā hrāse grāma sīmā anavīkṛtau
anumānya ca deveśam śata aṣṭa kalaśa āplavaḥ

original: kṛtvā sīmāṃ viniścitya tataḥ kāryaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: kṛtvā sīmām viniścitya tatas kāryam samācaret
astarā ca utsavam kuryāt sahasra kalaśa āplavaḥ
devatā vāhanam kṛtvā tathā eva utsava mācaret

original: devādīnāṃ balaṃ yasmādvardhate sa balissmṛtaḥ // BhS_27.361 //
analyzed: deva ādīnām balam yasmāt vardhate sa baliḥ smṛtaḥ
śva sūkara ādibhiḥ duṣṭaiḥ na bhakṣyaḥ baliḥ ucyate
balibhuj vāyasaḥ proktaḥ gomukhyāḥ medhyajantavaḥ
viparīte mahān doṣaḥ tad mantraiḥ hāvayet śatam
bali śeṣam na śūdraḥ adyāt arcakaḥ bali śeṣa bhāj
bala avamantrakam kṣipte saṃkṣipte vidhi varjite
bhakṣite ca anuloma ādyaiḥ pūrva uktām niṣkṛtim caret
balau paryuṣite ati uṣṇe tathā ca eva anivedite
nivedanāt prāk arvāk vā adṛṣṭe śūdra ādibhiḥ balau

original: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā sarvatra dviguṇaṃ baliḥ /
analyzed: pūrva uktām niṣkṛtim kṛtvā sarvatra dviguṇam baliḥ

original: devatāvāhanaṃ yatra deśeprāk kriyate tataḥ // BhS_27.366 //
analyzed: devatā vāhanam yatra deśe prāk kriyate tatas
tatra eva bali dānam syāt yāvat udvāsanam bhavet

original: maṇḍalaṃ ca jalaṃ kūrcamāhvānādhāra ucyate // BhS_27.367 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam ca jalam kūrcam āhvāna ādhāraḥ ucyate
rathyāsu bali dānāya pīṭham śaila ādibhiḥ bhavet

original: balidānaṃ tu guptaṃ syānna tatbaśyantyavaidikāḥ // BhS_27.368 //
analyzed: bali dānam tu guptam syāt na tat baśyanti avaidikāḥ
tatthsāvam tu tiraskuryāt kāle yavanikā ādibhiḥ
bali pradāna hīne tu vaiṣṇavam bali rakṣakam
hutvā tu niṣkṛtim kuryāt bali dānam punar tadā

original: balidravye 'tha vā pātre patite bhūtale tathā // BhS_27.370 //
analyzed: bali dravye atha vā pātre patite bhū tale tathā

original: bhinne naṣṭe ca pūrvoktaṃ hutvānyaṃ balimāharet /
analyzed: bhinne naṣṭe ca pūrva uktam hutvā anyam balim āharet

original: balidānaṃ tu kṛtvaiva bhutapīṭhe kṣipettataḥ // BhS_27.371 //
analyzed: bali dānam tu kṛtvā eva bhuta pīṭhe kṣipet tatas

original: baliśeṣamanukte tu sthāne buddhyā tu nirvapet /
analyzed: bali śeṣam an ukte tu sthāne buddhyā tu nirvapet

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ cākṣahamanuṃ vaiṣvakcenaṃ ca gāruḍam // BhS_27.372 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam ca akṣaha manum vaiṣvakcenam ca gāruḍam

original: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvaiva bhūtapīṭhe bali kṣipet /
analyzed: saudarśanam ca hutvā eva bhūtapīṭhe bali kṣipet
haviḥ nivedane hīne hīne ca dviguṇa arcane

original: śāntiṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ hutvā tathābhyarcya nivedayet /
analyzed: śāntim ca vaiṣṇavam hutvā tathā abhyarcya nivedayet

original: yathoktahome hīne tu vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktakam // BhS_27.374 //
analyzed: yathā ukta home hīne tu vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam
nṛsūktam ca trayastriṃśat kṛtvas hutvā hunet punar
cakravīśa amitānām ca kuṃbha sthānām atha api vā
devānām arcane hīne vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam

original: nṛsūktaṃ sāntamantrau ca gāruḍaṃ cākrameva ca // BhS_27.376 //
analyzed: nṛsūktam sa anta mantrau ca gāruḍam ca ākram eva ca
hutvā punar samabhyarcya viśeṣeṇa nivedayet

original: devālaṅkaraṇe hīne śrīdaivatyaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // BhS_27.377 //
analyzed: deva alaṅkaraṇe hīne śrī daivatyam ca vaiṣṇavam
hudvā alaṅkāram āsādya bhūṣayet guruḥ

original: alaṅkāreṣu dravyeṣu niryāsaṃ candanaṃ sumam // BhS_27.378 //
analyzed: alaṅkāreṣu dravyeṣu niryāsam candanam sumam
tat hitvā anyat samādāya dravyam prakṣālya mantrataḥ
pañcagavyaiḥ samabhyukṣya tena alaṅkāraḥ ucyate

original: nṛtte geye 'tha vā hīne vaiṣṇavaṃ rudradaivatam /
analyzed: nṛtte geye atha vā hīne vaiṣṇavam rudra daivatam

original: stotrahīne tathā brāhmaṃ hutvā sārasvataṃ tataḥ // BhS_27.380 //
analyzed: stotra hīne tathā brāhmam hutvā sārasvatam tatas
bhakta bṛndaiḥ parivṛtau hīnāyām vāruṇam tathā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntadaivatyaṃ hīne picchādike tathā // BhS_27.381 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam śānta daivatyam hīne picchā ādike tathā

original: yānātkāle yāgaśālāṃ deve na pratigacchati // BhS_27.382 //
analyzed: yānāt kāle yāga śālām deve na pratigacchati
bhavet nitya arcanam tatra yatra devaḥ adhivāsitaḥ

original: dhruvārcanaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ na tatrāsti vyatikramaḥ // BhS_27.383 //
analyzed: dhruva arcanam yathā pūrvam na tatra asti vyatikramaḥ
devam pratyāgatam dṛṣṭyā punar anya utsavam caret
dina vyapāye kuryāt ca tad kāla niyata utsavam
atītam utsavam ca api tantreṇa atra samācaret
tad dine api apramādāt ced bhūyāt kālasya yāpanam
na jahyāḥ deva kuryāt ca tad kāla ucitam utsavam

original: atra pramādetu bhavetpūrvoktaiva hi niṣkṛtiḥ // BhS_27.386 //
analyzed: atra bhavet pūrva uktā eva hi niṣkṛtiḥ
dīkṣitaḥ vastra mālya ādyaiḥ pañca aga arpita bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: carennityaṃ viśuddhātmā viparīte tu doṣakṛt // BhS_27.387 //
analyzed: caret nityam viśuddha ātmā viparīte tu doṣa kṛt

original: dīkṣāṅgasya tu vastrasya tathā pratisarasya vā /
analyzed: dīkṣā aṅgasya tu vastrasya tathā pratisarasya vā
nāśe tatra mahān doṣaḥ tadā anyat punar āharet
sahasram viṣṇugāyatrīm hutvā śāntim atha ācaret
yāvat dīkṣā bhavet tāvat dīkṣā aṅgasya parigrahaḥ
ante tu tad gatā aśaktiḥ svayam eva avahīyate

original: atha vā mocanaṃ kuryādite ke cidvadantihi // BhS_27.390 //
analyzed: atha vā mocanam kuryāt ite ke cid vadanti hi
tatra pūrṇāhutim kālam pravadanti vipaścitaḥ

original: pratiṣṭhānte tu sā dīkṣā bhavedutsavasaṃgatā // BhS_27.391 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā ante tu sā dīkṣā bhavet utsava saṃgatā
na tatra dīkṣā sāṃkaryam dvayam ekatra ced yadi
anyonyam kalahāyante yadi ācārya ādayaḥ kratau
mahān anarthaḥ tatra syāt pratibhūḥ guruḥ atra hi
guru vākyam ca rāja ājñām samam āhuḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: dīkṣite vartamāne tu nānyaṃ tatra praveśayet /
analyzed: dīkṣite vartamāne tu na anyam tatra praveśayet
na hi ekasmin bhavet kārye ācārya dvaya saṃgatiḥ
pramādāt buddhi pūrvam vā kalahe kṣataja srutiḥ

original: kṣatāni vā bhaveyustaṃ visṛjyānyena kārayet // BhS_27.395 //
analyzed: kṣatāni vā bhaveyuḥ tam visṛjya anyena kārayet

original: na tasya tu bhaveddīkṣā mahāśāntiṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: na tasya tu bhavet dīkṣā mahāśāntim tu kārayet

original: sa dīkṣito bhavedeva pūrvasya pkaṇidhissa hi // BhS_27.396 //
analyzed: sa dīkṣitaḥ bhavet eva pūrvasya hi
yāvat āśauca saṃkrāntiḥ
punar anyam samādāya śeṣam pūrvavat āyaret

original: ādau madhye tadhānte ca hīne brāhmaṇabhojane /
analyzed: ādau madhye ca hīne brāhmaṇa bhojane

original: trivākaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā brāhmaṇabhojanam, // BhS_27.398 //
analyzed: tri vākam tu mahāśāntim hutvā brāhmaṇa bhojanam
dviguṇam kārayet ca eva vaiṣṇavānām tu pūjanam
punāti pūjitaḥ sadyas pāpmabhyaḥ vaiṣṇapaḥ sakṛt
avaiṣṇavaiḥ ca pāṣaṇḍaiḥ ūḍhe deve du anartha kṛt
tad doṣa śāntaye kuryāt sahasra kalaśa āplavam
avaiṣṇava kṛta apūjā hanti puṇyam purātanam

original: yānāttu patite deve śīghramuddhṛtya sādaram // BhS_27.401 //
analyzed: yānāt tu patite deve śīghram uddhṛtya sa ādaram
kṣama asva iti anumānya eva śuddhodaiḥ abhiṣicya ca

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ sahitaṃ kramāt // BhS_27.402 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca nṛsūktam sahitam kramāt
dinādhipasya daivatyam hutvā ca utsavam ācaret
cakravīśa ākha mita ādīnām biṃba abhāve pṛthak pṛthak
taṇḍula upari pātreṣu kūrceṣu āvāhya mantrataḥ

original: tattadrūpaṃ tu saṃsmṛtya samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ // BhS_27.404 //
analyzed: tad tad rūpam tu saṃsmṛtya samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ
hutvā ca tad tad daivatyam paścāt utsavam ācaret

original: patane tu tathaiteṣāmuddhṛtyaiva ca pūrvavat // BhS_27.405 //
analyzed: patane tu tathā eteṣām uddhṛtya eva ca pūrvavat
snāpayitvā hunet tad tad daivatyam vaiṣṇavam tathā

original: yānāttu patite biṃbe hīnāṅge doṣagaurave // BhS_27.406 //
analyzed: yānāt tu patite biṃbe hīna aṅge doṣa gaurave
padmānale mahāśāntim hutvā tad doṣa śāntaye

original: dhruvabere samāropya taccaktiṃ vidhinā tataḥ // BhS_27.407 //
analyzed: dhruva bere samāropya tad caktim vidhinā tatas
kautukam snāpanam vā atha baliberam atha api vā
yathārham samalaṅkṛtya samāvāhya yathāvidhi
samabhyarcya utsavam kuryāt na tatra syāt vyatikramaḥ

original: berāntarasyālābhe tu ratnaṃ vā kāñcanaṃ tathā // BhS_27.409 //
analyzed: bera antarasya alābhe tu ratnam vā kāñcanam tathā

original: nyasya pātre samāvāhya samabhyarcya dine dine /
analyzed: nyasya pātre samāvāhya samabhyarcya dine dine
mahāśāntim ca hutvā eva punar utsavam ācaret
hīna aṅgam ca punar beram saṃdhāna vidhinā punar
saṃdhāya cātvareṇa eva pratiṣṭhām punar ācaret
patane gāyak ādīnām śrī daivatyam ca vaiṣṇavam

original: vādakānāṃ tu patanai brāhmaṃ raudraṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.412 //
analyzed: vādakānām tu brāhmam raudram tathā eva ca

original: ācāryādīnāṃ tu patane saṃkṣobhe ca tathākṛte /
analyzed: ācārya ādīnām tu patane saṃkṣobhe ca tathā kṛte

original: ārṣabhaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tadvaddhvajādīnāṃ ca pātane // BhS_27.413 //
analyzed: ārṣabham vaiṣṇavam tadvat dhvaja ādīnām ca pātane

original: dhvājaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ ca hunedvidhiḥ /
analyzed: dhvājam ca vāruṇam ca eva vāyavyam ca hunet vidhiḥ
varṣa dhārāsu vātyāyām vidyut vraja samāhatau
kāle na ca utsavam kuryāt kuryāt ced vaiṣṇavam tathā

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca śrībhūdaivatyameva ca // BhS_27.415 //
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam nṛsūktam ca śrī bhūdaivatyam eva ca
hutvā utsavam prakurvīta viparīte tu doṣa kṛt
vīthi antare varṣa dhārā praveśe aśani garjite
tṛṇa pāṃsu samāyukta vāta sparśe viśeṣataḥ
kalaha dhvani saṃyukte devam saṃsnāpya mantra vid
vaiṣṇavam diś daivatyam ca vāruṇam vāyu daivatam
yat deva ādīn ca hutvā eva punar utsavam ācaret
kalahe rudhira srāve dāhe ca api utsave tatas

original: vaiṣṇapaṃ cāgnidaivatyaṃ brāhmaṃ raudraṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.419 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇapam ca agni daivatyam brāhmam raudram tathā eva ca
tad dinādhipa daivatyam juhuyāt prārthayet harim
ālaya abhyantare ca eva śastra ādyaiḥ maraṇe sati
tat śīghram apahāya eva padmāgnau juhuyāt tathā
mahāśāntim tad dina ādhidaivatyam ca viśeṣataḥ

original: vīthyāṃ cenmarahaṇādautu tacchīghraṃ tu vyapohya ca /
analyzed: vīthyām ced mara haṇa ādau tu tat śīghram tu vyapohya ca
śānti homam ca hutvā eva punar utsavam ācaret
nāḍikāyāḥ
ālayasya aśīti daṇḍa abhyantare tu śave sati
tatra utsavam na kuryāt tu kuryāt ced sa vinaśyati
tat śīghram apahāya iva prāyaścittam yathā uditam
mahāśāntim pārṣadam ca ca hutvā ca utsavam ācaret
lagare vidhiḥ eṣaḥ syāt grāmena eṣa vikalpyate
antaśsavena eva kuryāt utsavam grāma vṛddhaye
dhvaja sva ārohaṇāt ūrdhvam yāvat tīrtha dinam bhavet
anyāt savam śubham karma kuryāt ced ābhicārikam
tad doṣa śamanāya eva vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam

original: nṛsūktaṃ pārṣadaṃ caiva hutvā viprāṃstu bhojayet /
analyzed: nṛsūktam pārṣadam ca eva hutvā viprān tu bhojayet

original: tīrthāhātpūrvarātrau tu hīne kautuka bandhane // BhS_27.428 //

original: arcākāne tu dṛṣṭeṣu caiteṣu vidhinā harim /

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ raudrameva ca // BhS_28.14 //

original: mahāśāntiṃ ca hutvaiva pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_28.17 //

original: saptāhaṃ mahatīṃ śāntiṃ hutvābjāgnau vidhānataḥ // BhS_28.20 //

original: prājāpatyaṃ ca hutvaiva brāhmaṇān bhojayedvidhiḥ // BhS_28.77 //

original: avaṭe 'bhyarcya bhūdevī “mapo hi'ṣṭheti prokṣya ca // BhS_28.80 //

original: hariśyā sahita statra śayīdhā' iti sanmanum // BhS_28.82 //

original: kūrcaṃ tu biṃbavatsmṛtvā manasaivākṣarāṇi tu // BhS_28.89 //
analyzed: kūrcam tu biṃba vat smṛtvā manasā eva akṣarāṇi tu

original: snapanādau tu saṃprāpte kuryādabhyukṣaṇaṃ budhaḥ // BhS_28.90 //
analyzed: snapana ādau tu saṃprāpte kuryāt abhyukṣaṇam budhaḥ

original: bhāgonnatāṃ yathālobhonna tāṃ dhānyairvidhāya ca // BhS_28.95 //

original: vediṃ manoharāṃ caiva vāsāṃsyāstīrya pañca ca /

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_28.100 //

original: mahābere vimāne ca patite jarite tathā // BhS_28.119 //

original: duṣṭe vā yena kenāpi maṇḍapādau manoramam /
analyzed: duṣṭe vā yena kena api maṇḍapa ādau manoramam

original: deśaṃ tu samalaṅkṛtya saṃśodhya vidhivatpunaḥ // BhS_28.194 //
analyzed: deśam tu samalaṅkṛtya saṃśodhya vidhivat punar
saṃsthāpya kautuka ādīn ca samabhyarcyet vidhānataḥ

original: bālālayaṃ navīkṛtya tadeva tvaritaṃ yathā // BhS_28.195 //
analyzed: bāla ālayam navīkṛtya tat eva tvaritam yathā

original: vāstuśuddhiṃ ca puṇyāhaṃ kṛtvā saṃsthāpya cārcayet /
analyzed: vāstuśuddhim ca puṇyāham kṛtvā saṃsthāpya ca arcayet
tatas tasmin nidhāya anyatra mandiram
punar pratiṣṭhā mārgeṇa pratiṣṭhāpya samarcayet

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre 'ṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre aṣṭāviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha ekonatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
prāyaścittam
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa dhruvaberasya niṣkṛtim

original: tāmrajaṃ śailajaṃ caiva mūrtikaṃ dāravaṃ tviti // BhS_29.1 //
analyzed: tāmrajam śailajam ca eva mūrtikam dāravam tu iti
cāturvidhyam dhruvasya atra pūrvam eva mayā uditam
ṣaṇmāna sahitam kṛtvā āsanālam pāda padmakam
kṛtvā tu tāmra jam biṃbam kautukasya ukta vartmanā
kṛtvā akṣi unmocanam ca adhivāsān saṃsthāpya ca acalam
sthāpayet saha devyau ca śuddhi artham prati parva tu
śuddhodaiḥ abhiṣicya eva bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca vibhūṣya ca

original: puṣpanyāsaṃ ca kṛtvaiva sarvān pariṣadaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: puṣpa nyāsam ca kṛtvā eva sarvān pariṣadaḥ kramāt
śailān eva prakurvīta yathā śātātapaḥ abravīt

original: śailaṃ dhruvaṃ tathā citraṃ citrārdhaṃ vā vidhāya ca /
analyzed: śailam dhruvam tathā citram citrārdham vā vidhāya ca

original: pūrvoktena vidhānena paraṃ saṃskṛtya tatkramāt // BhS_29.6 //
analyzed: pūrva uktena vidhānena param saṃskṛtya tat kramāt
devyau anyān ca devān ca tad ālaya gatān api
tad dravyeṇa prakurvīta dhruvam ṣaṣ māna saṃyutam
kṛtvā akṣṇoḥ ca bhruvoḥ tadvat oṣṭhayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: karapādatale caiva nakheṣu mukuṭe 'pi ca // BhS_29.8 //
analyzed: kara pāda tale ca eva nakheṣu mukuṭe api ca
bhūṣaṇeṣu vidhānena tad tad varṇena lepayet

original: mṛṇmayaṃ dāravaṃ vā cettaddravyeṇaiva devatāḥ // BhS_29.9 //
analyzed: mṛṇmayam dāravam vā ced tad dravyeṇa eva devatāḥ
tad ālaya gatāḥ kuryāt anyathā viparīta kṛt

original: atha vā varṇahīnaṃ tu śailaṃ sarvatra kārayet // BhS_29.10 //
analyzed: atha vā varṇa hīnam tu śailam sarvatra kārayet

original: ardhacitrasya śailasya hīneṣvaṃ geṣu caiva hi /
analyzed: ardhacitrasya śailasya geṣu ca eva hi
pratyaṅgeṣu tathā upāṅgeṣu aniṣṭam tat bhavet iha
bālāgāre atha tad śaktim nītvā biṃbam samāharet

original: bhūmau pidhāya tasyordhve padmāgniṃ parikalpya ca // BhS_29.12 //
analyzed: bhūmau pidhāya tasya ūrdhve padmāgnim parikalpya ca
hutvā ca mahatīm śāntim śilā grahaṇa vat tathā

original: tattadaṅgasamutpattiṃ yuktyā takṣṇā tu kārayet // BhS_29.13 //
analyzed: tad tad aṅga samutpattim yuktyā takṣṇā tu kārayet
hīne mahā aṅge tat beram ayuktam ced samīkṛtau
tyaktvā tad vidhinā beram punar anyat samāharet
beram saṃdhāna yogyam yaḥ tyajet pāpī bhavet sa hi
vinaṣṭam ca bhavet sarvaṃsaṃdhānam śaktitas caret
dhruvaberam atha ār'cām ca kartum pūrvam iva dvayam
aśaktaḥ ced dhruva arcān tu kṛtvā ca ekam sva śaktitaḥ
pratiṣṭhāpya arcayet samyak iti ke cit manīṣiṇaḥ
ekabera pratiṣṭhāyām eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
aśaktaḥ ced dhruvam beram arcā beram atha api vā

original: sahitaṃ rahitaṃ vātha devībhyāṃsthāpya cārcayet // BhS_29.18 //
analyzed: sahitam rahitam vā atha devībhyām sthāpya ca arcayet
mṛd ālaye brahmasthāne dhruvā arcā beram āharet

original: taṃ devīsahitaṃ kṛtvā vimānaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.19 //
analyzed: tam devī sahitam kṛtvā vimānam ca viśeṣataḥ
śailam tu kartum icchet ced devaḥ daivikam āśrayet

original: yathā tathā prakalpyaiva vimānaṃ kautukaṃ punaḥ // BhS_29.20 //
analyzed: yathā tathā prakalpya eva vimānam kautukam punar
loha jam jaṅgamam kṛtvā samācaret

original: kautukaṃ śailajaṃ cettu sthāvaraṃ tveva sthāpayet // BhS_29.21 //
analyzed: kautukam śaila jam ced tu sthāvaram tu eva sthāpayet
laghu beram pratiṣṭhāpya vimāne mṛṇmaye arcite

original: kartumiccheddhruvaṃ beraṃ vimānaṃ caiva śailajam // BhS_29.22 //
analyzed: kartum icchet dhruvam beram vimānam ca eva śailajam
vimānam parikalpya eva vidhinā hasta mānataḥ

original: devībhyāṃ sahitaṃ devaṃ daivikāṃśe vidhāya ca // BhS_29.23 //
analyzed: devībhyām sahitam devam daivika aṃśe vidhāya ca
pūrva arcitām gṛhītvā eva beram kautuka karmaṇi
tasya uttare ca autsava ādīn pratiṣṭhāpya samarcayet
pūrvam arcyamāne mṛd ālaye
śilābhiḥ iṣṭakābhiḥ vā vimānam kartum icchayā
rakṣā artham tasya berasya śilpi sparśa nivṛttaye

original: kāṣṭhena pañjaraṃ kṛtvā bālāgāraṃ dṛḍhaṃ tataḥ // BhS_29.26 //
analyzed: kāṣṭhena pañjaram kṛtvā bālāgāram dṛḍham tatas
saṃśodhya śalyam ca adhastāt yuktyā paramāyā punar
vimānam yugma hastena tat berasya vaśāt api
yathā vibhava vistāram saudham kṛtvā su rakṣayet
tad bera samam adhyardham dviguṇam caturaśrakam
adhamam madhyamam tadvat uttamam trividha uditam

original: kṛtvā tasya caturbhāgaṃ tribhāgaṃ cārdhamevavā // BhS_29.29 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tasya catur bhāgam tri bhāgam ca ardham eva vā
garbhāgāram bhavet śeṣam bhitti viṣkaṃbham eva ca
sa maṇṭapam vimānam tu pūrvavat kārayet vidhiḥ
śilā iṣṭakā vimāne tu vargasya ante parasya vā
kārayet miśram atha ced aśaktaḥ kartum īdṛśam
adhiṣṭhānasya ca ūrdhvam hi yathā iṣṭa sthānake punar

original: miśradravyeṇa kuryāttu śaktilobhaṃ na kārayet // BhS_29.32 //
analyzed: miśra dravyeṇa kuryāt tu śakti lobham na kārayet
varṇa kṣaye dhruve doṣa saṃphade sphuṭita ādibhiḥ
alpa doṣe api vā aśaktim dhruva bera sthitām tadā
kuṃbhe aṃbhasi samāvāhya tad kuṃbham kautuka ādi ca

original: samādāya vidhānena mālikāyāṃ tu maṇḍape // BhS_29.34 //
analyzed: samādāya vidhānena mālikāyām tu maṇḍape
sannyasya kautuka ādau tu samāvāhya samarcayet
kāle kuṃbhe samāropya kriyāḥ sarvāḥ samācaret
atīte dvi dine kuṃbham anyat ādāya cātvaraḥ
kuṃbhāt śaktim samādāya kuṃbhe anyasmin vidhālataḥ
arcayet tri dine ca evam kuṃbha saṃśodhanam caret

original: paścācca varṇalepādīn kṛtvā saṃśodya caivahi // BhS_29.37 //
analyzed: paścāt ca varṇa lepa ādīn kṛtvā saṃśodya ca eva hi

original: vāstuhomaṃ ca puṇyāhaṃ dhruvaśuddhiṃ ca kārayet /
analyzed: vāstu homam ca puṇyāham dhruva śuddhim ca kārayet

original: kuṃbhaṃ biṃbaṃ samādāya praviśyābhyantaraṃ tataḥ // BhS_29.38 //
analyzed: kuṃbham biṃbam samādāya praviśya abhyantaram tatas
kautuka ādīn su saṃsthāpya nyāsa ādīn ca vidhāya ca
kuṃbha sthām śaktim ādāya dhruva bere avaropayet
dhruvāt punar tu samarcayet
doṣāṇām goravāt māsāt ūrdhvam kāla itu apekṣite
devam bāla ālaye sthāpya śodhayet mṛṇmayam punar
yāvat śūlam punar śailam śilā antam śodhayet kramāt
nava ṣaṣ pañca mūrtīnām vimāne doṣa saṃyutam

original: yattalaṃ tattalaṃ gṛhya bālasthānaṃ prakalpya ca // BhS_29.42 //
analyzed: yat talam tat talam gṛhya bālasthānam prakalpya ca
kautuka ādīn su saṃsthāpya vidhinā samyak arcayet

original: paścāttale tu nirduṣṭe kautukādīn pragṛhya ca // BhS_29.43 //
analyzed: paścāttale tu nirduṣṭe kautuka ādīn pragṛhya ca
sthāpayitvā punar ca eva vidhinā api samarcayet
atha vakṣye jīrṇa bera parityāga vidhim kramāt
dhruvasya aṅga vihīne tu tyajet tat sadyas eva hi
kartṛ ārādhakayoḥ grāhyam anyathā syāt mahat bhayam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena jīrṇam saṃśodhya sarvatas
nava vastraiḥ samācchādya baddhvā ca kuśa rajjubhiḥ
brāhmaṇaiḥ vāhayitvā eva nadīm sphārām samudra gām
a śoṣyam vā jala ādhāram anyat nītvā atha tat taṭe
prapām kṛtvā agnim ādhāya ca aupāsanam atandritaḥ
āghāra ante tu juhuyāt vaiṣṇavam śataśas tatas
dadbhyaḥ svāhā āha iti aṅga homam vyāhṛti antam hunet bhudhaḥ
vastra bandham vimocya eva prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ guruḥ

original: vāruṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva prakṣipyaiva ca tajjale /
analyzed: vāruṇam vaiṣṇavam ca eva prakṣipya eva ca tad jale

original: snāyātsaṃsmṛtya deveśaṃ dārave tu viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.50 //
analyzed: snāyāt saṃsmṛtya deveśam dārave tu viśeṣataḥ
dagdhvā agninā atha tat bhasma nikṣipet tādṛśe jale

original: devyādīnāṃ parṣadāṃ ca tattanmantraṃ savaiṣṇavam // BhS_29.51 //
analyzed: devī ādīnām parṣadām ca tat tat mantram sa vaiṣṇavam
hunet jale kṣipet paścāt dadyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām
atha ced kautuka ādīnām maṅga hāniḥ tat ucyate

original: mahāṅgāni śiraḥ kukṣi vakṣaḥ kaṇṭhān pracakṣate /
analyzed: mahāṅgāni śiraḥ kukṣi vakṣaḥ kaṇṭhān pracakṣate
pādau hastau bāhavaḥ ca iti aṅgāni pravadanti hi
aṅgulyaḥ karṇa nāsā ādyāḥ pratyaṅgāni viduḥ budhāḥ

original: śiraścakraṃ ca pīṭhaṃ ca prabhāmaṇḍalameva ca // BhS_29.54 //
analyzed: śiraḥ cakram ca pīṭham ca prabhā maṇḍalam eva ca
upāṅgāni ūcire bhūṣaṇa āyudha aṃbara pūrvakān

original: tatropāṅgasya hīne tu kuṃbhaṃ saṃsādhya pūrvavat // BhS_29.55 //
analyzed: tatra upāṅgasya hīne tu kuṃbham saṃsādhya pūrvavat

original: āvāhya kuṃbhe tacchaktiṃ biṃbaṃ saṃdhāya pūrvavat /
analyzed: āvāhya kuṃbhe tad śaktim biṃbam saṃdhāya pūrvavat

original: kṛtvā jalādhivāsādīn vāstuhomaṃ vidhāya ca // BhS_29.56 //
analyzed: kṛtvā jala adhivāsa ādīn vāstu homam vidhāya ca
saṃśodya pañcagavyaiḥ ca kuśa udaiḥ ca viśeṣataḥ
saptabhiḥ kalaśaiḥ thsāpya kuṃbha sthām śaktim ādarāt
samāvāhya punar biṃbe vidhinā samyak arcayet
pratyaṅga hīne tad śaktim mahā bere avaropya ca
udhrutya biṃbam saṃprokṣya pañcagavyaiḥ kuśa udakaiḥ
tulya lohena saṃdhāya ca adhivāsya kuśa ādiṣu
punar pratiṣṭhā mārgeṇa pratiṣṭhām punar ācaret
aṅga hīnā itu saṃdhāna yogyam saṃdhāya pūrvavat
arcayet anyathā vā api mahā aṅgake

original: bhūmau pidhāya tadberaṃ tadūrdhve juhuyātkramāt // BhS_29.61 //
analyzed: bhūmau pidhāya tat beram tad ūrdhve juhuyāt kramāt
aṅga homam mahāśāntim apohya eva ca tat dinam

original: uddhṛtya biṃbaṃ prakṣālya pañcagavyaiḥ kuśodakaiḥ // BhS_29.62 //
analyzed: uddhṛtya biṃbam prakṣālya pañcagavyaiḥ kuśa udakaiḥ
tris agnau saṃparikṣipya śodhayet āmla vāriṇā
rājatam dvis sakṛt raukmam dahet agnau iti kramaḥ
kṛtvā tena eva dravyeṇa biṃbam pūrvavat uttamam
punar pratiṣṭhām kṛtvā eva kārayet arcanam kramāt

original: paṭe kuḍye 'tha vā likhya bere vidhivadarcite /
analyzed: paṭe kuḍye atha vā likhya bere vidhivat arcite
jīrṇam ālokya tad śaktim āropya eva arka maṇḍale
navīkṛtya punar tasmin pratiṣṭhāpya samarcayet

original: ācāryeṇa ca yenādau karṣaṇādyāḥ kṛtāḥ kriyāḥ // BhS_29.66 //
analyzed: ācāryeṇa ca yena ādau karṣaṇa ādyāḥ kṛtāḥ kriyāḥ
pratiṣṭhā vā kṛtā viṣṇoḥ tena eva anyān ca kārayet
nitya arcana utsava ādīn ca prāyaścitta ādikān api

original: tadabhāve ca tatputraṃ pautraṃ naptārameva ca /
analyzed: tad abhāve ca tad putram pautram naptāram eva ca
tad vaṃśa jam vā tad śiṣyam tad niyuktam atha antatas
ācārya sannidhau na anyam ācāryam varayet kvacid
varayet yadi rāṣṭrasya rājñaḥ ca api mahat bhayam

original: bhavecca niṣphalā pūjā sarvaṃ kāryaṃ vinaśyati /
analyzed: bhavet ca niṣphalā pūjā sarvam kāryam vinaśyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena na kuryāt guru saṃkaram
ajñānāt artha lobhāt vā kṛte tu ācārya saṃkare

original: abjānale mahāśāntiṃ hutvā saṃprārthyavai gurum // BhS_29.71 //
analyzed: abja anale mahāśāntim hutvā gurum
yācayitvā kṣama āsva iti pūjayitvā viśeṣataḥ
panaḥ tena eva tat karma kārayet iti śāsanam
ācārya dīnām alābhe tu tad rūpam lekhayet paṭe
tad sannidhau yuktam anyam ācāryam varayet tathā
ekasmin ālaye syāt ced sannipātaḥ tu karmaṇām
ācāryam saṃpraṇamya eva tad putra ādyaiḥ vidhānataḥ
kārayet tad alābhe tu kārayet tantrataḥ guruḥ

original: pūrvaṃ tu yogamārgeṇa pratiṣṭhāpyārcite punaḥ // BhS_29.75 //
analyzed: pūrvam tu yoga mārgeṇa pratiṣṭhāpya arcite punar

original: devībhyāṃ saha paścāttu kārayet sthāpanaṃ yadi /
analyzed: devībhyām saha paścāt tu kārayet sthāpanam yadi
ābhicārikam eva syāt rāja rāṣṭra vināśa kṛt
dhruva kautuka saṃyukte pūjyamāne purā tatas
vimāna dhruvayoḥ nāśe brahmasthāne dhruva arcanam
kautukam ca utsava sthāne sthāpayet iti ke cana

original: sthānake cāsanaṃ kuryācchayanaṃ vāpi cecchayā // BhS_29.78 //
analyzed: sthānake ca āsanam kuryāt śayanam vā api ca icchayā
asaneśayanam na tu kārayet

original: śayane nāsanaṃ caiva sthānakaṃ kārayedvidhiḥ // BhS_29.79 //
analyzed: śayane na āsanam ca eva sthānakam kārayet vidhiḥ
kautukam sthitam āsīna mā autsavam kārayet tathā
asīnam kautukam kuryāt thsitam autsavam eva vā

original: snapanaṃ baliberaṃ ca sthitaṃ sarvatra kārayet /
analyzed: snapanam baliberam ca sthitam sarvatra kārayet
avatāra gaṇasya eva mūrtīnām pañcakasya ca
anyonya saṃkareṇa eva sthāpane kautukasya ca
mahattaraḥ bhavet do
vai

original: hutvā tu mahatīṃ śāntiṃ yathāsthāne tu sthāpayet /
analyzed: hutvā tu mahatīm śāntim yathāsthāne tu sthāpayet
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa śānti pañcaka kalpanam
narāṇām pāpa bāhulyāt aparādha viśeṣataḥ
devāḥ sṛjanti adbhutāni teṣu dṛṣṭeṣu satvaram
kuryāt śāntim viparīte tu anartha kṛt
kartṛ ārādhakayoḥ ca eva rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya vāstuvaḥ

original: saṃkṣobho jāyate sadyo vināśo bhavati dhruvam /
analyzed: saṃkṣobhaḥ jāyate sadyas vināśaḥ bhavati dhruvam
dvādaśa aha antare tasmāt śāntim kuryāt vidhānataḥ
atīte mahāśānti purassaram

original: saṃpūjya vaiṣṇavān śaktyādatvā vai bhūridakṣiṇām // BhS_29.87 //
analyzed: saṃpūjya vaiṣṇavān śaktyā datvā vai bhūri dakṣiṇām
ārabhet uttaram karma māse atīte viśeṣataḥ

original: saptāhaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā vipraśataṃ tathā // BhS_29.88 //
analyzed: sapta aham tu mahāśāntim hutvā vipra śatam tathā
bhojayitvā ca deveśam anumānya tu kārayet

original: ṣaṇmāse samatīte tu ramate tatra nohariḥ // BhS_29.89 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māse samatīte tu ramate tatra nohariḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kuryāt śāntim yathā uditām
bhauma āntarikṣa divya ākhya bhedāt trividham adbhutam
graha yuddhaḥ ca bhedaḥ ca vikāraḥ graha maṇḍale
sarva grāsa uparāgaḥ ca durbhikṣaḥ ca akṣa bhedanam
evamādīni divyāni tu adbhutāni pracakṣate
āntarikṣāṇi ca arka indvoḥ pariveṣaḥ nirantaraḥ
varṇa antareṇa bāhulyāt pariveṣaḥ tathāvidhaḥ
rātrau indradhamar devasadma ca ākāśa maṇḍale
aśani ulkā ādi pātaḥ ca rāhu puccha ādi darśanam
nakṣatra patanam ketoḥ dhūmasya indrasya darśanam
gandharvanagarasya api darśanam patanam tu vā
prati sūrya abja nakṣatra darśanam saṃpracakṣate
bhaumāni aneka thā uktāni cara sthira vibhedataḥ
deśa kāla svabhāva ādi viruddham prasava ādikam
pṛṣat aṃśaka sarpa aśva yoni jānām viśeṣataḥ
gonāga mahiṣa ādyeṣu tiryakṣu jananam tathā
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅgeṣu viṣkireṣu aṇḍaja ādiṣu
vivarṇa ākāra vāsa ādiḥ āśraya ādiḥ tathā ālaye
rakta strī darśana ādīni ca adbhutāni careṣu tu
divyāni ca antarikṣāṇi teṣām atra uttamottamam
nārāṇi ca uttamāni syuḥ māhiṣa ādyāni madhyamam
sarīsṛpa ādiṣu
rodanam hasanam jalpaḥ jvalanam parivartanam
svedaḥ ca rudhira srāvaḥ kṛmi kīna ādi saṃbhavaḥ
akāla sphoṭanam dhūmaḥ ca aṅga kaṃpanam eva ca
tṛṇa valmīka saṃbhavaḥ
pratimāyām bhavet ced tu rakta strī darśanam tathā
pāṣaṇḍa pratiloma antya jātibhiḥ
sṛgāla ādibhiḥ aspṛśyaiḥ sparśane ca praveśane
sthūṇā virohaṇe ca eva calane parivartane
tathā apasarpaṇe ca eva kavāṭa śayana āsane
bhitti āyudha aṃbare tadvat agnihotra ādi upaskare
vimāne ca vikāraḥ ca makṣikā vṛkṣa pātane
pravartane ca upasarpe parṇa puṣpa phaleṣu ca
śākhā ādau viparītasya darśanam ca viśeṣataḥ
rakta srāvaḥ jala srāvaḥ ca adbhutāni sthireṣu tu

original: teṣu garbhakṛhe caiva pīṭhe caiva bhavāni tu /
analyzed: teṣu garbhakṛhe ca eva pīṭhe ca eva bhavāni tu
viprāṇām viśeṣataḥ
kartṛ ārādhakayoḥ nāśaḥ iti śātātapaḥ abravīt

original: prāsādajāni rājñāṃ syuḥ prāsāde 'pi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.109 //
analyzed: prāsāda jāni rājñām syuḥ prāsāde api viśeṣataḥ

original: adhiṣṭhāne ca pāde ca prastare ca gale 'pi ca /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāne ca pāde ca prastare ca gale api ca

original: śikhare ca bhavāni syuḥkṣatriyāṇāṃ krameṇa tu // BhS_29.110 //
analyzed: śikhare ca bhavāni syuḥ kṣatriyāṇām krameṇa tu
abhiṣekasya yogyasya yuvarājasya ca eva hi
abhiṣiktasya samrājaḥ ca atyāhita karāṇi tu
prathama āvaraṇe vaiśya jātīnām mantriṇām tathā
purohitasya tad maṇḍala adhipānām mahat bhayam
śūdra jāti vipad het dvitīya āvaraṇa ādiṣu
sasya nāśaḥ gaja aśva ādi paśu nāśaḥ ca jāyate
purodhasaḥ ca agnikuṇḍe brahmasthāne dvijanmanām

original: rudrālaye tu sarveṣāṃ nṛpasya tu guhālaye // BhS_29.114 //
analyzed: rudra ālaye tu sarveṣām nṛpasya tu guhālaye
seneśānām vipattiḥ syāt vakratuṇḍa ālaye tathā
rāja patnīnām durgā sthāne anya yoṣitām
mātṛ sthāne antya jātīnām oṣadhīnām kuberake
nṛpa vāhana śastra upajīvinām bhāskara ālaye
anya devālaye tat tat bhoktānām api lakṣayet
āsthāna maṇḍapa saṅga maṇḍaba prāṅgaṇeṣu ca
mahānase nṛpa āvāse krīḍā sthāne viśeṣataḥ
ācārya yajamāna ādi pada arthi nilayeṣu ca
caitya vṛkṣa ādiṣu udbhūtāḥ rakta strī darśana ādayaḥ
valmīka ādyāḥ ca phala dāḥ tad tad diśi ukta mārgataḥ
bhaumeṣu deva bera arcā pīṭha garbhagṛha ārte
saṃproktāḥ uttama uttama saṃjñitāḥ
uttamāḥ tu punar jātāḥ prākāre mukha maṇḍape
madhyamāḥ prathama āvaraṇe śeṣeṣu uktāḥ tathā adhamāḥ
tathā rāja aṅgaṇe ca uttamottamāḥ paritas tatas
aṅkaṇeṣu uttamāḥ antarvāstuke madhyamāḥ smṛtāḥ
adhamā vāstunaḥ bāhye tāratamyam iti smṛtam
divya āntarikṣayoḥ nā asti cikitsā śāntiḥ iṣyate

original: bhaumeṣu tu careṣvatra nimittaṃ ca nimittinam /
analyzed: bhaumeṣu tu careṣu atra nimittam ca nimittinam
deśa antare vāsayitvā śāntim tatra samācaret

original: sthireṣu pratimānāṃ tu rodane hasane tathā /
analyzed: sthireṣu pratimānām tu rodane hasane tathā

original: jvalane ca tathā devaṃ saṃsthāpya taruṇālaye // BhS_29.125 //
analyzed: jvalane ca tathā devam saṃsthāpya taruṇa ālaye
tad bera sthām samāropya śaktim tatra vidhānataḥ

original: śāntiṃ kṛtvā punaḥ kuryātthsāpanaṃ cārcanaṃ kramāt // BhS_29.126 //
analyzed: śāntim kṛtvā punar ca arcanam kramāt
parivṛttau kuryāt śānti ādi pūrvavat

original: svede ca rudhirasrāve sarvaṃ rodanavaccaret // BhS_29.127 //
analyzed: svede ca rudhira srāve sarvam rodana vat caret
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅgānām kṛṇa ādīnām atha udbhave
āropya pūrvavat śaktim punar saṃdhāya yuktitaḥ
śānti ādīn ācaret evam akāla sphoṭana ādike
bera arcā pīṭhake ca
valmīka ādi udbhave devam saṃsthāpya taruṇa ālaye
yāvaddoṣam khanitvā eva gavyaiḥ abhyukṣya pañcabhiḥ
saṃśodhya sarvam saṃdhāya mācaret
prāsāda bāhye ca utpanne vivare viśadīkṛte
peṣayitvā marīci ādi jalena āpūrya ca aśmanā

original: ālipya śarkarāṃ kuryāc chāntiṃ divyapracoditām // BhS_29.132 //
analyzed: ālipya śarkarām kuryāt śāntim divya pracoditām
punar api udite kuryāt evam eva tu yuktitaḥ
makṣikā darśane tat tyad vyapohya tva vilaṃbitam
śodhayitvā tatas śāntim ārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ
a spṛśya spakśane tadvat kṛtvā śāntim samācaret
sthūṇā virohaṇa ādau ca punar saṃdhāya ca ācaret
haṭhāt vṛkṣa adhipatine śāntiḥ s tad tyāga pūrvikā
rāja aṅgaṇe samutpanne rājānam sa balam punar

original: veśmāntaraṃ vāsayitvā śāntiṃ kṛtvā yathocitām // BhS_29.136 //
analyzed: veśma antaram vāsayitvā śāntim kṛtvā yathocitām
abhiṣicya punar yuktedine rāṣṭram praveśayet
atha uttama uttamasya uttamasya syāt madhyamasya ca
adhamasya api ca a spṛśya sparśanasya yathākramam
krameṇa adbhuta śāntiḥ tu prabhūtā mahatī tathā
śāntiḥ śuddhiḥ iti prājñaiḥ pañcadhā śāntiḥ ucyate
ālaya abhimukhe tadvat aiśānyām ca uttare atha vā

original: parvatāgre taṭākasya tīre vā maṇḍapaṃ prapām /
analyzed: parvata agre taṭākasya tīre vā maṇḍapam prapām
kūṭam vā ṣoḍaśa staṃbha saṃyuktām su manoharam
catur hasta pramāṇa antar tsaṃbha antara samāyutām
tāna unnata acala āyuktām
kṛtvā madhye vidhānataḥ
kuṇḍam śrāmaṇaka uktam tu kṛtvā adhas dvādaśa aṅgulam

original: khanitvaiva cat prācyāṃ dvihastāyata vistṛtam // BhS_29.142 //
analyzed: khanitvā eva prācyām vistṛtam
hasta mātra samutsedham kṛtvā sthaṇḍilam uttamam
prāc ādiṣu catuḥ dhikṣu krameṇa āhavanīyakam
anvāhāryam ca āvasathyam gārhapatyam ca kārayet
agneya ādiṣu koṇeṣu kuṇḍāni aupāsanāni ca
kṛtvā advāreṣu vidhinā toraṇa ādi prakalpayet
pūrma kaṃbhaiḥ aṅkuraiḥ ca kadalībhiḥ dhvajaiḥ api
staṃbha veṣṭanaka ādyaiḥ ca darbha mālābhiḥ eva ca
alaṅkṛtya vitāna ādyaiḥ yathā vibhava staram

original: sthaṇḍile dhānyarāśiṃ tu kṛtvā tasya ca madhyame /
analyzed: sthaṇḍile dhānya rāśim tu kṛtvā tasya ca madhyame
padmam aṣṭa dalam kṛtvā taṇḍulaiḥ tasya madhyame

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ kṛṇmayaṃ vā svaśaktitaḥ /
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam tāmram kṛṇmayam vā sva śaktitaḥ
dvātriṃśat prastha saṃpūrṇam kaṃbham ādāya śāstra vat
tantunā pariṣṭya eva yava antaram anantam

original: vastrayugmena saṃveṣṭya bhūṣaṇaiśca vibhūṣya ca // BhS_29.149 //
analyzed: vastra yugmena saṃveṣṭya bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca vibhūṣya ca
sauvarṇa maṅgalāni aṣṭau tathā pañca āyudhāni ca
varṇa cihnāni tādṛṃśi ca ahīnāni aṅgulāt api

original: ratnāni hema rajataṃ tāmraṃ kāṃsyaṃ tathā trapu /
analyzed: ratnāni hema rajatam tāmram kāṃsyam tathā trapu
sīsa ayaḥ tīkṣṇu kāntāni graha rūpāṇi ca eva hi
nikṣipya āpūrya toya iva śuddhena tu vidhānataḥ
karpūra candana uśīra lavaṅga elā ādikān api
gandha dravyāṇi ca anyāni nyasya cūta ādi pallavān
tad mukham tu pidhānā iva pidadhyāt sadṛśena vai
ācāryam ṛtvijaḥ ca api vṛtvā śāstra vidhānataḥ
nava vastra uttarīya ādyaiḥ pañcāṅga arpita bhūṣaṇaiḥ
alaṅkṛtya agnikuṇḍeṣu hutvā āghāram yathā uditam

original: madhye sūryaṃ tathendrādi bhārgavāṅgārakau tathā // BhS_29.155 //
analyzed: madhye sūryam tathā indra ādi bhārgava aṅgārakau tathā
mandam gurum pāvaka ādi candra rāhu dhvajān budham
pradakṣiṇa vaśena eva dhyātvā avāṅyā ārcayet tatas
aṣṭa akṣareṇa ayutam vā sahasram ca aṣṭa saṃyutam
abhimṛśya vidhānena graha yajña uditena vai
hunet ca tad tad daivatyam samidh caru ghṛtaiḥ kramāt
hutvā aṣṭa uttara sāhasram tatas vaikhānasa anale
ghṛta āplutaiḥ bilva dalaiḥ aṣṭottara sahasrakam
hunet aṣṭa akṣaram nityam tathā
dūrvā apūpa vrīhi tila caru lāja abja saktubhiḥ
vaiṣṇavyā ca eva gāyat sā pūrvavat juhuyāt guruḥ
ghṛtena aṣṭa akṣareṇa eva sahasram ca aṣṭa saṃyutam

original: hutvānte tu ghṛtenaiva vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktakam // BhS_29.161 //
analyzed: hutvā ante tu ghṛtena eva vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktakam
juhuyāt pauruṣam sūktam nṛttaiḥ geyaiḥ ca ghoṣayet
yathādiśam catur vedān nityam adhyāpayet kramāt
kalpasūtram atha aukheyam praṇītam guruṇā purā
svādhyāyaḥ yatra yatra uktaḥ tatra adhyeyam vidhānataḥ
ṛtvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dadyāt evam sapta aham ācaret

original: yadi devālaye doṣaḥ kuṃbhapārśvetha sthaṇḍile // BhS_29.164 //
analyzed: yadi devālaye doṣaḥ sthaṇḍile

original: devaṃ taṃ sthāpya cābhyarchya nivedya ca mahāhaviḥ /
analyzed: devam tam sthāpya ca abhyarchya nivedya ca mahāhaviḥ
devasya abhimukhe hutvā homam ante yathāvidhi
nava aham vā atha stāham utsavam kārayet vidhiḥ
divya antarikṣayoḥ kuṃbha jalena ā plāvayet nṛpam

original: bhaumeṣu tatthsalaṃ prākṣya śiṣṭatoyena vai nṛpam /
analyzed: bhaumeṣu tatthsalam prākṣya śiṣṭa toyena vai nṛpam

original: tatpatnīṃ cābhiṣiñcecca guruṃ saṃpūjya pārthivaḥ // BhS_29.167 //
analyzed: tad patnīm ca abhiṣiñcet ca gurum saṃpūjya pārthivaḥ
suvarṇa paśu bhūmi ādīn dadyāt ṛtvigbhyaḥ eva ca

original: dakṣiṇāṃ bahulāṃ dadyājjīvo yajñasya dakṣiṇā // BhS_29.168 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām bahulām dadyāt jīvaḥ yajñasya dakṣiṇā
yadi rāja gṛhe doṣaḥ kṛtvā maṇḍapam antike
pūrvavat graha yajñam ca homam śrāmaṇake anale

original: kuṃbhasya sādhanaṃ kṛtvā saptāhānte prabhuṃ tathā /
analyzed: kuṃbhasya sādhanam kṛtvā sapta aha ante prabhum tathā
snāpayet kuṃbha toyena pratiṣṭhā anta krameṇa vai
dakṣiṇām guru pūrvebhyaḥ da tvā kṛtvā aṃkura ār'paṇam
śubhe anukūle nakṣatre kṛtvā ca eva abhiṣecanam
praviśet pūrva geham tu dharma siddhyai guru uditaḥ

original: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto gṛhiṇāmapi sammataḥ // BhS_29.172 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ gṛhiṇām api sammataḥ
rājñām parārtha vṛtti tvāt saḥ atra tu prakṛtīkṛtaḥ
sarva grāsa uparāga ādi divya adbhuta śamāya vai
yathāśakti brāhmaṇebhyaḥ svarṇam bhūmim paśūn api
dadyāt tathā viśeṣeṇa dakṣiṇām bhūri sammitām
anāvṛṣṭi nivṛtti artham kuṃbham saṃgṛhya pūrvavat
sarva tīrtham samāvāhya samabhyarcya agratas hareḥ
dhyānya pīṭhe tu sauvarṇam padmam aṣṭa dalaiḥ yutam

original: hemapātre tu sannyasya devamāvāhya tatra ca // BhS_29.176 //
analyzed: hema pātre tu sannyasya devam āvāhya tatra ca

original: abhyarcya tasya cordhvetu pīṭhe kuṃbhaṃ nidhāya ca /
analyzed: abhyarcya tasya ca ūrdhve tu pīṭhe kuṃbham nidhāya ca

original: kuṃbhamūle tu suṣiraṃ sūcīmātraṃ vidhāya ca // BhS_29.177 //
analyzed: kuṃbha mūle tu suṣiram sūcī mātram vidhāya ca
tad dhārayā tu avicchinna rūpayā secayet harim
samidbhiḥ vaitasībhiḥ tu pālāśībhiḥ atha api vā
aṣṭhottarasahastram tu juhuyāt pañja vāruṇam
agnau śrāmaṇake paścāddiśā homeṣu pūrvavat
aṣṭāttarasahasram tu pratyekam pañca vāruṇam
samidbhiḥ juhuyāt vidvān vaitasībhiḥ yadhāvithi
samidbhiḥ punar ājyena vaitasībhiḥ pṛthak hunet
aṣṭa adhika sahasram tu indram iti api
śrāmaṇāgnim vidhāya ekam dakṣiṇe tasya vajriṇam
āvāhya tu samabhyarcya homayet
devam viśeṣataḥ abhyarcya kārayet snapana ādikam

original: evaṃ jñātvā vidhānena tattatkarmasu gauravam // BhS_29.183 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā vidhānena tad tad karmasu gauravam
tṣaha ādi triṃśat ghasra antam śrāmaṇāgnau yathāvithi

original: dine dine pūrayitvā kuṃbhaṃ tenaiva secayet // BhS_29.184 //
analyzed: dine dine pūrayitvā kuṃbham tena eva secayet
sarva ante devam āsnāpya samabhyarcya haviḥ dadet
karma ante syāt mahā vṛṣṭiḥ tasmāt yatnena kārayet

original: atha vā varṣa kāmī vā mokṣārthī paśukāmanaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā varṣa kāmī vā mokṣa arthī paśu kāmanaḥ
sarva upadrava śānti arthī vijaya arthī viśeṣataḥ
snapana ālayam āsādya alaṅkṛtya ca pūrvavat
karma gauravam ājñāya saṃbhṛtya bahudhā payaḥ
pūjayet prathamam yatnāt ācāryam sa hi dhārakaḥ
ācāryaḥ su prasanna ātmā śvabhrāt prācyām tu taṇḍulaiḥ
kṛtvā paṅktim dakṣiṇa uttara āyatām vipula antarām

original: śvabhrāddakṣiṇataḥ kṛtvā kuṇḍaṃ śrāmaṇakasya tu // BhS_29.189 //
analyzed: śvabhrāt dakṣiṇatas kṛtvā kuṇḍam śrāmaṇakasya tu

original: agnimādhāya kuṃbhāṃ stu nava saṃveṣṭya tantunā /
analyzed: agnim ādhāya kuṃbhām stu nava saṃveṣṭya tantunā

original: adbhiḥ prakṣālya cotpūya kuśakūrcena cātvaraḥ // BhS_29.190 //
analyzed: adbhiḥ prakṣālya ca utpūya kuśa kūrcena
kṣīreṇa pūrayitvā eva ca utbūtena krameṇa vai
paṅktim nidhāya apidhānaiḥ apidhāya upari kramāt
vastreṇa ācchādayet śvabhram pūjā antebhyaḥ arcya vai harim
svasti sūktena ca ānamya saṃsthāpya śvabhra madhyame
arcana ukta vidhānena sarvam pūrva nada āyaret

original: tantunā veṣṭite kṣīraṃ kṛhītvākarake pūnaḥ // BhS_29.193 //
analyzed: tantunā veṣṭite kṣīram kṛhītvā a karake pūnaḥ
viṣṇusūktena ca iṣe ātvā ityādyaiḥ mantraiḥ kramāt guruḥ
tayā kṣīra dhārayā
tathā eva pariṣicya agnim mantraiḥ viṣṇoḥ nu ākā ādibhiḥ
atodeva ādi ībhiḥ tadvat aṣṭa arṇa manunā tathā
juhuyāt viṣṇu gāyatṣā aṣṭa adhika sahasrakam

original: atha vā snapanaṃ yāvattāvadudvartya mantrataḥ // BhS_29.196 //
analyzed: atha vā snapanam yāvat tāvat udvartya mantrataḥ
hāridrena tu cūrṇena saṃśodhya amla ādibhiḥ tatas
gandhodena su saṃsnāpya plotena vimṛjet tatas
vastra ādibhiḥ alaṅkṛtya samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ
pāyasa ādi haviḥ dadyāt dapyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām
anena sarvān kāmān ca labheta aviśayam naraḥ

original: dhruvaberārcane cettu saṃsnāpya pramukhe ghaṭam // BhS_29.199 //
analyzed: dhruva bera arcane ced tu saṃsnāpya pramukhe ghaṭam
tasmāt ānīya tatra eva snāpayet ukta gauravāt
sapta pañca tṣa hāni atra kṣīra snānam prakalpayet
evam ghṛta abhiṣekam ca kārayet sadṛśam phalam
imām adbhuta aśāntim tu kāśyapa ādyāḥ pracakṣate
atha prabhūtaśāntim tu pravakṣyāmi tapodhanāḥ
pūrvavat maṇṭapa ādīni kārayitvā yathāvidhi
viśā homam cakṛtvā eva śrāmaṇāgnau yathā uditam

original: kuṃbhaṃ saṃsādhya ca prāgvatsaptāhānte viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.203 //
analyzed: kuṃbham saṃsādhya ca prāgvat sapta aha ante viśeṣataḥ
aṣṭottaraśatam vā aṣṭacatvāriṃśat atha atha vā
saṃgṛhya kalaśānām tu samabhyarcya abhiṣecya ca
devam viśeṣataḥ abhyarcya haviḥ dadyāt ayam vidhiḥ

original: mahāśāntikramaṃ vakṣye vinā kuṃbhasya sādhanam // BhS_29.205 //

analyzed: agnau śrāmaṇake bilva patraiḥ ājya āplutaiḥ kramāt
aṣṭa adhika sahasram vai hunet aṣṭa akṣareṇa tu
ājyena vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam pauruṣam eva ca
hutvā saṃsnāpya śuddha snapana vartmanā
samabhyarcya haviḥ dadyāt mahāśāntiḥ iyam bhavet
aupāsana agnau eka aham hutvā śāntim vidhānataḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā eva dadyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām

original: atha śuddhividhiṃ vakṣye vāstuhomaṃ hunettataḥ // BhS_29.209 //
analyzed: atha śuddhi vidhim vakṣye vāstu homam hunet tatas
bilva patra ādibhiḥ hutvā pṛthak aṣṭa uttaram śatam
puṇyāha ante gurum pūjya bhojayet brāhmaṇān api
sarvatra tu vikalpena ghaṭa saṃskāram ācaret
atha atas sarva śāntiḥ syāt apamṛtyu bhaye tathā
graha kope mahā vyādhau para cakra bhaye tathā

original: arthabandhuvināśe ca durbhikṣe ca parājaye // BhS_29.212 //
analyzed: artha bandhu vināśe ca durbhikṣe ca parājaye
abhicāra bhaye ca eva tāpa traya nipīḍane
viruddhe a ca ātmanaḥ prāpte sarva śāntim samācaret

original: saptāhaṃ vā navāhaṃ vā dvādaśārṇena vai pṛthak /
analyzed: sapta aham vā nava aham vā dvādaśa arṇena vai pṛthak

original: aṣṭottara sahasraṃ tu juhuyādvidhinā kramāt // BhS_29.214 //
analyzed: aṣṭottara sahasram tu juhuyāt vidhinā kramāt

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sihitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ekonatriṃśo 'dhyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛguproktāyām sihitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre ekonatriṃśaḥ adhyaḥ
atha triṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
prāyaścittam
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa tantra saṃkara niṣkṛtim
vaiṣṇavasya anya tantreṇa saṃkare doṣam ādiśet
grāmasya yajamānasya rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya saṃkṣayaḥ
tad doṣa śamanāya eva sāṃkaryam apahāya ca

original: padmāvale vaiṣṇavaṃ ca viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣam /
analyzed: padmāvale vaiṣṇavam ca viṣṇusūktam ca pauruṣam
pāramātmikam īṅkārāḥ di aṣṭāśītim viśeṣataḥ
aṣṭottarasahasram vā śatam aṣṭa uttaram tu vā
doṣa gauravam uddiśya hutvā pūrvavat ācaret
vaiṣṇavam dvividham śāstram munibhiḥ parikīrtitam

original: vaikhānasaṃ pañcarātraṃ vaidikaṃ tāntrikaṃ kramāt // BhS_30.5 //
analyzed: vaikhānasam pañcarātram vaidikam tāntrikam kramāt
vaikhānasam vaidikam syāt vaidikaiḥ arcitam dvijaiḥ
aihika āmuṣmika phala pradam saumyam prakīrtitam
pañcarātram atha āgneyam a vaidikam a tāttvikam
tāpa ādi pañca saṃskāra dīkṣāvadbhiḥ samarcitam
aśrīkaram atha proktam kevala āmuṣmika pradam

original: saumyaṃ sarvatra saṃpūjyaṃ grāmādiṣu viśeṣataḥ // BhS_30.8 //
analyzed: saumyam sarvatra saṃpūjyam grāma ādiṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca geheṣu saumye nai vārcayeddharim /
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām ca geheṣu saumye vā arcayet harim
āgneyam arcayet tadvat avāstu aṅga ālaye tathā
parvata ādiṣu araṇyeṣu vivikteṣu sthaleṣu ca

original: viprāvāse janāvāse naiva kuryādanena tu // BhS_30.10 //
analyzed: vipra āvāse jana āvāse nā eva kuryāt anena tu

original: saumye vaikhānase mārge yadyāgne yena saṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: saumye vaikhānase mārge yadi āgne yena saṃkaraḥ

original: pañcarātreṇa saṃprāpto rājā rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati // BhS_30.11 //
analyzed: pañca rātreṇa saṃprāptaḥ rājā rāṣṭram vinaśyati
tad doṣa śamānāya eva padma agnau juhuyāt kramāt

original: mahāśāntiṃ vidhānena saptāhaṃ vā tṣahantu vā // BhS_30.12 //
analyzed: mahāśāntim vidhānena sapta aham vā vā
aṣṭa adhika śadaiḥ ca eva saṃsnāpya kalaśaiḥ tatas

original: abhyarcya devadeveśaṃ saṃpūjyaiva tu vaiṣṇavān // BhS_30.13 //
analyzed: abhyarcya devadeveśam saṃpūjya eva tu vaiṣṇavān
bhojayitvā brāhmaṇān tu kārayet pūrva vartmanā
kālena antarite tasmin kuryāt saumya praveśanam
saumya tvāt rājarāṣṭrāṇām tat sa mṛddhi karam bhavet
padmānale mahāśāntim hutvā ādau ca tatas kramāt
vaikhānasena vidhinā a vimānam biṃbam eva ca
saṃskṛtya ca ucitaiḥ sarvaiḥ kaṃskāraiḥ karṣaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: pratiṣṭhāpya tadārabhya sarvaṃ tenaiva cācaret // BhS_30.17 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya tat ārabhya sarvam tena eva ca ācaret
ālaya āśrita devānām parivārasya parṣadām
pūjāyām api amukhyāyām saṃkaraḥ nā eva sammataḥ
mahātmyam kim uvakṣyāmi śāstrasya mahataḥ asya vai
na alam devāḥ trayaḥ sa indrāḥ anantaḥ api upavarṇitum
śruṇantu munayaḥ sarve śāstra māhātmyam uttamam
yāvacchakti pravakṣyāmi jñātam guru kṛpā balāt
purā caturmukhaḥ brahmā sisṛkṣuḥ akhilam jagat
supta udthitaḥ ciram kālam prākrāmīt sarga karmaṇi
visasmāra yadā dhātā nidrayā ākrānta mānasaḥ
vedān sarga pradhānān tu sṛṣṭiḥ na eva pravartate
cintā āturaḥ tadā brahmā mūḍhaḥ kartavya karmaṇi

original: bahudhā dhyāyamānastuna lebhe kāraṇaṃ svataḥ // BhS_30.23 //
analyzed: bahudhā lebhe kāraṇam svataḥ
sva śaktyā yat vidheyam syāt sarvam cakre vimūḍha dhīḥ

original: na hi tatkāraṇaṃ lebhe vedavismaraṇaṃ tu yat // BhS_30.24 //
analyzed: na hi tad kāraṇam lebhe veda vismaraṇam tu yat

original: cirācchintāṃ tu tāṃ tyaktvā svasthacittaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: cirāt śintām tu tām tyaktvā svastha cittaḥ prajāpatiḥ
hṛd padma madhye puruṣam parameṇa samādhinā
cintayāmāsa vai viṣṇum ṛk yajuḥ sāma rūpiṇam

original: tuṣṭāva ca tadā brahmā haripravaṇamānasaḥ // BhS_30.26 //
analyzed: tuṣṭāva ca tadā brahmā hari pravaṇa mānasaḥ
nanāma ca tadā viṣṇum śaṅkha cakra gat haram
arcayāmāsa deveśam pādya ādyaiḥ vigrahaiḥ samaiḥ
muhur muhur praṇamya atha mūrthnā devam jagatpatim
nirvyāja karuṇā leśāt devasya vimala antaraḥ
tuṣṭāva ajagat īśānam nārāyaṇam ajam vidhiḥ
jita ante puṇḍarīkākṣa namaḥ te viśvabhāvana
namaḥ te astu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja
deśa kāla pariccheda rahita ananta cit maya
satya jñāna sukha ānanda svarūpa parameśvara
pañcavyūha catur vyūha ana nta vyūha ātma vigraha
viṣṇo puruṣa satya acyuta aniruddha jagatpate
śrī bhū nīla ādi saṃsevya divya maṅgala vigraha
śaṅkha cakra gadā vāṇe bhakta abhaya vara prada
kīrīṭa hāra keyūra kaṭaka aṅgada bhūṣita
graiveyaka pariṣkāra kaṭī sūtra virājita
tulasī mālikā rāja dvi śālā urasthsalāṃcita
pralaṃba yajñasūtra āḍhya kaustubha ābharaṇa ujjvala
sarva loka īśvara acintya śrīvatsa kṛta lakṣaṇa
divya āyudha samāsevya pīta aṃbara su śobhita
manda snita mukha aṃbhoja madhura adhara pallava
rukma ābha rakta netra āsya pāṇi pāda sukha udvaha
su bhrū lalāṭa subhaga su nasa su āyata īkṣaṇa
vṛtta pīna āyata bhuja tanu madhya mahā hano
vilāsa vikrama ākrānta trailokya caraṇa aṃbuja
jñāna śakti bala aiśvarya vīrya tejaḥ vidhe anagha

original: namaste viṣṇave tubhyaṃ puruṣāya namo namaḥ // BhS_30.40 //
analyzed: namaḥ te viṣṇave tubhyam puruṣāya namaḥ namaḥ
samaḥ satya svarūpāya acyutāya namaḥ namaḥ
namaḥ aniruddha rūpāya vāsudevāya śārṅgiṇe
namaḥ cit ātmane ananta śānta rūpāya dhanvine
śāsate nirapekṣāya svatantrāya adhikāriṇe
acyutāya avikārāya tejasām nidhaye namaḥ
pradhāna puruṣa īśāya veda vedyāya vedine
namaḥ para vyūha rūpa namaḥ vibhava vigraha
antaryāmin namaḥ te astu namaḥ ūrjā rūpa śāśvata
sahasra śīrṣam puruṣam sahasra akṣam nirañjanam
sahasrapādam trātāram śaraṇam tvā aṅgataḥ asmi aham

original: mātā tvaṃ me pitā tvaṃ me bhrātā tvaṃ me sakhāmama /
analyzed: mātā tvam me pitā tvam me bhrātā tvam me sakhā amama

original: sarvaṃ tvamasi viśvātmaṃstvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_30.46 //
analyzed: sarvam tvam asi viśvātman tvayi sarvam pratiṣṭhitam
