original: tvāmeva śaraṇaṃ pāpya nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ // BhS_30.47 //
analyzed: tvām eva śaraṇam pāpya nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: na hi te gopya te kiñcinna hyantyaviditaṃ tava /
analyzed: na hi te gopya te kiñcid na hi antya viditam tava

original: tvaṃ sākṣī dehināmekassarvaṃ vyāpya tvamedhase // BhS_30.48 //
analyzed: tvam sākṣī dehinām ekaḥ sarvam vyāpya tvam edhase

original: na te rūpaṃ na karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti te 'nagha /
analyzed: na te rūpam na karaṇam kāraṇam na asti te anagha

original: tvaṃ śāstā sarvalokānāṃ sraṣṭāpātā haran hare // BhS_30.49 //
analyzed: tvam śāstā sarva lokānām sraṣṭā āpātā haran hare
aham bhavaḥ ca te brahman prasāda krodha jau ubhau

original: tvatto me mānasaṃ janma prathamaṃ dvijapūjitam // BhS_30.50 //
analyzed: tvattaḥ me mānasam janma prathamam dvija pūjitam

original: vijñānaṃ tadidaṃ prāptaṃ brahmatvaṃ ca yadārjitam /
analyzed: vijñānam tat idam prāptam brahma tvam ca yadā arjitam

original: sarvaṃ tava kaṭākṣasya leśo 'yaṃ madhusūdana // BhS_30.51 //
analyzed: sarvam tava kaṭākṣasya leśaḥ ayam madhusūdana
tamasā ākrānta cittasya vismṛtāḥ nigamāḥ mama

original: avedavihitassargo mayā kartuṃ na śakyate // BhS_30.52 //
analyzed: a veda vihitaḥ sargaḥ mayā kartum na śakyate
prasīda parameśāna veda bhikṣām prayaccha me
iti cintayataḥ tasya babhūva avāvilam manaḥ
tatas tu bhagavān brahmā vedarāśim avāptavān
sasmāra nikhilān vedān sa aṃgān upaniṣad gaṇam
purāṇa nyāya mīmāṃsā dharma śāstrāṇi sarvaśas
catuḥṣaṣṭi kalāḥ ca eva vidyā sthānāni yāni ca
antarhitānām khananāt vedānām tu viśeṣataḥ

original: sa vibhuḥ procyate brahmā vikhanā brahmavādibhiḥ // BhS_30.56 //
analyzed: sa vibhuḥ procyate brahmā vikhanāḥ brahma vādibhiḥ
vaikhānasaḥ ca bhagavān procyate sa pitāmahaḥ
jagat sarvam aśeṣeṇa veda dṛṣṭena vartmanā
prāṇāt ca cakṣuṣaḥ tadvat abhimānāt ca marmaṇaḥ
hṛdayāt śirasaḥ śrotrāt udānāt vyānataḥ tatas
samānāt ca tathā apānāt ṛṣi śreṣṭhān imān daśa

original: dakṣaṃ marīcinaṃ nīlalohitaṃ bhṛgumena ca // BhS_30.59 //
analyzed: dakṣam marīcinam nīlalohitam bhṛgumena ca
tathā aṃgirasam atrin ca pulastyam pulaham tathā
vasiṣṭham cakratum ca eva kramāt asṛjat abja bhūḥ
nava brahmāṇaḥ eva e te vinā asyuḥ nīlalohitam

original: vedānāṃ vyasanādarpāk prāgrūpaṃ militaṃ tu yat // BhS_30.61 //
analyzed: vedānām vyasanāt arpāk prāgrūpam militam tu yat

original: nāmnā vikhanasaṃ prāhuryaṃ ca śātātapaṃ tathā // BhS_30.62 //
analyzed: nāmnā vikhanasam prāhuḥ yam ca śātātapam tathā
bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ marīci atri pulastya pulahāḥ kratuḥ

original: tathā vasiṣṭhodakṣaśca nava brahmāṇar iritā // BhS_30.63 //
analyzed: tathā vasiṣṭhaḥ udakṣaḥ ca nava
nava brāhmāṇaḥ eva ete nīla lohitam
ete vikhanasaḥ siṣyāḥ śruti smṛti vidhānataḥ
tad śiṣyāḥ tu mahātmānaḥ munayaḥ tattva darśinaḥ
veda anugāni śāstrāṇi cakruḥ loka hita eṣiṇaḥ

original: ke cidgṛhyāṇi vai cakrurgṛhyaśrautātmakāni tu // BhS_30.65 //
analyzed: ke cit gṛhyāṇi vai cakruḥ gṛhya śrauta ātmakāni tu

original: dharmaśāstrāṇi kecittu purāṇāni ca ke cana /
analyzed: dharma śāstrāṇi kecid tu purāṇāni ca ke cana
itihāsān tathā akalpān procuḥ anye mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: vāṅmayaṃ sakalaṃ sarvaṃ śāstrabaddhaṃ pracakrire // BhS_30.67 //
analyzed: vāc mayam sakalam sarvam śāstra baddham pracakrire
tāntuvākhānasīm śākhām sva sūtre viniyuktavān
padma bhūḥ paramaḥ dhātā tasmin ārādhana trayam
tām tu vaikhānasīm śākhām sva sūtre viniyuktavān

original: cakre ṛgādibhedaistu vyasitvā tu pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_30.69 //
analyzed: cakre ṛk ādi bhedaiḥ tu vyasitvā tu pṛthak pṛthak

original: ādikāle tu bhagavān brahmātu vikhanā muniḥ /
analyzed: ādi kāle tu bhagavān vikhanāḥ muniḥ
yajuḥ śākhā anusāreṇa cakre sūtram mahattaram
varṇa āśrama ācāra yutam śrauta smārta samanvitam
yat sūtra ādi anta madhyeṣu bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ
yaṣṭavyaḥ gīyate yasmāt sarva sūtra uttamam tu tat

original: vede vaikhānase sūtre yo dharmaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // BhS_30.72 //
analyzed: vede vaikhānase sūtre yaḥ dharmaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
sarvaiḥ sadharmaḥ nuṣṭheyaḥ na atra kāryā avicāraṇā
sva sūtrasya parityāgāt anya sūtra samāśrayāt
sadyas patati vai vipraḥ na vedasya samāśraye
sūtram vaikhānasam yat tu vedaḥ saṃpratipadyate
etat vaikhānasam sūtram anya sūtra an apekṣitam
etat vaikhānasam sūtram sarva veda artha saṃgrahaḥ
vaiṣṇavam sarva viprāṇām sāmnyam abhidhīyate
vaikhānasasya sūtrasya ca agneḥ śrāmaṇakasya ca
nārāyaṇasya devasya māhātmyam na avabudhyate

original: yathā vedeṣu sarveṣu sāmavedaḥ praśasyate // BhS_30.77 //
analyzed: yathā vedeṣu sarveṣu sāmavedaḥ praśasyate
tathā sarveṣu sūtreṣu sūtram etat praśasyate
agniḥ vaikhānasam śāstram viṣṇuḥ vedāḥ ca śāśvatāḥ
gāyatrī vaiṣṇavāḥ viprāḥ saptā ete bahu pāvanāḥ

original: adhīteṣu ca vedeṣu sāṃgeṣu labhate phalam // BhS_30.79 //
analyzed: adhīteṣu ca vedeṣu sa aṃgeṣu labhate phalam
tat phalam labhate sadyas sūtram etat paṭhan dvijaḥ
agnīṣoma ādayaḥ devāḥ ye yajña aṃśa haviḥ bhujaḥ

original: te sarve sūtramāśritya cainaṃ gacchanti mādhavam /
analyzed: te sarve sūtram āśritya ca enam gacchanti mādhavam
śārīrāṇi anya sūtrāṇi tathā svarga phalāni ca
vaiṣṇavam sūtram etat hi sarva siddhi karam param
ādya tvāt sarva sūtrāṇām vaiṣṇava tvāt viśeṣataḥ
mayā anuvartitam tadvat kāśyapa atri marīcibhiḥ

original: yasminneva tu saṃprokte sūtre vikhanasā purā // BhS_30.83 //
analyzed: yasmin eva tu saṃprokte sūtre vikhanasā purā
vanasthānām tu sarveṣām vidhiḥ śrāmaṇaka abhidhaḥ
vānaprasthāḥ tatas svarve ye dvijāḥ ca anya sūtriṇaḥ
tad sūtra vidhi amaṣṭhānāt smṛtāḥ vaikhānasāḥ amī

original: kiṃ bahūktena vidhinā sarvaṃ vaikhānasaṃ jagat // BhS_30.85 //
analyzed: kim bahu uktena vidhinā sarvam vaikhānasam jagat
parasmin vyomni yat ca ār'ke yat tejaḥ tu trayī mayam

original: tadvaikhānaḥ paraṃ brahma iti vedādadhīmahi // BhS_30.86 //
analyzed: tat vaikhānaḥ param brahma iti veda ādadhīmahi
śāstram etat ca sūtram ca sarveṣām api jīvanam
ye vaikhānasa sūtreṇa saṃskṛtāḥ tu dvijātayaḥ
te viṣṇu sadṛśāḥ jñeyāḥ sarveṣām uttamottamāḥ
vaikhānasānām sarveṣām garbha vaiṣṇava janmanām
nārāyaṇaḥ svayam garbhe mudrām dhārayite nijām
viprāḥ vaikhānasa ākhyāye te bhaktāḥ tattvam ucyate
ekāntinaḥ su sattva sthāḥ dehāntam
viṣṇoḥ priyatamāḥ loke catvāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ
aśvadthaḥ kapilāḥ gāvaḥ tulasī vaiṣṇavāḥ dvijāḥ

original: dvijeṣu brāhmāṇāśśreṣṭhā brāhmaṇeṣu ca caiṣṇavāḥ // BhS_30.91 //
analyzed: dvijeṣu brāhmāṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ brāhmaṇeṣu ca caiṣṇavāḥ
vaiṣṇaveṣu param śreṣṭhāḥ ye vaikhānasa sūtriṇaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavīṃ pratimāṃ loke vipraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tathā // BhS_30.92 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavīm pratimām loke vipram vaikhānasam tathā

original: gaṅgāṃ viṣṇupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate mūlamasyāpi śāstrasya /
analyzed: gaṅgām viṣṇupadīm dṛṣṭvā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate mūlam asya api śāstrasya

original: sārdhakoṭipramāṇataḥ upādiśatsa bhagavān asmabhyaṃ naimiśe vane // BhS_30.93 //
analyzed: sārdha koṭi pramāṇataḥ upādiśat sa bhagavān asmabhyam naimiśe vane
iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktam mahat tvam sūtra śāstrayoḥ
tasmāt vaikhānasāḥ viprāḥ saṃpūjyāḥ bhagavat priyāḥ

original: pūjānte snapanānte ca tathānte cotsavasya ca /
analyzed: pūjā ante snapana ante ca tathā ante ca utsavasya ca
ācāryam arcakam ca api sarvān vaikhānasān tathā
prathamam pūjayitvā eva paścāt kāryam samācaret
yaḥ pūjakam an ādṛtya vipram vaikhānasam haṭhāt

original: tīrthaṃ gṛhītuṃ prathamcchetsa patati dhruvam yaḥ /
analyzed: tīrtham gṛhītum pratham chet sa patati dhruvam yaḥ
pūjakam an ādṛtya vipram vaikhānasam punar
prasādam devadevasya prathamam tu jighṛkṣati
brahma hatyām avāpnoti tad būjā niṣpalā bhavet
yaḥ pūjakam an ādṛtya vipram vaikhānasam punar
yādṛśīm api deva agre vāñchati apacitim janaḥ
catur vedī api saḥ vipraḥ sadyas caṇḍāla tām vrajet

original: tatpūjā niṣphalā ca syādrājarāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati // BhS_30.100 //
analyzed: tad pūjā niṣphalā ca syāt rāja rāṣṭram vinaśyati

original: ṣaṭkālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vā dvikālaṃ kālameva vā /
analyzed: ṣaṣ kālam vā tri kālam vā dvi kālam kālam eva vā

original: ālaye bhagavatpūjā saumyena vidhinā kṛtā // BhS_30.101 //
analyzed: ālaye bhagavat pūjā saumyena vidhinā kṛtā
sarva saṃpad karī sā syāt jagatām iti śāsanam

original: tatrārcane tu śuddhātmā pūjakaḥ paritoṣitaḥ // BhS_30.102 //
analyzed: tatra arcane tu śuddha ātmā pūjakaḥ paritoṣitaḥ

original: tena rājā ca rājyaṃ ca yajamānaśca nānvayaḥ /
analyzed: tena rājā ca rājyam ca yajamānaḥ ca na anvayaḥ
sarva lokaḥ ca saṃtuṣṭaḥ vardhate brahma tejasā
agram vṛkṣasya rājānaḥ mūlam vṛkṣasya pūjakāḥ
tasmāt mūlam na hiṃsīyāt mūlāt agram prarohati

original: phalaṃ vṛkṣasya rājānaḥ puṣpaṃ vṛkṣasya pūjakāḥ /
analyzed: phalam vṛkṣasya rājānaḥ puṣpam vṛkṣasya pūjakāḥ
tasmāt puṣpam na hiṃsīyāt puṣpāt saṃjāyate phalam

original: devasyaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca sanmānaṃ pūjakasya ca /
analyzed: deva syam brāhmaṇa svam ca sat mānam pūjakasya ca

original: yastu na trāyate rājā tamāhurbrahmaghātukam // BhS_30.106 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu na trāyate rājā tam āhuḥ brahmaghātukam
durbalānām anāthānām bāla vṛddha tapasvinām

original: anyāyaiḥ paribhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pārthivo gatiḥ // BhS_30.107 //
analyzed: anyāyaiḥ paribhūtānām sarveṣām pārthivaḥ gatiḥ

original: rājā pitā ca mātā ca rājā ca paramo guruḥ /
analyzed: rājā pitā ca mātā ca rājā ca paramaḥ guruḥ

original: rājā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ paritrātā gururmataḥ // BhS_30.108 //
analyzed: rājā ca sarva bhūtānām paritrātā guruḥ mataḥ
dāva agni dava dagdhānām rājā pūrṇam iva aṃbhasā
samudram iva tṛpyanti brāhmaṇāḥ veda vādinaḥ
dahati agniḥ tejasā ca sūryaḥ dahati raśmibhiḥ

original: rājā dahati diḍena vipro dahati manyuvā // BhS_30.110 //
analyzed: rājā dahati diḍena vipraḥ dahati manyuvā
manyu praharaṇāḥ viprāḥ cakra praharaṇaḥ hariḥ
cakrāt tīkṣṇataraḥ manyuḥ tasmāt viprān na kopayet
agni dagdham praroheta sūrya dagdham tathā eva ca
daṇḍyaḥ tu saṃpraroheta brahma śāpa hataḥ hataḥ

original: āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ nāvamānyo hi pūjakaḥ /
analyzed: āpadi api ca kaṣṭāyām na avamānyaḥ hi pūjakaḥ

original: arcakena tu tuṣṭena yaduktaṃ devasannidhau // BhS_30.113 //
analyzed: arcakena tu tuṣṭena yat uktam deva sannidhau

original: tadvākyaṃ tu ha rervākyaṃ nāvamānyo hi pūjakaḥ /
analyzed: tat vākyam tu ha reḥ vākyam na avamānyaḥ hi pūjakaḥ

original: arcakaṃ kopayedyastu sa hi devasya kopakṛt // BhS_30.114 //
analyzed: arcakam kopayet yaḥ tu sa hi devasya kopa kṛt
deveśam toṣayet yaḥ tu sa hi pūjaka toṣa kṛt

original: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā mālyaṃ tāṃbūlaṃ cākṣatādikam // BhS_30.115 //
analyzed: gandham puṣpam tathā mālyam tāṃbūlam ca akṣata ādikam
prasādam ca api devasya prathamam pūjakaḥ ṛhati
ṣaḍaṅga viduṣām ca eva kratu pravara yājinām
vaikhānasaḥ punāti agre goṣṭhīm vipra śatasya tu
phala abhisaṃdhiḥ ahitam sarvam karma akhilam kṛtam
brahma arpaṇa dhiyā kuryāt sa bhavet vaiṣṇava uttamaḥ

original: nānyaṃ devaṃ namaskuryānnānyaṃ devaṃ prapūjayet // BhS_30.118 //
analyzed: na anyam devam namaskuryāt na anyam devam prapūjayet
arcayet satatam dhyāyet nārāyaṇam anāyam

original: kāyena manasā vācā sa tu vaiṣṇava ucyate // BhS_30.119 //
analyzed: kāyena manasā vācā sa tu vaiṣṇavaḥ ucyate
tiryak puṇḍra dharam ca eva pāṣaṇḍinam avaiṣṇavam
deva agre pūjaye tad vaiṣṇava vimānanā
abhyarcyāḥ viṣṇu bhaktāḥ hi vaiṣṇavāḥ bhagavat priyāḥ

original: avaiṣṇavasya pūjā tu teṣāmagre sudāruṇā // BhS_30.121 //
analyzed: avaiṣṇavasya pūjā tu teṣām agre su dāruṇā
tasmāt sarva prayatnena tyajet dūrāt avaiṣṇavam
ye tu sāmānya bhāvena manyante puruṣottamam
rudra ādibhiḥ saha ājñā na āt te api jñeyāḥ avaiṣṇavāḥ
nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ brāhmaṇeṣu vipaścitaḥ
vipaścitsu kṛta dhiyaḥ teṣu kartāraḥ eva ca

original: kartṛṣu brahmaviduṣo ye hi bhaktājanākdane // BhS_30.124 //
analyzed: kartṛṣu brahma viduṣaḥ ye hi
viṣṇu bhakteṣu sarvatra śreṣṭhāḥ vaikhānasāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tasmātsaṃpūjya sarvādau bhaktyā vaikhānasaṃ dvijam // BhS_30.125 //
analyzed: tasmāt saṃpūjya sarva ādau bhaktyā vaikhānasam dvijam
viṣṇu bhaktam tatas pūjya yathāvarṇa ānupūrvyaśaḥ
goṣṭhīm samarcayet kāle bhojyāḥ ca anye dvijātayaḥ
strī iyaḥ pūjyāḥ vidhānena vaiṣṇapyaḥ vaiṣṇava āśrayāḥ

original: na hi sādhāraṇi sṛṣyirvaiṣṇavīti vicintayet // BhS_30.127 //
analyzed: na hi sādhāraṇi sṛṣyiḥ vaiṣṇavī iti vicintayet
janma antara sahasreṣu tapaḥ dhyāna samādhibhiḥ

original: narāṇāṃ kṣīṇapāpānāṃ kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ prajāyate // BhS_30.128 //
analyzed: narāṇām kṣīṇa pāpānām kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ prajāyate
na hi abhāgavataiḥ viṣṇuḥ jñrātum stotum ca tattvataḥ

original: draṣṭuṃ vā śakyate mūḍhāḥ praveṣṭuṃ kuta eva hi // BhS_30.129 //
analyzed: draṣṭum vā śakyate mūḍhāḥ praveṣṭum kutas eva hi
tad bhakti bhāvitāḥ pūtāḥ narāḥ tad gata cetasaḥ

original: bhavantivai bhāgavatāste viṣṇuṃ praviśanti ca // BhS_30.130 //
analyzed: bhavanti vai bhāgavatāḥ te viṣṇum praviśanti ca
aneka janma saṃsāra cite pāpa samuccaye

original: vārṣiṇe jāyate puṃsāṃ govindābhimukhī matiḥ // BhS_30.131 //
analyzed: vārṣiṇe jāyate puṃsām govinda abhimukhī matiḥ

original: pradveṣaṃ yāti govinde dvijān vedāṃśca nindati /
analyzed: pradveṣam yāti govinde dvijān vedān ca nindati
yaḥ naraḥ tam vijānīyāt āsura aṃśa samudbhavam
pāṣaṇḍeṣu ratiḥ puṃsām hetuvāda anukūla tā
jāyate viṣṇum āyātaḥ patitānām durātmanām
yadā pāpa kṣayaḥ puṃsām tadā deva dvijātiṣu

original: viṣṭau ca yajñapuruṣe śraddhā bhavati niścalā // BhS_30.134 //
analyzed: viṣṭau ca yajñapuruṣe śraddhā bhavati niścalā
yathā śeṣaḥ tu narāṇām pāpa saṃcayaḥ

original: bhavanti te bhāgavatā niśśreyaśaparā narāḥ // BhS_30.135 //
analyzed: bhavanti te bhāgavatāḥ niśśreyaśa parāḥ narāḥ
bhrāmyatām atra saṃsāre narāṇām karma durgame
hasta avalaṃbanaḥ hi ekaḥ bhakti krītaḥ janārdanaḥ
karmaṇā manasā vācā prāṇinām yaḥ anasūyakaḥ

original: bhāvasaktaśca govinde viṣṇau bhāgavato hi saḥ // BhS_30.137 //
analyzed: bhāva saktaḥ ca govinde viṣṇau bhāgavataḥ hi saḥ
yaḥ brāhmaṇān ca vedān ca nityam eva namasyati

original: na drogdhā paravittādeḥ sahi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_30.138 //
analyzed: na drogdhā para vitta ādeḥ sahi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: sarvān devān hariṃ vetti sarvān lokāṃśca keśavam /
analyzed: sarvān devān harim vetti sarvān lokān ca keśavam

original: tebhyaśca nāsyamātmāvaṃ sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.139 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca sa hi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
devam manuṣyam anyam vā paśu pakṣi pipīlikāḥ
taru pāṣāṇa kāṣṭha ādīn bhūmi aṃbhaḥ gaganam diśaḥ
ātmānam ca api deveśāt vyatiriktam janārdanāt

original: yo na jānāti puṇyātmā sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.141 //
analyzed: yaḥ na jānāti puṇya ātmā sa hi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
sarvam bhagavataḥ bhāgaḥ yat bhūtam bhavya saṃsthitam

original: iti yo vai vijānāti sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.142 //
analyzed: iti yaḥ vai vijānāti sa hi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
bhava bhītim harati eṣa bhakti bhāvena bhāvitaḥ
bhagavān iti yad bhāvaḥ sa tu bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bhāvaṃ na kurute yastu sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
analyzed: bhāvam na kurute yaḥ tu sarva bhūteṣu pāpakam

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa tu bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.144 //
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa tu bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
bāhya artha nirapekṣaḥ yaḥ bhaktyā bhagavataḥ kriyām

original: bhāvena niṣpādayati jñeyo bhāgavato hi saḥ // BhS_30.145 //
analyzed: bhāvena niṣpādayati jñeyaḥ bhāgavataḥ hi saḥ
na arayaḥ yasya su snigdhāḥ na ca udāsīna vṛttayaḥ
paśyataḥ sarvam evā idam viṣṇum bhāgavataḥ sa hi
su taptena iha tapasā yajñaiḥ vā bahu dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: tāṃ gatiṃ na narāyānti yāṃ tu bhāgavatā narāḥ // BhS_30.147 //
analyzed: tām gatim na nara āyānti yām tu bhāgavatāḥ narāḥ
yoga cyutaiḥ bhāgavataiḥ devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ
avāk nirīkṣyate ye yoga pāragāḥ
yajña niṣpattaye vedāḥ devāḥ yajñapateḥ kṛte

original: tattoṣaṇāya yatate sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.149 //
analyzed: tad toṣaṇāya yatate sa hi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: yena sarvātmanā bhaktyā viṣṇau bhāvo niveśitaḥ /
analyzed: yena sarva ātmanā bhaktyā viṣṇau bhāvaḥ niveśitaḥ
yukta tvāt kṛtakṛtya tvāt sa hi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
vratinām yajñapuruṣaḥ pūjyaḥ viṣṇuḥ asaṃśayaḥ

original: strīyaśca svaṃ ca bhartāramṛte pūjyanna daivatam // BhS_30.151 //
analyzed: strī iyaḥ ca svam ca bhartāram ṛte pūjyan na daivatam
bhartuḥ gṛhasthasya sataḥ pūjyaḥ yajñapatiḥ hariḥ
vaikhānasānām ārādhyaḥ tapobhiḥ madhusūdanaḥ
dhyeyaḥ parivrājakānām vāsudevaḥ mahātmanām
evam āśramiṇām viṣṇuḥ sarveṣām ca parāyaṇam
na dānaiḥ na tapobhiḥ ca prīyate bhagavān hariḥ
varṇa āśrama ācāravatā yathā sa parituṣyati
varṇa āśrama ācāravatā puruṣeṇa paraḥ pumān
viṣṇuḥ ārādhyate panthā nā anyaḥ tad toṣa kārakaḥ
atra anukteṣu doṣeṣu prāyaścittam pravakṣyate
paiṇḍarīka agnim āsādya pariṣicya ca pāvakam
ṣaṣ kṛtvas vaiṣṇavam tadvat catur kṛtvas ca vyāhṛtīḥ
aṣṭa akṣaram ca aṣṭa kṛtvas tathā ca dvādaśa akṣaram
hutvā dvādaśa kṛtvas tu viṣṇusūktam ca pauruṣam
ekākṣara ādi sūktam ca śrī bhū sūkta dvayam hunet
devam saṃsnāpya ca abhyarcya haviḥ samyak ni vedayet

original: anena vidhinā tatra śāntirbhavati śobhanā // BhS_30.159 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā tatra śāntiḥ bhavati śobhanā
hā doṣeṣu ca punar ukta homaiḥ saha eva tu
pāramātmika mīṅkāra ādi aṣṭāśītim viśeṣataḥ
hutvā ca sarva daivatyam aṣṭābhiḥ ca śataiḥ ghaṭaiḥ

original: devaṃ saṃsnāpya cābhyarcya havissamyaṅni vedayet // BhS_30.161 //
analyzed: devam saṃsnāpya ca abhyarcya haviḥ samyak ni vedayet

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre triṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha eka triṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
saṃprokṣaṇa trayam
atha vakṣyāmi tatra ukta prāyaścittasya saṃgraham
jala saṃprokṣaṇam ca eva laghu saṃprokṣaṇam tathā
mahāsaṃprokṣaṇam ca iti prāyaścittam tridhā smṛtam
nimitte samanuprāpte jñātvā gaurava lāghavam
vakṣyamāṇa krāreṇa sadyas saṃprokṣaṇam caret
saṃprokṣaṇa vidhānasya na kāla niyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
na kuryāt māsa nakṣatra tithi vāra ādi avekṣaṇam
tasmāt nimitte saṃprāpte sadyas saṃprokṣaṇam caret
deśa kāla ādi avekṣāyāḥ nimitte sati gauravam

original: bahubereṣu caikasmin sthāvare jaṅgame 'tha vā // BhS_31.5 //
analyzed: bahu bereṣu ca ekasmin sthāvare jaṅgame atha vā
arcanāyām vihīnāyām kāla atīte viparyaye
nirmālya pūjane ca eva nivedita nivedane
eka ahe api arcana ahīne nitya snāpana varjane
bali homa ādi hīne ca nitya utsava vivarjane
prākāra abhyantare prāpte pramādāt aśubhe sati
a spṛśya āgamane tatra caṇḍāla ādyaiḥ praveśane
śva kukkuṭa varāha uṣṭra gardabhānām praveśane
udakyayā sūtikayā pāṣaṇḍa ādyaiḥ atha api vā
kuṇḍa gola vrata bhraṣṭa turuṣka ādi praveśane
anya sūtri dvijaiḥ spṛṣṭe mohāt ajñānataḥ api vā
mahāvāta hate biṃbe saṃsikte varṣa bindubhiḥ
viṣ mūtra rudhira srāve bahu jalpe ca maithune
evamādi nimitte tu jala saṃprokṣaṇam caret
na eva a saṃprokṣite biṃbe hariḥ vasati niścayaḥ
tasmāt biṃba viśuddhi artham saṃprokṣya eva samarcayet
doṣa ādhikye samutpanne laghu saṃprokṣaṇam caret
rāṣṭra kṣobhe ca durbhikṣe tantra saṃkara dūṣaṇe
śūdraiḥ vā atha anulomaiḥ vā apāṣaṇḍaiḥ bhramitaiḥ api
udakyayā sūtikayā patitaiḥ vā atha pātakaiḥ

original: caṇḍālādyaiḥ praviṣṭe ca garbhāgāre viśeṣataḥ // BhS_31.15 //
analyzed: caṇḍāla ādyaiḥ praviṣṭe ca garbhāgāre viśeṣataḥ
sūtaiḥ vā kuṇḍa gola ādyaiḥ tathā devalaka ādibhiḥ
śva kukkuṭa varāha ādyaiḥ praviṣṭe gārdabha ādibhiḥ
ulūka gṛdhra kāka ādyaiḥ praviṣṭe antargṛhe tathā
turuṣka ādyaiḥ praviṣṭe vā śukra ṇoṇitayoḥ api
viṣ mūtra ādeḥ visarge vā

original: tṣahādūrdhvaṃ vihīne tu pūjane dīpavarjane // BhS_31.18 //
analyzed: vihīne tu pūjane dīpa varjane
eka rātram atikramya devegrāma antara sthite
ā agni dāhe aśanīpāte garbhāgāreḥ adha maṇḍape
anya sūtṣarcite biṃbe spṛṣṭe vā buddhi pūrvakam
anyaiḥ anuktaiḥ deṣaiḥ ca laghu saṃprokṣaṇam caret
mahā nimitte saṃprāpte mahā saṃprokṣaṇam caret
dvādaśa ahāt samārabhya vatsara antam vidhānataḥ
hīnāyām arcanāyām ca nitye naimittike tathā
kriyā hīne viparyāse hīne māsa utsava ādike
nitya snapana hīne api mātrā dāna vihīnake
bali homa ādi hīne ca saṃprāpte śāstra saṃkare
evamādiṣu hīneṣu vatsara antam pramādataḥ
parṣadām parivārāṇām āśrita ālaya sevinām
dhvaja ārohaṇa pūrvam tu kṛte kāla utsava ādike
vipra ādi maraṇe prāpte devāgāre viśeṣataḥ
gardabha aśva lulāya uṣṭra śva sūkara mukhe mṛte
gaja ādi mṛga nāśe ca devāgāre pramādataḥ
caṇḍāla ādi antya jātīnām maraṇe vā viśeṣataḥ
śūdraiḥ vā atha anulomaiḥ vā pāṣaṇḍaiḥ patita ādibhiḥ
saṃspṛṣṭe vaiṣṇave biṃbe turuṣka ādyaiḥ malimlucaiḥ
spṛṣṭe caṇḍālaka ādyaiḥ vā mahāpātaka dūṣitaiḥ
vimāne aśani pāte vā mahā ulkā patane api vā

original: lohito palavarṣe ca vāṃsuvarṣe viśeṣataḥ // BhS_31.29 //
analyzed: pala varṣe ca vāṃsu varṣe viśeṣataḥ
bhū kaṃpāt calite biṃbe valmīkasya samudbhave
śithili bhavane vā api ca aṣṭa bandhe viśeṣataḥ
jīrṇe staṃbha ādi patane devāgārena

original: agnisparśe ca berasya manuṣyaprasave tathā // BhS_31.31 //
analyzed: agni sparśe ca berasya manuṣya prasave tathā
suthā karmaṇi sarvatra garbha geha ādike punar
biṃbeṣu garbha gehe vā kṛmi kīṭa ādi darśane

original: hasane rodane caiva bhāṣaṇe ca viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: hasane rodane ca eva bhāṣaṇe ca viśeṣataḥ
sveda śoṇitayoḥ vā api darśane varṇa saṃkṣaye

original: vimāne maṇḍape vātha yatra kutrāpi vā hareḥ /
analyzed: vimāne maṇḍape vā atha yatra kutra api vā hareḥ

original: devāgāre samutpanne doṣeṣveteṣu vā pṛthak // BhS_31.34 //
analyzed: devāgāre samutpanne doṣeṣu eteṣu vā pṛthak
durbhikṣe rāṣṭra saṃkṣobhe durnimitteṣu ca eva hi
dussvapne bhūmikaṃpe vā para rāja ādi upadrave
bhū gupte ca uddhṛte biṃbe ciram anya ālaye sthite

original: atikramya trirātraṃ tu deve grāmāntare sthite // BhS_31.36 //
analyzed: atikramya tri rātram tu deve grāma antare sthite
kuṇḍa golaka sūta ādyaiḥ dīkṣitaiḥ arcane kṛte

original: anuktāni ca karvāṇi duritānyadbhutāni ca // BhS_31.37 //
analyzed: anuktāni ca karvāṇi duritāni adbhutāni ca
dṛṣṭvā tu yajamānaḥ ca ye tad parisare janāḥ

original: grāmasthitā canāścaiva rājā rāṣṭraṃ ca yatnataḥ // BhS_31.38 //
analyzed: grāma sthitā canāḥ ca eva rājā rāṣṭram ca yatnataḥ
jñātvā śāstra ukta vidhinā doṣa jam bhaktitaḥ phalam
mahā saṃprokṣaṇam kuryāt mahā doṣa apanuttaye
mahā doṣeṣu sarvatra mahāśāntiḥ vithīyate
pūrvam sthāpita biṃbasya na sādhāraṇa hetunā
syāt punar thsāpanam tasmāt mahā saṃprokṣaṇam caret
mahā saṃprokṣaṇa vidheḥ nūtana sthāpanasya ca
su alpaḥ bhedaḥ iti proktam ṛṣibhiḥ kāśyapa ādibhiḥ
jala saṃprokṣaṇa vidhim pravakṣyāmi tapodhanāḥ
yajamāna abhyanujñātaḥ guruḥ snātvā vidhānataḥ

original: ālayābhimukhe vāpi dakṣiṇe vā manorame // BhS_31.43 //
analyzed: ālaya abhimukhe vā api dakṣiṇe vā manorame
sthaṇḍile saikate śuddhe

original: vāstuhomāvasāne ca doṣaduṣṭaṃ tu yat sthalam // BhS_31.44 //
analyzed: vāstu homa avasāne ca doṣa duṣṭam tu yat sthalam

biṃbam puruṣasūktena kalaśaiḥ abhiṣicya ca
ṣaṣ droṇa dhānya rāśau tu pañca kuṃbhān nidhāya ca
vastra yugnena saṃveṣṭya pratimāḥ teṣu nikṣipet
nālikera āmra patra ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtya pṛthak ghaṭān
pañcasūktam japitvā eva pañca śāntibhiḥ eva ca
pañca mūrtibhiḥ āvāhya samabhyarcya aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ

original: paścādagniṃ paristīrya pañcasūktaṃ hunetsudhīḥ r // BhS_31.48 //
analyzed: paścāt agnim paristīrya pañcasūktam hunet sudhīḥ
iṅkāra ādīn ca juhuyāt aṣṭāśītim atas param

niṣka ahīna suvarṇam ca vastra ābharaṇa kuṇḍalān
paścāt kuṃbha jalena eva prokṣayitvā sa mantrakam
prabhūtam ca nivedya eva nitya arcanam atha ācaret

original: anena vidhinā doṣā naśyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: anena vidhinā doṣāḥ naśyati eva na saṃśayaḥ
tad biṃbe deva sānnidhyam bhavet iti āha ca aṅgirāḥ
etāvān eva saṃproktaḥ jala saṃprokṣaṇa kramaḥ
laghu saṃprokṣaṇam kuryāt yajamānena vai guruḥ

original: tṣahe vā dviyahe vāpi kṛtvā caivāṅkurārpaṇam // BhS_31.54 //
analyzed: vā dvi yahe vā api kṛtvā ca eva aṅkura arpaṇam

śothayitvā vidhānena vastu vāstu paricchadān

original: kuṃbhapūjāṃ tataḥ kuryātsamyak dhyānayuto guruḥ // BhS_31.57 //
analyzed: kuṃbha pūjām tatas kuryāt samyak dhyāna yutaḥ guruḥ

original: tantunā veṣṭayitvā tu toyairāpūrya mantrata // BhS_31.58 //
analyzed: tantunā veṣṭayitvā tu toyaiḥ āpūrya
ṣaṣ bhāra dhānya rośau tu vedyām saptadaśa kramāt
vastra yugmena saṃveṣṭya pratimāḥ teṣu nikṣipet

original: ratnālābhe suvarṇaṃ vā pratyekaṃ nikṣipedghaṭe // BhS_31.60 //
analyzed: ratna alābhe suvarṇam vā pratyekam nikṣipet ghaṭe
gandha puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya nālikera āmra pallavaiḥ
āyudhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ tadvat toraṇaiḥ aṣṭamaṅgalaiḥ

original: alaṅkṛtya gururdhīmānt pṛṣṭvā kūrcena tān ghaṭān /
analyzed: alaṅkṛtya guruḥ dhīmān pṛṣṭvā kūrcena tān ghaṭān
pañca sūktam pañcaśāntim tatas dvādaśa sūktakam
sārasvata ādi sūktam ca diś sūktam pañca vāruṇam
svasti sūktam japitvā eva tathā eva oṣadhi sūktakam
nava mūrtibhiḥ āvāhya devībhyām saha pārṣadaiḥ

paiṇḍarīka agnim āsādya pariṣicya ca pāvakam

R iṅkāra ādīn ca juhuyāt aṣṭāśītim atas param
dhātādim mūla homam ca pañcavāruṇam eva ca

original: hutvā kūśmāṇḍahomaṃ ca pañcavāruṇameva ca // BhS_31.67 //
analyzed: hutvā kūśmāṇḍa homam ca pañca vāruṇam eva ca
paṅkajaiḥ bilva patraiḥ vā viṣṇugāyatriyā tatas
aṣṭottaraśatam hutvā paścāt agnim visarcayet
paścāt guruḥ pūjitaḥ san vastra ābharaṇa kuṇḍalaiḥ
kuṃbham ādāya śirasaḥ grāmam ālayam eva vā
pradakṣiṇam parītya atha devadevasya sannidhau
kūrcena ādāya tat toyam prokṣayet pañca mūrtibhiḥ
śucī vaḥ havya mantreṇa prokṣayet sarva mandiram
upacāraiḥ samabhyarcya kṣama āsva iti praṇamya ca
mahāhaviḥ prabhūtam vā deveśāya nivedayet

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasraṃ ca bhojayedguruṇā saha // BhS_31.72 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām sahasram ca bhojayet guruṇā saha
gurave dakṣiṇām dadyāt suvarṇam pañca niṣkakam
pradadyāt bhūmim iṣṭām ca pronmiṣat sasya mālinīm
daśa dānam tatas kṛtvā nitya arcanam atha ācaret

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā laghusaṃprokṣaṇaṃ hareḥ // BhS_31.74 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute bhaktyā laghu saṃprokṣaṇam hareḥ
viṣṇu sānnidhyam āpnoti doṣa śāntiḥ ca jāyate
rāja rāṣṭra abhivṛddhiḥ ca jagat puṣṭi karam bhavet
laghu saṃprokṣaṇa vidhiḥ mayā prakhyāpitaḥ kila
kāśyapa ādyaiḥ ca munibhiḥ evam eva pracoditaḥ
mahā saṃprokṣaṇa vidhau viśeṣaḥ vakṣyate mayā
jala adhivāsa rahitam netra unmīlana varjanam
pratiṣṭhā ukta vidhānena sarvam pūrvavat ācaret
netrayoḥ tejane tadvat dṛṣṭi doṣe viśeṣataḥ
jala adhivāsanam kuryāt akṣṇoḥ unmīlanam punar
mahāśānti vidhānasya viśeṣaḥ atra prakīrtitaḥ
jaṅgama pratimāḥ sarvāḥ adhivāsa purassaram
prokṣayitvā vidhānena devam pūrva vat arcayet
mahā nimitte saṃprāpte yajamāna arthitaḥ guruḥ
pratiṣṭhā ukta dine vidvān ṛtvigbhiḥ lakṣaṇa anvitaiḥ
vastraiḥ ābharaṇaiḥ ca api pūrva uktam iva bhūṣitaḥ
prokṣaṇā divasāt sūrvam aṅkura arpaṇam ācaret
dravyāṇi api su saṃbhṛtya yāga śālām praviśya ca
kadalī pūga mālā ādyaiḥ patākā ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtām
tad madhye kalpayet vedim śayana artham vidhānataḥ
tasyāḥ tu pūrva digbhāge kuṃbha vedim sa lakṣaṇam
paritas ca agnikuṇḍān ca paiṇḍarīkam ca kārayet
devālayam ca saṃśodhya mṛṣṭa sikta upalepanaiḥ
ācāryaḥ su prasanna ātmā yajamāna arthitaḥ muhur
snātvā asnāna vidhānena gāyatrīm ca sahasraśas
japtvā dvādaśa sūktāni puṇyāham api vācayet

original: vāstuhomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā kuṇḍe tvaupāsane guruḥ // BhS_31.87 //
analyzed: vāstu homam tatas kṛtvā kuṇḍe tu aupāsane guruḥ
paryagni pañcagavyābhyām saṃśodhya eva ca sarvatas
gārhapatya ādi kuṇḍeṣu kramāt āghāram ācaret

original: tantunā trivṛtā veṣṭya śodhayitvā sudhūpitān // BhS_31.89 //
analyzed: tantunā trivṛtā veṣṭya śodhayitvā su dhūpitān
ādāya mantravat divyam jalam āhṛtya yatnataḥ
pūtābhiḥ adbhiḥ āpūrya nālikera āmra pallavaiḥ
alaṅkṛtya tathā kūrcaiḥ gandha puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ
yavaiḥ vā hrīhibhiḥ vā atha vedyām dvādaśa bhārakaiḥ
āstīrya teṣu saṃsthāpya pṛthak vastreṇa veṣṭayet
sauvarṇa pratimāḥ tatra pañca niṣka kṛtāḥ pṛthak
gaja kūrma ādi rūpāṇi navaratna ādi ca kṣipet
dhyāna mārgeṇa kuṃbheṣu madhyama ādiṣu ca kramāt
nava mūrti krameṇa eva mantreṇa āvāhayet guruḥ
vedi adhastheṣu kuṃbheṣu ceṃ da ādīn aṣṭa dikpatīn
āvāhya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ samabhyarcya nivedayet
sahasra kalaśaiḥ snāpya snapana ukta prakārataḥ
sauvarṇam kautukam baddhvā pratiṣṭhā ukta vidhānataḥ
śayyā vedim samabhyukṣya pañcatalpān prākalpya ca
śāli vrīhi yavaiḥ ca api ṣaṣ bhāraiḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak
tad ardhaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ ca atha tad ardhaiḥ ca tilaiḥ tathā
upari upari ca āstīrya carma ja ādīn samāstaret
śayane śāyayet vedyām autsavam biṃba mukta vat
kūrcādhivāsam kurvīta dhruva mātram yadi kramāt
vedān adhyāpayet dikṣu ṛcām śrutiḥ
gārhapatya ādi kuṇḍeṣu pratiṣṭhā ukta vidhānataḥ
ṛtvigbhiḥ kārayet homam tad tad daivatya pūrvakam
guruḥ sabhya agnim āsādya pariṣicya ca pāvakam
pañca sūktam krameṇa eva mahāvyāhṛti pūrvakam
vyāpaka traya mantram ca viṣṇugāyatriyā punar

original: aṣottaraśataṃ hutvā vyāhṛtyā ca tathaiva ca // BhS_31.102 //
analyzed: aṣottaraśatam hutvā vyāhṛtyā ca tathā eva ca
tatas abjā agnim samāsādya pañca sūktaiḥ saha eva tu
dhātādi mūla homam ca pañca vāruṇa saṃyutam
mahāśānti ukta mantrān ca tris āvartya hunet tatas
kuṃbha vedim samāsādya samabhyarcya aṣṭa vigrahaiḥ

original: spṛṣṭvā kūrcena tatkuṃbhān ṛtvigbhissaha vai guruḥ /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā kūrcena tad kuṃbhān ṛtvigbhiḥ saha vai guruḥ
ātmasūktam japitvā eva pañcasūktam atas param

original: svastisūktaṃ ca daurgaṃ ca rātrimekākṣaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: svasti sūktam ca daurgam ca rātrim eka akṣaram tathā
aṣṭa dikpāla sūktāni pañcaśāntimataḥ param

original: japtvā dvādaśasūktaṃ ca tatassabhyānale kramāt // BhS_31.107 //
analyzed: japtvā dvādaśa sūktam ca tatas sabhya anale kramāt
hautra praśasanam kuryāt sarvam tu pūrvavat

sa apūpaiḥ viṣṇu gāyatṣā hutvā ā kuṇḍeṣu pūrvavat
aṣṭottaraśatam tadvat aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ eva vā

aṣṭāśītim tatas hutvā mahāvyāhṛti pūrvakam
hutvā tad doṣa nāśāya rāja rāṣṭra abhivṛddhaye
sabhya agnim pauṇḍarīka agnim hitvā anyeṣu antahomakam
nṛtta gīta ādi vādyaiḥ ca rātri śeṣam nayet guruḥ
prātar snātvā vidhānena kalaśaiḥ snapanam caret
pañca sūktaiḥ ca saṃsnāpya pañca śānti samanvitam
paścāt devam alaṅkṛtya su vastra ābharaṇa ādikaiḥ
gandha puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiḥ ca yāpat netra manaḥ priyam
muhūrte samanuprāpte kuṃbham ādāya deśikaḥ

original: kṛtvā devāgrataḥ kuṃbhaṃ dhyānyapīṭhe niveśayet // BhS_31.118 //
analyzed: kṛtvā deva agratas kuṃbham dhyānya pīṭhe niveśayet

yajamānaḥ su saṃpūjya paśu bhūmi ādibhiḥ gurum

original: ṛtvigbhyaśca tathā dadyātsuprīto bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_31.121 //
analyzed: ṛtvigbhyaḥ ca tathā dadyāt su prītaḥ bhagavān hariḥ

original: puṣpāñjaliṃ tato datvā “kṣaya'' sveti praṇamya ca // BhS_31.123 //
analyzed: puṣpa añjalim tatas da tvā kṣaya sva iti praṇamya ca

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ekatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre ekatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

prakīrṇakam
atas param pravakṣyāmi jyeṣṭhāyām utsava kramam

original: jyeṣṭhe māsi tu saṃprāpte jyeṣṭhānakṣatra saṃyute // BhS_32.1 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhe māsi tu saṃprāpte jyeṣṭhānakṣatra saṃyute
viṣṇoḥ eva viśeṣaḥ syāt sugandham tailam āharet
taila kramam pravakṣyāmi śruṇudhvam muni puṅgavāḥ
yāga śālām prakalpya eva sarva alaṅkāla saṃyutām

original: sabhyaṃ ca paiṇḍarīkaṃ ca kārayitvā salakṣaṇam // BhS_32.3 //
analyzed: sabhyam ca paiṇḍarīkam ca kārayitvā salakṣaṇam
tad dinasya tu pūrvedyus tṛtīye pañcame api vā
saptame ahani vā ca api aṅkura arpaṇam ācaret
āghāram vidhivat kṛtvā sarva kāryam adaḥ param
vedyāḥ tathā uttare pārśve bhūmyām apaṭam ācaret
catur tāla pramāṇā iva vistāram nimnam eva ca
nimne tu vinyaset bhāṇḍam dvi droṇa parimāṇakam

original: “bhūḥ prati'' ṣṭheti mantreṇa nimne bhāṇḍaṃ sunikṣipet /
analyzed: bhūḥ prati stha iti mantreṇa nimne bhāṇḍam su nikṣipet

original: yāni cātra sugandhīni devayogyāni tāni vai /
analyzed: yāni ca atra sugandhīni deva yogyāni tāni vai

original: guggulaṃ ca samāhṛtya mardayitvāsakṛt sakṛt // BhS_32.8 //
analyzed: guggulam ca samāhṛtya mardayitvā asakṛt sakṛt

original: śarāveṇa pidhāyātha mṛdā ca parilepayet // BhS_32.9 //
analyzed: śarāveṇa pidhāya atha mṛdā ca parilepayet
go karīṣāṇi kāṣṭhāni tasya upari vinikṣipet
manda agninā pacet tat tu yāvat taila āgamam bhavet

original: vāsitāni tu vastūni parihṛtya tu tatra vai // BhS_32.11 //
analyzed: vāsitāni tu vastūni parihṛtya tu tatra vai
sugandhi daila bhāṇḍam ca dhyānya pīṭha upari nyaset
pūrva uktena eva mantreṇa tantunā pariveṣṭayet
pitṝn somam tathā abhyarcya vanatpatim atas param
taile tasmin vidhānena arghya antam abhipūjayet

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca narasūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca narasūktam tathā eva ca
japtvā tu viṣṇugāyatrīm aṣṭottarasahasrakam
ācāryaḥ tvaritaḥ gatvā sabhya agneḥ tu samīpatas

kūrma ākṛti vat ākāram bilva ādyaiḥ parikalpitam

original: devakāryeṣu sarveṣu tathānyeṣu ca karmasu // BhS_32.17 //
analyzed: deva kāryeṣu sarveṣu tathā anyeṣu ca karmasu

original: asīnaḥ kūrmapīṭhe tu sabhyāgnau juhuyāttathā // BhS_32.18 //
analyzed: asīnaḥ kūrma pīṭhe tu sabhya agnau juhuyāt tathā

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca narasūktaṃ tatheva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca narasūktam tathā iva ca
juhuyāt sarva daivatyam pāramātmikam eva ca

paricārakam āhūya yathārham pūjya tam tatas
uṣṇīṣam paricāraka mūrdhani

ācāryam pūjayet tatra gandham ārya anulepanaiḥ
pañcāṅga bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca eva dukūlaiḥ ca navaiḥ tathā
tatas guruḥ prasanna ātmā prayuñjyāt āśiṣaḥ tadā
tat uktam bhagavat proktam pratigṛhṇīyuḥ ādarāt

original: evaṃ kurvīta pratyabdaṃ pavitrāropaṇaṃ hareḥ // BhS_32.111 //
analyzed: evam kurvīta pratyabdam pavitra āropaṇam hareḥ

original: ihaloke sukhībhūtvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: ihaloke sukhībhūtvā sa yāti paramām gatim
priya tām bhagavān viṣṇuḥ prārthanāsu uktam ucyate
śākunam sūktam īritam
svastinaḥ mimī iti uktvā svastisūktam iti smṛtam
śuddhāḥ ime paśavaḥ iti go sūktam samudāhṛtam
ṛtam ca satyam ca ityādi aghamarṣaṇam ucyate
prokṣaṇam īritam
apaḥ hiraṇya varṇāḥ ca pavamāna iti trayaḥ
prokṣaṇam sūktam iti tu kecid vaikalpikam jaguḥ
yā jātā iti mantrāḥ ca oṣadhī sūktam ucyate
kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ ityādi sūktam pratisara āhvayam
atodeva ādi ṣaḍbhiḥ tu vaiṣṇavam sūktam ucyateḥ
atodeva ādi ṣaṣ mantrāḥ āṣ
viṣṇoḥ nu ākā ādi ṣaṣ mantrāḥ viṣṇusūktam udīritam
sahasra śīrṣā puruṣa iti pauruṣasūktakam
hiraṇya varṇā ityādi śrīsūktam sarva kāma dam
bhūmiḥ bhūmne ātyādi mantrāḥ bhūmisūktam udāhṛtam
upa śvāsaya ityādi dundubhī sūktam ucyate
suparṇaḥ asi garutmān ān iti uktam sūktam ca gāruḍam
hiraṇya garbha ityādi brahmasūktam udhṛtam
indram vaḥ viśvatas iti indrasūktam iha ucyate
agne naya iti ā ādi ṣaḍbhiḥ agnisūktam pracakṣate
āyātu deva ityādi yama sūktam prakīrtitam
namaḥ sute nirṛte sūktam nairṛtam ucyate
astabhnāt yām ṛṣabhaḥ iti vāruṇa sūktakam
vṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ iti vāyavam
adbhyaḥ tirodhāḥ ā ityādi kauveram sūktam ucyate
stuhi śrutam garta iti rudrasūktam prakīrtitam
omāsaḥ carṣaṇī ityādi sūktam sārasvatam bhavet
viśvajitedhana iti viśvajit sūktam ucyate
rātrī vyakhya ādityādi rātrisūktam udāhṛtam
jātavedasaḥ ityādi ṣaṣ durgāsu uktam ucyate
ā godānā ā t iti procya godānam sūktam ucyate
eka akṣaram iti procya sūktam eka akṣara ādikam
ātmā ātmā paramā ityādi ātma sūktam prakīrtitam

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣa sūktamataḥ param /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣa sūktam atas param
śrī bhū sūktam ca pañca etam pañca sūktam iha ucyate
viṣṇusūktam nṛsūktam ca śrī bhūsūktam atas param

original: ekākṣarādi sūktaṃ ca pañcasūktaṃ jaguḥpare // BhS_32.131 //
analyzed: eka akṣara ādi sūktam ca pañca sūktam jaguḥ pare

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca śrībhūsūktaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam /
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam nṛsūktam ca śrī bhū sūktam ca vaiṣṇavam
ekākṣara ādi sūktam ca viṣṇugāyatriyā sahā
āhatya saptabhiḥ ca etaiḥ sapta sūktam samīritam

original: rudrasūktaṃ dhruvasūktaṃ durgāsūktaṃ tataḥ param // BhS_32.133 //
analyzed: rudrasūktam dhruvasūktam durgāsūktam tatas param
rātrisūktam tathā sūktam sārasvatam api kramāt
viśvajit sūktam atha ca sahasra śīrṣam iti api
aghamarṣaṇa sūktam ca godānam sūktam eva ca
ātmasūktena saṃyuktam daśamūktam udāhṛtam

original: daśasūktaṃ pañcasūktaṃ kṛtvā saṃhṛtameva ca evaṃ /
analyzed: daśa sūktam pañca sūktam kṛtvā saṃhṛtam eva ca evam
bhavet pañca daśa sūktam iti saṃjñā prabhāṣitā
atas param pravakṣyāmi śruṇudhvam muni sattamāḥ

original: maṇḍalārādhanaṃ nityaṃ puṇyāhaṃ snapanaṃ caret // BhS_32.137 //
analyzed: maṇḍala ārādhanam nityam puṇya aham snapanam caret
maṇḍalam dina pañcakam
puṇyāham vidhivat kṛtvā vrīhibhiḥ taṇḍula upari
navam kalaśam ādāya pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
samabhyarcya japam kuryāt brāhmaṇaiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ
vaiṣṇavam viṣṇusūktam ca puruṣasūktam atas param

original: śrībhūsūktaṃ tathā pañcaśāntiṃ caiva pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_32.140 //
analyzed: śrī bhūsūktam tathā pañcaśāntim ca eva pṛthak pṛthak
catuḥ āvartya japtvā tu snāpayet dhruvam acyutam
tathā eva kautuka ādīn ca snāpayet vidhinā budhaḥ

original: dadhyodanaṃ guḍānnaṃ ca pāyasaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: dadhi odanam guḍa annam ca pāyasam ca viśeṣataḥ
nivedya devadevasya mukha vāsam pradāpayet
ācārya dakṣiṇām dadyāt ṛtvijām ca tathā eva ca
pratiṣṭhā dinam ārabhya maṇḍala antam dinam prati
evam eva krameṇa eva kārayet tu viśeṣataḥ
maṇḍala ardham tu kuryāt śet madhyamam tat pracakṣate
maṇḍala ante viśeṣeṇa kārayet dvija bhojanam
sabhya agnikuṇḍam kṛtvā eva puṇyāham asi vācayet
āghāram vidhivat hutvā vaiṣṇavam sūktam eva ca

original: viṣṇusūktaṃ tato hutvā puruṣasūkta samanvitam // BhS_32.146 //
analyzed: viṣṇusūktam tatas hutvā puruṣasūkta samanvitam
śrī bhūsūktam samuccārya pañcaśāntim atas param
pāramātmikam īṅkāra ādi aṣṭāśītim kramāt hunet
aṣṭa akṣaram samuccārya tathā eva dvādaśa akṣaram
pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā anta homaḥ ca hūyate
saṃsnāpayet śa kalaśaiḥ aṣṭa adhika śataiḥ kramāt
beram
snāpayet na tu
dvādaśa ārādhanam kuryāt madhye madhye vidhānataḥ
grāmam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarva vādya samanvitam
pakṣirāja upari sthāpya rakṣā dīpam ca darśayet
jīvasthāne su saṃsthāpya praṇāmam kārayet tatas
evam yaḥ kurute bhaktyā maṇḍala ārādhanam hareḥ

original: sarvān kāmānavāpyaiva sa yāti paramāṅgatim // BhS_32.152 //
analyzed: sarvān kāmān avāpya eva sa yāti paramām gatim

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre. dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām saṃhitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre dvātriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha trayastriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
arcā avatāra mahattvam
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ
pañcadhā avasthitam rūpam para vyūha ādi bhedataḥ
anugrahāya lokānām bhaktānām anukaṃpayā
para vyūha ādi bhedena devadevaḥ pravartate
ādyena para rūpeṇa vyūha ākhyena itareṇa tu
tathā avibhava rūpeṇa nānābhāvam upeyuṣā
antaryāmi sva rūpeṇa caturthena tathā punar
arcā avatāra rūpeṇa pañcadhā avasthitaḥ hariḥ
anaupama manirdesyam punar sa bhajate param
paran dhāma paran jyotiḥ sarva śakti mayaḥ amalaḥ
nirdvandvaḥ nirvikalpaḥ acchaḥ nityaḥ acintyaḥ sanātanaḥ
aprameyaḥ nirādi antaḥ dṛśyaḥ adṛśyaḥ hi atīndriyaḥ
su sūkṣma tvāt anirdeśyaḥ sarvajñaḥ sat asat vibhuḥ
ānādimat param brahma sarva heya vivarjitam

original: vyāpi yatsarvabhūteṣu sthitaṃ sadasatoḥ param // BhS_33.8 //
analyzed: vyāpi yat sarva bhūteṣu sthitam sat asatoḥ param
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma divya āyudha pariṣkṛtaḥ
sahasra āditya saṃkāśe pakame vyomni saṃsthitaḥ
nityam ukta eka saṃbhāvyaḥ catur bhuja dharaḥ hariḥ
anyūna anata rigtaiḥ svaiḥ guṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ
samaḥ sama vibhakta aṅgaḥ sarva avayava sundaraḥ
divyaiḥ ābharaṇaiḥ yuktaḥ sudhā kallola saṃkulaiḥ
śriyā nitya anapāyinyā sevyamānaḥ jagatpatiḥ
pañca dhātu punar vyūhaḥ procyate śruti sammataḥ
devaḥ viṣṇu ādi bhedā iva pañcadhā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: sa vā eṣa puruṣaḥ pañcadhā pañcātmeti ca śrutiḥ /
analyzed: sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ pañcadhā pañca ātmā iti ca śrutiḥ
tathā popūyamānaḥ pañcabhiḥ sva guṇaiḥ iti
ādi mūrtiḥ tu pañcānām viṣṇuḥ bhedāḥ ca tasya tu
catasraḥ puruṣa ādyāḥ syuḥ mūrtayaḥ bhinna lakṣaṇāḥ
tat viṣṇoḥ śrama apanudāya caturguṇa āya iti caśrutiḥ
tasmāt brahma catuṣpād iti ucyate veda vedibhiḥ
pādāt ardhāt tri pādāt ca kevalāt śakti bhedataḥ
krameṇa dharma jñāna aiśvarya vairāgya ākhyaiḥ guṇaiḥ yutāḥ
bhavanti mūrtayaḥ tasmāt catasraḥ viṣayaiḥ nijaiḥ
cāturātmyāt ādi mūrteḥ catasraḥ tatra mūrtayaḥ
viṣṇuḥ ca eva mahā viṣṇuḥ sadā viṣṇuḥ iti kramāt

original: vyāpī nārāyaṇa iti tannāmāni tataḥkramāt // BhS_33.19 //
analyzed: vyāpī nārāyaṇaḥ iti tad nāmāni tatas kramāt
viṣṇoḥ aṃśaḥ tu puruṣaḥ mahāviṣṇoḥ tu satyakaḥ
sadā viṣṇoḥ acyutaḥ syāt yāpinaḥ aṃśaḥ aniruddhakaḥ
dharma ādibhiḥ brahma guṇaiḥ caturdhā bhedaḥ īritaḥ
tṛtīyam vibhava ākhya antam viśvam antara madhyamam
nānā ākāra kriyā kartṛ rūpam vakṣye mahātmanaḥ
vibhavāḥ matsya kūrma ādyāḥ hayagrīva ādayaḥ matāḥ
antaryāmi svarūpam tu turīyam idam ucyate
nīvāra śūka vat tanvī pīta ābhā syāt tanū upamā
tasyāḥ śikhāyāḥ madhye paramātmā vyavasthitaḥ
iti uktaḥ śruti abhihitaḥ hṛdaya aṃbuja madhyame
jvalat mahā agnau viśva arciḥ jvālā ante viśvatas mukhe
āpādatala cūḍā agram santāpayati santatam

original: śikhā tatra ca pītābhā tanvī nīvāraśūkavat /
analyzed: śikhā tatra ca pīta ābhā tanvī nīvāra śūka vat

original: madhye śikhāyāstasyāśca jyotiḥ prajvalitaṃ mahat // BhS_33.26 //
analyzed: madhye śikhāyāḥ tasyāḥ ca jyotiḥ prajvalitam mahat
sva saṃkalpa viśeṣeṇa tapta jāṃbūnada prabhaḥ
pīta aṃbara dharaḥ saumyaḥ su prasannaḥ śuci smitaḥ
cakra śaṅkha abhaya dharaḥ kaṭi nyasta anya hastakaḥ
śrīvatsa aṃkaḥ mahā bāhuḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ

original: hṛdi tiṣṭhati sarvātmā śrībhūmibhyāṃ ca pārṣadaiḥ // BhS_33.29 //
analyzed: hṛdi tiṣṭhati sarvātmā śrī bhūmibhyām ca pārṣadaiḥ
bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā
antaryāmī iti vijñeyaḥ sarva kāraṇa kāraṇaḥ
anyat arcā svarūpam tu sarva uttara phala pradam
nitya mukta upabhogya tvāt para vyūha ātmanaḥ hareḥ
tad kāla sannikṛṣṭa eka lakṣya tvāt vibhava ātmanaḥ
viśuddhaiḥ yoga saṃsiddhaiḥ cintya tvāt antarātmanaḥ
arcā ātmani eva sarveṣām adhikāraḥ niraṅkuśaḥ
viśeṣa bhakti hetu tvāt pratimā ārādhanam param
arcā avatāraḥ sarveṣām bāndhavaḥ bhakta vatsalaḥ
arcā avatāra viṣaye mayā api uddeśataḥ tathā

original: uktā guṇā na śakyante vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi /
analyzed: uktāḥ guṇāḥ na śakyante vaktum varṣa śataiḥ api
vicitrā deha saṃpattiḥ īśvarāya niveditum
kalpitā brahmaṇā pūrvam hasta pāda ādi saṃyutā

original: mudhaiva jihvā kṛṣṇeti keśaveti na vakṣyati // BhS_33.36 //
analyzed: mudhā eva jihvā kṛṣṇā iti keśava iti na vakṣyati
mudhā cittam natat gāmi yat anyat kim itas adhikam

original: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ keśavārpitam // BhS_33.37 //
analyzed: sā jihvā yā harim stauti tat cittam keśava arpitam
tad karma ca arcanam tasya tad anyat tu nirarthakam
sattā mātram param brahma viṣṇu ākhyam a viśeṣaṇam
durvicintyam yatas pūrvam tad prāpti artham iha ucyate
vāta ūrmi cañcalam cittam anālaṃbanam asthiram
sūkṣma tvāt brahmaṇaḥ ajasya nigrāhyam grāhma dharmaṇaḥ
samyak abhyasyataḥ ajasram upabṛṃhita śaktimat
janmāntara śatasya api brahma grāhī eva jāyate
yadi astarāya doṣeṇa na apakarṣaḥ vicintyate
yoginaḥ yoga rūḍhasya tāla agrāt patanam yathā

original: tadāpnoti paraṃ brahmakleśena mahatāpi ca // BhS_33.42 //
analyzed: tat āpnoti param brahma kleśena mahatā api ca
vijñānena samādhinā
viṣṇu ākhyam brahma duṣprāpam viṣaya ākrānta cetasā
manuṣyeṇa alpa sāreṇa tad prāptau sādhanam tu idam
surūpām pratimām viṣṇoḥ prasanna vadana īkṣaṇām
kṛtvā ātmanaḥ prīti karīm suvarṇa rajata ādibhiḥ
tām arcayet tām vraṇamet tām namet tām vicintayet
viśati apāsta doṣaḥ tu tām eva brahma rūpiṇīm

original: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām sahitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre trayastriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha catustriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi sthala pañcaka kalpanam
devadevaḥ mahā bāhuḥ hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
yena yena prakāreṇa āvirāste dharā tale
arcā avatāra rūpeṇa bhakta saulabhya hetave

original: svayaṃvyaktaṃ ca divyaṃ ca saiddhaṃ paurāṇameva ca /
analyzed: svayam vyaktam ca divyam ca saiddham paurāṇam eva ca

original: pauruṣaṃ ceti kathitaṃ sthalānāṃ pañcakaṃ budhaiḥ // BhS_34.3 //
analyzed: pauruṣam ca iti kathitam sthalānām pañcakam budhaiḥ
svayam vyaktam tu tat proktam yatra asau hari vyayaḥ
sva icchayā bhūmyām āvirbhavet svayam
na tatra devadevasya pratiṣṭhā vidhi sammatā

original: na cāpi karṣaṇaṃ nāpi biṃbaśuddhyādikāḥ kriyāḥ // BhS_34.5 //
analyzed: na ca api karṣaṇam na api biṃba śuddhi ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
biṃbena saha deveśaḥ sannidhatte yatas svayam
vaset bhūmau tāvat kālam samarcitaḥ
svayaṃvyakta sthale pūjā sarva loka śubha pradā
svayam vyakta sthalāni atra catvāri āsata bhū tale
yatra vaikhānasam śāstram āśritya paramam śubham

original: arcayāmo jagadyonimahamanye ca te trayaḥ // BhS_34.8 //
analyzed: arcayāmaḥ jagadyonim aham anye ca te trayaḥ
marīciḥ mandhare viṣṇum arcayāmāsa keśavam
sarva deva uttamam devam śrīnivāse atriḥ arcayat
kāśyapaḥ viṣṇu adhiṣṭhāne śubha kṣetre api aham bhṛguḥ

original: yādṛśīvartate pūjā yā biṃbānāṃ ca saṃsthitiḥ // BhS_34.10 //
analyzed: yādṛśī īva ārtate pūjā yā biṃbānām ca saṃsthitiḥ

original: na kiṃ cittāmatikramya pūrvoktāṃ tu samācaret /
analyzed: na kim cit tām atikramya pūrva uktām tu samācaret
svayam āvirabhūt devaḥ yatra bhakta anukaṃpayā
kartavyam akhilam tatra tad nideśena kalpyate
na vā api ucchāstra karaṇam pravartayati mādhavam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūrvaiḥ ācaritam caret
anyathā ced tu kurvāṇaḥ devāya eva aparādhyati

original: yanmāyāmohitaṃ sarvaṃ yasyāntaṃ ke 'pi no viduḥ /
analyzed: yat māyā mohitam sarvam yasya antam ke api no viduḥ

original: tasya devasya māhātmyaṃ vaktuṃ śaknoti ko bhuvi // BhS_34.14 //
analyzed: tasya devasya māhātmyam vaktum śaknoti kaḥ bhuvi

original: yadyadā caritaṃ tatra tatsarvaṃ śāstrameva hi /
analyzed: yat yadā caritam tatra tat sarvam śāstram eva hi
tatra api ca viśeṣaḥ asti prāyaścitta ādi darśane
sarvam prāmādikam kuryāt tatra śāstram pravartakam

original: śrutismṛtī ubhetasya paramājñāṃ vadanti hī // BhS_34.16 //
analyzed: śruti smṛtī ubhā itasya parama ājñām vadanti hi
svayam vyakta sthale pūjā sarva loka śūbha āvahā
svayam vyaktaḥ jagannāthaḥ tādātmyena śilā ādiṣu
svayam bhakta jana abhīṣṭān vicārya eva prayacchati

original: na hyatra sādhanāpekṣā svayaṃnyaktastato varaḥ // BhS_34.18 //
analyzed: na hi atra sādhana apekṣā svayam nyaktaḥ tatas varaḥ
devaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ yatra hariḥ āvirbabhūva hi
tat didyasthalam uddiṣṭam devaḥ divyaḥ udīryate
smṛtāḥ devāḥ trayastriṃśat tāvat koṭī mitāḥ api

original: sarve te phalakāmāssyurve prapadyante yathā harim // BhS_34.20 //
analyzed: sarve te phala kāmāḥ syuḥ ve prapadyante yathā harim
tān tathā bhajate devaḥ yatas asau karuṇā nidhiḥ

original: phalārthino yadā devāḥ pratiṣṭhyāpya hariṃ kramāt // BhS_34.21 //
analyzed: phala arthinaḥ yadā devāḥ harim kramāt
samabhyarcya ca saṃprāpya vāṃbhitam tad anantaram
loka anugraha hetoḥ vai tādṛśam deva mandiram
cira sthāyi ca saṃkalpya yathārham samapūjayan
divya sthala stha devaḥ hi devānām sannidhāpanāt
atyantam puṣṭivaḥ proktaḥ sarva śānti karaḥ sṛtaḥ
divya sthala stha pūjā tu śata yojana vistṛtam

original: punāti parito deśaṃ nātra saṃdeha iṣyate /
analyzed: punāti paritas deśam na atra saṃdehaḥ iṣyate

original: arcayanti na te grāhyānarāḥ kṛṣṇāśrayoddhatāḥ // BhS_35.20 //
