puṃsām kulam nā avalokyam bhavadbhiḥ duṣṭa cakṣuṣā
yena arcā bhagavat bhaktyā vāsudevasya kāritā
nara ayutam tat kula jam bhavatām śāsana atigam
bhavatām bhramatām atra viṣṇu saṃśraya mudrayā
vinā ājñā bhaṅga kṛt nā eva bhaviṣyati naraḥ kvacid
yajñāḥ narāṇām pāpa ogha kṣālanāḥ sarva kāma dāḥ
tathā evā ijyā jagaddhātuḥ sarva yajña mayaḥ hariḥ
sthāpitam pratimāḥ viṣṇoḥ samyak saṃpūjya mānavaḥ

original: yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnotyasaṃśayam // BhS_35.26 //
analyzed: yam yam kāmayate kāmam tam tam āpnoti asaṃśayam
yathā hi jvalanaḥ vahniḥ tamaḥ hānin tad arthinām
śīta hānin tad anyeṣām svedam sveda abhilāṣiṇām

original: karoti kṣudhitānāṃ ca bhojyāṃ pākakriyāṃ śikhī /
analyzed: karoti kṣudhitānām ca bhojyām pāka kriyām śikhī
tathā eva kāmān bhūteśaḥ sadadāti yathā īpsitam
kalpadrumāt iva hareḥ yat iṣṭam tat avāpyate
yaḥ sat āyatane viṣṇoḥ kurute mārjana kriyām
sa pāṃsu bhumyaiḥ
dehasya sarvam pāpam vyapohāti
yāvantaḥ pāṃsu kaṇikāḥ mārjyante keśava ālaye
varṣāṇi divi tāvante vasati asta malaḥ naraḥ

original: ahanyahani yatpāpaṃ kurute viṣayī naraḥ // BhS_35.31 //
analyzed: ahani ahani yat pāpam kurute viṣayī naraḥ
yaḥ bāhya abhyantaram veśma mārjayet keśavālaye

original: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tasya kāyo niṣkalmaṣo bhavet // BhS_35.32 //
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaram tasya kāyaḥ niṣkalmaṣaḥ bhavet
gocarma mātram sammṛjya hanti tat keśavālaye
sa bāhya abhyantaram yat ca mārjayet acyuta ālaye
sa bāhya abhyantaram tasya kāyam niṣkalmaṣam viduḥ

original: udakābhyukṣaṇaṃ viṣṇoryaḥ karoti satā gṛhe // BhS_35.34 //
analyzed: udaka abhyukṣaṇam viṣṇoḥ yaḥ karoti satā gṛhe
saḥ apigacchati yatra āste bhagavān yādasām patiḥ
mṛdā dhātu vikāraiḥ vā varṇakaiḥ gomayena vā
viṣṇoḥ āyatane nityam yaḥ karoti anu lepanam
pravāte vāti guṇavat varṣāsu ati manoharam
su anuliptam śūbha ākāram sva kṛham labhate naraḥ
pūrṇa dhānya hiraṇya ādi maṇi muktāphala ujjvalam
pratyāsanna jala upetam gṛham prāpnoti śobhanam
sāmanta sva janānām ca sarveṣām uttamottamam
tat āpnoti gṛham ramyam upalepana kṛt naraḥ
yena anulipte tiṣṭanti viṣṇu āyatana bhū tale
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdraḥ sādhvī astriyaḥ tathā

original: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānugāḥ // BhS_35.40 //
analyzed: tasya puṇya phalam vaktum na alam devāḥ saha anugāḥ
apsaraḥ gaṇa saṃkīrṇam muktā hāla śata ujjvalam
śreṣṭham sarva vimānānām svarga dhiṣṇyam avāpnuyāt
yāvantaḥ stithayaḥ liptāḥ divya abdān tāvataḥ naraḥ

original: tasminvimāne sa narastsrī vā tiṣṭhati śobhane // BhS_35.42 //
analyzed: tasmin vimāne sa naraḥ tsrī vā tiṣṭhati śobhane
sraj gandha vastra saṃyuktaḥ sarva bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
gandharva apsarasām saṃghaiḥ pūjyamānaḥ sa tiṣṭhati

original: liptā ca yāvatā hastā viṣṇorāyatane mahī /
analyzed: liptā ca yāvatā hastāḥ viṣṇoḥ āyatane mahī
tāvat yojana vistīrṇa svarga sthāna adhipaḥ bhavet
pūjyamānaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ śīta uṣṇa ādi vivarjitaḥ
manojña gātraḥ vipra indraiḥ tiṣṭhati ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: tat kṣayādiha cāgatya viśiṣṭe jāyate kule /
analyzed: tat kṣayāt iha ca āgatya viśiṣṭe jāyate kule
ati utkṛṣṭa gṛham prāpya martya loke abhivāñchitam
na tatra tāvat dāridṣam na upasargaḥ na vākaliḥ
na tāvat mṛta niṣkrāntiḥ yāvat jīvanti sākṣiṇaḥ
viṣṇuḥ samasta bhūtāni sasarja etāni yāni vai
teṣām madhye jagaddhātuḥ atīva iṣṭā vasuṃdharā
kṛte sammārjane tasyāḥ tathā ca eva anulepane
prayāti paramam toṣam viṣṇuḥ bhūḥ vaiṣṇavīyataḥ
upoṣitaḥ naraḥ nārī yaḥ karoti anulepanam

original: na tasyajāyate bhaṅgo gārhasthye tu kadā ca na // BhS_35.50 //
analyzed: na bhaṅgaḥ gārhasthye tu kadā ca na
yā ca nārī karoti evam yathāvat anulepanam

original: nāpnoti sāpi vaidhavyaṃ gṛhabhaṅgaṃ kadā ca na // BhS_35.51 //
analyzed: nā āpnoti sā api vaidhavyam gṛha bhaṅgam kadā ca na
sarva ābharaṇa saṃpūrṇaḥ sarva upaskara dhānyavān
go mahiṣī ādi saṃbhāgam gṛham āpnoti mānava
tasmāt abhīpsatā samyak gārhasthyam tat akhaṇḍitam
viṣṇoḥ āyatane kāryam sahasā vā upalepanam
yaḥ ca anulepanam kuryāt viṣṇoḥ āyatane naraḥ

original: so 'pi lokaṃ samāsādya modatevai śatakratoḥ // BhS_35.54 //
analyzed: saḥ api lokam samāsādya modata ivai śatakratoḥ
puṣpa prakīrṇam atyartham su gandham keśava ālaye

original: upalipte naro datvā na durgatimavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.55 //
analyzed: upalipte naraḥ da tvā na durgatim avāpnuyāt
snāna pāna aṃbhasām viṣṇoḥ pradānāt tad sa loka bhāj
snānīya dravya dānena nīrogaḥ prītya modate
kṣauma ādi dānāt āpnoti para loke mahat sukham
ālepana dravya dānāt kāmān āpnoti śāśvatān
elā karpūra tāṃbūlī taila ādi sparśanāt pukhī
paratra iha ca loke syāt dīrgha kālam asaṃśayaḥ
sarva yajña mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ gavyānām paramaḥ smṛtaḥ
jāyate yeṣu lokeṣu pulakaḥ saṃgamaḥ mahān
yeṣu kṣīra vahāḥ nadyaḥ hradāḥ pāyasa kardamāḥ

original: tān lokān puruṣā yāntikṣīrasnānakarā hareḥ // BhS_35.60 //
analyzed: tān lokān puruṣāḥ yānti kṣīra snāna karāḥ hareḥ
āhgādam nirvṛtim svāsthyam ārogyam cāru rūpa tā
sapta janmāni avāpnoti kṣīra snāna karaḥ hareḥ
dadhi ādīnām vikārāṇām kṣīrataḥ saṃbhavaḥ yathā
tathā eva aśeṣa kāmānām kṣīra snāpanataḥ hareḥ

original: yathā ca vimalaṃ kṣīraṃ yathā nirvṛtikārakam /
analyzed: yathā ca vimalam kṣīram yathā nirvṛti kārakam
tathā asya nirmalam jñānam bhavati ati phala pradam
graha anukūla tām puṣṭim priyam ca api akhile jane
karoti bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kṣīra snāpana toṣitaḥ
sarvaḥ asi a snigdha tām eti dṛṣṭimāt prāt prasīdati

original: yassnāpayati devasya ghṛtena pratimāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.65 //
analyzed: yaḥ snāpayati devasya ghṛtena pratimām hareḥ

original: indraprasthe dvijāgṣāṇāṃ sa dadāti gavāṃ śatam /
analyzed: indraprasthe dvijāgṣāṇām sa dadāti gavām śatam

original: gavāṃ śatasya viprāṇāṃ na dattasya bhavetphalam // BhS_35.66 //
analyzed: gavām śatasya viprāṇām na dattasya bhavet phalam
ghṛta prasthena tat viṣṇoḥ labhet snāna upayoginām

original: purā rājarṣibhiḥ prāptā saptadvīpā vasundharā // BhS_35.67 //
analyzed: purā rājarṣibhiḥ prāptā sapta dvīpā vasundharā
ghṛta āḍhakena govinda pratimā snāpanāt kila

original: pratimāsaṃ sitāṣṭamyāṃ ghṛtena jagataḥ patim // BhS_35.68 //
analyzed: pratimāsam sita aṣṭamyām ghṛtena jagataḥ patim
snāpayitvā samastebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ api pramucyate

original: dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca gavyena haviṣā hareḥ // BhS_35.69 //
analyzed: dvādaśyām paurṇamāsyām ca gavyena haviṣā hareḥ
snāpanam devadevasya mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi yatpāpaṃ kurute naraḥ // BhS_35.70 //
analyzed: jñānataḥ ajñānataḥ vā api yat pāpam kurute naraḥ
tat kṣālayati saṃdhyāyām ghṛtena snāpayan harim
ghṛta kṣīreṇa deveśe snāpite madhusūdane

original: sa gatvāvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma modate saha sūribhiḥ /
analyzed: sa gatvā avaiṣṇavam dhāma modate saha sūribhiḥ

original: srajaṃ baddhvā sumanasāṃ yaḥ prayacchati viṣṇave // BhS_35.72 //
analyzed: srajam baddhvā sumanasām yaḥ prayacchati viṣṇave
sa bhuktvā vipulān bhogān nāka pṛṣṭhe virājate
cāmara vyajana chatra dānāt svārājyam aśnu te
dānāt ābharaṇa ādīnām tejasvī divi modate
dānāt ca deva sālokyam aśnute
ādarśana pradānena dṛśyaḥ sarvaiḥ bhaviṣyati
gandha dravya pradānena
dhūpa dravya pradānena sva sthānam svargiṇām bhavet

original: upānahau pāduke ca vāhanaṃ yānameva ca // BhS_35.76 //
analyzed: upānahau pāduke ca vāhanam yānam eva ca
dadāti yaḥ saṃdayitvā
maṇi kāñcana citritam

original: sa vimānaṃ tu dutprāpaṃ prāpno tyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.77 //
analyzed: sa vimānam tu dutprāpam prāpnoti eva na saṃśayaḥ
alaṅkṛtam bhadrapīṭham prayacchan sarva kāma bhāj
vinatā nandana sthānam dhvajam utpādya darśayan

original: sāmīpyaṃ sahasā viṣṇoryāti sadyo sa saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sāmīpyam sahasā viṣṇoḥ yāti sadyo sa saṃśayaḥ

original: dhvajaṃ ca vādyamutpādya viṣṇusātkurute tu yaḥ // BhS_35.79 //
analyzed: dhvajam ca vādyam utpādya viṣṇusāt kurute tu yaḥ
sa divya dundubhi prāyan sthānam prāpya virājate

original: dāsīdāsaṃ tathātmāna mātmīyaṃ ca prayacchali // BhS_35.80 //
analyzed: dāsī dāsam ca
vāsudevāya dāsyena muktiḥ kara tale sthitā
nṛtta bhedaiḥ gīta bhedaiḥ tathā vādyaiḥ anekathā
śrotavyaiḥ api dṛśyaiḥ ca devadevasya sannidhau
āsīnam upacāraiḥ taiḥ ye samārādhayanti te
pretya divyeṣu lokeṣu pūjyante etaiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: dīpaṃ prayacchati naro viṣṇorāyatane hi yaḥ // BhS_35.83 //
analyzed: dīpam prayacchati naraḥ viṣṇoḥ āyatane hi yaḥ
sa dakṣiṇasya yajñasya phalam prāpnoti asaṃśayaḥ
āhorātram anirvāṇam dīpam āropayet naraḥ
sarva pāpa viśuddha ātmā viṣṇu loke mahīyate
dine dine japan nāma keśava iti samāhitaḥ
sakṛt dadāti yaḥ vipraḥ pradīpam keśavālaye

original: jātismaratvaṃ prajñāṃ ca prākāśyaṃ sarvavantuṣu // BhS_35.86 //
analyzed: jāti smara tvam prajñām ca prākāśyam sarva vantuṣu
avyāhata indriya tvam ca samāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ

original: sarvakālaṃ ca cakṣuṣmān medhāvī dīpado naraḥ // BhS_35.87 //
analyzed: sarvakālam ca cakṣuṣmān medhāvī dīpa daḥ naraḥ

original: jāyate narakaṃ cāpi tamassaṃjñaṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: jāyate narakam ca api tamaḥ saṃjñam na paśyati
suvarṇa maṇi muktā āḍhyam manojñam ati śobhanam
dīpa mālā ākulam divyam vimānam adhirohati
tasmāt āyatane viṣṇoḥ dadyāt dīpam prayatnataḥ
tān cadatvā anna hīnaḥ te
na ca taila viyojanam

original: kurvīta dīpahartāca mūkū'ndho jāyate jaḍaḥ // BhS_35.90 //
analyzed: kurvīta dīpa hartā aca mūkū andhaḥ jāyate jaḍaḥ
andhetamasi duṣpāre narake patitān kila
vikrośamānān manujān vakṣyanti yama kiṅkarāḥ
vilāpaiḥ ala kiṃvas vilapite phalam
tathā pramādibhiḥ pūrvam ātmā atyantam upekṣitaḥ
purvam ālocitam na etat katham ante bhaviṣyati

original: idānīṃ yātanā bhaugāḥkiṃ vilāpaḥ kariṣyati // BhS_35.93 //
analyzed: idānīm yātanā bhaugāḥ kim vilāpaḥ kariṣyati
deha uditāni su alpāni viṣayāḥ ca atikarṣakāḥ

original: etatkona vijānāti yena yūyaṃ pramādinaḥ // BhS_35.94 //
analyzed: vijānāti yena yūyam pramādinaḥ
jantuḥ janma sahasrebhyaḥ hi ekasmin mānuṣaḥ yadi
tatra api ati vimāḍha tvāt kiṃbhogān abhidhāvati
kaḥ atibhāraḥ hareḥ nāmni jihvayā parikīrtite
varṇite tulya mūle tu yat agniḥ labhyate sukham
atas adhika rolābhaḥ abhavat tathā
yena āyateṣu hasteṣu dīpakaḥ
mahā phalaḥ viṣṇu gṛhe na dattaḥ naraka apahāḥ

original: na vo vilapite kiṃ cididānīṃ dṛśyate phalam // BhS_35.98 //
analyzed: na vaḥ vilapite kim cit idānīm dṛśyate phalam
a svātantṣe vilapatām svātantṣe tu pramādinām
avaśyaṃpātinaḥ prāṇāḥ bhoktā jīvaḥ api aharniśam
dattam ca labhate bhoktum kāmayan viṣayān tadā
etat svātantṣavadbhiḥ vaḥ yuktam āsīt parīkṣitum
idānīm kim vilāpena sahadhvam yat upāgatam
yadi etat anabhīṣṭam vaḥ yat duḥkham samupasthitam

original: yadbhūyo 'pi matiḥ pāpe na kartavyā kathaṃ ca na /
analyzed: yat bhūyas api matiḥ pāpe na kartavyā katham ca na
pāpa karmaṇi nirvṛtte api ajñānāt agha nāśanam
kartavyam api avicchinnam smaradbhiḥ madhusūdanam
vimānam ati vidyoti sarva ratna mayam divi
samāpnoti naraḥ da tvā pradīpam keśavālaye

original: haviṣāṃ pāyasādīnāṃ haraye ca nivedanāt // BhS_35.104 //
analyzed: haviṣām pāyasa ādīnām haraye ca nivedanāt
rājate viṣṇu sannidhau
bhakṣya pānīya bhojyānām anyeṣām api dānataḥ
śvetadvīpe tad samīpe vasanti sukhinaḥ sadā
bahunā atra kim uktena vāsudeva artham ādarāt
dadāti vastu dānam
prāpnoti ca īpsitam
karmaṇām mārjana ādīnām phala bhogāt anantaram
karma śeṣaiḥ punarjanma karma anuguṇa yoniṣu
utkṛṣṭa asvena bhoktāraḥ labhante sukhinaḥ sadā
ārāmāṇām taṭākānām prapāṇām ca pravartanāt
viṣṇoḥ ālaya sāmīpye tad phalam kena varṇyate
su pradarśā balavatī citrā dhātu vibhūṣitā
upetā sarva bhūtaiḥ ca śreṣṭhā bhūmiḥ iha ucyate
tasyāḥ kṣetra viśeṣāḥ ca taṭākānām ca bandhanam
audakāni ca sarvāṇi pravakṣyāmi anupūrvaśas

original: taṭākānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ /
analyzed: taṭākānām ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānām ca api ye guṇāḥ

original: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjanīyaḥ pratāpavān // BhS_35.112 //
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjanīyaḥ pratāpavān
atha vā mitra sadanam maitram mitra vivardhanam
kīrti saṃjananam śreṣṭham taṭākānām niveśanam
dharmasya arthasya kāmasya phalam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
taṭākam su kṛtam deśe kṣetram ekam mahā āśrayam
caturvidhānām bhūtānām taṭākam upalakṣayet

original: taṭākāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyamuttamām // BhS_35.115 //
analyzed: taṭākāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyam uttamām
devāḥ manuṣyāḥ gandharvāḥ pitaraḥ yakṣa rākṣasāḥ

original: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam // BhS_35.116 //
analyzed: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam
tasmāt tān tu pravakṣyāmi taṭāke ye guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
yā ca tatra phala avāptiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā

original: varṣākāle taṭāke tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: varṣā kāle taṭāke tu salilam yasya tiṣṭhati
agnihotra phalam tasya phalam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: śaratkā le tu salilaṃ taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: śarad kā le tu salilam taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati
go sahasrasya saṃpretya labhate phalam uttamam
hemanta kāle salilam taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati

original: sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam // BhS_35.120 //
analyzed: sa vai bahu suvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam

original: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taṭāke salilaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taṭāke salilam bhavet
tasya agniṣṭoma yajñasya bhalam ūhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
taṭākam su kṛtam yasya vasanta itam mahā āśrayam

original: atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ sa samupāśnute // BhS_35.122 //
analyzed: atirātrasya yajñasya phalam sa samupāśnute
nidāgha kāle pānīyam taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati

original: vājimedhapalaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ // BhS_35.123 //
analyzed: vājimedha palam tasya phalam vai munayaḥ viduḥ

original: sa kulaṃ tārayetsarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye /
analyzed: sa kulam tārayet sarvam yasya khāte jalāśaye

original: gāvaḥ pibanti salilaṃ sādhavaśca narāssadā // BhS_35.124 //
analyzed: gāvaḥ pibanti salilam sādhavaḥ ca narāḥ sadā

original: taṭāke yasya gāvastu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam /
analyzed: taṭāke yasya gāvaḥ tu pibanti tṛṣitāḥ jalam
mṛga pakṣi manuṣya āśya saḥ aśvamedha phalam labhet
yat pibanti jalam tatra styāyante viśramanti ca
taṭākadasya tat sarvam pretya ānantyāya kalpate

original: durlabhaṃ salilaṃ ceha viśeṣeṇa paratra vai /
analyzed: durlabham salilam ca iha viśeṣeṇa paratra vai
pānīyasya pradānena prītiḥ bhavati śāśvatī
taṭāke yasya pānīyam pānīyāya jagatpateḥ

original: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānu gāḥ // BhS_35.128 //
analyzed: tasya puṇya phalam vaktum na alam devāḥ saha anu gāḥ
taṭāke yasya pānīye sāyam prātar dvijātayaḥ

original: snātvā kurvanti karmāṇi tasya nākesthitirbhavet // BhS_35.129 //
analyzed: snātvā kurvanti karmāṇi tasya
taṭāke yasya devasya snāpanam ca adhivāsanam

original: tasya lokā bhavantyeva pāvanāḥ kṣativarjitāḥ // BhS_35.130 //
analyzed: tasya lokāḥ bhavanti eva pāvanāḥ kṣati varjitāḥ
sarva dānaiḥ gurutaram sarva dānaiḥ viśiṣyate
pānīya āvāsa dānam tu devasya agre praśasyate
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa vṛkṣāṇām avaropaṇam

original: sthānarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaṣṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ // BhS_35.132 //
analyzed: sthānarāṇām ca bhūtānām jātayaḥ ṣaḍ prakīrtitāḥ
tvac cārāḥ tṛṇa jātayaḥ

original: etā jātyastu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇāstvime // BhS_35.133 //
analyzed: etāḥ jātyaḥ tu vṛkṣāṇām teṣām rope guṇāḥ tu ime

original: kīrtiśca mānave loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham /
analyzed: kīrtiḥ ca mānave loke pretya ca eva phalam śubham

original: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiśca mahīyate // BhS_35.134 //
analyzed: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiḥ ca mahīyate
deva loka gatasya api na naśyati
atīte anāgate ca ubhe pitṛ vam śe anyatas tathā
tārayet vṛkṣa rūpī ca tasmāt vṛkṣān ca ropayet

original: tasya putrā bhavantyete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.136 //
analyzed: tasya putrāḥ bhavanti ete pādapāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
para loka gataḥ svargam lokān ca āpnoti saḥ avyayān

original: puṣpaissuragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiścāpi tathā pitṛn // BhS_35.137 //
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ sura gaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiḥ ca api tathā pitṛn
cāyayā ca atithīn ca api pūjayanti mahīruhāḥ
kinnara uraga rakṣāṃsi deva gandharva mānavāḥ
tathā ṛṣi gaṇāḥ ca eva saṃśrayanti mahīruhān
puṣpitāḥ phalavantaḥ ca tarpayanti iha mānavān
vṛkṣa dam putra vat vṛkṣāḥ tārayanti paratra tu

original: patraṃ phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yasyārāme 'varopite // BhS_35.140 //
analyzed: patram phalam vā puṣpam vā yasya ārāme avaropite
acyutasya padam prāptam lokāḥ tasya acyutāḥ dhruvam

original: patraiḥphalair vāpuṣpairvā prīyate bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.141 //
analyzed: patraiḥ phalaiḥ vā a puṣpaiḥ vā prīyate bhagavān hariḥ
tasmāt taṭa āre tad vṛkṣāḥ ropyāḥ śreyaḥ ṛthinā sadā
putra vat paripālyāḥ ca putrāḥ te dharmataḥ smṛtāḥ
taṭāka kṛt vṛkṣa ropī iṣṭa yajñaḥ ca yaḥ naraḥ

original: ete svarge mahīyante ye cānye satyavādinaḥ // BhS_35.143 //
analyzed: ete svarge mahīyante ye ca anye satya vādinaḥ
tasmāt taṭākān kurvīta ārāmān ca eva ropayet

original: yajecca vividhairyajñaissatyaṃ ca satataṃ vadet // BhS_35.144 //
analyzed: yajet ca vividhaiḥ yajñaiḥ satyam ca satatam vadet
go bhū hiraṇya dānāni kṛtvā ācāryāya viṣṇave
arcakāya viśeṣeṇa svar gataḥ sukham edhate
atidānam tu sarveṣām bhūmi dānam iha ucyate

original: acalā hyakṣayo bhūmissarvān kāmān prayacchati // BhS_35.146 //
analyzed: acalā hi akṣayaḥ bhūmiḥ sarvān kāmān prayacchati
yaḥ tu dadyāt bhūmi dānam

original: tasyaihikaṃ bhavetpuṇyaṃ tathā pāratrikaṃ bahu // BhS_35.147 //
analyzed: tasya aihikam bhavet puṇyam tathā pāratrikam bahu
yaḥ tu dadyāt sva nāmnā eva pūjakāya vasuṃdharām
tasya kāmāḥ prarohanti sarvam aihikam aśnute
deva kāryāya vaidadyāt yaḥ devāya vasundharām
deva nāmnā eva tasya syāt kevala āmuṣmikam phalam

original: brahmārpaṇadhiyā yastu guptaṃ dāsyati kiṃ cana /
analyzed: brahma arpaṇa dhiyā yaḥ tu guptam dāsyati kim cana
devāya deva kāryāya brāhmaṇāya adhikāriṇe
yāvat jīvati tat dānam svarga itasya sthitiḥ bhavet

original: yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ tu manasi kṛtvā yadyacca yor'payet // BhS_35.151 //
analyzed: yam yam kāmam tu manasi kṛtvā yat yat ca
tam tam eva phalam labdhvā a kartā a sammodate ciram
kim alabhyam bhagavati prasanne śrīniketane
ācāryāya arpitā bhūmiḥ atyanta phala dāyinī
dadyāt anantam phalam ucyate
padārthinām atha anveṣām tathā anya vibhavasya ca

original: sarvameva bhaveddattaṃ vasudhāṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.154 //
analyzed: sarvam eva bhavet dattam vasudhām yaḥ prayacchati
phāla kṛṣṭām mahīm dadyāt sa bījām sasya mālinīm
yāvat sūrya karāḥ loke tāvat svarge mahīyate
phāla kṛṣṭām mahīm dadyāt sa bījām sasya mālinīm
yāvat sūrya karāḥ loke tāvat svarge mahīyate
yaḥ ca api kurute pāpam puruṣaḥ vṛtti karśitaḥ
api gokarṇa mātreṇa bhūmi dānena śuddhi ati
sapta hastena vā samyak triṃśat daṇḍena vardhanam

original: sa śatānyeva gokarṇamiti vedavido vidaḥ // BhS_35.158 //
analyzed: sa śatāni eva go karṇam iti veda vidaḥ vidaḥ
jita indrayāya guṇine pūjakāya tapasvine
dadyāt mahīm bhadet tasya phalam akṣayam acyutam
yathā apsu patitaḥ sadyas taila binduḥ prarohati

original: evaṃ bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye prarohati // BhS_35.160 //
analyzed: evam bhūmi kṛtam dānam sasye sasye prarohati
yathā bījāni rohanti prakīrṇāni mahī tale
evam kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmi dāna samārjitāḥ
yathā gauḥ bharate vatsam kṣīriṇī kṣīram utsṛjet

original: evaṃ dattāciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmirbharati bhūmidam // BhS_35.162 //
analyzed: evam dattā aciram kālam bhūmiḥ bharati bhūmi dam
ikṣubhiḥ satatām bhūmim yava godhūma śādvalaiḥ

original: yo dadāti naraśreṣṭhassa na pracyavate divaḥ // BhS_35.163 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadāti nara śreṣṭhaḥ sa na pracyavate divaḥ
śubham bhadrāsanam chatram varāḥ ca vara yoṣitaḥ
bhūmi dānasya cihnāni phalam etat na saṃśayaḥ
āditya vasavaḥ viṣṇuḥ brahmā somaḥ hutāśanaḥ
śūlapāṇiḥ ca bhagavān abhinandanti bhūmi dam
sauvarṇa chatra hakmyāṇi vasordhārāḥ ca kāma dāḥ

original: gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra tiṣṭhanti bhūmidāḥ // BhS_35.166 //
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ yatra tatra tiṣṭhanti bhūmi dāḥ
iyam eva purā bhūmiḥ pālitā bahubhiḥ nṛpaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ dattāḥ rājabhiḥ satya saṃgaraiḥ

original: yasya yasya yadā bhūmi stasya tasya tadā phalam /
analyzed: yasya yasya yadā bhūmiḥ stasya tasya tadā phalam

original: bhūmiṃ yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti yaśca bhūmiṃ prayacchati // BhS_35.168 //
analyzed: bhūmim yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti yaḥ ca bhūmim prayacchati
tau ubhau puṇya karmāṇau niyatau svarga gāminau
dāna pālanayoḥ madhye dānāt śreyaḥ anupālanam
dānāt svargam avāpnoti pālanāt acyutam padam
sva dattāt dviguṇam puṇyam para datta anupālanam
bhūmi daḥ svargam āruhya śāsvatīḥ edhate samāḥ

original: punaśca janma saṃpāpya bhavedbhūmi patirdhruvam // BhS_35.171 //
analyzed: punar ca janma saṃpāpya bhavet bhūmi patiḥ dhruvam

original: yathā bhūmissadā devī dātāraṃ kurute patim /
analyzed: yathā bhūmiḥ sadā devī dātāram kurute patim
evam sa dakṣiṇā dattā ākurute gauḥ janādhipam
api pāpa kṛtam prāpya pratigṛhṇāti bhūmi dam

original: mahīṃ dadatpavitrassyātpuṇyā ca jagatī yataḥ // BhS_35.173 //
analyzed: mahīm dadat pavitraḥ syāt puṇyā ca jagatī yatas
nāma eva priya dattā iti guhyām etat sanātanam
tat asyāḥ satatam prītyā e kīrtanīyā prayacchatā
tapaḥ yajña āśritam śīlam alobhaḥ satya vādi tā
guru daivata pūjā ca na atikrāmati bhūmi dam
bhartuḥ niśśreyase yuktāḥ styakta ātma ādoraṇe hatāḥ
brahma loka gatāḥ santaḥ na atikrāmanti bhūmi dam

original: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa puṣṇāti svasutaṃ mudā /
analyzed: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa puṣṇāti sva sutam mudā
evam sarva guṇaiḥ bhūmiḥ dātāram anupuṣyati
agniṣṭoma ādibhiḥ yajñaiḥ iṣṭvā vipula dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: na tatphalamavāpnoti yaddatvā vasudhāṃ punaḥ // BhS_35.178 //
analyzed: na tat phalam avāpnoti yat datvā vasudhām punar
mṛtyoḥ hi kiṅkarāḥ daṇḍāḥ hi agni tāpāḥ su dāruṇāḥ

original: ghorāśca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam // BhS_35.179 //
analyzed: ghorāḥ ca vāruṇāḥ pāśāḥ na upasarpanti bhūmi dam
pītaraḥ pitṛ loka sthāḥ deva loke divaukasaḥ
santarpayanti dātāram bhūmeḥ prabhavatām naraḥ

original: ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā di mānavāḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ iva dīpyante tejasā di mānavāḥ

original: ye prayacchanti vasudhāṃ haraye lokasākṣiṇe // BhS_35.181 //
analyzed: ye prayacchanti vasudhām haraye lokasākṣiṇe
kṛśāya kṛśa bhṛtyāya vṛttim kṣīṇāya sīdate
devāgreḥ apyatu viprāya su śrīḥ bhavati mānavaḥ
āsphoṭayanti pitaraḥ pranṛtya ni pitāmahāḥ
bhūmi daḥ naḥ kule jātaḥ savaḥ santārayiṣyati

original: sa naḥ kulasya puruṣassano bandhussano guruḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ kulasya puruṣaḥ sanaḥ bandhuḥ sanaḥ guruḥ

original: sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām // BhS_35.184 //
analyzed: sa dātā sa ca vikrāntaḥ yaḥ dadāti vasuṃdharām
lokān tu sṛjatā pūrvam gāvaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
vṛddhi artham sarva bhūtānām tasmāt tāḥ mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ
tāḥ tuda tvā saurabheyīḥ svarge loke mahīyate

original: dhenuṃ datvā suvratāṃ ca sopadhānāṃ payasvinīm // BhS_35.186 //
analyzed: dhenum da tvā suvratām ca sa upadhānām payasvinīm
sa vatsām kapilām divyām ācāryāya arcakāya ca

original: devadevasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ devāya brāhmaṇāya vā // BhS_35.187 //
analyzed: devadevasya tuṣṭi artham devāya brāhmaṇāya vā

original: na tasya śakyate vaktuṃ phalaṃ varṣaśatairapi /
analyzed: na tasya śakyate vaktum phalam varṣa śataiḥ api
yāvanti dhenvā alomāni vatsāyāḥ ca viśeṣataḥ

original: tāvadvarṣa sahasrāṇi kāmān duhyeta sā varā /
analyzed: tāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi kāmān duhyeta sā varā
prayacchate yaḥ kapilām sa vatsām kāṃsya johanām
svarṇa śruṅgīm raupya khurām taiḥ taiḥ dravya guṇaiḥ punar

original: sā gauḥ kāmadughā bhūtvā dātāramupasarpati // BhS_35.190 //
analyzed: sā gauḥ kāmadughā bhūtvā dātāram upasarpati
go sahasram tu yaḥ dadyāt sarva ratnaiḥ alaṅkṛtam

original: parāṃ vṛddhiṃśriyaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate // BhS_35.191 //
analyzed: parām vṛddhiṃśriyam prāpya svarga loke mahīyate
daśa ca ubhayatas pretya mātā maha pitāmahāḥ

original: gacchetsukṛtināṃ lokān gāvo datvā yathāvidhi // BhS_35.192 //
analyzed: gacchet su kṛtinām lokān gāvaḥ da tvā yathāvidhi
dāyādya labdhaiḥ yoga ādyaiḥ gāvaḥ sampādya yaḥ dadet

original: tasyāpi cākṣayā lokā bhavantīha paratra ca // BhS_35.193 //
analyzed: tasya api ca akṣayāḥ lokāḥ bhavanti iha paratra ca

original: yo vā dyūte dhanaṃ jitvāgāvaḥkrītvā prayacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ vā dyūte dhanam jitvā a gāvaḥ krītvā prayacchati
sa gacchet virajān lokān go pradāna phala arjitān
pratigṛhyatu yaḥ dadyāt gāvaḥ śuddhena cetasā

original: sa gatvā durlabhaṃ sthānamamaraissaha modate // BhS_35.195 //
analyzed: sa gatvā durlabham sthānam amaraiḥ saha modate
yaḥ ca ātma vikrayam kṛtvā gāvaḥ dadyāt yadhāvidhi

original: sa gatvā virajān lokān sukhaṃ vasati devavat // BhS_35.196 //
analyzed: sa gatvā virajān lokān sukham vasati deva vat
saṃgrāme yaḥ tanum tyaktvā tvaktvā gāvaḥ prayacchati
deha vikraya mūlyāḥ tāḥ śśāśvatāḥ kāma dohanāḥ
jīrṇām jarat gām śīla varjitām

original: tamaḥ praviśate datvā dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet // BhS_35.198 //
analyzed: tamaḥ praviśate da tvā dvijam kleśena yojayet
dāna yogyā kṛśā duṣṭā palāyinī

original: yuñjyātlkeśaistu yo vipraṃ datvaināṃ tadvṛdhā bhavet // BhS_35.199 //
analyzed: yuñjyāt keśaiḥ tu yaḥ vipram da tvā enām tad vṛdhā bhavet

original: yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ halena saha yūthapam /
analyzed: yuvānam balinam śyāmam halena saha yūthapam
gopatim haraye dadyāt bhūri śruṅgam alaṅkṛtam

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kulamekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam /
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām gavām ca eva kulam ekam dvidhā kṛtam

original: ekatra mantrā stiṣṭhanti havirekatra tiṣṭhati // BhS_35.201 //
analyzed: ekatra mantrāḥ stiṣṭhanti haviḥ ekatra tiṣṭhati
upagamya tu yaḥ dadyāt gāvaḥ śuddhena cetasā
yāvanti tāsām romāṇi tāvat svarge mahīyate
pravakṣyāmi gavām lokāḥ yādṛśāḥ yatra saṃsthitāḥ
manojñāḥ ramaṇīyāḥ ca sarva kāmaduhāḥ sadā
puṇyāḥ pāpa harāḥ ca iva gavām lokāḥ na saṃśayaḥ
atyanta sukhinaḥ tatra sarva pāpa vivarjitāḥ
pramodante mahāsthsāne narāḥ vigata kalmaṣāḥ

original: tulyaprabhāvā devaiste modante psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // BhS_35.205 //
analyzed: tulya prabhāvāḥ devaiḥ te modante psarasām gaṇaiḥ
gandharvaiḥ upagīyante go śaraṇyāḥ na saṃśayaḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ sādhu vṛttāḥ ca dayāvantaḥ anukaṃpakāḥ
ghṛṇinaḥ śubha kartāraḥ modante daivataiḥ saha

original: yathaiva salile matsyassalilena sahoṣya te // BhS_35.207 //
analyzed: yathā eva salile matsyaḥ salilena saha uṣya te
gobhiḥ pāpa kṛtam karma dṛḍham eva vyapohyate
mātaraḥ sarva bhūtānām prajānām rakṣaṇe kṛtāḥ
brahmāṇā loka sāreṇa gāvaḥ pāpa bhaya apahāḥ

original: tānu dattāsu loke 'smin kiṃ na dattaṃ bhavediha // BhS_35.209 //
analyzed: tān u dattāsu loke asmin kim na dattam bhavet iha
deveśāya viśeṣeṇa tad kriyāya tathā punar
pratipādyāḥ sadā gānaḥ bhūtim sbhārām abhīpsubhiḥ

original: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā /
analyzed: suvarṇam paramam dānam suvarṇam dakṣiṇā parā
etat pavitram paramam etat svastyayanam mahat
daśa pūrvān parān vaṃśyān ātmānam ca viśeṣataḥ

original: apipāpaśataṃ kṛtvā dattaṃ vipriṣu tārayet // BhS_35.212 //
analyzed: apipāpa śatam kṛtvā dattam vipriṣu tārayet
suvarṇam ye prayacchanti narāḥ śuddhā iva cetasā
devatāḥ te prayacchanti samastam iti naḥ śrutam
agniḥ hi devatāḥ sarvāḥ suvarṇam ca hutāśanaḥ
tasmāt suvarṇam dadatā dattāḥ sarvāḥ ca devatāḥ

original: agnyabhāve ca kurvanti vahnisthāne ca kāñcanam /
analyzed: agni abhāve ca kurvanti vahni sthāne ca kāñcanam
sarva deva pramāṇa jñāḥ veda śruti nidarśanāt
yaḥ tu enam jvalayet agnim āditya udayanam prati
dadyāt vai devam uddiśya sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
suvarṇa daḥ sarva loke kāmān iṣṭān avāpnute
viraja aṃbara saṃvītaḥ pariyāti tatas tatas
vimānena arka varṇena bhāsvareṇa virājatā
apsaraḥ gaṇa saṃkīrṇaḥ bhāsvaraḥ tena tejasā
haṃsa barhiṇa yuktena kāmagena nara uttamaḥ
divya gandha vahaḥ svarge parigacchan itas tatas
tasmāt sva śaktyā dātavyam kāñcanam mānavaiḥ bhuvi
vimānena arka varṇena sa yāti svargam uttamam

original: na hyataḥ paramaṃ loke sadyaḥ pāpavināśanam /
analyzed: na hi atas paramam loke sadyas pāpa vināśanam

original: brahmakośasya śuddhasya suvarṇaṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.221 //
analyzed: brahma kośasya śuddhasya suvarṇam yaḥ prayacchati
bahūni abda sahasrāṇi svarge loke mahīyate

original: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ svarṇadānaphalaṃ mayā // BhS_35.222 //
analyzed: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktam svarṇa dāna phalam mayā
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa phalam annasya dāpanāt

original: viṣṇave ca śriyai bhūmyai sarvadevebhya eva ca // BhS_35.223 //
analyzed: viṣṇave ca śriyai bhūmyai sarva devebhyaḥ eva ca
tat ni vedita śeṣasya dānāt ca arthibhyaḥ ādarāt

original: na śakyate phalaṃ tasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BhS_35.224 //
analyzed: na śakyate phalam tasya vaktum varṣa śataiḥ api
tathā api gīyate yat tu vistārāt parama ṛṣibhiḥ
saṃkṣepataḥ pravakṣyāmi anna dāna arjitam phalam
prasādam amṛtam brūyāt annam deva niveditam
tīrtham ca amṛtam iti eva deva pāda udakam vadet
annam eva praśaṃsanti devāḥ ṛṣi gaṇāḥ tathā

original: lokatantraṃ hi saṃjñāśca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.227 //
analyzed: lokatantram hi saṃjñāḥ ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam

original: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: annena sadṛśam dānam na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati
tasmāt annam viśeṣeṇa dātum icchanti mānavāḥ
annam ūrjaskaram loke prāṇāḥ ca anne pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagadidaṃ mahat // BhS_35.229 //
analyzed: annena dhāryate sarvam viśvam jagat idam mahat
annāt gṛhasthāḥ loke smin bhikṣavaḥ tāpasāḥ tathā

original: annādbhavanti vai prāṇāḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.230 //
analyzed: annāt bhavanti vai prāṇāḥ pratyakṣam na atra saṃśayaḥ
kuṭuṃbam pīḍayitvā tu brāhmaṇāya mahātmane
dātavyam bhikṣave ca annam ātmanaḥ bhūtim icchatā
brāhmaṇāya abhirūpāya yaḥ dadyāt annam arthine
vidadhāti nidhim śreṣṭham pāralaukikam ātmanaḥ
śrāntam adhvani vartantam vṛddham arham upasthitam
arcayet bhūtim anvicchan gṛhasthaḥ gṛham āgatam
krodham utpatitam hitvā su śīlaḥ vīta matsaraḥ

original: annadaḥ prāpnute bhū yo bhuvi ceha ca yatsukham // BhS_35.234 //
analyzed: anna daḥ prāpnute bhū yaḥ bhuvi ca iha ca yat sukham
na avamanyet abhigatam na praṇudyāt katham cana

original: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati // BhS_35.235 //
analyzed: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānam vipraṇaśyati
yaḥ dadyāt aparikliṣṭam anna madhvani vartate
śāntāya a dṛṣṭa pūrvāya sa mahat dharmam āpnuyāt
pitṝn devān ṛṣīn viprān atithīn ca viśeṣataḥ
yaḥ naraḥ prīṇayati annaiḥ tasya puṇya phalam mahat
kṛtvā atipātakam dadyāt annam arthine

original: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena muhyate // BhS_35.238 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena muhyate
brāhmaṇeṣu akṣayam nāmnām śūdre mahat bhalam

original: annadāmapi śūdre ca brāhmaṇasya viśiṣyate // BhS_35.239 //
analyzed: anna dām api śūdre ca brāhmaṇasya viśiṣyate
na pṛcchet gotra caraṇam svādhyāyam deśamena ca
bhikṣitaḥ brāhmaṇena iha dadyāt annam prayācitaḥ
anna dasya anna vṛkṣāḥ ca sarva kāma phala pradāḥ
bhavanti ca iha na amutra nṛpateḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
āśaṃsate hi pitaraḥ su vṛṣṭim iva karṣakāḥ

original: asmākamapi putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati // BhS_35.242 //
analyzed: asmākam api putraḥ vā pautraḥ vā annam pradāsyati
brāhmaṇaḥ hi mahat bhūtam svayam dehi iti yācate

original: akāmovā sakāmo vā datvā puṇyamavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.243 //
analyzed: akāmaḥ vā sa kāmaḥ vā da tvā puṇyam avāpnuyāt
brāhmaṇaḥ sarva bhūtānām atidhiḥ prasṛta agra bhuj

original: viprā yamadhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā // BhS_35.244 //
analyzed: viprāḥ yam adhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇāḥ gṛham sadā
satkṛtāt ca nivartante tat atīva pravarthate

original: mahābhoge kule pretya janma cāpnoti nityaśaḥ // BhS_35.245 //
analyzed: mahā bhoge kule pretya janma ca āpnoti nityaśas
naraḥ loke yathāsthānam anuttamam

original: nityaṃ mṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ // BhS_35.246 //
analyzed: nityam mṛṣṭa anna dāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ
annam prāṇāḥ narāṇām hi sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam

original: annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavānapi // BhS_35.247 //
analyzed: anna daḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavān api
prāṇavān ca api bhavati rūpavān ca tathā bhavet

original: annadaḥprāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ // BhS_35.248 //
analyzed: anna daḥ prāṇa daḥ loke sarva daḥ procyate tu saḥ
annam hidatvā atithaye brāhmaṇāya yathāvidhi
pradātā sukham āpnoti daivataiḥ ca api pūjyate
brāhmaṇaḥ hi mahat bhūtam kṣetra bhūtam iha ucyate

original: upyate yatra tadbījaṃ taddhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // BhS_35.250 //
analyzed: upyate yatra tat bījam tat hi puṇya phalam mahat
pratyakṣa prīti jananam bhoktuḥ dātuḥ bhavati uta
sarvāṇi anyāni dānāni parokṣa phalavanti uta
annāt hi prasavam yānti ratiḥ annāt hi jāyate
vidyāt roga nāśaḥ tathā annataḥ
annam hi adbhutam iti āha purā kalpe prajāpatiḥ

original: annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.253 //
analyzed: annam bhuvam divam kham ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam

original: anna praṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ /
analyzed: anna praṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ
balam balavataḥ api iha praṇaśyati anna hānitaḥ
āvāhāḥ ca vivāhāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca anna kṛte tathā

original: nivartante viśeṣeṇa brahma cātra pradīyate // BhS_35.255 //
analyzed: nivartante viśeṣeṇa brahma ca atra pradīyate
annataḥ sarvam etat hi yat kiñcid sthāṇu jaṅgamam

original: triṣulokeṣu dharmārthamannaṃ deyaṃ tato budhaiḥ // BhS_35.256 //
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu dharma artham annam deyam tatas budhaiḥ
anna dasya manuṣyasya balam ojaḥ yaśāṃsi ca

original: āyuśca vardhate tadvatteṣu lokeṣu niścitam // BhS_35.257 //
analyzed: āyuḥ ca vardhate tadvat teṣu lokeṣu niścitam
meghāt ūrdhvam sannidhatte prāṇānām pavanaḥ patiḥ

original: yacca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati harṣitaḥ // BhS_35.258 //
analyzed: yat ca megha gatam vāri śakraḥ varṣati harṣitaḥ
ādatte ca rasān bhaumān ādityaḥ sva gabhastibhiḥ
vāyuḥ āditya taptān ca rasān devaḥ pravarṣati

original: tadyathā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau /
analyzed: tat yathā meghataḥ vāri patitam bhavati kṣitau

original: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhāvitā // BhS_35.260 //
analyzed: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhāvitā
tatas sasyāni rohanti yena vartayate jagat
māṃsa medaḥ asthi śukrāṇām prādurbhāvaḥ tatas punar
saṃbhavanti tatas śukrāt prāṇinaḥ pṛdhivī tale

original: agniṣṭomau hi tacchrakraṃ sṛjataḥ puṣyataśca ha // BhS_35.262 //
analyzed: agniṣṭomau hi tat śrakram sṛjataḥ puṣyataḥ ca ha
evam annāt hi sūryaḥ ca pavanaḥ śukram eva ca

original: eka eva smṛto rāśistato bhūtāni jaṅgire // BhS_35.263 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva smṛtaḥ rāśiḥ tatas bhūtāni jaṅgire
prāṇān dadāti bhūtānām tejaḥ ca satata prabham
gṛham abhyāgatāya atha yaḥ dadyāt annam arthine
anna dānāt hi ye lokāḥ tān śruṇudhvam samāhitāḥ

original: bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BhS_35.265 //
analyzed: bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣām mahātmanām
tārā saṃsthāna rūpāṇi nānā staṃbha anvitāni ca
candra maṇḍala śubhrāṇi kiṅkiṇī jālavanti ca
taruṇa āditya varṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
aneka śata bhaumāni sa aṃtar jalacarāṇi ca
vaiḍūrya arka prakāśāni raukma rūpya mayāni ca
sarva kāma phalāḥ ca api vṛkṣāḥ bhavana saṃsthitāḥ

original: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpādīrghi kāścaiva sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: vāpyaḥ vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpa adīrghi kāḥ ca eva sarvaśas
ghoṣavanti atha yānāni muktāni atha sahasraśas
bhakṣya bhojya mayāḥ śailāḥ vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca

original: kṣīraṃ sravanti saritastathā caivānna parvatāḥ // BhS_35.270 //
analyzed: kṣīram sravanti saritaḥ tathā ca eva anna parvatāḥ
prāsādāḥ pāṇḍura abhra ābhāḥ śayyāḥ ca kanaka ujjvalāḥ
tāni anna dāḥ prapadyante tasmāt annam dadet sadā
dadyāt dadyāt sadā eva annam viṣṇave viniveditam

original: haviḥpātrādi sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmrameva vā // BhS_35.272 //
analyzed: haviḥ pātra ādi sauvarṇam rājatam tāmram eva vā
kāṃsyam vā api atha yaḥ dadyāt arghya pātra ādikān api
kalaśān karakān kuṃbhān anyān ca eva paricchadān
śakti lobham a kṛtvā eva tasya puṇya phalam mahat
sauvarṇāni evayaḥ dadyāt sārūpyam labhate phalam
rājatāni atha yaḥ dadyāt sāmīpyam phalam āpnuyāt

original: dadyāttāmrāṇi kāṃsyāni sārokyaṃ padameti saḥ // BhS_35.275 //
analyzed: dadyāt tāmrāṇi kāṃsyāni sārokyam padam eti saḥ
dhvacān vicitrān yaḥ dadyāt nānā varṇa samāyutān
sarveṣām uttamaḥ bhūtvā kula ketuḥ bhaviṣyati

original: śvetaṃ vitānaṃ raktaṃ vā kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ ca śyāmalam /
analyzed: śvetam vitānam raktam vā kṛṣṇam pītam ca śyāmalam

original: dukūlenātha paṭṭena tantunānyena vā kṛtam // BhS_35.277 //
analyzed: dukūlena atha paṭṭena tantunā anyena vā kṛtam
yaḥ dadyāt devadevasya sa gacchet vaiṣṇavam padam

original: sopadhānāṃ satalpāṃ ca khaṭvāṃ dadyācca yohareḥ // BhS_35.278 //
analyzed: sa upadhānām sa talpām ca khaṭvām dadyāt ca yaḥ hareḥ
kubera lokam āsādya tatra sammodate ciram
ātapatram tathā haimam muktā dāma vibhūṣitam
haima daṇḍa yutam dadyāt indra lokam sa gacchati

original: rājyakāmī tu rājā syātsārvabhaumo 'pi jāyate // BhS_35.280 //
analyzed: rājya kāmī tu rājā syāt sārvabhaumaḥ api jāyate
mayūra chatra dānāt tu vāruṇam lokam āpnuyāt

original: cāmaraṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ ca vyajanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam // BhS_35.281 //
analyzed: cāmaram hema daṇḍam ca vyajanam ratna bhūṣitam

original: kevalaṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ vā bhaktyā śaktyā ca saṃyutam /
analyzed: kevalam hema daṇḍam vā bhaktyā śaktyā ca saṃyutam
arpayet haraye yaḥ tu deva loke mahīyate
mayūra vyajanam tadvat rukma daṇḍam ca śaktitas
bhaktyā eva yaḥ hareḥ dadyāt vāyu loke mahīyate
vimānam ha eva saṃcchannam viṣṇoḥ yaḥ kārayet naraḥ

original: aśakyaṃ tatphalaṃ vaktuṃ sarvairapi surāsuraiḥ // BhS_35.284 //
analyzed: aśakyam tad phalam vaktum sarvaiḥ api sura asuraiḥ

original: sauvarmaṃ viṣṇurūpantu yo bhaktyaiva tu kārayet /
analyzed: sauvarmam viṣṇu rūpam tu yaḥ bhaktyā eva tu kārayet
tasya api yat phalam sarvam anantam iti naḥ śrutam
maṇḍapam vā prapām vā atha ratna muktā upaśobhitam
samāyuktam haima staṃbha pariṣkṛtam
kalpayet viṣṇu sālokyam prāpnoti amara durlabham

original: haimaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yo bhaktyaivār'payeddhareḥ // BhS_35.287 //
analyzed: haimam siṃhāsanam śreṣṭham yaḥ bhaktyā eva ār'payet hareḥ
siṃhāsanam samāsthāya māhendrīm saṃpadam vrajet
haimīḥ iryāḥ śibikāḥ ca eva raṅga ādīn yaḥ ca kārayet

original: haimaṃ yānaṃ tathāruhya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: haimam yānam tathā āruhya viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati
aśakta udāravān vā atharaṅga ādīn śibikāḥ tathā

original: siṃhāsanaṃ vā yo dadyātsomalokaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: siṃhāsanam vā yaḥ dadyāt soma lokam sa gacchati
yaḥ ca kāṃsya mayīm ghaṇṭām hṛdi adhvani yutām dadet

original: hṛdyavāksusvaro hṛdyo vāgmī sa tu bhavennaraḥ /
analyzed: hṛdya vāc su svaraḥ hṛdyaḥ vāgmī sa tu bhavet naraḥ
śaṅkha bherī ādi dānena śakra loke sa pūjyate
nṛtta geya ādibhiḥ vādyaiḥ ghoṣaṇam kārayet tu yaḥ
nartayet apsarobhiḥ vā gāndharvam lokam āpnuyāt
vīṇā veṇu vinādaiḥ ca śaktyā yaḥ pūjayet harim
bhuktvā atra mahat aiśvaryam vaiṣṇavam padam āpnuyāt

original: yadyaddravyaṃ mudā yukto dadyāttu haraye naraḥ /
analyzed: yat yat dravyam mudā yuktaḥ dadyāt tu haraye naraḥ

original: tadagre pūjakebhyaśca gurave ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.294 //
analyzed: tad agre pūjakebhyaḥ ca gurave ca viśeṣataḥ
tad prītyai ca itarebhyaḥ ca brāhmaṇebhyaḥ vidhānataḥ
samṛddhim tasya tasya eva dravyasya āpnoti asaṃśayam
yam kāmayitvā dadyāt yat tat sarvam sa labhet naraḥ

original: yadyatkarma tadarthaṃ syātparicaryā ca tasya yā // BhS_35.296 //
analyzed: yat yat karma tad artham syāt paricaryā ca tasya yā

original: tasyopacāraṃ yatkarma karoti śraddhayā tu yaḥ /
analyzed: tasya upacāram yat karma karoti śraddhayā tu yaḥ

original: sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpya nāmīpyaṃ padamāpnu yāt // BhS_35.297 //
analyzed: sarva yajña phalam prāpya nāmīpyam padam āpnu yāt
tasmāt atra pratiṣṭhāpya devadevasya mandiram
śakti lobham a kṛtvā eva vibhavānām ca bhaktitaḥ
bahudhā bahulām vṛttim kalpayet ced tat uttamam

original: athār'cane phalaṃ vakṣye viśeṣeṇa madhudviṣaḥ // BhS_35.299 //
analyzed: atha ar'cane phalam vakṣye viśeṣeṇa madhudviṣaḥ
bhaktyā apradakṣiṇam kurvan nityam viṣṇu ālaye naraḥ

original: sāyaṃ prātaśca deveśaṃ namasyannatha cintayan // BhS_35.300 //
analyzed: sāyam prātar ca deveśam namasyan atha cintayan

original: yaḥ pramāmaṃ muhuḥ kuryātsa tu yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
analyzed: yaḥ pramāmam muhur kuryāt sa tu yajña phalam labhet
upacāra viśeṣāṇāt vakṣyate phalam
dhyānam āvāhanam kṛtvā sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
aṣṭāṅga yoga mārgeṇa manasā bhāvayan harim
saṃcintya manasā pūrvam pūta kāyaḥ mahā manāḥ

original: yaḥ kuryātpūjanaṃ viṣṇostatra devo vaseddhruvam // BhS_35.303 //
analyzed: yaḥ kuryāt pūjanam viṣṇoḥ tatra devaḥ vaset dhruvam
arcakasya tapaḥ yogāt pūjāyāḥ ca atiśāyanāt

original: ābhirūpyācca biṃbasya sannidheḥ procyate hareḥ // BhS_35.304 //
analyzed: ābhirūpyāt ca biṃbasya sannidheḥ procyate hareḥ

original: āsanaṃ haraye datvā pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate ciram /
analyzed: āsanam haraye da tvā pratiṣṭhām labhate ciram
svāgatena anumānena yaḥ pūjayati mādhavam
sarvaiḥ anumataḥ bhūtvā svāgatam saḥ abhipadyate

original: pādyamācamanīyaṃ ca samarpya haraye naraḥ // BhS_35.306 //
analyzed: pādyam ācamanīyam ca samarpya haraye naraḥ
bāhyam ābhyantaram yat tu pāpam tena vimucyate

original: nityaṃ puṣpāṇi puṇyāni bhaktyā yastu samarcayet // BhS_35.307 //
analyzed: nityam puṣpāṇi puṇyāni bhaktyā yaḥ tu samarcayet
sūrya koṭi nibham divyam vimānam adhiruhyasaḥ
viṣṇu lokam gataḥ satyam viṣṇu vat modate ciram
deveśam puṣpa mālā ādyaiḥ alaṅkuryāt ca yaḥ budhaḥ

original: tasyānantaphalaṃ prokta mananto bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.309 //
analyzed: tasya ananta phalam manantaḥ bhagavān hariḥ
caṃpaka aśoka punnāga jātī malaya paṅkajam
samarpya devadevāya śubhānām āśrayaḥ bhavet
damana uśīra lā majjā ketakī utpalam arpayet

original: maṅgalaṃ tasya niśchidraṃ bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.311 //
analyzed: maṅgalam tasya niśchidram bhavet eva na saṃśayaḥ
tulasīm arpayet vidvān pādayoḥ bhaktitaḥ hareḥ

original: sa cāna ntaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇusannedhau // BhS_35.312 //
analyzed: sa ca an nta phalam prāpya modate viṣṇu sannedhau
sugandhi puṣpa dānena sugandhiḥ jāyate naraḥ
bahu puṣpa pradānena bahudhā tuṣyate hariḥ

original: bahujātisumānāṃ ca dānena prīyate sa vai /
analyzed: bahu jāti sumānām ca dānena prīyate sa vai
pādayoḥ arpaṇāt viṣṇoḥ puṣpāṇām saṃcayam sakṛt
pade pade ca aśvamedha phalam prāpnoti asaṃśayam

original: tulasīṃ mūrthni devasya samarpya madhuvidviṣaḥ // BhS_35.315 //
analyzed: tulasīm mūrthni devasya samarpya madhuvidviṣaḥ
naraḥ pāpāt vimucyeta karmaṇā na upalipyate

original: sarvāṅgeṣvarpayan puṣpaṃ sarvagasya naro hareḥ // BhS_35.316 //
analyzed: sarva aṅgeṣu arpayan puṣpam sarvagasya naraḥ hareḥ
sarvadā sarva lokeṣu kāma coraḥ bhaviṣyati
alaṅkṛtya phalaiḥ devam puṣpa arpaṇa phalam labhet
saṃgandha candana dravyam karpūra ādi yutam tathā
yathārham arpayet aṅgeḥ ślakṣṇam sarva aṅga sundaram
sa naraḥ viṣṇu sālokyam prayāti amara durlabham
svayam eva āhṛtaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjayet yaḥ tu mādhavam
sa sarvān samavāpnoti puṣpa arpaṇa phala ādikān

original: sarveṣāmapi puṣpāṇāṃ tulasī prītidā hareḥ // BhS_35.320 //
analyzed: sarveṣām api puṣpāṇām tulasī prīti dā hareḥ
tulasī dalam ādāya yatra gacchati pūjakaḥ

original: anugacchati taṃ devo yathā gorvatsalā bhṛśam // BhS_35.321 //
analyzed: anugacchati tam devaḥ yathā goḥ vatsalā bhṛśam
pratyaham pūjayet yaḥ tu tulasyā garuḍadhvajam
janma mṛtyu jarā vyādhi muktaḥ muktim avāpnuyāt
maṇi kāñcana puṣpāṇi muktā vaidūryakāni ca
tulasī dala dānasya kalām na ar'hanti ṣoḍaśīm
sumañjarī dalaiḥ yuktaiḥ komalaiḥ tulasī dalaiḥ

original: ye kurvanti hareḥ pūjāṃ te kṛtārthāḥ kalau yuge // BhS_35.324 //
analyzed: ye kurvanti hareḥ pūjām te kṛtārthāḥ kalau yuge

original: śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vār'draṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā tulasīdalam /
analyzed: śuṣkam paryuṣitam kāṣṭham vā tulasī dalam
arcane vāsudevasya lakṣa koṭi guṇam bhavet
tulasī grahaṇam śastam viṣṇoḥ arcana hetave

original: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ puṣpaṃ na varjyaṃ tulasīdalam // BhS_35.326 //
analyzed: varjyam paryuṣitam puṣpam na varjyam tulasī dalam

original: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ toyaṃ na varjyaṃ jāhnavījalam /
analyzed: varjyam paryuṣitam toyam na varjyam jāhnavī jalam

original: anyatparyuṣitaṃ varjyaṃ na varjyaṃ padmapuṣpakam // BhS_35.327 //
analyzed: anyat paryuṣitam varjyam na varjyam padma puṣpakam
śuṣkaiḥ paryuṣitaiḥ vā api kāṣṭha mūla mṛd ādibhiḥ
arcanāt vāsudevasya muktaḥ bhavati pūruṣaḥ
puṣkara ādyāni tīrthāni gaṅgā ādyāḥ saritaḥ tathā

original: devā divisthitā ye vaitiṣṭhanti tulasīdale // BhS_35.329 //
analyzed: devāḥ divi sthitāḥ ye tulasī dale
tāvat garjanti puṣpāṇi mālatī ādīni garvataḥ

original: yāvanna prāpyate puṇyā tulasī viṣṇuvallabhā // BhS_35.330 //
analyzed: yāvat na prāpyate puṇyā tulasī viṣṇu vallabhā
sakṛt abhyarcya govindam tulasyā ca eva mānavaḥ
mukti bhāgī nirātaṅkam kṛṣṇasya anucaraḥ bhavet
na akṣataiḥ arcayet viṣṇum na śaṃbhum śaṅkha vāriṇā

original: nārcayeddūrvayā durgāṃ na tulasyā surāntaram // BhS_35.332 //
analyzed: na arcayet dūrvayā durgām na tulasyā sura antaram
dala alābhe tulasyāḥ tu patraiḥ ārādhayet harim
patra alābhe śiphābhiḥ vā śiphā abhāve śiphā lavaiḥ
lava alābhe mṛdā tatra bhaktimān arcayet harim

original: harerabhyarcanāyāṃ ca tulasī sādhanaṃ param // BhS_35.334 //
analyzed: hareḥ abhyarcanāyām ca tulasī sādhanam param
alābhe tulasī ca tad nāma grahaṇam param
bhagavān aravinda akṣaḥ santuṣyati sahasradhā
na padmaiḥ nā api kalhāraiḥ na hema kusumaiḥ api

original: tathā tuṣyati govindo yathaina tulasīdalaiḥ // BhS_35.336 //
analyzed: tathā tuṣyati govindaḥ tulasī dalaiḥ
saṃgṛhya tulasīm bhaktyā sarvān iṣṭa

original: tulasyaiva hareḥ pūjāṃ ye kurvanti sadā bhuvi // BhS_35.337 //
analyzed: tulasyā eva hareḥ pūjām ye kurvanti sadā bhuvi

original: tasmāttulasyā sadṛśaṃ sa ca bhūtaṃ na bhāvi ca /
analyzed: tasmāt tulasyā sadṛśam sa ca bhūtam na bhāvi ca
tulasī kānana āmoda vāpitāḥ yatra mārutāḥ
na tatra dharaṇī bhāge caranti yama kiṅkarāḥ
tulasī tulasī iti evam nāmāni āvartayanti ye
te viṣṇu lokam āsādya paśyanti madhusūdanam
darśanāt śravaṇāt svarśāt smaraṇāt kīrtanāt api
punāti tulasī puṇyā daśa pūrvān daśa avarān

original: tulasīkānanaṃ yatra yatra vā harikīrtanam // BhS_35.341 //
analyzed: tulasī kānanam yatra yatra vā hari kīrtanam
tatra eva āste hariḥ śrīmān śaṅkha cakra gadā āyudhaḥ
yaḥ pūjayet phalaiḥ viṣṇum nu pakvaiḥ amṛta upamaiḥ
puṇya vṛkṣa samudbhūtaiḥ tad phalam kena varṇyate
candana aguru koṣṭhu ādyaiḥ bhūpam āghrāpayet cayaḥ

original: sūryalokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: sūrya lokam sa gatvā eva yāti viṣṇoḥ param padam

original: ghṛtena kāpilenaiva dṛḍhavartiyutaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_35.344 //
analyzed: ghṛtena kāpilena eva dṛḍha varti yutam tu yaḥ
darśayet devadevasya dīpam dṛṣṭi manoharam

original: so 'ndhaṃ naiva praviśati narakaṃ narapuṅgavaḥ // BhS_35.345 //
analyzed: saḥ andham nā eva praviśati narakam nara puṅgavaḥ
yaḥ tu tailena saṃdīptam darśayet dīpam ujjvalam
vimānam ati vidyoti yāti āruhya tamaḥ param
karbūra dīpam yaḥ bhaktyā darśayet haraye naraḥ

original: tasya pāpāni naśyanti nirlepassa bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.347 //
analyzed: tasya pāpāni naśyanti nirlepaḥ sa bhaviṣyati
vidhinā ar'ghyam hareḥ dadyāt aṣṭha aṅgam bhaktitaḥ naraḥ

original: candralokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.348 //
analyzed: candra lokam sa gatvā eva yāti viṣṇoḥ param padam

original: sugandhi śubhamutpūtaṃ snānatoyaṃ ca yo dadet /
analyzed: sugandhi śubham utpūtam snāna toyam ca yaḥ dadet
deveśasya sa bhavet vīta kalmaṣaḥ

original: tataśca vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ prāpya tatraiva modate /
analyzed: tatas ca vāruṇam lokam prāpya tatra eva modate
plota vastra uttarīyāṇi viśuddhāni mṛdūni ca
devadevasya da tvā tu saumyam lokam avāpnuyāt

original: kārpāsamatha ca kṣaumaṃ kauśeyaṃ rāṅkavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.351 //
analyzed: kārpāsam atha ca kṣaumam kauśeyam rāṅkavam tathā
yathāśakti samarpya eva phalam ca anantam aśnute
kārpāsāt rāṅgavam tasmāt kau śeyam kṣaumam iti api
praśastam kathitam vastram yathā śakti anurūpataḥ
sauvarṇa ābharaṇāni atra muktā maṇi kṛtāni vā
arpayet devadevasya bhavet bhūmipatiḥ sa hi

original: jāṃbūnadaṃ śātakuṃbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.354 //
analyzed: jāṃbūnadam śātakuṃbham hāṭakam vaiṇavam tathā

original: śruṅgī ca śuktijaṃ caiva jātarūpamataḥ param /
analyzed: śruṅgī ca śukti jam ca eva jātarūpam atas param
rasa viddham tathā proktam ākara udgatam iti api
proktam bahuvidham hema pūrvāt pūrvāt param param
pratyuptāni viśeṣeṇa ratnaiḥ nāvāvidhaiḥ hareḥ
bhūṣaṇāni arpayet bhaktyā mitrāṇi asya nava grahāḥ

original: rājaśriyaṃ ca bhuktvā nte viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.357 //
analyzed: rāja śriyam ca bhuktvā nte viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati
upavītam tu yaḥ dadyāt sauvarṇaiḥ tantubhiḥ kṛtām
dvijottamaḥ syāt vijñānī brahma lokam avāpnuyāt
sālagrāmaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ nirmitām mālikām tu yaḥ
arpayet devadevasya sa viṣṇoḥ yāti sannidhim
lakṣmīḥ priyatamā viṣṇoḥ sā hi nitya anapāyinī
ca śaktiḥ sarva ātmikā parā
prakṛteḥ mūla bhūtā ca svāminī jagatām satām
lakṣmī pratikṛtim kṛtvā maṇi muktā ādibhiḥ munā
ābadhya mālikāyām yaḥ deveśāya samarpayet

original: tasya prasannau jāyete daṃpatī jagataḥ patī // BhS_35.362 //
analyzed: tasya prasannau jāyete daṃpatī jagataḥ patī

original: mātrāṃ ca devadesya datvā haste viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: mātrām ca devadesya da tvā haste viśeṣataḥ
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti cara aṃśaḥ tarpitaḥ hareḥ
madhuparkam hareḥ dadyāt bhaktyā prīti karam hareḥ
virajām bara saṃvītaḥ śaśāṅka dhavalaḥ mudā
candra loka adhipaḥ bhūtvā yāyāt viṣṇu padam mahat
haviḥ ni vedya devasya pratiṣṭhā phalam aśnute
prabhūtam vinivedya eva jīrṇa uddhāra phalam tathā
pāyasam vinidedya eva hareḥ bhaktyā viśeṣataḥ
payaḥ hradaiḥ ca pitaraḥ tṛptim āyānti tasya tu

original: kṛsaraṃ vinivedyaiva devasya mudito naraḥ // BhS_35.367 //
analyzed: kṛsaram vinivedya eva devasya muditaḥ naraḥ
akṣayam pratipadyeta sva gṛhe annam ciram ciram

original: gaulyaṃ nivedya devasya prāpnoti guḍaparvatān // BhS_35.368 //
analyzed: gaulyam nivedya devasya prāpnoti guḍaparvatān
mudga annasya pradānena mudga rāśim samāpnuyāt

original: yavodanasya donena nīrogo bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.369 //
analyzed: yavodanasya donena nīrogaḥ bhavati dhruvam
śuddha annasya pradānena tri śuddhā bhavati prajā
apūpa ādi pradānena manasvī jāyate naraḥ
upadaṃśa ādi dānena na upadaṃśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sugandhi svādu śuddhaṃ ca pānīyaṃ yo harerdadet // BhS_35.371 //
analyzed: sugandhi svādu śuddham ca pānīyam yaḥ hareḥ dadet
haviḥ dāna phalasya ardham phalam samyak samaśnute

original: kadalyā nārikelasya cūtasya panasasya ca // BhS_35.372 //
analyzed: kadalyāḥ nārikelasya cūtasya panasasya ca

original: phalāni ca nupakvāni bhaktyā śuddhāni yo dadet /
analyzed: phalāni ca nu pakvāni bhaktyā śuddhāni yaḥ dadet
haviḥ dānāt catur bhāgam phalam saḥ api samāpnuyāt
karpūra elā lavaṅgaiḥ ca tathā jātīphala ādibhiḥ
mātuluṅga phalaiḥ śuddhaiḥ su pakvaiḥ ca yutam tathā

original: tāṃbūlaṃ kramukairyuktaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca yo dadet /
analyzed: tāṃbūlam kramukaiḥ yuktam mukha vāsam ca yaḥ dadet
sarva aiśvaryam avāpnoti viṣṇu lokam ca gacchati
vidhinā balim ārādhya kārayet yaḥ pradakṣiṇam

original: balaṃ balavatāṃ labdhvā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.376 //
analyzed: balam balavatām labdhvā viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: baliṃ seveta yo bhaktyā so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
analyzed: balim seveta yaḥ bhaktyā saḥ api yajña phalam labhet
devasya maṇḍapam kuryāt gandha puṣpaiḥ
sarva aiśvaryam avāpya eva nitya puṣpa phalam vrajet

original: viṣṇoḥ kathāstu saṃkīrtyastotraiḥ stutvā ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // BhS_35.378 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ kathā astu saṃkīrtya stotraiḥ stutvā ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ
śrutvā abhaktyā harim dhyāyan viṣṇu loke mahīyate
saumyān puṇyān imān viṣṇoḥ caturaḥ api arcanā vidhīn
śrāvayet yaḥ budhaḥ bhaktyā tathā yaḥ śruṇuyāt api
sarva pāpa vinirmuktāḥ vaiṣṇavam padam āpnuyuḥ
atha utsava ādi karaṇe phalam vakṣye madhudviṣaḥ

original: sakāmānāṃ phalaṃ kāmyamakāmānāṃ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.381 //
analyzed: sa kāmānām phalam kāmyam akāmānām param padam
utsavam tu pravakṣyanti devadeva arcanām surāḥ

original: utsāha utsavaḥ prokto manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣetaḥ // BhS_35.382 //
analyzed: utsāhaḥ utsavaḥ proktaḥ manuṣyāṇām viśeṣetar
ud iti utkṛṣṭa śabdaḥ ayam savaḥ yajñaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
tasmāt uttama yajña tvāt utsavaḥ paribhāṣyate
vājimedhāḥ tayā āgānām tasmāt deva utsavaḥ varaḥ

original: utsavaṃ devadevasya yaḥ kuryātsvakulaṃ svakam // BhS_35.384 //
analyzed: utsavam devadevasya yaḥ kuryāt sva kulam svakam

original: uttārayan svayaṃ viṣṇossa yāti paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: uttārayan svayam viṣṇoḥ sa yāti paramam padam

original: sa yajño vo narān yuṣmānuttārayati niścayam /
analyzed: sa yajñaḥ vaḥ narān yuṣmān uttārayati niścayam

original: iti vedā vadantīti sa utsava udīrya te // BhS_35.386 //
analyzed: iti vedāḥ vadanti iti saḥ utsavaḥ udīrya te
vājīmedha sahasreṇa yajataḥ yat phalam bhavet

original: yaścotsavena yajate tayostulyaṃ phalaṃ nmṛtam // BhS_35.387 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca utsavena yajate tayoḥ tulyam phalam
yāgānām api sarveṣām phalam utsava karmaṇā

original: devasyāśnuvate sarvaṃ ye yajante saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.388 //
analyzed: devasya aśnuvate sarvam ye yajante saṃśayaḥ
savān utkramate yasmāt tasmāt utsavaḥ uchyate
upakurvanti ye martyāḥ devasya utsava karmaṇi

original: karmāṇā manasā vācā te 'pi yānti phalaṃ bahu /
analyzed: karmāṇā manasā vācā te api yānti phalam bahu

original: grāme vā ragare va'pi pattane vā mahotsavaḥ // BhS_35.390 //
analyzed: grāme vā ragare pattane vā mahā utsavaḥ
yatra pravartate viṣṇoḥ saṃpadaḥ santi tatra vai

original: yatra deśe janapade rāṣṭre vā pyutsavo hareḥ // BhS_35.391 //
analyzed: yatra deśe janapade rāṣṭre vā pi utsavaḥ hareḥ
na apamṛtyu bhayam tatra
nā eva cora ādi upahatiḥ na tāpa traya saṃgatiḥ
dharmaḥ catuṣpād varteta kalau tatra ādimaḥ yugaḥ
dhārmikaḥ ca bhavet rājā prajāḥ dharma parāyaṇāḥ
bhavanti sukhinaḥ sarve sarva duḥkha vivarjitāḥ
mahā utsave vartamāne yat arthibhyaḥ pradīyate
pānīyam annam vastram vā tat sahasraguṇam bhavet
puṣpa mula phalaiḥ ijyā devasya ābharaṇa ādikaiḥ
kriyamāṇā yathāśakti nitya ānantyāya kalpate
sevante tatra ye devam aharniśam atandritāḥ
teṣām puṇya phalam vaktum na alam devāḥ saha asurāḥ

original: ālepanaṃ mārjanaṃ ca rajaḥ praśamanaṃ tathā // BhS_35.397 //
analyzed: ālepanam mārjanam ca rajaḥ praśamanam tathā
vāri bhīḥ dīpikā āropam kṣvelana āsphoṭana ādikam
kurvanti ye brāhma lokam prayānti amara durlabham

original: yānaṃ vahanti ye viprāste yānti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
analyzed: yānam vahanti ye viprāḥ te yānti brahmaṇaḥ padam

original: rathaṃ vahanti ye cāśvāste 'pi yāntisurālayam // BhS_35.399 //
analyzed: ratham vahanti ye ca aśvāḥ te api yāntisurālayam
chatra ādi dhāriṇaḥ ca api modante divi mānavāḥ
ācāryāḥ ca arcakāḥ ca eva tathā eva paricārakāḥ
utsave adhikṛtāḥ viṣṇoḥ prāpnuvanti yathā īpsitam

original: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni ye tatrādhīyate janāḥ // BhS_35.401 //
analyzed: ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni ye tatra adhīyate janāḥ

original: te pare vyomni devasya pārśve vartanti nisspṛhāḥ /
analyzed: te pare vyomni devasya pārśve vartanti nisspṛhāḥ
sarva śānti karam sarva duḥkha utsādanam uttamam
rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya sukha dam āyuḥ ārogya vardhanam
prajānām vāsudevasya kalyāṇa ārādhanam mahat
imam deva ādayaḥ sarve viṣṇoḥ utsavam uttamam
kṛtvā śāśvatikam sthānam prāpnuvanti ati durlabham
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa mahāsnapana jam phalam
yena dravyeṇa deveśam snāpayet yaḥ tu bhaktitaḥ

original: taddravyaṃ varthate tasya naśyaṃ tyevāśubhāni tu /
analyzed: tat dravyam tasya tu

original: rājño rāṣṭrasya taddravyaṃ samṛddhyaiva bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.406 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya tat dravyam samṛddhyā eva bhaviṣyati
aśubhāni vinaśyanti śūbhāni prabhavanti ca

original: nirmāti yaḥprapāṃ viṣṇordevasya nnapanāya vai // BhS_35.407 //
analyzed: nirmāti yaḥ prapām viṣṇoḥ devasya nnapanāya vai
tasya nirmīyate gehaḥ svarge svarga nivāsibhiḥ
mṛdbhiḥ saṃsnāpanāt bhūmiḥ sarva sasya anvitā bhavet
nagaiḥ pradakṣiṇāt eva gotrasya sthitiḥ āpyate
dhānyaiḥ saṃsnāpanāt viṣṇoḥ dhānyānām vṛddhiḥ āpyate
aṅkuraiḥ arcanāt viṣṇoḥ prajā vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
maṅgalaiḥ pūjanāt sarva maṅgalāni bhavanti vai
snāpanāt pañcabhiḥ gavyaiḥ pāpam saśyati sarvadhā
ghṛtena snāpanāt bhuyāt sāma adhyayana jam phalam
kṣīreṇa snāpayet viṣṇum gāḥ ca kṣīravatīḥ iyāt
madhunā snāpayet viṣṇum madhu syandi bhavet vacaḥ
dadhnā saṃsnāpayet devam accham tasya bhavet yaśaḥ
gandha uda snāpanāt viṣṇoḥ sarva saṃpad vṛtaḥ bhavet
snāpayet akṣata udaiḥ tu prajā tasya akṣatā bhavet
phala udaka snāpanena śubhāni īyāt phalāni tu
snāpanāt tu kuśa udena brahmavarcasam āpnuyāt
ratna udaka snāpanena maṇi ratna ādi vardhayet
japya udakasya snānena sarva jāpa phalam labhet
bhavanti oṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ sarva oṣadhi udaka āplavāt
puṇya puṣpa arcanena eva puṇyavān jāyate naraḥ
cūrṇaiḥ śrīveṣṭaka ādīni īm arpaṇāt vṛddhiḥ āyuṣaḥ
udvartanāt kaṣāyeṇa cūrṇena avāpyate ruciḥ
tīrtha uda snāpanena eva tīrtha yātrā phalam bhavet
vana oṣadhībhiḥ saṃsparśāt bhavet nityam aroga tā
hāridra cūrṇa snānena prītaḥ bhavati ca acyutaḥ
mārjanāt sarva gandhaiḥ ca śrīḥ bhavati acalā calā
mārjanāt mūla gandhaiḥ ca kulam edheta nityaśas
dhātubhiḥ ca api alaṅkārāt dhātu vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
anyaiḥ anuktaiḥ vā yaḥ tu dravyaiḥ snāpana karmaṇi
upatiṣṭhet jagadyonim phalam prāpnoti vistṛtam

original: yastu kuryājjaladroṇīṃ snānapīṭhaṃ ca śārṅgiṇaḥ // BhS_35.422 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu kuryāt jala droṇīm snāna pīṭham ca śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyayānantu pīṭhe cātyunna te vaset /
analyzed: sa sarvaiḥ pūjya yānantu pīṭhe vaset

original: evaṃ yassnapanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kārayecchaktito naraḥ // BhS_35.423 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ snapanam viṣṇoḥ kārayet śaktitas naraḥ
yathā uktāni iha labdhvā eva phalāni su ciram bhuvi

original: ante vimāsamāruhya haimaṃ devaiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // BhS_35.424 //
analyzed: ante vimāsam āruhya haimam devaiḥ parīvṛtaḥ
kinnaraiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca nṛttaiḥ geyaiḥ ca tarpitaḥ
yakṣaiḥ vṛtaḥ atha gandharvaiḥ tsūyāmānaḥ mudā anvitaḥ
sarva lokāt param puṇyam vaikuṇṭham lokam āpnuyāt

original: devadevasya viṣṇostu snapanaṃ bhaktimāṃstu yaḥ // BhS_35.426 //
analyzed: devadevasya viṣṇoḥ tu snapanam bhaktimān tu yaḥ

original: seveta so 'pi pāpmabhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: seveta saḥ api pāpmabhyaḥ mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
snāpana ante tu deveśasya utsavam yaḥ ca kārayet
prajā vṛddhim śriyam sphārām samāpnoti viśeṣataḥ

original: utsavaṃ sevateyastu so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet // BhS_35.428 //
analyzed: utsavam sevate yaḥ tu saḥ api yajña phalam labhet
viṣṇupañcadine yaḥ tu deveśam snāpayet prabhum
tasya syāt mahatī saṃpad paśu putra ādi sammitā
grahaṇe viṣuve tadvat saṃkrama ādiṣu ca eva hi

original: anyeṣvapi ca puṇyeṣu kāryeṣu jagataḥ prabhum // BhS_35.430 //
analyzed: anyeṣu api ca puṇyeṣu kāryeṣu jagataḥ prabhum
snāpayet yaḥ ca seveta phalam āpnoti saḥ api saḥ
yaḥ kuryāt vaiṣṇavam dhāma bhakti śraddhā samanvitaḥ

original: khaṇḍite sphaṭite dhāmni dūṣite ca sūdhādibhiḥ /
analyzed: khaṇḍite sphaṭite dhāmni dūṣite ca sūdha ādibhiḥ

original: samādadhyātpunardhāma sa lokaṃ yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ // BhS_35.432 //
analyzed: samādadhyāt punar dhāma sa lokam yāti vaiṣṇavam
coraiḥ apahṛte biṃbeyaḥ kuryāt pratimām punar

original: sthāpayedbhakti yuktaśca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // BhS_35.433 //
analyzed: sthāpayet bhakti yuktaḥ ca sa yāti paramām gatim
pramādāt patite biṃbe sphuṭate dūṣite atha vā

original: yaḥ sandhāya punaḥ kuryātpritiṣṭhāṃ pūrvavanmudā // BhS_35.434 //
analyzed: yaḥ sandhāya punar kuryāt pritiṣṭhām pūrvavat mudā
tasya taṣyati deveśaḥ varam iṣṭam pradāsyati

original: śīrṇe jīrṇe tathā bhinne bhūṣaṇādau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.435 //
analyzed: śīrṇe jīrṇe tathā bhinne bhūṣaṇa ādau viśeṣataḥ
navīkṛtya ār'payet yaḥ tu tasya pāpam praṇaśyati
yānāni rathaṅga ādīni ālokya śithilāni vai
samīkṛtya tu yaḥ dadyāt tāni bhaktyā haret naraḥ

original: tasya kāyakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_35.437 //
analyzed: tasya kāya kṛtam pāpam tad kṣaṇāt eva naśyati
yaḥ tu vīkṣya hareḥ arcām patamānām anādarāt
na ṛdhayet dhana dānena tasya lokāḥ madhu dviṣaḥ
sīdatām vṛtti hīnānām devasya āghre padārthinām

original: yo dadyāducitāṃ vṛttiṃ sa yamaṃ nopasarpati // BhS_35.439 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadyāt ucitām vṛttim sa yamam na upasarpati
yaḥ tu deva utsava ādīni kārayet bhakti saṃyutaḥ
lupta prāyāṇi bhavet phalam anantakam
yaḥ kuryāt devatāgāre lupta kāryāṇi sattamaḥ
na tasya kṛtakṛtya tvāt amātyāḥ yama kiṅkarāḥ
deva ardhe brāhmaṇasya ar'the yaḥ tyajet tanum uttamām

original: tasya vāso bhavetsvarge cāvadidrāśca turdhaśa // BhS_35.442 //
analyzed: tasya vāsaḥ bhavet svarge turdhaśa
deva arthe brāhmaṇasya ar'dhe sarva svam su antyajet tu yaḥ

original: tasya tuṣyati deveśassa tu svārājyamaśnu te // BhS_35.443 //
analyzed: tasya tuṣyati deveśaḥ sa tu svārājyam aśnu te
prāyaścitta nimittāni saṃbhūtāni tu dhāmani

original: dṛṣṭvā ca śraddhayā yuktoyo devamupatiṣṭhate // BhS_35.444 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca śraddhayā yuktaḥ yaḥ devam upatiṣṭhate
tasya tuṣyati deveśaḥ pra hṛṣṭaḥ saṃprasīdati
prāyaścittāni aśeṣāṇi pāpa ogha dhvaṃsanāya vai
nirdiṣṭāni purākalpe brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā
loka anugraha letoḥ vai guruḥ atvaraḥ
narāṇām sīdatām dṛṣṭvā citta vṛttīḥ su durmalāḥ

original: prāyaścittavidhānaṃ tu provāca jagatāṃ hitaḥ // BhS_35.447 //
analyzed: prāyaścitta vidhānam tu provāca jagatām hitaḥ
na kaścid nā ācaret karma śāstra uktam sakalam kramāt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena prāyaścittam samācaret
prāyaścittam tu kṛtvā eva yaḥ uktām ācaret kriyām
tasya syāt dviguṇam puṇyam mataḥ syāt anupālanam
bhakti śraddhā anvitaḥ yaḥ tu kuryāt vā kārayet kramāt
deveśasya pratiṣṭhā ādi prāyaścitta anta satkriyāḥ

original: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyaṃ tridaśairapi /
analyzed: tasya puṇya phalam vaktum na śakyam tridaśaiḥ api

original: iha loke 'khilān kāmānanubhūya sukhaṃ cirāt // BhS_35.451 //
analyzed: iha loke akhilān kāmān anubhūya sukham cirāt
dehante jāyate sadyas śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ
śrīvatsa aṃkaḥ catur bāhuḥ śyāmala aṅgaḥ su sundaraḥ
gagane garuḍa ārūḍhaḥ sarva deva namaskṛtaḥ
aditya maṇḍalam bhitvā gatvā śubhra aṃśu maṇḍalam
tatas avatīrya nikhilān lokān api yathākramam
satya stham satya roka stham jagataḥ prabhava apyayam
tathā aśeṣa viśeṣam ca nitya ānandam nirañjanam
śāśvatam tat paran jyotiḥ praviśet na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyālope ca yatphalam // BhS_35.456 //
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyā lope ca yat phalam
nirmātum ālayam yaḥ tu saṃkalpya matimān naraḥ
pareṇa id bodhitaḥ bhūyas tasmai vartate
tau ubhau narakam pretya bhavetām duḥkha bhāginau
kartā kārayitā ca eva prerakaḥ ca anumodakaḥ
sukṛte duṣkṛte ca eva vadanti sama bhāginaḥ
nirmātum icchayā dhāma devasya madhuvidviṣaḥ

original: svayaṃ nivartate yastu tasya syānmahatī vipat /
analyzed: svayam nivartate yaḥ tu tasya syāt mahatī vipad

original: saṃkalpya devatāgāraṃ nirmātuṃ yo viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.460 //
analyzed: saṃkalpya devatāgāram nirmātum yaḥ viśeṣataḥ
ācāryam vṛṇuyāt no ced tasya kāryam praṇaśyati

original: ācāryassatataṃ goptā ācāryastu pitā smṛtaḥ // BhS_35.461 //
analyzed: ācāryaḥ satatam goptā ācāryaḥ tu pitā smṛtaḥ
ācāryaḥ sarvam eva iti yaḥ manyeta sa manyate

original: ārabhya gehanirmāṇaṃ devasya jagataḥ pateḥ // BhS_35.462 //
analyzed: ārabhya geha nirmāṇam devasya jagataḥ pateḥ

original: asamāpya tu yo mūḍho nivarte pravilobhataḥ /
analyzed: a samāpya tu yaḥ mūḍhaḥ nivarte pravilobhataḥ

original: tasya saṃpadvināśassyāt kruddho bhavati cāvyayaḥ // BhS_35.463 //
analyzed: tasya saṃpad vināśaḥ syāt kruddhaḥ bhavati ca avyayaḥ
pravṛttāyām pratiṣṭhāyām yena kena api hetunā

original: yaḥ kuryādantarāyaṃ tu tasya puṇyaṃ vinaśyati // BhS_35.464 //
analyzed: yaḥ kuryāt antarāyam tu tasya puṇyam vinaśyati

original: yena vighnastadā bhūyāttaṃ hatvāpi na doṣabhāk /
analyzed: yena vighnaḥ tadā bhūyāt tam hatvā api na doṣa bhāj

original: yastu śāstroditaṃ karma kurvantaṃ ca padārthinam // BhS_35.465 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu śāstra uditam karma kurvantam ca padārthinam
śilpinam vivadet mūḍhaḥ tasya nāsti phalam kvacid
vivadeta yaḥ ucchāstram ācāryeṇa padārthinā
tasya aśubhāni bhūyāṃsi bhaveyuḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: adhvare vartamāne tu saṃbhārān śāstracoditān // BhS_35.467 //
analyzed: adhvare vartamāne tu saṃbhārān śāstra coditān

original: yo na dadyātsa pāpīyān nāpnuyāt karmajaṃ phalam /
analyzed: yaḥ na dadyāt sa pāpīyān na āpnuyāt karma jam phalam

original: pratiṣṭhāpya harerbiṃbaṃ yo na satkurute gurum // BhS_35.468 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya hareḥ biṃbam yaḥ na satkurute gurum
anyān padārthinaḥ ca api sa kiñcid nā āpnuyāt phalam

original: pratiṣṭhānte tathā nityamavicchinnaṃ tu pūjitum // BhS_35.469 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā ante tathā nityam avicchinnam tu pūjitum
arcakam vṛṇuyāt no ced yajamānaḥ vinaśyati
arcakam ca tathā ācāryam anyān ca api padārthinaḥ
kāla avadhim viniścitya yaḥ karmasu niyojayet

original: sa bhavedbrahmahā caiva dhanaṃ tasya vilupyati // BhS_35.471 //
analyzed: sa bhavet brahma hā ca eva dhanam tasya vilupyati
dāya arhām kāyet vrattim arcakasya na ced yadi
yajamānaḥ vipadyeta devāvāsaḥ naśiṣyati
ācāryam arcakam kuryāt sva sthānāt yaḥ avaropitam

original: anyaṃ vā yojayettatra tāvubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ // BhS_35.473 //
analyzed: anyam vā yojayet tatra tau ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
āpadi api ca kaṣṭhāyām na kadāpi anyam arcakam
pūrva avaropaṇāt eva niyuñjyāt tu katham cana
ādya arcakasya vaṃśe tu jāyante ye mahā āśayāḥ

original: sarve ca kramaśaḥ pūjāṃ kartumarhanti te yataḥ // BhS_35.475 //
analyzed: sarve ca kramaśas pūjām kartum arhanti te yatas

original: pitryaṃ bhavati devasya dāyādyaṃ pūjanaṃ svataḥ /
analyzed: pitryam bhavati devasya dāyādyam pūjanam svatas
tasmāt tad vaṃśa jān hitvā yadi anyaiḥ kāritā ār'canā
brahmahatyā bhavet tasya tad būjā niṣphalā bhavet

original: yastudadyādarcakāya bhṛtyarthaṃ ke valaṃ dhanam // BhS_35.477 //
analyzed: yaḥ tudadyāt arcakāya bhṛti artham ke valam dhanam
anyat vā api asthiram vastu na hariḥ tena tuṣyati
lobhāt mohāt atha ajñānāt yaḥ ādatteḥ acakaḥ dhanam
vetana ardham tathā dadyāt yajamānaḥ vimūḍha dhīḥ
ubhautaunarakam yātaḥ yādat candra divākaram
vitta artham pūjayet yaḥ tu niyamya api avadhim harim
sa vaidevalakaḥ nāma sarva karma bahirkṛtaḥ
a datvā vasudhām agre pūjana artha

original: nirmāti brāhmaṇaṃ bhūyo yajamānastu devalam // BhS_35.481 //
analyzed: nirmāti brāhmaṇam bhūyas yajamānaḥ tu devalam
na hi asmāt pātakam kiñcid brāhmaṇāyāḥ aparādhyati
a labdhvā devatāgāra nirmāṇa sadṛśam phalam
brahma ghna tvam anuprāpya vinaśyati na saṃśayaḥ
hartā hārayitā bhūmeḥ dattasya danu śāsinaḥ
tat kiṅkarāṇām anyeṣām yaḥ mūḍhaḥ sa tamaḥ vṛtaḥ
saṃbaddhaḥ vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyamāṇaḥ samantataḥ
duḥkhitaḥ narake bhūyas tiryagyoniṣu jāyate

original: svadattāṃ varadattāṃ vā yo hareta vasundharām // BhS_35.485 //
analyzed: sva dattām vara dattām vā yaḥ hareta vasundharām
ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣa sahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ
sva dattāt dviguṇam puṇyam para datta anu pālanam
para datta apahāreṇa sva dattam niṣpalam bhavet
anyāyena hṛtā bhūmiḥ anyāyena ena hāritā
harataḥ hārakasya api dahati āsaptamam kulam

original: pañca kanyānṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte // BhS_35.488 //
analyzed: pañca kanyā anṛte hanti daśa hanti gava anṛte
śatam aśva anṛte hanti sahasram puruṣa anṛte
hanti jātān ajātān ca hiraṇyār'dhe anṛtam vadan

original: sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti no brūyādanṛtaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: sarvam bhūmi anṛte hanti no brūyāt anṛtam kvacid
vindhya aṭavīṣu atoyāsu śuṣka kojara vāsinaḥ
kṛṣṇa sarpāḥ prajāyante deva brahma sva hāriṇaḥ
taṭākānām sahasreṇa hayamedha śatena ca
gavām koṭi pradānena śuddhi ati

original: brahmasvaṃ brahmahatyā ca daridrasya ca yaddhanam // BhS_35.492 //
analyzed: brahma svam brahmahatyā ca daridrasya ca yat dhanam
guru mitra dhanam ca eva svarga stham api pātayet

original: brahmasve no matiṃ kuryātprāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // BhS_35.493 //
analyzed: brahma sve naḥ matim kuryāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api
agni dagdhāḥ prarohānti brahma dagdhaḥ na rohati
na viṣam viṣam iti āhuḥ brahma svam viṣam ucyate
viṣam ekākinam hanti brahma svam putra pautrakam
brahma svam praṇayāt bhuktam dahati āsaptamam kulam
vikrameṇa tu bhoktṝṇām daśa pūrvān daśa avarān

original: lohacūrṇāṃśca cūrṇāṃśca viṣaṃ vā jarayetpumān // BhS_35.496 //
analyzed: loha cūrṇān ca cūrṇān ca viṣam vā jarayet pumān
brahma svam triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ pumān jarayiṣyati

original: devasvaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca lobheno pahinasti yaḥ // BhS_35.497 //
analyzed: deva svam brāhmaṇa svam ca lobhena u pahinasti yaḥ
sa pāpāt tu pare loke gṛdhra ucchiṣṭena jīvati
deva dravya vināśena brahma sva haraṇena ca
kulāni akula tām yānti brāhmaṇa atikrameṇa ca
sahasra sammitā dhenuḥ anaḍvān daśa dhenavaḥ
daśa avaḍvat samam yānam daśa yāna samaḥ hayaḥ

original: daśavājisamā kanyā bhūmidānena sā samā // BhS_35.500 //
analyzed: daśa vāji samā kanyā bhūmi dānena sā samā
ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣa sahasrāṇi svarge tiṣṭhati bhūmidhaḥ

original: ācchettācānumantā ca tānyena narake vaset // BhS_35.501 //
analyzed: ācchettā acā anumantā ca tān yena narake vaset
patanti aśrūṇi rudatām dīnānām avasīdatām

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyādāsaptamaṃ kulam // BhS_35.502 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām hṛte kṣetre hanyāt āsaptamam kulam
sādhubhyaḥ bhūmim ākṣipya na bhūmim vindate kvacid

original: dadaddhi bhūmiṃ sādhubhyo vindate phūmimuttamām // BhS_35.503 //
analyzed: dadat hi bhūmim sādhubhyaḥ vindate phūmim uttamām
arcakaḥ praṇidhiḥ yasmāt deveśasya jagatpateḥ
sa devaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ sādhuḥ mahat bhūtam pracakṣate
tasmāt tad arpitām vṛttim na eva śaṅketa buddhimān

original: tadarcakārpitāṃ bhūmiṃ yo hareta yateta vā // BhS_35.505 //
analyzed: tad arcaka arpitām bhūmim yaḥ hareta yateta vā

original: kiṃ punastasya vaktavyaṃ na bhavettasya niṣkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kim punar tasya vaktavyam na bhavet tasya niṣkṛtiḥ

original: na vācā śakyate vaktuṃ gatistasya durātmanaḥ // BhS_35.506 //
analyzed: na vācā śakyate vaktum gatiḥ tasya durātmanaḥ

original: mriyeta sadya evāsau jāyate 'tha punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: mriyeta sadyas eva asau jāyate atha punar punar

original: na tasya śaraṇaṃ kvāpi labhyate pāpakarmaṇaḥ // BhS_35.507 //
analyzed: na tasya śaraṇam kvāpi labhyate pāpa karmaṇaḥ
devasye api matim kuryāt prahma svam na haret kvacid
prāsāda maṇḍapa ādīnām bhoktāraḥ kaiṭabhadviṣaḥ
te mūḍha matayaḥ pretya narakeṣu niratyayāḥ

original: vasanti bhūyo jāyante nīcayoniṣu ca dhruvam // BhS_35.509 //
analyzed: vasanti bhūyas jāyante nīca yoniṣu ca dhruvam
bhūṣaṇa chatra vastra ādi hartā yaḥ durmatiḥ naraḥ

original: gale nigalitaḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyate nirayeṣu saḥ // BhS_35.510 //
analyzed: gale nigalitaḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyate nirayeṣu saḥ
vāhanāni ca yānāni vaiṣṇavāni
mohāt vasanti te dīrgha maṅgāra naraka udare
pretya bhūyas api jāyante gardabha uṣṭra ādi yoniṣu
candana ādīni vastūni puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi api
vrajanti svāni viṣṇoḥ te vrajante yāmya yātanām
anubhūya punar bhūyas jāyante gandhamūṣikāḥ
upānah pādukā pīṭha vāhanāni

original: uṣitvā narakeṣvete jāyante phaṇināṃ kule // BhS_35.514 //
analyzed: uṣitvā narakeṣu ete jāyante phaṇinām kule
go bhū hiraṇya vastra ādi dhanam viṣṇoḥ parigraham
āhṛtya ye anubhuñjante narakeṣu duratyayāḥ
uṣitvā pretya bhūyas api jāyante śva ādi yoniṣu
sarveṣu narakeṣu evam deva brahma sva hāriṇaḥ
nasanti mūḍha matayaḥ yāmya duḥkheṣu yātanāḥ
vāsudeva pratikṛteḥ bhedana chedana ādiṣu
vikrīḍā ādīn iyān yeṣu yatante pāpa cetasaḥ
ete yānti kramāt sarvān narakān bhṛśa dāruṇān
anyeṣu api apacāreṣu sthūla sūkṣmeṣu mānavāḥ

original: kṛtinaḥ pretya narake pacyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // BhS_35.519 //
analyzed: kṛtinaḥ pretya narake pacyante duḥkha bhāginaḥ
atha nitya arcanāyām vai deveśasya viśeṣataḥ

original: upacārādihāno tu pāpasyedaṃ phalaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.520 //
analyzed: tu pāpasya idam phalam bhavet
āsanasya vihīne tu dharma nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati
svāgate buddhi nāśaḥ syāt mūka tvam anumānake
vihīne pādukāyāḥ tu paṅgu tvam saṃbhavati uta
pādya hīne mahān rogaḥ kleśaḥ ca api bhaviṣyati
danta dhāvana hīne ca duṣṭa dantaḥ abhijāyate
tāṃbūla hīne vidveṣam kuṣṭam taila vihīnake
keśa saṃśodhane hīne gala rogaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: snānadravyavihīne ca snānahīne tathaiva ca // BhS_35.524 //
analyzed: snāna dravya vihīne ca snāna hīne tathā eva ca
rājayakṣmā bhavet rogaḥ pāpiṣṭhaḥ ca su dāruṇaḥ
plota hīne vāta rogaḥ vastra hīne jalodaraḥ
saṃvyāna hīne hṛd rogaḥ yajñasūtra vihīnake

original: agnidāhabhayaṃ caiva mandāgnitvaṃ ca jāyate // BhS_35.526 //
analyzed: agni dāha bhayam ca eva manda agni tvam ca jāyate
gandha hīne ca kuṣṭhaḥ syāt bhūṣā hīne mahat bhayam
puṣpa hīne tu alābhaḥ syāt tathā ca kapha saṃbhavaḥ
śūdra āhṛtaiḥ kraya krītaiḥ arcanam niṣphalam sumaiḥ
araṇyāt vā agṛhāt vā api vikrītāni āpaṇa antarāt
a yācitāni puṣpāṇi labdhāni arhāṇi na ar'cane
tathā paryuṣitaiḥ yā api jantubhiḥ dūṣitaiḥ api
mlānaiḥ aspṛśya saṃspṛṣṭaiḥ durgandhaiḥ pāda laṅghitaiḥ
pratiloma antya jānītaiḥ arcanam tu aphalam bhavet
uttamam sva arjitam puṣpam madhyamam vanyam ucyate
adhamam tu kraya krītam pārakyam adhama adhamam
hasta ānītam paṭa ānītam svayam patitam eva vā

original: anyārāmodbhavaṃ puṣpaṃ nār'payediti ke cana // BhS_35.532 //
analyzed: anya ārāma udbhavam puṣpam na ār'payet iti ke cana

original: ārahare ca śukre ca manvādiṣu yugādiṣu /
analyzed: ārahare ca śukre ca manu ādiṣu yuga ādiṣu
na āharet tulasī patram madhyāhnāt paratas tathā
saṃkrāntyām pakṣayoḥ ante dvādaśyoḥ niśi saṃdhyayoḥ

original: tulasīṃ ye vicinvanti te kṛntanti hareśśiraḥ // BhS_35.534 //
analyzed: tulasīm ye vicinvanti te kṛntanti hareḥ śiraḥ
bhṛgu arka aṃgārake vāre dvādaśyām pañca parvasu
na āharet tulasī patram nandāyām śravaṇe api ca
keśa kīṭa apaviddhāni śīrṇa paryuṣitāni ca

original: bhugnapatraṃ na ca grāhyaṃ kṛmiduṣṭaṃ ca nāharet // BhS_35.536 //
analyzed: bhugna patram na ca grāhyam kṛmi duṣṭam ca na āharet

original: sthalajaṃ noddharetpuṣpaṃ chedayejjalajaṃ na tu // BhS_35.537 //
analyzed: sthala jam nā uddharet puṣpam chedayet jala jam na tu

na viśīrṇataraiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ na aśubhaiḥ na avikāsibhiḥ
pūti gandha ugrandhāni hi ugra gandhāni varjayet

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye ke citpuṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti vaidvijāḥ /
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā tu ye ke cit puṣpam gṛhṇanti vai dvijāḥ
devatāḥ tat na gṛhṇanti tat na gṛhṇanti mānavāḥ

original: snānaṃ kṛtvātu madhyāhne puṣpāṇi na samāharet // BhS_35.541 //
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā tu madhyāhne puṣpāṇi na samāharet
tebhyaḥ kruddhaḥ akṣayam duḥkham krodhāt viṣṇuḥ prayacchati
anya deva ar'tha sandiṣṭaiḥ pūjayet yaḥ harim prabhum

original: sa tu tenaiva pāpena maṇḍūko jāyate naraḥ /
analyzed: sa tu tena eva pāpena maṇḍūkaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: sa pūti gandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva prajāyate // BhS_35.544 //
analyzed: sa pūti gandha saṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī ca eva prajāyate

original: janmadvayaṃ tu vai mūḍhaśśūdratāṃ yāti mānavaḥ /
analyzed: janma dvayam tu vai mūḍhaḥ śūdra tām yāti mānavaḥ
a sūtra grathitam puṣpam a sneha aktam tathā odanam
bhavet
etaiḥ tu pūjanāt sadyas niṣphalāḥ sakalāḥ kriyāḥ

original: arghyahīne tu devasya kulaṃ bhavati ninditam /

rakṣā nīrājane hīne rāṅgasaiḥ
āvṛtiḥ bhavet
veda adhyayana hīne tu karma lopaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: havirnivedane hīne durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.550 //
analyzed: haviḥ nivedane hīne durbhikṣam bhavati dhruvam

original: hīne bhakṣyādike caiva vividhe haviṣī prabho // BhS_35.552 //
analyzed: hīne bhakṣya ādike ca eva vividhe haviṣī prabho
tat grāma yajamānasya viśeṣeṇa aśubham bhavet

kāle yavanikā hīne kartā ca eva vinaśyati

original: śāntasya pūjane hīne tathā caivānapāyinām // BhS_35.555 //
analyzed: śāntasya pūjane hīne tathā ca eva anapāyinām
rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya sarvasya vināśaḥ syāt na saṃśayaḥ

pāpa roga ādi pīḍā ca bhaviṣyati tathā punar
sarpa vṛścika lūtā ādyaiḥ hāniḥ ca eva bhavet bahu
nyūne vā mantra varjite

original: bhūtapīṭhasya pārśve vā dakṣiṇe vā viśeṣataḥ, /
analyzed: bhūtapīṭhasya pārśve vā dakṣiṇe vā viśeṣataḥ
bhūta ādi nāga paryantam bali arcana vihīnake

original: śrīdevyā arcane hīne saṃpadāṃ tu bhavet kṣayaḥ // BhS_35.560 //
analyzed: śrī devyāḥ arcane hīne saṃpadām tu bhavet kṣayaḥ

original: agnipūjāvihīne tu nyūne vā mantravarjite // BhS_35.561 //
analyzed: agni pūjā vihīne tu nyūne vā mantra varjite

analyzed: bala kṣayaḥ janānām syāt pitṝṇām patanam bhavet

original: biṃbanyāsavihīne tu kalatraṃ tasya naśyati // BhS_35.567 //
analyzed: biṃbanyāsa vihīne tu kalatram tasya naśyati

original: dakṣiṇādānahīne tu sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet /
analyzed: dakṣiṇā dāna hīne tu sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet
rāṣṭrasya yajamānasya rājñaḥ ca api bhavet bhayam

artha hāniḥ prajā hāniḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: utsave ca viśeṣaṇa yajamānabhayaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.574 //
analyzed: utsave ca yajamāna bhayam bhavet

original: viṣude cāyane caiva hīne tatroktakarmaṇi // BhS_35.575 //
analyzed: viṣude ca ayane ca eva hīne tatra ukta karmaṇi

original: nimitte yadi saṃprāpte snāpayeccenna mādhavam // BhS_35.578 //
analyzed: nimitte yadi saṃprāpte snāpayet ced na mādhavam

original: tasya pāpaphalaṃ naktuṃ na kenāpi hi śakyate /

original: rājño rāṣṭrasya ca bhavetsarvatrātyāhitaṃ dhruvam // BhS_35.579 //

original: mṛtsuhīnānu nāśassyātsasyānāṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.580 //

original: dhānyeṣu tu vihīneṣu dyānyanāśo bhavettathā // BhS_35.581 //
analyzed: dhānyeṣu tu vihīneṣu bhavet tathā

apacārāḥ
apacārāḥ tathā viṣṇoḥ dvātriṃśat parikīrtitāḥ

original: na śruṇvanti ca ye mūḍhāssādhūktaṃ dharmagauravam // BhS_36.27 //
