aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ eva etāḥ pāpānām yātanā ātmanām

original: tāsāṃ krameṇa vijñeyāḥ pañca pañcaikanāyakāḥ // BhS_36.41 //
analyzed: tāsām krameṇa vijñeyāḥ pañca pañca eka nāyakāḥ
pratyekam sarva koṭīnām nāmataḥ tān nibodhata

original: rauravaḥ prathamasteṣāṃ rudante yatra dehinaḥ // BhS_36.42 //
analyzed: rauravaḥ prathamaḥ teṣām rudante yatra dehinaḥ
mahārauravakaḥ yatra mahāntaḥ api rudanti ca

original: tamaśśītaṃ yathā coṣṇaṃ pañcādyā nāyakāssmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.43 //
analyzed: tamaḥ śītam yathā ca uṣṇam pañca ādyāḥ nāyakāḥ smṛtāḥ
su ghoraḥ su tapaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ padmaḥ sam jīvanaḥ śataḥ
mahāmāṃsaḥ vilomaḥ ca subhīmaḥ ca kaṭaṅkaṭaḥ
tīvra veṣī karālaḥ ca vikarālaḥ prakampanaḥ
mahāpadmaḥ supadmaḥ ca kālavakraḥ ca garjanaḥ
sūcīmukhaḥ sunemiḥ ca khādakaḥ suprapīḍanaḥ
kuṃbhīpākaḥ supākaḥ ca cakrakaḥ ca ati dāruṇaḥ
aṅgāra rāśi pha vanamasṛj pūya cahadraḥ tathā
tīkṣṇāyastuṇḍa śakuniḥ mahā saṃvartakaḥ tatā
sutaptābjaḥ sulopaḥ ca pūtimāṃsaḥ dravatrapu
ucchvāsaḥ ca sudīrghaḥ kūṭaśālmalī
darīṣṭaḥ su mahā nāda prabhāvaḥ su prabhāvanaḥ
ṛkṣa meṣa vṛkāḥ śalya siṃha vyāghra gaja ānanāḥ
śva sūka rāja mahiṣa khara meṣa haya ānanāḥ
graha kuṃbhīra nakra āsyāḥ sarpa kūrma āsya vāyasāḥ
kṛdhra ulūka jalūkāḥ ca śārdūla kapi karkaṭāḥ
gandhakaḥ pūtivakraḥ ca raktākṣaḥ pūtimṛttikaḥ
kaṇa dhūmaḥ tuṣa agniḥ ca kṛmīṇām nicayaḥ tathā
amedhyaḥ ca apratīkāraḥ rudhira annasya bhojanam
lālā bhakṣam a bhakṣaḥ ca sarva bhakṣaḥ ca dāruṇaḥ
jaṅkaṭaḥ suvilāsaḥ ca vikaṭaḥ kaṭapūtanaḥ
ambarīṣaḥ kaṭāhaḥ ca kaṣṭā vaitaraṇī nadī
su tapta loha śayanam eka pāda prataptakam
asitāla vanam ghoram asthi bhaṅga prapīḍanam
tila atasī kṣu yāntra āṇikūṭa pāśa pramardanam
mahā chullī suchullī ca tapta loha mayī śilā
parvata kṣuradhāra ākhyam tathā ca mala parvataḥ
mūtra viṣṭhā aṃdhakūpeṣu kṣārakūpeṣu pātanam
musala ulūkhalam yantram śilā śakala lāṅgalam
tāla patra asi gahanam mahā maśaka maṇḍapam
sammohanaḥ asthibhaṅgaḥ ca tapuḥśūlam ayaḥ guḍaḥ
bahu duḥkham mahā duḥkham kaśmalam śamalam malam
hālāhalaḥ nirūpaḥ ca surūpaḥ ca tamaḥ anugaḥ
ekapādaḥ tripādaḥ ca tīvravīciḥ ca rantimaḥ
aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ eva etaiḥ kramaśas pañcakāḥ smṛtāḥ
koṭīnām anu pūrvyeṇa pañca pañca eva nāyakāḥ

original: rauravādyaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca śatamekantu sarvataḥ // BhS_36.61 //
analyzed: raurava ādyam ca vīryam ca śatam ekam tu sarvatas
catvāriṃśat samadhikam mahānaraka maṇḍalam
teṣu pāpāḥ prapacyante narāḥ karma anurūpataḥ
yātanābhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ ākarma prakṣayāt bhṛśam
su sūḍham hastayoḥ baddhvā atapta śṛṅkhalayāḥ narāḥ
mahāvṛṅgara śākhāsu gamyante iyam akiṅkaraiḥ
ḍolitāḥ ca ati vegena nissaṃjñāḥ yānti yojanam
antarikṣa sthitānām ca loha bhāra śatam tatas
pādayoḥ badhyate teṣām yamadūtaiḥ mahā balaiḥ
tena bhāreṇa mahatā bhṛśam ātāḍitāḥ anarāḥ

original: ākhyāntassvāni karmāṇi tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭanti vihvalāḥ // BhS_36.66 //
analyzed: ākhyāntaḥ svāni karmāṇi tūṣṇīm tiṣṭanti vihvalāḥ
tatas taptaiḥ agni varṇaiḥ loha daṇḍaiḥ sa kaṇṭakaiḥ
hanyante kiṅkaraiḥ ghoraiḥ samartāt pāpa kāriṇaḥ
tatas kṣāreṇa dīptena vahneḥ api viśeṣataḥ

original: samantataḥ pralipyante tāmreṇa ca punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.68 //
analyzed: samantataḥ pralipyante tāmreṇa ca punar punar
drutena atyanta liptena kṣata aṅgāḥ jarjarīkṛtāḥ
punar vidhāya ca aṅgāni śiraḥ prabhṛti cakramāt
vārtāka vat prapacyante tapta taile kaṭāhake
niṣṭhā pūrṇe tathā ākūpe kṛmīṇām nicaye punar
medaḥ asṛj pūya pūrṇāyām vāpyām kṣipyanti te punar
bhakṣyante kṛmibhiḥ tīvraiḥ lohatuṇḍaiḥ ca vāyasaiḥ
śvabhiḥ daṃśaiḥ vṛkaiḥ ugraiḥ vyāghraiḥ ca vikṛtaiḥ naraiḥ
pacyante caru vat vā api pradīpta aṅgāra rāśiṣu
protāḥ tīkṣṇeṣu śūleṣu narāḥ pāpena karmaṇā
śaila pīṭhaiḥ atha ākramya ghoraiḥ karmabhiḥ ātmajaiḥ
tila vat saṃprapīḍyante cakra ākhye narake narāḥ
pacyante ca atitapteṣu loha bhāṇḍeṣu anekathā
taila pūrṇa kaṭāheṣu su tapteṣu punar punar
sarda indriyāṇi saṃbaddhya kramāt pāpena yātanāḥ

original: bhavanti ghorāḥ pratyekaṃ śarīre tatkṛtena ca /
analyzed: bhavanti ghorāḥ pratyekam śarīre tad kṛtena ca

original: ye śruṇvanti harernindāṃ teṣāṃ karṇaḥ prapūryate // BhS_36.76 //
analyzed: ye śruṇvanti hareḥ nindām teṣām karṇaḥ prapūryate
agni na ṛṇaiḥ ayaḥkīlaiḥ taptaiḥ tāmra ādika drutaiḥ
trapu sīsa ārakūrakūṭa ādyaiḥ kṣāreṇa jatunā punar
su tapta tīkṣṇa tailena vajra lepena ca antatas
kramāt āpūryate karṇau
narakeṣu ca yātanāḥ
anukrameṇa sarveṣu bhramanti eteṣu yātanāḥ

original: ye tu deva gṛhaṃ gatvā tatra sevārthamāgatāḥ // BhS_36.79 //
analyzed: ye tu deva gṛham gatvā tatra sevā artham āgatāḥ
atha vā anyatra tad rūpāḥ mada moha parājitāḥ
para dārān ca gacchanti lubdhāḥ snigdhena cakṣuṣā
guroḥ kurvanti bhrukuṭīm krūra netrāḥ caye narāḥ
sūcībhiḥ agni varṇābhiḥ teṣām cakṣuḥ pravidhyate
kṣāra ādyaiḥ ca kramāt sarvaiḥ dehe sarvāḥ ca yātanāḥ
sparśa lobhena ye mūḍhāḥ saṃspṛśanti para striyaḥ
teṣām tapta agni varṇābhiḥ sūcībhiḥ vidhyate karaḥ
tatas kṣāra ādikaiḥ sarvam śarīram anulipyate
yātanāḥ ca mahā kaṣṭāḥ sarveṣu narakeṣu ca
pareṣu ajanti ca ati ugram pradīptam loha śālmalim
hanyante pṛṣṭha deśeṣu punar bhīmaiḥ mahā balaiḥ
dantureṇa ati kuṇṭhena krakacena balīyasā
śilaḥ pṛbhṛti pāṭyante ghoraiḥ karmabhiḥ ātmajaiḥ
tena tena eva rūpeṇa hanyante pāradārikāḥ
gāḍham āliṅgyate nārī jvalantī loha nirmitā

original: pūrvākālaṃ jvalantaṃ taṃ pūruṣaṃ lohanirmitam // BhS_36.87 //
analyzed: pūrvākālam jvalantam tam pūruṣam loha nirmitam
duścāriṇyaḥ strīyaḥ gāḍham āliṅganti vadanti ca

original: kiṃ pradhāvasi vegena na te moho 'sti saṃprati // BhS_36.88 //
analyzed: kim pradhāvasi vegena na te mohaḥ asti saṃprati

original: laṅghitaste yathā bhartā pāpaṃ bhuṅkṣva tadādhunā /
analyzed: laṅghitaḥ te yathā bhartā pāpam bhuṅkṣva tadā adhunā
loha kuṃbhe vinikṣiptāḥ sa apidhāne śanais śanais
mṛdu agninā prapacyante sva pāpaiḥ iva mānavāḥ

original: ulūkhalādyaiḥ kṣodyante prapīḍyante śilāsu ca // BhS_36.90 //
analyzed: ulūkhala ādyaiḥ kṣodyante prapīḍyante śilāsu ca
kṣipyante ca andhakūpeṣu daśyante bhramaraiḥ bhṛśam
kṛmibhiḥ bhinna sarva aṅgāḥ śataśas jarjarīkṛtāḥ
su tīkṣṇa kṣura kūpeṣu kṣipyante tad anantaram

original: mahajvāle ca narake pāpāḥ pacyanti sarvataḥ // BhS_36.92 //
analyzed: mahajvāle ca narake pāpāḥ pacyanti sarvatas
itas tatas ca dhāvanti dahyamānāḥ tad arciṣā

original: pṛṣṭhenānīya jaṅghe dve vinyaste srandhayojite // BhS_36.93 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhena ānīya jaṅghe dve vinyaste srandha yojite
tayoḥ madhyena ca ākṛṣya bāhu pṛṣṭhena gāḍhatas

original: baddhvā parasparaṃ sarvaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ pāparajjubhiḥ // BhS_36.94 //
analyzed: baddhvā parasparam sarvam su dṛḍham pāpa rajjubhiḥ
piṇḍa baddham daśanti enam bhramārāḥ tīkṣṇaloha jāḥ

original: mānināṃ krodhināṃ caiva taskarāṇāṃ ca dāruṇāḥ // BhS_36.95 //
analyzed: māninām krodhinām ca eva taskarāṇām ca dāruṇāḥ
piṇḍa baddhāḥ smṛtāḥ yāmya mahājvāle ca yātanāḥ
rijjubhiḥ veṣṭita aṃgāḥ ca praliptāḥ kardamena ca
karīṣa vat prapacyante mriyante tena te tathā
su tīkṣṇa kṣāra toyena śilāsu ca
apāpa saṃkṣayāt pāpāḥ ghṛṣyante candanam yathā
śarīra abhyantara gataiḥ santatam kṛmibhiḥ narāḥ
bhakṣyante tīvra vadanaiḥ ādeha prakṣayāt bhṛśam

original: kṛmīṇāṃ nicaye kṣiptāḥ pūtimāṃsasya rāśiṣu // BhS_36.99 //
analyzed: kṛmīṇām nicaye kṣiptāḥ pūti māṃsasya rāśiṣu
tiṣṭhanti udvigna hṛdayāḥ parvata abhyantara arditāḥ
su tapta vajra lepena śarīram upalipyate
adhomukha ūrdhva pādāḥ ca vṛtāḥ stapyanti vahninā
vadana antar pravinyastam su prataptam ayaḥ guḍam
te khādanti para adhīnāḥ hanyamānāḥ ca mudgaraiḥ
ye deva ārāma puṣpāṇi lobhāt saṃsṛhya pāṇinā
jighranti mūḍha manasaḥ śirasā dhārayanti ca
āropyate śiraḥ teṣām su taptaiḥ loha śaṅkubhiḥ
tatas kṣāreṇa dīptena taila tāmra ādibhiḥ kramāt
śarīre ca mahā ghorāḥ citrāḥ naraka yātanāḥ
bahudhā utpāṭyate jīhvā ye asatya priya vādinaḥ
saṃdaṃśena su taptena prapīḍya urasi pādataḥ
midhyā āgama pravaktuḥ ca jīhvā ca asya vinirgatā
krośa ardha jīhvā vistīrṇaiḥ halaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ prapāṭyate
nirbhartsayanti ye krūrāḥ mātaram pitaram gurum
teṣām vajra jalūkābhiḥ mukham ādaśyate yatas
tataḥkṣāreṇa tāmreṇa trapuṇā sicyate punar
drutaiḥ āpūryate atyartham tapta lohaiḥ ca tad mukham
itas tatas punar dhāvan baddhyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ
ye nindanti mahātmānam ācāryam dharma deśikam
viṣṇu bhaktān ca sammūḍhāḥ tad dharmam ca eha śāśvatam

original: teṣāmurasi kanthe ca jihmāyāṃ dantasandhiṣu // BhS_36.110 //
analyzed: teṣām urasi kanthe ca jihmāyām danta sandhiṣu
tāluni oṣṭhe ca nāsāyām mūrdhni sarva aṃga sandhiṣu
agni varṇāḥ su taptāḥ ca tri śikhāḥ loha śaṅkavaḥ
āropyante su bahuśas sthāneṣu eteṣu mudgaraiḥ

original: tataḥ kṣāreṇa taptena tāmreṇa trapuṇā punaḥ // BhS_36.112 //
analyzed: tatas kṣāreṇa taptena tāmreṇa trapuṇā punar
tapta loha ādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ āpūryante samantataḥ
yātanāḥ ca mahā citrāḥ śarīrasya api sarvatas
niśśeṣa narakeṣu evam bhramanti kramaśas punar

original: ye gṛhṇanti paradravyaṃ padbhyāṃ vipraṃ spṛśanti ca // BhS_36.114 //
analyzed: ye gṛhṇanti para dravyam padbhyām vipram spṛśanti ca

original: devopakaraṇāṃgaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca likhitaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: deva upakaraṇa aṃgam ca jñānam ca likhitam kvacid
hasta pāda āghanaiḥ te ṣām āpūryante samantataḥ
kṣāra tāmra ādibhiḥ dhīptaiḥ dahyante kramaśas punar

original: narakeṣu ca sarveṣu vicitrā dehayātanāḥ // BhS_36.116 //
analyzed: narakeṣu ca sarveṣu vicitrāḥ deha yātanāḥ
bhavanti bahuśas kaṣṭāḥ pāṇi pāda samudbhavāḥ

original: pradattāṃ devadevasya tannāmnā pūjakasya vā // BhS_36.117 //
analyzed: pradattām devadevasya tad nāmnā pūjakasya vā
pada ardhinām atha anyeṣām haṭhāt vṛttim haranti ye
te vai naraka kūpeṣu pacyamānāḥ sva karmabhiḥ
vrajanti yātanāḥ bhūyas na atiyanti yāma aṅgaṇam
ye devāyatana ārāma vāpī kūpa maṭha aṅgaṇam
upadravanti pāpiṣṭhāḥ nṛpāḥ tatra vasanti ca
vyāyāma udvartana abhyaṅga snāna pāna anna bhojanam
krīḍanam maithunam dyūtam aśauca ādi ācaranti ca
te nadhaiḥ vividhaiḥ ghoraiḥ ikṣu yantra ādi pīḍanaiḥ
niraya agniṣu pacyante yāvat ācandratārakam
devāyatana paryante devārāme ca kutracid
samutsṛjanti ye mūḍhāḥ purīṣam mūtram eva vā

original: teṣāṃ śiśnaṃ savṛṣaṇaṃ hanyate lohamudgaraiḥ, // BhS_36.123 //
analyzed: teṣām śiśnam sa vṛṣaṇam hanyate loha mudgaraiḥ
sūcībhīḥ netra paryantaiḥ agni varṇaiḥ sa kaṇṭakaiḥ

original: aropyante gude teṣāṃ yāvanmūrdhni vinirgataiḥ // BhS_36.124 //
analyzed: aropyante gude teṣām yāvat mūrdhni vinirgataiḥ

original: tataḥ kṣāreṇa mahatā tāmreṇa trapuṇā punaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṣāreṇa mahatā tāmreṇa trapuṇā punar

original: drutenāpūryate gāḍhaṃ gudaṃ śiśnaṃ ca dehinām // BhS_36.125 //
analyzed: drutena āpūryate gāḍham gudam śiśnam ca dehinām
manaḥ sarva indriyāṇām ca yasmāt uktam pravartanam
tasmāt indriya duḥkhena jāyate tat su duḥkhitam
anna pānam adattam yaiḥ mūḍhaiḥ na api anumoditam

original: dhane satyapi ye dānaṃ na ca yacchanti tṛṣṇayā // BhS_36.127 //
analyzed: dhane sati api ye dānam na ca yacchanti tṛṣṇayā
atithim ca avamanyante kāla prāptam gṛhāśrame
tejaḥ hīnāḥ raṇe baddhāḥ hasta pādāna dhāritāḥ
vistārita aṃgāḥ śuṣyanti tiṣṭhanti abda śatam narāḥ
hasta pāda lalāṭeṣu kīlitāḥ loha śaṅkubhiḥ
nityam ca vikṛtam vakram kīlaka dvaya ghāṭitam
kṛmibhiḥ prāṇibhiḥ ca ugraiḥ lohatuṇḍaiḥ ca vāyasaiḥ
upadravaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ mukham antar prapīḍyate

original: jihvā tataḥ prabhinnā ca gāḍhaṃ śṛṅkhalayā punaḥ // BhS_36.131 //
analyzed: jihvā tatas prabhinnā ca gāḍham śṛṅkhalayā punar
tiṣṭanti laṃbamānāḥ ca loha ākārāḥ su vartulāḥ
tatas sva māṃsam utkṛṣya tila mātra pramāṇataḥ

original: khādituṃ dīyate teṣāṃ sūcyagreṇa ca śoṇitam /
analyzed: khāditum dīyate teṣām sūci agreṇa ca śoṇitam

original: yathā nirmāṃsatāṃ prāptāḥ kālena bahudhā punaḥ // BhS_36.133 //
analyzed: yathā nirmāṃsa tām prāptāḥ kālena bahudhā punar
tatas kṣāreṇa dīptena tat śarīram pralipyate

original: bhidyante varṣa dhārābhiśśuṣyante vāyunā punaḥ // BhS_36.134 //
analyzed: bhidyante varṣa dhārābhiḥ śuṣyante vāyunā punar
punar tailena sicyante su taptena samantataḥ
iti citravidhaiḥ ghoraiḥ madhya mānāḥ sva karma jaiḥ
mriyante na eva pāpiṣṭhāḥ yāvat pāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ

original: tasmātpāpaṃ na kurvīta cañcale jīvite sati // BhS_36.136 //
analyzed: tasmāt pāpam na kurvīta cañcale jīvite sati
evam kliṣṭāḥ viśiṣṭāḥ ca sa avaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā

original: tataḥ kṣitiṃ samāsādya jāyante dehinaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.137 //
analyzed: tatas kṣitim samāsādya jāyante dehinaḥ punar
sthāvarāḥ vividhāḥ krūrāḥ tṛṇa gulma ādi bheditaḥ
tatra anubhūya duḥkhāni jāyante kīṭa yoniṣu
niṣkrāntāḥ kīṭa yonibhyaḥ jāyante pakṣiṇaḥ kramāt
saṃkliṣṭāḥ pakṣi bhevena bhavanti mṛga jātiṣu
mārgam duḥgham atikramya jāyante paśu yoniṣu
kramāt go yonim āsādya jāyante mānuṣe punar
vyutkrameṇa api mānuṣyam prāpyate puṇya gauravāt
tatas manuṣya tām prāpya tad tad pāpa anusārataḥ
saṃyutām pāpa cihneḥ ca vartante prāṇinaḥ tatas
deva abhigamanam
snātaḥ dhṛta ūrdhva puṇḍraḥ ca prayataḥ śānta mānasaḥ
avyagraḥ ca anya kāryeṣu gṛhītvā śaktitaḥ svayam
phala ādīni upahārāṇi gandhān sumanasaḥ tathā
hiraṇyam harim uddiśya yena sarvāḥ kṛtāḥ ime
upahāra ādibhiḥ samyak abhisacchet jagadgurum
patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ vā api yathāśakti samarpitaiḥ
ayatna sulabhena api toyena api sa tuṣyati
pāda cārī eva gacchet tu devālayam atandritaḥ

original: aśakto 'pyatha vāśakta āḍhyo vā durvidho 'dha vā // BhS_36.146 //
analyzed: aśaktaḥ api atha vā aśaktaḥ āḍhyaḥ vā durvidhaḥ adha vā
ādhirājye jagaddhātuḥ adhikārī

original: na hi saṃharate jyotsnāṃ candraścaṇḍālaveśmani // BhS_36.147 //
analyzed: na hi saṃharate jyotsnām candraḥ caṇḍāla veśmani

original: na vā saudheṣu samrājāṃ sudhādhārāḥ pravarṣati /
analyzed: na vā saudheṣu samrājām sudhā dhārāḥ pravarṣati
teṣām m eka ākāram kaleparam

original: anugṛhṇāti dātā tasya noccānaco vidhiḥ viṣṇupāramyam /
analyzed: anugṛhṇāti dātā tasya na uccānacaḥ vidhiḥ viṣṇu pāramyam

original: devateha parañjyotireka eva paraḥ pumān // BhS_36.149 //
analyzed: devatā iha paran jyotiḥ ekaḥ eva paraḥ pumān

original: sa eva bahudhā loke māyayā bhidyate svayā /
analyzed: saḥ eva bahudhā loke māyayā bhidyate svayā

original: viṣṇvākhyassa svayaṃ māyaṃ prakṛtiṃ vyajya sa dvidhā // BhS_36.150 //
analyzed: viṣṇu ākhyaḥ sa svayam māyam prakṛtim vyajya sa dvidhā
sthitaḥ tridhā ca sattva ādi guṇa bhedāt pratīyate
viṣṇu brahma śiva ākhyaḥ asau sthiti utpati anta kṛt smṛtaḥ
viṣṇu ādyāḥ mūrtayaḥ tasya dharma jñāna ādi bhedataḥ

original: catasra eva vijñeyā vedavarṇa yugāśrayāḥ // BhS_36.152 //
analyzed: catasraḥ eva vijñeyāḥ vedavarṇa yuga āśrayāḥ
viṣṇuḥ ca puruṣaḥ satyaḥ hi acyutaḥ cha aniruddhakaḥ
pañcadhā upaniṣad bhedāt mahābhūta tvam āgataḥ
manaḥ śrotra ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ ca hṛdaya ādibhiḥ
ṣaṣ akṣara ātmakaḥ nityam ṛṣibhiḥ ca eṣa bhidyate
sapta vyāhṛtibhiḥ lokaiḥ chandobhiḥ kratubhiḥ tathā
saptadhā bhidyamānaḥ asau vijñātavyaḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
aṣṭa prakṛtibhiḥ ca asau aṣṭa mūrtibhiḥ eva ca
aṣṭa akṣara mayaḥ nityam aṣṭadhā ca eṣa bhidyate
nārāyaṇaḥ nṛsiṃhaḥ ca varāhaḥ vāmanaḥ tathā
rāma brahma indra sūryāḥ ca candraḥ taiḥ na vadhā sthitiḥ
indraḥ yamaḥ ca eva nirṛtiḥ varuṇaḥ tathā
vāyuḥ somaḥ tathā īśānaḥ brahmā anantaḥ ca te daśa
ekādaśa indriyaiḥ bhinnaḥ tathā dvādaśa mānapaiḥ

original: sa trayodaśadhā caiva viśvedevādibhiḥ sthitaḥ // BhS_36.159 //
analyzed: sa trayodaśadhā ca eva viśvedeva ādibhiḥ sthitaḥ
sa caturdaśadhā bhinnaḥ manubhiḥ cākṣuṣa ādibhiḥ

original: tithibhiḥ pañcadaśadhā bhinno jñeyassu vai prabhuḥ // BhS_36.160 //
analyzed: tithibhiḥ pañcadaśadhā bhinnaḥ vai prabhuḥ
svaraiḥ ṣoḍaśadhā bhinna udiś koṇa avāntaraiḥ tathā

original: mūrtyantaraiśca vijñeyo bahudhā tasya vistaraḥ // BhS_36.161 //
analyzed: mūrti antaraiḥ ca vijñeyaḥ bahudhā tasya vistaraḥ
eka dvi tri catur pañca ṣaṣ ādyāḥ viśvatas mukhāḥ
mukha bhedāḥ samākhyātāḥ tasya viśvātmanaḥ hareḥ
dvi ādayaḥ viśvatas pāṇeḥ bhuja bhedaḥ tathā smṛtāḥ
vividha ābharaṇāḥ dīrghāḥ vividha āyudha dhāriṇaḥ
mūrdhānaḥ ca eva tasya uktāḥ lasat mukuṭa kuṇḍalāḥ
haima ūrdhva puḍra lāvaṇya prabhavāḥ vakra kuntalāḥ
smera aruṇa adharāḥ saumyāḥ prasāda amṛta varṣiṇaḥ
sahasram pauruṣe sūkte pādāḥ ca akṣīṇi anekaśas
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ aneka ātmā vimalaḥ śyāmaḥ eva ca

original: nīlaḥ pītastathā rakto nānāvarṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhS_36.166 //
analyzed: nīlaḥ pītaḥ tathā raktaḥ nānā varṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
tasya nayane vāma dakṣiṇe
brahmāṇam āhuḥ mūrdhānam keśān ca asya vanaspatīn

original: āsyaṃ vedāśca ye 'nantā toyaṃ rudhirameva ca /
analyzed: āsyam vedāḥ ca ye anantā toyam rudhiram eva ca
upajihvā tu tasya uktam upaśruti śatam tathā

original: bhruvormadhye tathā rudraṃ bhṛguṃ manasi saṃsthitam /
analyzed: bhruvoḥ madhye tathā rudram bhṛgum manasi saṃsthitam

original: rudrā ekādaśa jñe yā stasya kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritā // BhS_36.169 //
analyzed: rudrāḥ ekādaśa jñe yāḥ stasya kaṇṭham samāśritā
nakṣatra graha tārāḥ ca dantāḥ syuḥ marutaḥ api ca
dharma adharmau tathā ūrdhva adhara uṣṭhau tu parikīrtitau
indra agnī tāluke tasya jihmā ca eva sarasvatī
diśaḥ ca vidiśaḥ ca eva saṃsmṛtāḥ
vāyuḥ prāṇeṣu vijñeyaḥ sādhyāḥ ca aṃgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ
ṛṣayaḥ romakūpeṣu sāgarāḥ vasti gocarāḥ

original: nadyaśca vasudhā cāsya nāgāśca nalake sthitāḥ /
analyzed: nadyaḥ ca vasudhā ca asya nāgāḥ ca nalake sthitāḥ
jānu sthau aśvinau devau parvatāḥ ca ūru saṃsthitāḥ
guhyaḥ asya guhyakāḥ jñeyāḥ vasavaḥ ca urasi sthitāḥ

original: nakhāgreṣu ca vijñeyā divyā oṣadhayas tathā // BhS_36.174 //
analyzed: nakha agreṣu ca vijñeyāḥ divyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ tathā
nāsikāyāḥ puṭau jñeyau ayane dakṣiṇa uttare

original: ṛtavo bāhumūle tu māsāḥ karataleṣu ca // BhS_36.175 //
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ bāhumūle tu māsāḥ kara taleṣu ca
lalāṭa agre tathā siddhāḥ bhruvoḥ meghāḥ sa vidyutaḥ
yakṣa kinnara gandharvāḥ daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ tathā
rākṣasāḥ cāraṇāḥ ca asya jaṭharam sa musā āśritāḥ
pitaraḥ preta kūśmāṇḍa vetāla pramathāḥ tathā
pātāla gocarāḥ ca asya pāva yugmam samāśritāḥ
pārśvayoḥ tasya vijñeyāḥ kriyāḥ vedaiḥ abhiṣṭutāḥ
agnihotra ādi karmāṇi varṇa āśrama hitāni ca
svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāḥ rāḥ sarve asya hṛdaye śritāḥ

original: nāmnāṃ śataṃ sahasraṃ vā tathānantaṃ paṭhantiyat /
analyzed: nāmnām śatam sahasram vā tathā anantam
ananta ananta rūpasya yathāyogam samanvitam
mūrtayaḥ ca asya sarvāḥ tāḥ saṃkhyā atītāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: devādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ mūrtayastatra saṃśritāḥ // BhS_36.181 //
analyzed: deva ādīnām ca sarveṣām mūrtayaḥ tatra saṃśritāḥ
puṃsūkte tat udīritam
sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ sahasra pād

original: brāhmaṇā mukhate yasya kṣatriyā yasya bāhutaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ yasya kṣatriyāḥ yasya bāhutaḥ

original: ūruto yasya vai jātā vaiśyāśceti narā bhuvi // BhS_36.183 //
analyzed: ūrutaḥ yasya vai jātāḥ vaiśyāḥ ca iti narāḥ bhuvi
candramāḥ manasaḥ jātaḥ cakṣuṣā ūrmi hiraḥ tathā
mūkhāt indraḥ tathā agniḥ ca prāṇāt vāyuḥ ajāyata
nābhyāyasya antarikṣam ca śirasaḥ dyauḥ ajāyata
padbhyām bhūmiḥ diśaḥ śrotrāt yasya devasya saṃbabhau
tam īdṛśam mahā viṣṇum aprameyam anāmayam

original: tatprasādādṛte jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vā naiva śakyate // BhS_36.186 //
analyzed: tad prasādāt ṛte jñātum vaktum vā nā eva śakyate
sarva deva mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ sarve devāḥ tad ātmakāḥ

original: aśeṣaṃ vāṅmayaṃ cedaṃ lokālokaṃ carācaram // BhS_36.187 //
analyzed: aśeṣam vāc mayam ca idam loka alokam carācaram
vaiṣṇavyā vyāpyate śaktyā vāyunā iva diśaḥ antaram
sarve viṣṇu mayāḥ devāḥ sarva śāstreṣu kīrtitāḥ
ādhāra ādheya bhāvena vyāpya tiṣṭhati
sarva bhūta hitāya eva niṣkalaḥ sakalaḥ sthitaḥ
niṣkalaḥ sakalaḥ ca evam jñeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
sarvatas pāṇi pādam tat sarvatas akṣi śiraḥ mukham
sarvatas śrutimat loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
sarva indriya guṇa ābhāsam sarva indriya vivarjatam
asaktam sarva bhṛt ca eva nirguṇam guṇa bhoktṛ ca

original: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktamiva ca sthitam // BhS_36.192 //
analyzed: avibhaktam ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam

original: bhūtabhartṛca tad jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca /
analyzed: bhūta bhartṛ ca tat jñeyam grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca
jyotiṣām api tat jyotiḥ tamasaḥ param ucyate

original: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam /
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam jñāna gamyam hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
tat ca ādyaḥ jagatām īśaḥ para īśaḥ parameśvaraḥ
parāvara sva rūpeṇa viṣṇuḥ sarva hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: sthūlasūkṣmaparatvena tridhā ca bhagavān sthitaḥ // BhS_36.195 //
analyzed: sthūla sūkṣma para tvena tridhā ca bhagavān sthitaḥ
prabhaviṣṇuḥ mahā viṣṇuḥ sadā viṣṇuḥ smṛtaḥ ca saḥ

original: ātmā sa hyantarātmā ca paramātmā ca saṃsmṛtaḥ // BhS_36.196 //
analyzed: ātmā sa hi antarātmā ca paramātmā ca saṃsmṛtaḥ
vairājam laiṅgikam ca eva bahis antar ca sarvaśas
śabda ādiḥ cit mayam rūpam jāgrat svapna suṣupti gam
mantra anusvāra nādeṣu trayam anveṣayet budhaḥ

original: vede ca bhagavacchāstre sāṃkhye yoge tathaiva ca // BhS_36.198 //
analyzed: vede ca bhagavat śāstre sāṃkhye yoge tathā eva ca
dharma śāstre purāṇe ca munibhiḥ deva mānuṣaiḥ

original: paṭhyate nikhilairnityaṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // BhS_36.199 //
analyzed: paṭhyate nikhilaiḥ nityam viśvam viṣṇu mayam jagat

original: yacca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyacca vartamānaṃ tu kiṃ cana /
analyzed: yat ca bhūtam bhaviṣyat ca vartamānam tu kim cana
indriyāṇi indriya arthāḥ ca bhūta antar karaṇāni ca
avyaktam triguṇā māyā vidyā dharma ādayaḥ tathā

original: niyatiśca kalā kālaḥ sarvamanyacca tanmayam // BhS_36.201 //
analyzed: niyatiḥ ca kalā kālaḥ sarvam anyat ca tad mayam
viṣṇuḥ eva paraḥ devaḥ sarva bhūteṣu avasthitaḥ

original: sarvabhūtāni caivācau na tadastīha yanna saḥ // BhS_36.202 //
analyzed: sarva bhūtāni ca eva ācau na tat asti iha yat na saḥ
deva asura ādayaḥ martyāḥ paśavaḥ ca sarīsṛpāḥ
taruvallī tṛṇauṣadhyaḥ mahā abhra aśani vidyutaḥ
śaila abdhi sarit ārāma nagarāṇi sarāṃsi ca
lokāḥ ca an anta kālaḥ preta āvāsa uraga ālayāḥ
sapta bhūḥ ādayaḥ brāhma śaiva vaiṣṇava saṃjñitāḥ
sarve ca viṣṇunā ekena vyāptāḥ sarva ātmanā ātmanā
varāhaḥ bhārgavaḥ siṃhaḥ rāma śrīdhara vāmanāḥ

original: aśvikṛṣṇau ca dikṣveṣāṃ lokairaṇḍaṃ sahākhilam // BhS_36.206 //
analyzed: aśvi kṛṣṇau ca dikṣu eṣām loka eraṇḍam saha akhilam
yat ca anuktam aśeṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ etāḥ vibhūtayaḥ
viśva vyāpi tayā iva eṣa viṣṇuḥ vṛddhaiḥ udhīritaḥ
puru saṃjñā śarīre asmin śayanāt puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
satyaḥ chāga a bādhita artha tvāt nitya tvāt sa prakīrtitaḥ
acyutaḥ acyavanāt eva sa hariḥ samadīritaḥ
aniruddhaḥ tathā proktaḥ sarvasmāt anirodhanāt
vasanāḥ tarva bhūteṣu vāsudeva tvam īyivān
ādi mūrteḥ samākṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
pradyumnaḥ dyumna pṛṣṭha tvāt tridhāmā dhāmabhiḥ tribhiḥ
vaikuṇṭha amala varṇa tvāt vaikuṇṭhaśṭāyam ucyate
līyete pralaye tu asmin keśau iti eṣa keśavaḥ
nara nārī prakartṛ tvāt narāṇām ca ayanāt ayam
nārāyaṇaḥ nara uddhānām ayana tvāt apān ca saḥ
mādhavaḥ madhuṣu utpattyā dhava tvāt vā śriyaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: govindatīti govindo gāvo vindanti yaṃ tathā /
analyzed: govindati iti go vindaḥ gāvaḥ vindanti yam tathā
asuram madhu nāmānam hanti iti madhusūdana
tribhiḥ svaiḥ vikramaiḥ vyāptaḥ jagat eṣa trivikramaḥ
vāmanaḥ vrāsvatā yogāt śrīdharaḥ vahanāt śriyaḥ
hṛṣīkasya indriyasya īśaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ udīritaḥ
padmam nābheḥ abhūt yapya padmanābhaḥ tatasmmataḥ
udara ālambi dāma asya iti uktaḥ dāmodaraḥ hariḥ
uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ yasmāt uktaḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ
viloma indriya gamya tvāt procyate sa tu adhokṣajaḥ
ardham ardham nara siṃhāḥ udāhṛtaḥ
janārdanaḥ sa pāpiṣṭhān janān ardayati iti saḥ

original: indrasyāvarajo bhūta upendraḥ procyate hariḥ // BhS_36.219 //
analyzed: indrasya avarajaḥ bhūtaḥ upendraḥ procyate hariḥ
haraṇāt sarva pāpānām hariḥ nāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
karṣaṇāt pāpa rāśīnām kṛṣṇaḥ sarva ātmakaḥ hariḥ
rudraḥ rodayate tasmāt brahmā bṛṃhaṇa karmaṇā
indraḥ ca parama aiśvaryāt vahanāt vahniḥ ucyate
yamaḥ saṃyamanāt puṃsām varaṇāt varuṇaḥ tathā
vāyuḥ vānāt savāt somaḥ iśaḥ ca īṣṭe janeṣu yaḥ
ādityaḥ aditi putra tvāt candraḥ candayate yatas
iti evam guṇa vṛttyā ūhyaiḥ śabdeḥ ekaḥ api anekathā

original: śrutibhiḥ procyate brahma viṣṇvākhyaṃ jātu netarat /
analyzed: śrutibhiḥ procyate brahma viṣṇu ākhyam jātu na itarat
tasya īśvarasya ca aiśvaryāt sarvam etat pravartate
sa īśvaram hi jagat sarvam bhavet na anīśvaram kvacid
tad maya tvena govinde nyasta sarva bharāḥ narāḥ
tad yājīnaḥ mahābhāgāḥ taranti bhava vāridhim

original: taṃ prasādhayituṃ yatnaḥ kāryassarātmanā naraiḥ // BhS_36.226 //
analyzed: tam prasādhayitum yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sara ātmanā naraiḥ
bhakti namraḥ sadā gacchet sarvaḥ api jagataḥ patim

original: taddevasya priyaṃ bhūyādyatassammānanaṃ tu tat // BhS_36.227 //
analyzed: tat devasya priyam bhūyāt yatas sammānanam tu tat

original: tasya sannihito devo yasya citte janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: tasya sannihitaḥ devaḥ yasya citte janārdanaḥ
dānena tapasā na anyaiḥ tyasya tuṣṭaḥ bhavet hariḥ
āruhya śakaṭam gacchet yaḥ viṣṇoḥ mandiram naraḥ

original: nārī vā bālako vātha vṛddha ātura eva vā // BhS_36.229 //
analyzed: nārī vā bālakaḥ vā atha vṛddhaḥ āturaḥ eva vā

original: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ nāsti pretya yugyaśca jāyate /
analyzed: tasya puṇya phalam na asti pretya yugyaḥ ca jāyate

original: ye vāhayanti tānmartyānnarā vā prāṇinaśca ye // BhS_36.230 //
analyzed: ye vāhayanti tān martyān narāḥ vā prāṇinaḥ ca ye

original: te yāsyanti padaṃ viṣṇoryasmātpādaca rāstu te /
analyzed: te yāsyanti padam viṣṇoḥ yasmāt pāda ca te

original: ye vāhayanti jantūṃstān ste 'pimūḍhāḥ patanti vai // BhS_36.231 //
analyzed: ye vāhayanti jantūn tān ste apimūḍhāḥ patanti vai
yaḥ todayati tān eva gamane mūḍha cetanaḥ

original: sa yāmīryātanāḥ prāpya todyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ // BhS_36.232 //
analyzed: sa yāmīḥ yātanāḥ prāpya todyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ
punar paśu tvam āpannaḥ todyate paśubhiḥ naraiḥ

original: yo vā bhṛtakadānena vāhanena tu mānavaḥ // BhS_36.233 //
analyzed: yaḥ vā bhṛtaka dānena vāhanena tu mānavaḥ
vāhayati atha vā ūheta saḥ api yāsyati durgatim
apāre durga saṃsāre karma baddhe viśeṣataḥ
svīyam karma samutsṛjya patanti narake aśucau
tataḥpaśu tvam āpannāḥ ciram tiṣṭhanti bhū tale
pādukām adhiruhya api yaḥ devālayam āprajet

original: sa paśurjoyate pretya rogī cehaprajāyate // BhS_36.236 //
analyzed: sa paśuḥ joyate pretya rogī ca iha prajāyate
pādukām vāhanam ca api yaḥ adhiṣṭhitya vimūḍha dhīḥ

original: praṇāmaṃ haraye kuryātta sya dūrataro hariḥ // BhS_36.237 //
analyzed: praṇāmam haraye kuryāt ta sya dūrataraḥ hariḥ
deva darṇanam uddiśya na evā idam vidhaḥ āvrajet
ayatnāt gamane jāte api avaruhya ca vāhanāt
pādukā ādi vimucya eva samupaspṛśya vāriṇā

original: praviśetprayato bhūtvā prākāraṃ prathamaṃ punaḥ // BhS_36.239 //
analyzed: praviśet prayataḥ bhūtvā prākāram prathamam punar
na viśet dhāma devasya yādatā vāhana ādibhiḥ
tādṛśam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā yathāśakti avabodhayet
ādyaḥ tu eṣaḥ apacāraḥ syāt yatna hāryaḥ bhavet tatas
śmaśāna madhye gatvā tu yaḥ gacchet devatāgṛham
sapta janma kṛtāt puṇyāt tat kṣaṇāt mucyate naraḥ
sārgālīm yonim āśritya paset janma trayam tatas
daridrāḥ ca eva mārkhāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti tri janmakam
anya devagṛham gadvā ahi a snātvā yaḥ vrajet gṛham
devadevasya mohāt tu tasya pāpam mahāt bhavet

original: gṛhādgṛhaṃ tathā gadvā bhikṣārthī kṣudhitassvayam // BhS_36.244 //
analyzed: gṛhāt gṛham tathā gadvā bhikṣā arthī kṣudhitaḥ svayam
bhikṣām a labdhvā kutra api daridraḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: catvāri caiva janmāni teṣāmante ca yo budhaḥ? // BhS_36.245 //
analyzed: catvāri ca eva janmāni teṣām ante ca yaḥ budhaḥ

original: caṇḍālayoni māpnoti janmāni daśa pañca ca /
analyzed: caṇḍāla yoni mā āpnoti janmāni daśa pañca ca
atra ca udāharanti imam viśeṣam kāśyapa ādayaḥ
sarva deva mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ sarva veda mayaḥ hariḥ
tasya atiriktam no kiñcid viśeṣaḥ tatra vakṣyate
sarve api adhikṛtāḥ loke tad tad karma anurūpataḥ
ā brahmastaṃba paryantam jagat antar vyavasthitāḥ
tasmāt eva jagat sarvam sarga kāle prajāyate
tasmin eva punar tat ca pralaye saṃpralīyate

original: yaḥ varaḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣo 'vyayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ varaḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ avyayaḥ

original: sa eva sarvabhūtātmā nara ityabhidhīyate // BhS_36.250 //
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva bhūta ātmā naraḥ iti abhidhīyate
narāt jātāni tattvāni nārāṇi iti pracakṣate

original: tānyeva cāyanaṃ yasya sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_36.251 //
analyzed: tāni eva ca ayanam yasya sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahma tattvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ param brahma tattvam nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
viṣṇu ādibhiḥ tathā kecid vāsudeva ādibhiḥ pare
saṃjñā bhedaiḥ mahātmānaḥ sadā eva ārādhayanti tam
sarvatra paripūrṇasya sarvadhā sarva vastuṣu

original: na jātu labhyate kiñcidyenāvyāptaṃ tu kiṃ cana /
analyzed: na jātu labhyate kiñcid yena a vyāptam tu kim cana
tasmāt tasmin samāropya sarvam deva īśvara īśvare
upāsanam bhavet yat tu tat bhavet ucitam budhaiḥ

original: anyatra taṃ samāropya yadi copāsanaṃ bhavet // BhS_36.255 //
analyzed: anyatra tam samāropya yadi ca upāsanam bhavet
tat bhavet anyat eva arcā tasmāt parimitam phalam
ye api anya devatā bhaktāḥ yajante śraddhayaḥ anvitāḥ
yajante te api deveśam tam evā avidhi pūrvakam
anye te brahma rudra indrāḥ tad ādyāḥ devatāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vaiṣṇavā avatārāśca ye tu śāstroditāḥ purā /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavāḥ avatārāḥ ca ye tu śāstra uditāḥ purā

original: paramārthe na bhidyante nānyatvaṃ syātparasparam // BhS_36.258 //
analyzed: paramārthe na bhidyante na anya tvam syāt parasparam
viṣṇu ālayāt atha ekasmāt anya viṣṇu ālayasya tu

original: tat sthānāṃ daivatānāṃ vā nānyatvaṃ jātu saṃbhavet // BhS_36.259 //
analyzed: tat sthānām daivatānām vā na anya tvam jātu saṃbhavet
atha śāstra vidhiḥ bhinnaḥ yatra na api upalabhyate
tatra anya tvam vijānīyāt na ca icchet śāstra saṃkaram

original: hariṃ devaṃ tu saṃsevya vāhanasthaṃ dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: harim devam tu saṃsevya vāhana stham dvijottamaḥ

original: yadanyaṃ sedate vīthyāṃ tatkāle vāhanasthitam // BhS_36.261 //
analyzed: yat anyam sedate vīthyām tad kāle vāhana sthitam
saḥ api pāpam avāpnoti viṣṇu dhyānena śuddhi ati

original: deveśasyotsavo yatra grāme vā nagare 'pi vā // BhS_36.262 //
analyzed: deveśasya utsavaḥ yatra grāme vā nagare api vā
parvata agre mahā nadyāḥ tīre durga aṭavī suvā
tatra gacchet naraḥ bhaktyā seveta utsavam ādarāt
saha puttreḥ saha amātyaiḥ sarvaiḥ parijanaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ kratudeśantu gatvā seveta mānavaḥ // BhS_36.264 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam kratu deśam tu gatvā seveta mānavaḥ
yathār'ham upayuñjīta sva śaktim tad kriyāsu ca

original: śrutvā devotsavāraṃbhaṃ paṅgūbhāvena yo naraḥ // BhS_36.265 //
analyzed: śrutvā deva utsava āraṃbham paṅgūbhāvena yaḥ naraḥ
tiṣṭhet sa janma sāhasram paṅguḥ eva bhaviṣyati
tat bhavet viphalam janma bhū bhāraḥ tasya jīvitam
deveśasya utsave samyak vartamāne mahā phale

original: yo 'nyatra vyāpṛtastatra na gaccheddurmanā naraḥ // BhS_36.267 //
analyzed: yaḥ anyatra vyāpṛtaḥ tatra na gacchet durmanāḥ naraḥ

original: na tasya niṣkṛtiḥ proktā sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: na tasya niṣkṛtiḥ proktā sa pāpī narakam vrajet
anāhūtaḥ adhvaram gacchet tathā guru kulam vrajet
yaḥ adhvaram gantu kāmaḥ atra pratīkṣeta ārṅgaṇa ādikam

original: tanya pūrvārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ tat kṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_36.269 //
analyzed: tanya pūrva arjitam puṇyam tat kṣaṇāt eva naśyati

original: devotsavaṃ tu yo martyo yatamānaṃ tu sevitum /
analyzed: deva utsavam tu yaḥ martyaḥ yatamānam tu sevitum

original: vārayedyena kenāpi hetunā sa tu durmatiḥ // BhS_36.270 //
analyzed: vārayet yena kena api hetunā sa tu durmatiḥ
aphalaḥ saphalaḥ vā api patati eva na saṃśayaḥ
viṣṇupañcadine vā api puṇya aheṣu itareṣu api
upoṣitaḥ tu śrutvā eva deveśasya utsavam haṭhāt

original: tat kṣaṇādyo na gacchettu tasya pāpaṃ mahadbhavet // BhS_36.272 //
analyzed: tat kṣaṇāt yaḥ na gacchet tu tasya pāpam mahat bhavet
khaṭvām āsthāya yaḥ śete vartamāne tad utsave

original: āsīnasthsita evātra sa yāmīryātanā vrajet // BhS_36.273 //
analyzed: āsīna sthsitaḥ eva atra sa yāmīḥ yātanāḥ vrajet
deveśa abhimukham gatvā na kuryāt yaḥ namaskriyām

original: sa pāpiṣṭhataro loke niṣkṛtirnāsya vidyate // BhS_36.274 //
analyzed: sa pāpiṣṭhataraḥ loke niṣkṛtiḥ na asya vidyate
utkramiṣyanti yat prāṇāḥ prāṇade samupasthite
pratyudthāna abhivādābhyām punar tān pratipādayet
sarveṣām prāṇa bhūtaḥ asau bhagavān hariḥ avyayaḥ
prāṇinaḥ cetanāḥ sarve prāṇī ekaḥ prāṇa daḥ aparaḥ
anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ saṃkṣuphyante ca mānavāḥ
eka hasta praṇāmena yat pāpam na tat anyatas

original: hastau dvau nirmitau dhātrā kiṃ tena sukṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: hastau dvau nirmitau dhātrā kim tena su kṛtam bhavet
prāñjalīkṛtya hastautu yāceta madhusūdanam
yaḥ ekena eva hastena praṇamet manda dhīḥ harim
tasya hastaḥ bhavet ekaḥ paścāt janma śataiḥ api

original: iha vai jāyate paṅgū rogī caiva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: iha vai jāyate paṅguḥ rogī ca eva na saṃśayaḥ
kim idam bahulaiḥ citraiḥ karaṇaiḥ deha kalpanam
yadi ekaikam na ced tasya kaiṅkaryāya upayujyate

original: kiṃ svādhīnena hastena svādhīnaṃ karma sevitum // BhS_36.281 //
analyzed: kim svādhīnena hastena svādhīnam karma sevitum
aśaknu vā anāḥ svātantṣa hatāḥ pāpa hatāḥ hatāḥ
eka hasta praṇāmaḥ tu parihāryaḥ viśeṣataḥ
praṇatam ca eka hastena yaḥ tu pratyabhivādayet
tau ubhau narakam yātaḥ tayoḥ yasmāt samāgamaḥ
devatāḥ tādṛśam mūḍham śapanti ca viśaṅkitāḥ
purastāt yaḥ tu devasya kuryāt ātma pradakṣiṇam
ātmanā sa bhavet vāpaḥ sa druhyet ātmane budhaḥ
purastāt deva biṃbe tu devī amaṅgala vigrahe
vartamāne tu an ādṛtya na hi anyasya pradakṣiṇam

original: yatra mānasikārcā syāttacca mānasikaṃ bhavet // BhS_36.286 //
analyzed: yatra mānasikā arcā syāt tat ca mānasikam bhavet

original: antaryāmī ya evāste hṛdaye niṣkalo hariḥ /
analyzed: antaryāmī yaḥ eva āste hṛdaye niṣkalaḥ hariḥ

original: sa eva sakalo bhūtvā biṃbe yatsannidhāpitaḥ // BhS_36.287 //
analyzed: saḥ eva sakalaḥ bhūtvā biṃbe yat sannidhāpitaḥ
tasmāt sakala pūjāyām nā eva kuryāt vyatikramam

original: na kadāpi bhavetprājña ucbhiṣṭassveṣu karmasu // BhS_36.288 //
analyzed: na kadāpi bhavet prājñaḥ ucbhiṣṭaḥ sveṣu karmasu

original: viṇmūtraṃ pathi kṛtvātu śaucaṃ yāvanna cācaret /
analyzed: viṣ mūtram pathi kṛtvā tu śaucam yāvat na ca ācaret
ucchiṣṭaḥ tāvat eva syāt anarhaḥ sarva karmasu
nakha romāṇi yaḥ ca eva keśa asthīni tathā eva ca

original: kṣipettu devatāgāre sa bhavedbrahmahā naraḥ // BhS_36.290 //
analyzed: kṣipet tu devatāgāre sa bhavet brahma hā naraḥ
mākṣikīm yonim śritya jāyate mriyate punar
sapta janmāni tatra eva vrajet naraka mastataḥ
tāṃbūlam carvitam yaḥ tu prakṣipet devam antire

original: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // BhS_36.292 //
analyzed: sa yāti narakam ghoram yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam
tatas muktaḥ mahā pāpī śunakaḥ apara janmani

original: saṃsthitastrīṇi janmāni vasatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.293 //
analyzed: saṃsthitaḥ trīṇi janmāni vasati eva na saṃśayaḥ
niṣṭhīvana karaḥ yaḥ tu mandire madhuvidviṣaḥ
kṛmibhakṣye patet ghore narake pāpa kṛt naraḥ
śleṣmātaka taruḥ bhūtvā jāyate janma pañcakam
mūtrayet mandire yaḥ tu keśavasya vimūḍha dhīḥ
sa mūtra garta narake patati eva hi avāk śirāḥ
tasmāt muktaḥ tu rakta ādi niṃbaka drumam āsthitaḥ
janiṣyati na sandehaḥ sapta janmasu saukarīm

original: purīṣaṃ vātra kurvīta yo naro bhagavadgṛhe // BhS_36.297 //
analyzed: purīṣam vā atra kurvīta yaḥ naraḥ bhagavat gṛhe
sa yāti narakān ghorān paryāyeṇa ekaviṃśatim

original: tato muktastu pāpātmā viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ // BhS_36.298 //
analyzed: tatas muktaḥ tu pāpa ātmā viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ
samīpe mandirasya api sakṛt mūtram karoti yaḥ

original: sa tiṣṭhedraurave ghore varṣāṇāmayutaṃ śatam // BhS_36.299 //
analyzed: sa tiṣṭhet raurave ghore varṣāṇām ayutam śatam
tatas api manujaḥ muktaḥ grāma sūkara jāti tām
grāme janma śatam prāpya viṣṭhā bhū sūkaraḥ tathā
yaḥ tu retaḥ visargam ca kṛtvā kāmāt akāmataḥ
a snātaḥ devatāgāram iyāt sadyas sa naśyati
yaḥ yatra devatā gehe dantadhāvanam ācaret

original: tathā nirlekhayejjihvāṃ sa pāpī naśyati dhruvam // BhS_36.302 //
analyzed: tathā nirlekhayet jihvām sa pāpī naśyati dhruvam
tailena abhyakta sarva aṅgaḥ kaṣāya udvartitaḥ tathā
yaḥ naraḥ praviśet geham devasya paramātmanaḥ

original: sa yāti gṛhagodhātvaṃ navajanmāni pañca ca /
analyzed: sa yāti gṛha godhā tvam nava janmāni pañca ca

original: anugamya yathā pretaṃ yāti devālayaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_36.304 //
analyzed: anugamya yathā pretam yāti devālayam tu yaḥ
ārādhitum atha icchet vāsa gacchet nara ayutam

original: balibhugyonitāṃ yāti janmāni subahūni vai // BhS_36.305 //
analyzed: balibhuj yoni tām yāti janmāni su bahūni vai

original: bharaṇaṃ tu tathā kṛtvā mṛtakasya viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: bharaṇam tu tathā kṛtvā mṛtakasya viśeṣataḥ

original: mandiraṃ na praveṣṭavyaṃ praviṣṭastu praṇaśyati // BhS_36.306 //
analyzed: mandiram na praveṣṭavyam praviṣṭaḥ tu praṇaśyati
cāṇḍālīm yonim āśritya janma kṛt nava pañca ca

original: bhaviṣyati tathā bhūyaḥ pṛthak krūro 'tha niṣṭhuraḥ // BhS_36.307 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati tathā bhūyas pṛthak krūraḥ atha niṣṭhuraḥ
bhuktvā śrāddham para gṛhe yāyāt viṣṇu gṛham tu yaḥ

original: arcayedvā viśeṣeṇa caṭako jāyate khalaḥ // BhS_36.308 //
analyzed: arcayet vā viśeṣeṇa caṭakaḥ jāyate khalaḥ
tatra janma śatam prāpya tatas godhā vapuḥ gataḥ

original: chāyāmākramya yo mohādyāti viṣṇostu mandiram // BhS_36.309 //
analyzed: chāyām ākramya yaḥ mohāt yāti viṣṇoḥ tu mandiram
pradakṣiṇam akurvan vā yaḥ tiṣṭhet mati pūrvakam
saḥ api ucchiṣṭaḥ bhavet mūḍhaḥ tasya pāpa phalam tu idam
tiṣset sa kānane śūnye kaṇṭakaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
phala puhpa ādi hīnaḥ ca śmaśāne
śūnya vṛkṣa tām
yajña sūtram adhaḥkṛtya karṇe kṛtvā viśeṣataḥ

original: apasavyaṃ ca dhṛtvaiva dhṛtvā caiva nivītavat // BhS_36.312 //
analyzed: apasavyam ca dhṛtvā eva dhṛtvā ca eva nivīta vat

original: na gaccheddevatāgāraṃ na vā muktaśikho naraḥ /
analyzed: na gacchet devatāgāram na vā mukta śikhaḥ naraḥ
a kacchaḥ puccha kacchaḥ ca nagnaḥ kaupīna mātṛdhṛk
rikta hastaḥ śūnya phālaḥ tyakta saṃvyānaḥ eva ca
khādan api ca tāṃbūlam upahāra ādi bhakṣayan
devālayam viśet na eva tasya pāpam mahat bhavet

original: durācāro hi puruṣo nehāyurvindate mahat // BhS_36.315 //
analyzed: durācāraḥ hi puruṣaḥ na iha āyuḥ vindate mahat
trasyanti ca asya bhūtāni tathā
tasmāt ācāravān eva kuryāt vaivaidikīḥ kriyāḥ
api pāpa śarīrasya ācāraḥ hanti alakṣaṇam
ācāra lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ santaḥ cāritra lakṣaṇāḥ
sādhūnām ca yathāvṛttam etat ācāra lakṣaṇam
api adṛṣṭam śravāt eva puruṣam dharma cāriṇam

original: svāni karmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyam /
analyzed: svāni karmāṇi kurvāṇam tam janāḥ kurvate priyam
ye nāstikāḥ niṣkriyāḥ ca guru śāstra atilaṅghinaḥ
a dharma jñāḥ durācārāḥ te bhavanti gata āyuṣaḥ
viśīlāḥ dharma maryādāḥ nityam saṃkīrṇa maithunāḥ
alpa āyuṣaḥ bhavanti iha narāḥ niraya gāminaḥ

original: loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī ca yo naraḥ // BhS_36.321 //
analyzed: loṣṭha mardī tṛṇa chedī nakha khādī ca yaḥ naraḥ
nitya ucchiṣṭaḥ saṃkusukaḥ na ihayuḥ vindate kvacid
viṣṇu sthāna samīpa sthān viṣṇu sevā artham āgatān
śvapacān patitān vā api spṛṣṭvā na snānam ācaret
utsave vāsudevasya yaḥ snāti sparśa śaṅkayā
svarga sthāḥ pitaraḥ tasya patanti narake aśucau
pibet pāda udakam viṣṇoḥ gurūṇām vā viśeṣataḥ
tatra na ācamanam kuryāt tadvat some dvijottamaḥ
anya deva artha sandiṣṭhaiḥ pūjayeyuḥ ca ye harim
sapta janmāni pañca api muḍūka tvam vrajanti te

original: janmadvayantu vai mūḍhāśśūdratāṃ yānti te narāḥ // BhS_36.326 //
analyzed: janma dvayam tu vai mūḍhāḥ śūdra tām yānti te narāḥ
kusumānām nivedya aham gandham āghrāti yaḥ naraḥ

original: sa pūtigandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva bhaveddhruvam // BhS_36.327 //
analyzed: sa pūti gandha saṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī ca eva bhavet dhruvam
tad ante trīṇi janmāni tādṛśāni bhavanti uta

original: jātakaṃ mṛtakaṃ vāpi yasyāśaucaṃ vidhīyate // BhS_36.328 //
analyzed: jātakam mṛtakam vā api yasya āśaucam vidhīyate
anarhaḥ sarva karmabhyaḥ sa na iyāt devatāḥ gṛham
puṃprasūtau smṛtam pūrvaiḥ sāpiṇḍyam sapta pūruṣam
kanyakā janane tadvat sāpiṇḍam tu tri pūruṣam
vratinām satriṇām tadvat yatīnām brahmacāriṇām
na āśaucaḥ kathyate prājñaiḥ yathā śātātapaḥ abravīt
vrata saṃkalpa mātreṇa vrati tvam vratinaḥ bhavet
vṛta mātraḥ tathā ṛtvij ca satre satrī prakīrtitaḥ
kāṣāya daṇḍa mātreṇa yati tvañca yateḥ matam

original: upanīto vasenmā vā tathā gurukule kramāt /
analyzed: upanītaḥ vaset mā vā tathā guru kule kramāt
brahma adhyeti na ca adhyeti brahmacārī kumārakaḥ
rāja ājñā kāriṇām tadvat rājñām ca snātakasya
idṛśānām atha anyeṣām atra astarbhāvar iḥ itaḥ
na kuryāt ca namaskāram na eva pratyabhivādayet
na ār'payet upahārān ca tīrtha ādīn na api sevate
āśaucī brāhmaṇaḥ yaḥ tu mohāt devam prapūjayet
sapta janmasu dāridṣam atyantam samavāpnuyāt
śvāna yoni śatam prāpya tatas caṇḍāla tām iyāt
yaḥ bhuktvā devatāgāre nikṣipya ucchiṣṭam atra tu
gacchet anyatra vā prāsyāt saḥ api mūḍhaḥ vipadyate

original: yastu devagṛhadvāre prasārya caraṇau kvacit // BhS_36.338 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu devagṛha dvāre prasārya caraṇau kvacid
śete sammohāt sa yāti naraka ayutam
punar ca janma saṃprāpya nīca yoniṣu anekaśas
yātanāḥ ca anubhūya iva daurbrāhmaṇyam vrajet tu saḥ
yaḥ tu devagṛhe mūḍhaḥ sayīta mada mohitaḥ
tatra ucchiṣṭa nidhānena bhṛśam niśśvāsa mārutaiḥ
durgandhī jāyate martyaḥ jāyate janma pañcakam

original: tatassūkaratāṃ prāpya janmāni nava pañca ca /
analyzed: tatas sūkara tām prāpya janmāni nava pañca ca

original: kliśyate bahubhiḥ kaṣṭairna śayīta harergṛhe // BhS_36.342 //
analyzed: kliśyate bahubhiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ na śayīta hareḥ gṛhe
upadhāna ādi sahitam yaḥ stalpam adhitiṣṭhati

original: devālaye viśeṣeṇa prākāre vāpi mūḍhadhīḥ // BhS_36.343 //
analyzed: devālaye viśeṣeṇa prākāre vā api mūḍha dhīḥ
sa bhavet durbhagaḥ ca eva sarpa yauniṣu jāyate

original: sapta pañca ca janmāni tato mānuṣatāṃ vrajet // BhS_36.344 //
analyzed: sapta pañca ca janmāni tatas mānuṣa tām vrajet
śayīta devatā gehe vyādhitaḥ yaḥ tu durmatiḥ

original: sa bhaveddurmanā dīno pretya ceha ca janmani // BhS_36.345 //
analyzed: sa bhavet durmanāḥ pretya ca iha ca janmani
yaḥ striyā sahitaḥ mūḍhaḥ śayīta bhagavat gṛhe
sa bhavet durita ṣaṇḍaḥ sapta janmāni pañca ca
yogibhiḥ yoga siddhi artham abhyasyante viśeṣataḥ

original: āsanāni tvasaṃkhyāni devāgāre na cācaret // BhS_36.347 //
analyzed: āsanāni tu asaṃkhyāni devāgāre na ca ācaret
mantra yoga paraiḥ tadvat laya yoga parāyaṇaiḥ
haṭha yogibhiḥ etāni kriyante rājayogibhiḥ
svastikam sarvatobhadram siddham siṃhāsanam tathā

original: savyaṃ khūlaṃ sukhaṃ caiva gomukhaṃ garuḍaṃ tathā // BhS_36.349 //
analyzed: savyam khūlam sukham ca eva gomukham garuḍam tathā
mayūram matsya matsyendram maṇḍūkam mudgaram mṛgam

original: kuñjaraṃ kukkuṭaṃ nāgaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ kraiñcaṃ ca kūrmakam // BhS_36.350 //

analyzed: khaḍgam ca kāma dahanam vaiyāghram veṇukā āsanam

original: yonyāsanaṃ vāsakaṃ ca dhīraṃ padmāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.351 //
analyzed: yonyāsanam vāsakam ca dhīram padmāsanam tathā
vārāham ca eva paryaṅkam pataga āsanam eva ca

original: tripadaṃ hastikarṇaṃ ca hemamardhāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.352 //
analyzed: tripadam hastikarṇam ca hemam ardhāsanam tathā

original: anyāni śāstrasiddhāni yāni santi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.353 //
analyzed: anyāni śāstra siddhāni yāni santi viśeṣataḥ

original: bhuñjīyāddevatāgāre yaḥ pāpassa tu durmanāḥ // BhS_36.354 //
analyzed: bhuñjīyāt devatāgāre yaḥ pāpaḥ sa tu durmanāḥ

original: kukṣirogārdito bhūtvā janmāni daśa pañca ca /
analyzed: kukṣi roga arditaḥ bhūtvā janmāni daśa pañca ca

original: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa sa bhavennindito janaḥ // BhS_36.356 //
analyzed: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa sa bhavet ninditaḥ janaḥ
garbhāgāre ca antarāle tathā ca eva ardha maṇḍape
mahā maṇḍapa madhye ca na annam adyāt viśeṣataḥ
annam pātre vinikṣipya puṭa patra ādi nirmite

original: āpośanaṃ tu kṛtvaiva yadadyādbhojanaṃ tutat // BhS_36.358 //
analyzed: tu kṛtvā eva yat adyāt bhojanam tu tat
na devatā prasādasya gṛhītasya añjalau tathā
na ca eva apośanam kuryāt kuryāt ced tat asammatam

original: sa gacchennarakān krūrān yāvanta udabindavaḥ // BhS_36.360 //
analyzed: sa gacchet narakān krūrān yāvantaḥ uda bindavaḥ

original: niveditaṃ tu devasya devasyāgre viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.361 //
analyzed: niveditam tu devasya devasya agre viśeṣataḥ

brahmaṇyadevam uddiśya puruṣam brāhmaṇapriyam

tathā niṣkṛti niṣpattyā aiśāstra uktena vidhānataḥ

original: niveditaṃ tu devasya saṃtuṣṭyaisvasya tasya ca /

original: tasya tuṣyati deveśa ādātā tu vipadyate // BhS_36.366 //
analyzed: tasya tuṣyati deveśaḥ ādātā tu vipadyate
dātuḥ tu sakalam pāpam manaḥ vāc kāya karmabhiḥ

prasādaḥ apihi devasya para pāka rucim naram

original: na jātu pāvayennaiva pāvayetpāvayenna tu // BhS_36.368 //
analyzed: na jātu pāvayet na eva pāvayet pāvayet na tu

original: tena bhuktaṃ bhavetpāpaṃ dātureva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tena bhuktam bhavet pāpam dātuḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ
ayutam brāhmaṇānām tu tarpayitvā tu yat phalam
tad phalam naśyati kṣipram ucchiṣṭasya kaṇena tu
atha anna vikraye doṣaḥ kathyate vidhi vittamaiḥ
anna vikrayiṇaḥ pāpāḥ vrajanti yama yātanāḥ

original: pretya sṛgālatāṃ yānti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.372 //
analyzed: pretya sṛgāla tām yānti nava janmāni pañca ca
yaḥ tu annam bhagavat gehe vikrīṇāti viśeṣataḥ

original: caṇḍālo jāyate pretya kṣudhitaśca carenmuhuḥ // BhS_36.373 //
analyzed: caṇḍālaḥ jāyate pretya kṣudhitaḥ ca caret muhur

original: vikrīṇate tu ye viprā vāṇijye dattacakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: vikrīṇate tu ye viprāḥ vāṇijye datta cakṣuṣaḥ
ye api annam upahāra ādi ca itarat deva mandire
te api yānti mahā ghoram narakam bhṛśa dāruṇam
yatra

original: kaṇamannasya vāna syāttapyante tatra te janāḥ /
analyzed: syāt tapyante tatra te janāḥ

original: ye gṛhītvā tadannādi bhuñjate kṣudhitā janāḥ // BhS_36.376 //
analyzed: ye gṛhītvā tat anna ādi bhuñjate kṣudhitāḥ janāḥ
upakurvanti ye vā tān ucyante a bhakṣya bhojanāḥ

original: annaṃ prāṇā manuṣyāṇāṃ sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_36.377 //
analyzed: annam prāṇāḥ manuṣyāṇām sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam

original: annaṃ vikrīṇate ye tu prāṇavikrayiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // BhS_36.378 //
analyzed: annam vikrīṇate ye tu prāṇa vikrayiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena tyajet tad kraya vikrayau
na kuryāt devatāḥ gehe abhyudayam śrāddha bhojanam
kuryāt na ca api śrāddha ādīn vihāya api dvija aśanam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena na aśnīyāt hari mandire
mudhā saṃbhāṣate yaḥ tu praviśya hari mandiram

original: sa nidhiṃ puratassiddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣati kākiṇīm // BhS_36.381 //
analyzed: sa nidhim puratas siddham tyaktvā bhikṣati kākiṇīm
yaḥ tu saṃbhāṣate vyartham devālayam upāśritaḥ

yat muhūrtam kṣaṇam vā api cintyate

original: sā hānistanmamahacchidraṃ sā bhrāntissā tu vikriyā // BhS_36.383 //
analyzed: sā hāniḥ tat mama hat chidram sā bhrāntiḥ sā tu vikriyā
dasyubhiḥ muṣitena iva dagdhena iva dava agninā

original: magneneva mahāsiṃdhau hateneva ca vātyayā // BhS_36.385 //
analyzed: magnena iva mahā siṃdhau hatena iva ca vā atyayā
saṃpiṣṭena iva pāṣāṇaiḥ ākrandet yaḥ sa mucyate

original: tasmāddevagṛhaṃ gatvā naro nānyaparo bhavet // BhS_36.387 //

original: satyaṃ yajñantathā vedāssatyā devī sarasvatī // BhS_36.392 //
analyzed: satyam yajñam tathā vedāḥ satyā devī sarasvatī
vrata caryā tathā satyam oṅkāraḥ satyam eva ca

original: satyaṃ tu vadato loke tulitaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.395 //

original: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā kṛtam /

original: satyamāhuḥ paraṃ brahma tasmātsatyaṃ na lobhayet /

ye satya niratāḥ satya śapathāḥ satya vikramāḥ

ap caraḥ gaṇa saṃkīrṇaiḥ vimānaiḥ saṃcaranti ca

original: devārthe vā parārthe vā putrārthe vā ''tmane tathā /

original: pāṭhanaṃ lekhanādyaṃ ca naiva kuryādgṛhe hareḥ /

original: yastu devagṛhaṃ gatvā roditi praṇayādyathā // BhS_36.421 //

ahiṃsā vaidikam karma dhyānam indriya nigrahaḥ

tri daṇḍam sarva bhūteṣu nidhāya puruṣaḥ śuciḥ

original: kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhimavāpnu te /

original: ātmanassukhamanvicchan sa pretya na sukhī bhavet /

original: ātmopamastu bhūteṣu yo vaibhavati pūruṣaḥ // BhS_36.430 //
analyzed: ātma upamaḥ tu bhūteṣu yaḥ vaibhavati pūruṣaḥ

original: prakhyāpane ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye // BhS_36.433 //

original: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.434 //

original: karmaṇā na naraḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ jātu vicakṣaṇaḥ, // BhS_36.435 //
analyzed: karmaṇā na naraḥ kurvan hiṃsām jātu vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: vācā ca manasā caiva tato duḥkhātpramucyate /
analyzed: vācā ca manasā ca eva tatas duḥkhāt pramucyate
caturvidhā iyam nirdiṣṭā hi ahiṃsā brahma vādibhiḥ

original: yathā sarvaścatuṣpādvai tribhiḥ pādairna tiṣṭhati // BhS_36.437 //
analyzed: yathā sarvaḥ catuṣpād vai tribhiḥ pādaiḥ na tiṣṭhati

yathā nāga pade anyāni padāni pada gāminām

original: evaṃ lokeṣvahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭādharmataḥ purā // BhS_36.439 //
analyzed: evam lokeṣu ahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭā adharmataḥ purā
na hi atas sadṛśam kiñcid ihaloke paratra ca

original: yatsarveṣviha bhūteṣu dayāhiṃsātmikā tu yā // BhS_36.440 //
analyzed: yat sarveṣu iha bhūteṣu dayā hiṃsā ātmikā tu yā

original: na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥ /

original: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtāni dadatīti jagau śrutiḥ // BhS_36.442 //
analyzed: abhayam sarva bhūtāni dadati iti jagau śrutiḥ

original: kṣataṃ ca patitaṃ caiva skhalitaṃ klinnamāhatam /
analyzed: kṣatam ca patitam ca eva skhalitam klinnam āhatam

original: sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BhS_36.443 //
analyzed: sarva bhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca

original: nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
