kāmukānām vilāsa artham tasmāt yuktataraḥ bhavet

original: anugacchetpitā bhrātā bhartā putro 'tha vā yadi // BhS_36.536 //
analyzed: anugacchet pitā bhrātā bhartā putraḥ atha vā yadi
tadā devagṛham yāyāt na anyathā jātu kāminī
dhyāyataḥ viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṃgaḥ teṣu upajāyate
saṃgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodhaḥ abhijāyate
krodhāt bhavati sammohaḥ sammohāt smṛti vibhramaḥ
smṛti bhraṃśāt buddhi nāśaḥ buddhi nāśāt praṇaśyati
balavān indriya grāmaḥ vidvāṃsam apikarṣati
tasmāt strīyā bhavet vidvān na ati saktaḥ katham cana

original: tasmāt strīṣu na kartavyaḥ prasaṃgo devatākṛhe // BhS_36.540 //
analyzed: tasmāt strīṣu na kartavyaḥ prasaṃgaḥ devatā kṛhe
tathā eva para dārebhyaḥ manaḥ prahiṇuyāt na ca
para dārāḥ na gantavyāḥ naraiḥ ṛddhim abhīpsubhiḥ

original: na hīdṛśamanāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate /
analyzed: na hi īdṛśam anāyuṣyam loke kim cana vidyate
yādṛśam puruṣasya iha para dāra niṣevanam
tādṛśam vidyate kiñcid anāyuṣyam nṛṇām iha

original: yāvanto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ // BhS_36.543 //
analyzed: yāvantaḥ romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇām gātreṣu nirmitāḥ
tāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi narakam paryupāsate
ati saṃgam tyajet tasmāt yoṣitām deva mandire
yaiḥ asabhyaḥ padaiḥ arthaḥ padena ekena vā tathā
gamyate kathanam tādṛś aślīlam parivarjayet
aślīla kathanāt ca eva bhavet udvejanam nṛṇām
bhaktānām bhagavat gehe bhavet cittam atha āvilam
nivarteta manaḥ tatra niviṣṭam paramātmani
tasmāt aślīlam ābhāṣṭa naraḥ pāpa paraḥ bhavet

original: sa tu caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya jāyate janmanāṃ śatam /
analyzed: sa tu caṇḍāla tām prāpya jāyate janmanām śatam
praviśet geham devasya paramātmanaḥ
vāyu bhūte śarīre asmin vāyu saṃcāra karmaṇi
mala vāyu visargaḥ tu deva gehe viśeṣataḥ
pātayet puruṣam satyam api vedānta pāragam
tasmāt apāna gandhasya visargam na eva ca ācaret
atha vyādhi kopaḥ bhaviṣyati
tasmāt vāyu visargam tu kuryāt eva avicārayān

original: iti devagṛhaṃ gantuṃ vyādhito naiva cārhati /
analyzed: iti devagṛham gantum vyādhitaḥ nā eva ca arhati
tathā kuṣṭhī viśeṣeṇa pāpa roga arditāḥ same
udvīkṣitum ca deveśam mandire madhusūdanam

original: arcituṃ sevituṃ cāpi dātuṃ dravyacayaṃ tathā // BhS_36.553 //
analyzed: arcitum sevitum ca api dātum dravya cayam tathā
na arhanti yasmāt tat saktam pāpam sāṃkrāmikam bhavet
yadi anyathā bhavet sadyas sa pāpī saṃprajāyate

original: janmāni nava pañcāpi jāyate malabhuk kṛmiḥ /
analyzed: janmāni nava pañca api jāyate mala bhuj kṛmiḥ
yadā viśet gṛham viṣṇoḥ seva ardham madhuvidviṣaḥ
kṛtvā upavīta vat samyak uttarīyam manoharam
seveta deva devaśam upavītaḥ sadā śuciḥ
kañcukena āvṛta aṅgaḥ tu na gacchet hari mandiram
na eva abhivādanam kuryāt na abhivādyaḥ saḥ uccate

original: uṣṇīṣī na ca seveta naiva pāṇau dhṛtāyudhaḥ /
analyzed: uṣṇīṣī na ca seveta na eva pāṇau dhṛta āyudhaḥ
vastreṇa ācchādya dehantu kambalena itareṇa vā
yaḥ gacchet vaiṣṇavam dhāma yaḥ vā api praṇamet harim

original: śvitrī saṃjāyate mūḍho navajanmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.559 //
analyzed: śvitrī saṃjāyate mūḍhaḥ nava janmāni pañca ca
kṣauma ādibhiḥ vā saṃvītaḥ yaḥ naraḥ praṇamet harim

original: caṇḍālayonitāṃ yāti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.560 //
analyzed: caṇḍāla yoni tām yāti nava janmāni pañca ca
na jātu tvam ita brūyāt āpannaḥ api mahattaram

original: tvaṅkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na niśiṣyate // BhS_36.561 //
analyzed: tvaṅkāraḥ vā vadhaḥ vā iti vidvatsu na niśiṣyate
para nindā parasya eva puṃsaḥ nindā bhaviṣyati

original: paranindā ca śāstrasya parasya tu vinindanam // BhS_36.562 //
analyzed: para nindā ca śāstrasya parasya tu vinindanam
para nindā bhavet krodhāt krodhāt sadyas vinaśyati

original: nindayā vai pareṣāṃ tu ninditāste punassmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.563 //
analyzed: nindayā vai pareṣām tu ninditāḥ te punar smṛtāḥ
tasmāt nidām pareṣām tudā iva agre parivarjayet

original: tathā parastutiṃ caiva vidhinā saṃtyajennaraḥ // BhS_36.564 //
analyzed: tathā para stutim ca eva vidhinā saṃtyajet naraḥ

original: paraḥ parātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ procyate tu yaḥ /
analyzed: paraḥ parātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ procyate tu yaḥ

original: tadagre 'nyasya devasya na stutiṃ stāvayennaraḥ // BhS_36.565 //
analyzed: tad agre anyasya devasya na stutim stāvayet naraḥ
yaḥ tu sarveśvarāt anyam adhikam tasya ca agratas

original: pūjayedyadi manyeta pūjārhaṃ vāsa naśyati // BhS_36.566 //
analyzed: pūjayet yadi manyeta pūjā arham naśyati
sarvam jagat ca tasya eva svarūpam paramātmanaḥ
tathā api tad tad rūṣeṇa tāratamya juṣā punar
pūjyate bhagavān bhaktaiḥ tatra śāstra uditā gatiḥ
tasmāt deveśvarāt anyat yat kiñcid thsa aṇu jaṅgamam
pūjā arham vidyate vastu tad dhāmani viśeṣataḥ
tasmāt pūjām stutim ca anyām itareṣām asaṃśayam
tyajet devagṛhe yaḥ tu sukham manyeta jīvitum

original: śaktau satyāṃ viśeṣeṇa yastulobhādinā naraḥ // BhS_36.570 //
analyzed: śaktau satyām viśeṣeṇa yaḥ tu lobha ādinā naraḥ
gauṇaiḥ arcayate upacāraiḥ udīritaiḥ

original: na tasya vidyate puṇyaṃ sa tūcchāstraṃ vravartate // BhS_36.571 //
analyzed: na tasya vidyate puṇyam sa tu ucchāstram
yāvatā kīrtyate īśāstre phalam āḍhya daridrayoḥ
tad tad śakti arpitaiḥ eva yathārham ca dhana ādikaiḥ
yathā tuṣyati deveśaḥ muktā hāreṇa bhūbhujām
tathā eva tulasī dāmnā durvidhasya api tuṣyati

original: tasmātkurvīta yatnena śaktilobhaṃ na jātu cit /
analyzed: tasmāt kurvīta yatnena śakti lobham na jātu cit

original: anyathā yadi kurvāṇaḥ phalaṃ naiva prapadyate // BhS_36.574 //
analyzed: anyathā yadi kurvāṇaḥ phalam nā eva prapadyate
pretya mārjāra tām prāpya jāyate janma pañcakam

original: viṣaṃ prāśnāti sammūḍho yassvasmai pacate naraḥ // BhS_36.575 //
analyzed: viṣam prāśnāti sammūḍhaḥ yaḥ svasmai pacate naraḥ
yaḥ adyāt annam kaṇam vā api yat viṣṇoḥ a niveditam
sa bhavet brahma hā abhūyas sa bhuṅkte pūya śoṇitam
yat pibet ca yat aśnīyāt yat ca jighret ca dhārayet
anuliṃpet ca yat tat tat nivedya agre madhudviṣe
tad nivedita śeṣam tu bhuñjīyāt vā upayojayet

original: viṣṇorniveditaṃ yastu na bhuṅkte manujādhamaḥ // BhS_36.578 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ niveditam yaḥ tu na bhuṅkte manuja adhamaḥ
kalpa koṭi śatena api niṣkṛtiḥ nā asya vidyate
niveditam tu yat viṣṇoḥ bhaktebhyaḥ tasya dāpanāt
bhagavān devaḥ tad paraḥ tu bhavet naraḥ
niveditam yadi brūyāt ucchiṣṭam iti manda dhīḥ
sa tu durgatim āsādya vindate yama yātanāḥ
vibhūtim samupāśritya yasya anantasya śāśvatam
samṛddhā dharaṇī sā iyam sa śaila vana kānanā

original: yā ca bhūyāṃsi loke 'sminnutpādayati santatam // BhS_36.582 //
analyzed: yā ca bhūyāṃsi loke asmin utpādayati santatam
oṣadhīḥ nikhilāḥ stadvat puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
tasya anṛṇyasya hetoḥ vaiya vidhinā naraḥ
yaḥ tu na ār'payate viṣṇoḥ tad tad kāla udbhavāni tu
sasyāni ca oṣadhīḥ tadvat phalāni kusumāni ca
saṃbhṛtāni yathāśakti sabhavet brahmah naraḥ

original: navāni kāle jātāni sasyādīni viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.585 //
analyzed: navāni kāle jātāni sasya ādīni viśeṣataḥ
dhyāyanti devadeveśam abhigantum yatanti ca
kadarthayantaḥ ye mūḍhāḥ teṣām abhyarthanam param
audāsīnyena tiṣṭhanti svayam vā api upayuñjate

original: teyāntinarakān ghorān kṛtaghnā yāntiyān bahūn // BhS_36.587 //
analyzed: te yānti narakān ghorān kṛtaghnāḥ bahūn
śapanti auṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ tasmāt bhaktyā viśeṣataḥ

original: navaṃ sasyaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ dadhikṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu // BhS_36.588 //
analyzed: navam sasyam phalam puṣpam dadhi kṣīram ghṛtam madhu
yad arham arpaṇe sarvam agre tasmai samarpayet
lobhāt mohāt atha ajñānāt yaḥ ucchiṣṭam nivedayet
deveśāya viśeṣeṇa sa bhavet pātakī naraḥ

original: ucchiṣṭa manyadevasya yo devāya nivedayet // BhS_36.590 //
analyzed: yaḥ devāya nivedayet

original: so 'pi caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya naśyedeva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ api caṇḍāla tām prāpya naśyet eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: niveditaṃ tu devasya ya ucchiṣṭena yojayet // BhS_36.591 //
analyzed: niveditam tu devasya yaḥ ucchiṣṭena yojayet
devānām ita reṣām vā manuṣyāṇām atha api vā

original: sa pāpī janmasāhasraṃ śvānayoniṣu jāyate // BhS_36.592 //
analyzed: sa pāpī janma sāhasram śvāna yoniṣu jāyate

original: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā pṛṣṭī kṛtyāsanaṃ caret /
analyzed: na hi devagṛham gatvā pṛṣṭī kṛtyā āsanam caret
deva abhimukhaḥ eva syāt bhaktaḥ sarva ātmanā naraḥ
na pṛṣṭham darśayet jātu deva agre hita cintakaḥ
pārśvatas tu caran eva nivarteta ālayam prati
na eva anyam praṇamet jātu praviśya hari mandiram

original: sa hi sarveśvara śśeṣī yastatrāste ramādhavaḥ // BhS_36.595 //
analyzed: sa hi sarva īśvara śśeṣī yaḥ tatra āste
pūjā arhaḥ ca praṇāma arhaḥ pūjā arhaḥ tatra na itaraḥ
yaḥ tathā praṇamet mūḍhaḥ sa yāti naraka ayutam
caṇḍāla yonim āsādya bhajate yātanā muhur

original: yastu devagṛhaṃ prāptān vaiṣṇavān bhagavatpriyān // BhS_36.597 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu devagṛham prāptān vaiṣṇavān bhagavat priyān
ācāryam ṛtvijaḥ ca atha pūjakān paricārakān
na ār'cayet maunam āsthāya sa vinaśyati sa anvayaḥ
yat iṣṭam yājakebhyaḥ syāt pūraṇāya iva tasya tu
bhaktāḥ paricareyuḥ ca viśeṣāt grāma vāsinaḥ
anyathā ced mad doṣaḥ sarveṣām ca vipacat bhavet
ātmānam yaḥ viśeṣeṇa stauti ahaṅkāra bhāvidaḥ
an ādṛtya gurūn daivam anibaddham ca saṃpadet
avalīptaḥ na jānāti doṣam ātmani saṃgatam
kula vidyā tapaḥ sampad pramukhaiḥ garvite naraḥ

original: na sukhaṃ na ca saubhāgyaṃ yenātmāntūyate svayam // BhS_36.602 //
analyzed: na sukham na ca saubhāgyam yena ātmā antūyate svayam
tasmāt ātma stutim kṛtvā naraḥ patati niścayam

original: tato janmaśataṃ prāpya mṛgayonau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.603 //
analyzed: tatas janma śatam prāpya mṛga yonau viśeṣataḥ
jāyate mriyate abhīkṣṇam tasya pāpam mahat bhavet
yaḥ devagṛham gatvā vāñchati apacitim janaḥ

original: sa tu tit tiritāṃ yāti navajanmāni pañca ca /
analyzed: sa tu tit tiritām yāti nava janmāni pañca ca
deveśasya tu sevā artham varṇānām ānupūrvyaśaḥ
adhikāraḥ samākhyātaḥ tad kramam na vimānayet
viśanti garbha gehe tu ye vaikhānasa sūtriṇaḥ
garbhāgāre praveṣṭavyaḥ na hi a vaikhānasaḥ kvacid

original: antarāle tathā yeṣāṃ sthānaṃ tattu pravakṣyate // BhS_36.607 //
analyzed: antarāle tathā yeṣām sthānam tat tu pravakṣyate
anye dvijāḥ ca tiṣṭhanti yathā syāt āśrama kramaḥ

original: te dvijāstat strīyaścāpi sevante tatra saṃgatāḥ // BhS_36.608 //
analyzed: te dvijāḥ tat strī yaḥ ca api sevante tatra saṃgatāḥ
sthitvā
deveśam abhisevante tadīyāḥ yāḥ ca yoṣitaḥ
saṃgatāḥ śūdra jātāḥ ca pratiloma bhavāḥ caye
mahā maṇḍapam āsthāya sevante puruṣottamam
anuloma bhuvaḥ ca evaye ca anye mleccha jātayaḥ

original: gopurādbāhyataḥ sthitvā sevante mandiraṃ hareḥ // BhS_36.611 //
analyzed: gopurāt bāhyatas sthitvā sevante mandiram hareḥ
tāratamyam idam jñātvā seveta satatam harim
devatā nindanam kuryāt yaḥ sa mucyate
anya deva samam yaḥ tu manyate puruṣottamam

original: caṇḍālayonitāmeti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.613 //
analyzed: caṇḍāla yoni tām eti nava janmāni pañca ca
apahnutya punar devān s tat dravya ādi haret tu yaḥ

original: sa bhaveddevahā satyaṃ jāyate śvādiyoniṣu, // BhS_36.614 //
analyzed: sa bhavet deva hā satyam jāyate śva ādi yoniṣu
tiraskṛtya tathā devān bhagavat śāstram eva ca

original: karmāṇi svecchayā kuryātso 'pi syāddevahā naraḥ // BhS_36.615 //
analyzed: karmāṇi sva icchayā kuryāt saḥ api syāt deva hā naraḥ
kathāyām kathyamānāyām devasya madhuvidviṣaḥ

original: anādṛtya ca ye yānti te narāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ // BhS_36.616 //
analyzed: an ādṛtya ca ye yānti te narāḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ
toya hīne ati raudre ca vane vai śūnya vṛkṣa tām
jāyante sapta janmāni tatas caṇḍāla tām yayuḥ

original: deveṣu goṣu vipreṣu devāgāreṣu caiva hi /
analyzed: deveṣu goṣu vipreṣu devāgāreṣu ca eva hi
vahet nā eva ādhipatyam yat na asau ṛddhim avāpnuyāt
doṣāḥ ca bahulāḥ stasmin ādhipatye smṛtāḥ budhaiḥ
kāmatas akāmatas ca api sarvam tasya viceṣṭitam
pāpāya eva bhavet tasmāt bhūti kāmaḥ tu tam tyajet

original: sevārthināṃ sakāśāttu balātkāreṇa yaḥ prabhuḥ // BhS_36.620 //
analyzed: sevā arthinām sakāśāt tu balātkāreṇa yaḥ prabhuḥ

original: gṛhṇīyāttukaraṃ sadyaḥ patetsa saha tena ca /
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt tu karam sadyas patet sa saha tena ca
devasya sannidhau bhaktaiḥ bhaktyāyat tu samarpyate

original: patraṃ phalaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā svarṇaṃ vāsāṃsi cetarat /
analyzed: patram phalam vā mūlam vā svarṇam vāsāṃsi ca itarat
dāyādyam arcakānām tu yaḥ mohāt apanihnute

original: svayaṃ vāpyupayuñjīta sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: svayam vā api upayuñjīta sa pāpī narakam vrajet
haraye yad bhaktāḥ bhakti bhāvitāḥ
tad nāmnā pūjakān eva jānanti phala bhāginaḥ
sthira jaṅgamayoḥ pūjā yatas sampāditā bhavet
tasmāt bhagavataḥ nāmnā dattam yat deva mandire
vihāya ābharaṇa ādīni vāsāṃsi anya paricchadam
deva alaṅkāra yogyāni mūlyavanti viśeṣataḥ

original: arcakā eva gṛhṇīyuḥ pratibadhnīta netaraḥ // BhS_36.626 //
analyzed: arcakāḥ eva gṛhṇīyuḥ pratibadhnīta na itaraḥ
yaḥ tu adhīkāra garveṇa devāgāram upāśritaḥ

original: akāle sevituṃ cecchetso 'pi yāsyati durgatim // BhS_36.627 //
analyzed: akāle sevitum ca icchet saḥ api yāsyati durgatim

original: atha vā sevituṃ cecchetkāraṇenāpi kena cit /
analyzed: atha vā sevitum ca icchet kāraṇena api kena cit

original: ukteṣveva tu kāleṣu seveta matimānnaraḥ // BhS_36.628 //
analyzed: ukteṣu eva tu kāleṣu seveta matimān naraḥ
antya arcana avasāne yat kavāṭaḥ badhyate tatas
punar udghāṭanam yāvat pratyūṣe ca bhaviṣyati
tāvat nā eva harim sevet akālaḥ sa viśeṣataḥ
pratyūṣa ādi antya kāla anta pūjane api tu mantrataḥ
tad tad kāle kavāṭasya bandhane vihite api ca
na tadā tāvatī hāniḥ avabaddhe api amantrakam
atha ar'canā arha kāle pi bhaktānām sevanāya tu
akālāḥ bahavaḥ proktāḥ tathā yavasikā uditā
tasmāt akāla sevām tu vidhinā parivarjayet
viṣaya ākrānta cittānām viṣṇu arcanam akurvatām

original: karmabhūmau nṛṇāṃ janma karmāpi vibhalaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: karma bhūmau nṛṇām janma karma api vibhalam dhruvam

original: yo gurau mānuṣaṃ bhāvaṃ śilābhāvaṃ ca daivate // BhS_36.634 //
analyzed: yaḥ gurau mānuṣam bhāvam śilā bhāvam ca daivate
mantreṣu jīvikā abhāvam hiṃsā abhāvam makheṣu ca

original: pūjakeṣu ca pūjāyāṃ nīrasaṃ bhāvameti saḥ // BhS_36.635 //
analyzed: pūjakeṣu ca pūjāyām nīrasam bhāvam eti saḥ

original: sarvadhā ninditavyo hi jīvitaṃ tasya niṣphalam /
analyzed: sarvadhā ninditavyaḥ hi jīvitam tasya niṣphalam
kṣamā mantraḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣaṇa kṣamāmantravidhiṃ param // BhS_36.636 //
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣaṇa kṣamā mantra vidhim param

original: apacāreṣu sarveṣu yaṃ japtvā mucyate naraḥ /
analyzed: apacāreṣu sarveṣu yam japtvā mucyate naraḥ

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yena jānatā svavaśena saḥ // BhS_36.637 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yena jānatā sva vaśena saḥ
kṣamā mantra sahasrasya jāpena api na mucyate
kṣamā mantraḥ tu aśeṣa agha dhvaṃsana kṣamaḥ ucyate
nārāyaṇa namaḥ te astu namaḥ bhakta parāyaṇa

original: namo namo namaste 'stu namaste 'stu namo namaḥ // BhS_36.639 //
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ te astu namaḥ te astu namaḥ namaḥ
ajñānāt artha lobhāt vā rāgāt dveṣāt pramādataḥ

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.640 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
saṃdhyayoḥ ca divā rātrau jāgrat svapna suṣuptiṣu

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.641 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
kāyena manasā vācā sarvaiḥ vā api samuccitaiḥ

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.642 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
tiṣṭhatā ca eva śayyā āsana gatena ca

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.643 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama

original: snāsyatā japatā vāpi yajatā juhvatā mayā /
analyzed: snāsyatā japatā vā api yajatā juhvatā mayā

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.644 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
bhujatā dhyāyatā nūnam viṣayān upasevatā

original: aparādhāḥ kṛtā ye tān kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.645 //
analyzed: aparādhāḥ kṛtāḥ ye tān kṣamasva puruṣottama
mayā vā majjanaiḥ vā api mama bandhubhiḥ

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.646 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
rājñā vā tad amātyaiḥ vā rāja bhṛtyaiḥ atha api vā

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.647 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
ācāryeṇa ār'cakena api bhaktaiḥ vā a paricārakaiḥ

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.648 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
gāyakaiḥ nartakaiḥ vā atha vāditrāṇām ca vādakaiḥ

original: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.649 //
analyzed: aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yaḥ tam kṣamasva puruṣottama
praṇava ādi visarga antam kriyāsu vidhi pūrvakam
amantram arcane doṣam kṣamasva puruṣottama
kriyāsu vividhāsu ca
śraddhā lopa kṛtam doṣam kṣamasva puruṣottama
kaḥ śaknoti arcitum devam tvām anādi antam avyayam
tasmāt ajñāna caritam kṣamasva puruṣottama
prārthaye devadevam tvām prasīda bhagavat mayi

original: prasīdatu ram mahyaṃ tava vakṣaḥsthalālayā // BhS_36.653 //
analyzed: prasīdatu mahyam tava vakṣaḥsthala ālayā
iśānā jagataḥ devī mātā nityā anapāyinī
prasīdantu surāḥ sarve prasādāt yuvayoḥ mayi
svasti astu kṛpayā asmākam yuvayoḥ su prasannayoḥ
upacāra apadeśena kṛtān aharahar mayā
apacārān imān kṣamasva puruṣa uttama
iti vijñāpayet bhūyas bhakti sādhvasa bhāvitaḥ
tad arthanāt param prītaḥ prasīdati khagadhvajaḥ
kṣamā mantram imam deyāt na ca aśuśrūṣave kvacid

original: guhyādguhyatamo gopyassarvadā gurubhiḥ sadā iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sihitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
analyzed: guhyāt guhyatamaḥ gopyaḥ sarva dāḥ gurubhiḥ sadā iti śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām sihitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atha saptatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
tri yuga dharma prapañcaḥ
atha vakṣye laghu uktena yuga dharmān tatas param

original: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaśca kaliśceti caturyugam // BhS_37.1 //
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparaḥ ca kaliḥ ca iti caturyugam

original: kṛtameva ca kartavyaṃ tasmin kāle yadīpsitam /
analyzed: kṛtam eva ca kartavyam tasmin kāle yat īpsitam

original: na tatradharmāḥsīdanti na ca kṣīyantivai prajāḥ // BhS_37.2 //
analyzed: na tatra dharmāḥ sīdanti na ca kṣīyanti vai prajāḥ
tatas kṛta yugam proktam anvarthena guṇena vai
na tasmin yuga saṃsarge vyavāyaḥ na indriya kṣayaḥ

original: nānūyā nāpi ruditaṃ na darpo na ca paiśunam /
analyzed: na anūyā na api ruditam na darpaḥ na ca paiśunam

original: na vigraho na vidveṣona mithyā nāpi vañcanam // BhS_37.4 //
analyzed: na vigrahaḥ na vidveṣaḥ na mithyā na api vañcanam

original: na bhayaṃ na ca santāpo na lobho na ca mānitā /
analyzed: na bhayam na ca santāpaḥ na lobhaḥ na ca māni tā
tadā jyotiḥ param brahma vaikhānasam anāmayam
yā gatiḥ yoginām ekā hi apunarbhava kāṅkṣiṇām

original: viṣṇussarvātmako devaḥ śuklo nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_37.6 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ sarva ātmakaḥ devaḥ śuklaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
antaryāmiṇi tasmin tu sarva loka maye harau
svayam śukla tvam āpanne sarvam accham bhaviṣyati
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ca bhagavat parāḥ
sva karma niratāḥ sarve bhavanti manujāḥ kṛte
sama āśramam sama ācāram satya bhūtam tapaḥ ratam
vijñāna bharitam sarvam jagat bhavati santatam
eka veda samāyuktāḥ eka dharma vidhi kriyāḥ
pṛthak dharmāḥ tu eka vedāḥ dharmam ekam anuvratāḥ
catur āśrama yuḥ tena karmaṇā kāla yoginā
a kāma bhala saṃyogāḥ prāpnuvanti parām gatim
kṛte yuge catuṣpādaḥ cāturvarṇyasya śāśvataḥ
etat kṛta yugam nāma traiguṇya guṇa varjitam
tatas tretā yugam nāma yatra dharma strī pād bhavet

original: raktatāṃ tu samabhyeti harirnārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // BhS_37.13 //
analyzed: rakta tām tu samabhyeti hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
satya pravṛttāḥ ca narāḥ dāna dharma parāyaṇāḥ
yajante vividhaiḥ yajñaiḥ nārāyaṇam anāmayam
brāhmaṇa ādyāḥ svadharmeṣu pravartante nirantaram

original: yato dharmapade vṛddhā dvāparaṃ pratipedare // BhS_37.15 //
analyzed: yatas dharma pade vṛddhāḥ dvāparam pratipedare
yugam saṃśīna dharma tvāt dvāparam paricakṣate
viṣṇuḥ pīta tvam abhyeti vedaḥ ca api vibhajyate
dvipād bhavati vaidharmaḥ dvāpare samupasthite
dvi vedāḥ ca eka vedāḥ ca nirvedāḥ ca tathā pare
vibhinna śāstra niṣṭhāḥ ca bhavanti vividha kriyāḥ

original: prajā dānaparā bhūtvā dānaṃ śaṃsanti santatam // BhS_37.18 //
analyzed: prajāḥ dāna parāḥ bhūtvā dānam śaṃsanti santatam
rājasam bhāvam āśritya rājasī bhavati prajā
sattvāt pracyavamānānām vyādhayaḥ bhṛśa dāruṇāḥ
atyāhitāni ca anyāni bhaveṣyanti adharottaram
kālasya hrasva tā yogāt caturtham syāt yugam kaliḥ
pratyakṣa rūpa dhṛk devaḥ na kalau dṛśyate yatas
kṛta ādiṣu iva tena eva tri yugaḥ kaliḥ ucyate

original: padenaikena vai dharmaḥ pravarteta kalau yuge /
analyzed: padena ekena vai dharmaḥ pravarteta kalau yuge
tasmin tu samanuprāpte na dharmaḥ saṃpravartate
tāmasam yugam āsādya hariḥ kṛṣṇa tvam eti ca

original: yaḥ kaścidatra dharmātmā kriyoyogarato bhavet // BhS_37.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid atra dharma ātmā kriyaḥ yoga rataḥ bhavet
naram dharma param dṛṣṭvā sarve asūyām prakurvate
varṇa āśrama āśrita ācārāḥ praṇaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
vrata ācārāḥ praṇaśyanti dhyāna yajña ādayaḥ tathā
upadravāḥ janiṣyanti hi adharmasya pravartanāt
asūyā niratāḥ sarve daṃbha ācāra parāyaṇāḥ
prajāḥ ca alpa āyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
sarve dharmāḥ praṇaśyanti kṛṣṇe kṛṣma tvam āgate
yasmāt kaliḥ mahā ghoraḥ sarva pāpasya sādhakaḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ dharma parāṅmukhāḥ

original: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // BhS_37.28 //
analyzed: ghore kali yuge prāpte dvijāḥ veda parāṅmukhāḥ
vyāja dharma parāḥ sarve vṛdha ahaṅkāra dūṣitāḥ
sarvam ākṣipyate nityam naraiḥ paṇḍita mānibhiḥ
aham eva adhikaḥ iti sarvaḥ vivadate janaḥ
adharma lolupāḥ sarve tathā ca eva dvijātayaḥ
atas tu alpa āyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
alpa āyuḥ tvāt manuṣyāṇām na vidyā grahaṇam bhavet
vidyā grahaṇa śūnya tvāt adharmaḥ saṃpravartate
vyutkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvāḥ mriyante pāpa tarparāḥ
brāhmaṇa ādyāḥ tathā varṇāḥ saṃkīryante parasbaram
kāma krodha parāḥ mūḍhāḥ vṛdhā aham kāra pūritāḥ
baddhavairāḥ bhaviṣyanti paraspara vadha īpsavaḥ
janāḥ sarve dayā hīnāḥ dākṣiṇya parivarjitā
śūdra tulyāḥ bhaviṣyanti tapaḥ satya vivarjitāḥ

original: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // BhS_37.35 //
analyzed: uttamāḥ nīca tām yānti nīcāḥ ca uttama tām tathā
rājānaḥ dravya niratāḥ lobha moha parāyaṇāḥ
dharma kañcuka saṃvītāḥ dharma vidhvaṃsa kāriṇaḥ
yaḥ yaḥ aśva ratha nāga āḍhyaḥ sa sa rājā bhaviṣyati
kiṅkarāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti śūdrāṇām ca dvijātayaḥ
mlecchāḥ ca yunādyāḥ ca pālayanti vasuṃdharām
anāvṛṣṭi bhayāt prāyas gagana ādatta cakṣuṣaḥ
bhaviṣyanti narāḥ sarve sadā kṣudh bhaya kātarāḥ
kalau narāḥ abhaviṣyanti su alpabhāgyāḥ bahu prajāḥ
pati vākyam an ādṛtya sadā anya gṛha tatparāḥ

original: duśśīlā duṣṭaśīleṣu kariṣyanti spṛhāṃ striyaḥ // BhS_37.40 //
analyzed: duśśīlāḥ duṣṭa śīleṣu kariṣyanti spṛhām striyaḥ
paruṣa anṛta bhāṣiṇyaḥ deha saṃskāra varjitāḥ

original: vācālāśca bhaviṣyantikalau prāpte sadā striyaḥ // BhS_37.41 //
analyzed: vācālāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpte sadā striyaḥ
nagareṣu ca grāmeṣu prākāra aṭṭa ādikān janāḥ
cora ādi bhaya bhītāḥ ca kāṣṭha yantrāṇi kurvate
durbhikṣa kara pīḍābhiḥ atīva upadrutāḥ janāḥ
godhūma anna yava anna āḍhyān deśān prāpsyanti duḥkhitāḥ
sva kārya siddhi paryantam snihyanti anyeṣu mānavāḥ
bhikṣavaḥ ca api mitra ādi sneha saṃbandha yantritāḥ
anna upādhi nimittena śiṣyān gṛhṇanti sarvatas
ubhābhyām api hastābhyām śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanam striyaḥ
kurvantyaḥ bhartṛ mukhyānām ājñām bhetsyanti an ādṛtāḥ
pāṣaṇḍa ālāpa niratāḥ pāṣaṇḍi jana saṃginaḥ
bhaviṣyanti yadā viprāḥ stadā vṛddhim iyāt kaliḥ
alpa udakāḥ tathā meghāḥ alpa sasyā vasuṃdharā
alpa kṣīrāḥ tathā gāvaḥ kṣīrāt sarpiḥ na jāyate

original: ekavarṇā bhaviṣyanti varṇāścatvāra eva ca // BhS_37.48 //
analyzed: eka varṇāḥ bhaviṣyanti varṇāḥ catvāraḥ eva ca
na asti varṇa antaram tatra layam yāsyanti mānavāḥ
santaḥ sīdanti asantaḥ ca vilasanti samantataḥ

original: maitrī parajane bhūyādvairaṃ ca svajane bhavet /
analyzed: maitrī para jane bhūyāt vairam ca sva jane bhavet

original: putrāḥ pitṛṣu jīvatsu mriyante ca tadagrataḥ // BhS_37.50 //
analyzed: putrāḥ pitṛṣu jīvatsu mriyante ca tad agratas
kalau kākiṇike api arthe vigṛhya tyakta sauhṛdāḥ

original: tyakṣyantihi priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti svabāndhavān // BhS_37.51 //
analyzed: tyakṣyanti hi priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti sva bāndhavān
pāṣaṇḍa pracure dharme dasyu prāyeṣu rājasu
caurya anṛta vṛdha ahiṃsā na anāvṛttiṣu vai nṛṣu
śūdra prāyeṣu varṇeṣu chāga prāyeṣu goṣu ca
kariṣyanti tathā śūdrāḥ pravrajyā liṅginau adhamāḥ
kāṣāya parinītāḥ ca jaṭilāḥ bhakma dhūsarāḥ
aśauca avakra matayaḥ para pāka anna jīvinaḥ
deva dvija nivāseṣu pūjām icchanti pāpinaḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti durātmānaḥ śūdrāḥ pravrajitās tathā // BhS_37.55 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti durātmānaḥ śūdrāḥ pravrajitāḥ tathā
utkoca jīvinaḥ tatra mahā pāpa ratāḥ tathā
bhaviṣyanti atha pāṣaṇḍāḥ kāpālāḥ bhikṣavaḥ dhamāḥ
dharma vidhvaṃsa śīlānām dvijanām rāja vallabhāḥ
śūdrāḥ dharmān pravakṣyanti pravrajyā liṅginaḥ adhamāḥ
gīta vādya parāḥ viprāḥ veda vāda parāṅmukhāḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpte śūdramārga pravartinaḥ // BhS_37.58 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpte śūdramārga pravartinaḥ

original: hartāro na ca dātārobhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
analyzed: hartāraḥ na ca dātāraḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
viśvāsa hīnāḥ piśunāḥ veda deva dvijātiṣu
kti vaktāraḥ rāga dveṣa parāḥ tathā
parama āyuḥ ca teṣām syāt tadā varṣāṇi ṣoḍaśa
pañcame vā varṣe kanyā prasūyate
prasūyante tathā narāḥ
sva karma tyāginaḥ sarve kṛtaghnāḥ bhinna vṛttayaḥ

original: yācakāḥ piśunāścaiva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // BhS_37.62 //
analyzed: yācakāḥ piśunāḥ ca eva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
para avamāna niratāḥ ātma stuti parāyaṇāḥ
para sva haraṇa upāya cintakāḥ sarvadā narāḥ
nindām kurvanti satatam pitṛ mātṛ kuleṣu tu

original: vadanti vācā dharmāṃśca cetasā pāpalolupāḥ // BhS_37.64 //
analyzed: vadanti vācā dharmān ca cetasā pāpa lolupāḥ
chādayanti prayatnena sva doṣam pāpa karma jam
apāpe duṣkṛtam samyak vivṛṇvanti nara adhamāḥ
dharma mārga pravaktāram tiraskurvanti pāpinaḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpti rājāno mlecchajātayaḥ // BhS_37.66 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti kalau rājānaḥ mleccha jātayaḥ
dvijāḥ ca kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ca anyāḥ ca jātayaḥ
atyanta kāminaḥ sarve saṃkīryante parasparam

original: na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro na tathā pitā /
analyzed: na śiṣyaḥ na guruḥ kaścid na putraḥ na tathā pitā

original: na bhāryā na patistatra bhavitā sarvasaṃkaraḥ // BhS_37.68 //
analyzed: na bhāryā na patiḥ tatra bhavitā sarva saṃkaraḥ

original: kalau ca te bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
analyzed: kalau ca te bhaviṣyanti dhana āḍhyāḥ api yācakāḥ
rasa vikrayiṇaḥ ca api bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
dharmapatnīṣu yacchanti patayaḥ jāra lakṣaṇam

original: dviṣyanti pitaraṃ putrā guruṃ śiṣyādviṣanti ca // BhS_37.70 //
analyzed: dviṣyanti pitaram putrāḥ gurum śiṣyāḥ dviṣanti ca

original: patiṃ ca vanitā dveṣṭi kalau prāptena saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: patim ca vanitā dveṣṭi kalau prāptena saṃśayaḥ
lobha abhibhūta manasaḥ sarve duṣkarma śālinaḥ
para anna lolupāḥ nityam bhaviṣyanti dvijātayaḥ
para strī niratāḥ sarve para dravya parāyaṇāḥ
martya āmiṣeṇa jīvanti duhantaḥ ca api ajāvikān
sarit tīreṣu kuddālaiḥ opayiṣyanti ca oṣadhīḥ
ati alpāni phalāni āsām bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
veśyā lāvaṇya śīleṣu spṛhām kurvanti yoṣitaḥ
dharma vighnāḥ bhaviṣyanti striyaḥ ca puruṣeṣu ca

original: na kanyāṃ yācate kaścinna ca kanyāprado naraḥ // BhS_37.75 //
analyzed: na kanyām yācate kaścid na ca kanyā pradaḥ naraḥ
kanyāḥ varān ca chandena parasparam

original: prāyaśaḥ kṛpaṇānāṃ ca bandhūnāṃ ca tadhā dvijāḥ // BhS_37.76 //
analyzed: prāyaśas kṛpaṇānām ca bandhūnām ca tadhā dvijāḥ
sādhūnām vividhānām ca vittāni apaharanti ca

original: na yakṣyanti na hoṣyantina tapasyanti vai janāḥ // BhS_37.77 //
analyzed: na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti na tapasyanti vai janāḥ

original: naiva dāsyanti dānādi nār'cayiṣyanti vā harim /
analyzed: na eva dāsyanti dāna ādi na ār'cayiṣyanti vā harim
na dharme niviśiṣyanti hetuvāda kathā āśrayāḥ

original: apātreṣveva dānāni kurvanti ca tathā narāḥ /
analyzed: apātreṣu eva dānāni kurvanti ca tathā narāḥ
kṣīra upādhi nimittena goṣu prītim prakurvate

original: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snāna śauca ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
akāla karma niratāḥ kūṭa yukti viśāradāḥ
deva nindā parāḥ ca eva vipra nindā parāḥ tathā
tyakta puṇḍra śikhā sūtrāḥ cariṣyanti dvijātayaḥ

original: viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ na syānmanaḥ kasyāpi jātu cit /
analyzed: viṣṇu bhakti param na syāt manaḥ kasya api jātu cit

original: devapūjāparaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve parihasanti ca // BhS_37.82 //
analyzed: deva pūjā param dṛṣṭvā sarve parihasanti ca
śāstra uditāḥ ca ye devāḥ parivārāḥ madhudviṣaḥ

original: tān parityajya mohena narāḥ kālabalātkṛtāḥ // BhS_37.83 //
analyzed: tān parityajya mohena narāḥ kāla balātkṛtāḥ
hetuvāda parān devān kariṣyanti aparām stadā
nirbadhnanti dvijān eva kara artham rāja kiṅkarāḥ
na ādriyante dvijān anye kalau pāpa samākule

original: dānayajña japādīnāṃ vikrīṇante phalaṃ dvijāḥ // BhS_37.85 //
analyzed: dāna yajña japa ādīnām vikrīṇante phalam dvijāḥ
pratigraham ca kurvante caṇḍāla ādeḥ api dvijāḥ
śūdra strīm aṅga niratāḥ vidhavā saṃga lolupāḥ
rajassvalānām voḍhāraḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge

original: śūdrānna pānaniratāḥ śūdraprāyā bhavanti ca // BhS_37.87 //
analyzed: śūdra anna pāna niratāḥ śūdra prāyāḥ bhavanti ca
aṭṭa śūlā janapadāḥ śiva śūlāḥ catuṣpathāḥ

original: pramadāḥ keśaśūlinyo bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // BhS_37.88 //
analyzed: pramadāḥ keśa śūlinyaḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge
kuhakāḥ ca janāḥ tatra hetuvāda viśāradāḥ
pāṣaṇḍinaḥ bhaviṣyanti tiṣṭanti āśrama nindakāḥ
na ca dvijāti śuśrūṣām sarva dharma nivartinīm
gṛha prāyeṣu āśrameṣu yogi prāyeṣu bandhuṣu
tatas chānudinam dharmaḥ satyam śaucam dayā kṣamā

original: kālena balinā sarvaṃ naśyatyāyurbalaṃ smṛtiḥ // BhS_37.91 //
analyzed: kālena balinā sarvam naśyati āyuḥ balam smṛtiḥ
vīttam eva kalau nṝṇām janma ācāra guṇa udayam
dāṃpatye abhiruciḥ hetuḥ māyā eva vyavahārake
dharma nyāya vyavasthānām kāraṇam balam eva hi
strī tvam eva upabhoge svādu pra tve sūtram eva hi
liṅgam eva āśrama khyātau anyāyaḥ vṛtti kāraṇam

original: avṛttau cāpi daurbalyaṃ pāṇḍitye cāphalaṃ vacaḥ // BhS_37.94 //
analyzed: avṛttau ca api daurbalyam pāṇḍitye ca aphalam vacaḥ
svīkāre eva ca udvāhe snānam eva aśucau smṛtam
udaraṃbharitā svārthe satya tve dhārṣṭyam eva hi
dākṣye kuṭuṃba bharaṇe yaśaḥ ṛthe dharma sevanam

original: itthaṃ kaliyuge prāpte dharmassarvo 'pi jīryate // BhS_37.96 //
analyzed: ittham kali yuge prāpte dharmaḥ sarvaḥ api jīryate

original: yadā māyānṛtaṃ tandrā nidrā hiṃsā viṣāyanam /
analyzed: yadā māyā anṛtam tandrā nidrā hiṃsā viṣāyanam

original: śoko moho bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistāmasaḥsmṛtaḥ // BhS_37.97 //
analyzed: śokaḥ mohaḥ bhayam dainyam sa kaliḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ
yadā yadā satām hāniḥ vaidikānām dvijanmanām
tadā tadā kaliṃprāptam avabuddhyeta paṇḍitaḥ
aho duḥkha mahat duḥkha mahat duḥkham aho mahat
sva rūpam ati bhīmasya saṃsārasya su durbharam
viṣ mūtra pūya kalite garbha vāse nipīḍanāt
aśucau ati bhībhatse duḥkham atyanta dussaham
duḥkham ca jāyamānānām gātra bhaṅga ādi pīḍane
vātena preryamāṇānām mūrchanāya ati bhīti dam
bālake nirvivekānām bhūta daiva ātma saṃbhavam

original: yauvane vārdhake caiva maraṇe cāti dāruṇe // BhS_37.102 //
analyzed: yauvane vārdhake ca eva maraṇe ca ati dāruṇe
eka auttaram mṛtyu śatam dehe jñeyam pratiṣṭhitam
tatra ekaḥ kāla saṃjñaḥ syāt śeṣāḥ tu āgantukāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ye cātrāgantukāḥ proktāste tu śāmyanti bheṣajaiḥ /
analyzed: ye ca atra āgantukāḥ proktāḥ te tu śāmyanti bheṣajaiḥ
japa homa pradānaiḥ ca kāla mṛtyuḥ na śāmyati
vividhāḥ vyādhayaḥ śastram sarpa ādyāḥ prāṇinaḥ tathā
viṣāṇi ca abhicārāḥ ca mṛtyoḥ dvārāṇi dehinām

original: nauṣadhaṃ na tapo dānaṃ na mantrāna ca bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: na auṣadham na tapaḥ dānam na ca bāndhavāḥ
śaknuvanti naram trātum kāla mṛtyu prapīḍitam
rasāyana tapaḥ japya yoga siddhaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
kāla mṛtyuḥ api prāptaḥ jīyate analasaiḥ naraiḥ

original: nāsti mṛtyusamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti mṛtyusamaṃ bhayam /
analyzed: na asti mṛtyu samam duḥkham na asti mṛtyu samam bhayam
sat bhāryām putra mitrāṇi rājya aiśvarya sukhāni ca
ābaddhāni ca vairāṇi mṛtyuḥ sarvam vināśayet

original: yadduḥkhaṃ maraṇe jantorna tasyeha samaṃ kvacit // BhS_37.109 //
analyzed: yat duḥkham maraṇe jantoḥ na tasya iha samam kvacid

original: maṇḍūka iva sarpeṇa grasyate mṛtyunā jagat /
analyzed: maṇḍūkaḥ iva sarpeṇa grasyate mṛtyunā jagat
bāndhavaiḥ ca pariṣvaktaḥ priyaiḥ ca parivāritaḥ
niśśvapan dīrgham uṣṇam ca mukhena pariśuṣyatā
caturṣu anteṣu khaṭvāyāḥ parivṛtya mūhur muhur
sammūḍhaḥ kṣipate atyardham hasta pādam itas tatas

original: khaṭvāyā vāñchate bhūmiṃ bhūmeḥ khaṭvāṃ tato mahīm // BhS_37.112 //
analyzed: khaṭvāyāḥ vāñchate bhūmim bhūmeḥ khaṭvām tatas mahīm
vivastraḥ tyakta lajjaḥ ca mūtra viṣṭhā pariplutaḥ
yācamānaḥ ca salilam śuṣka kaṇṭha āsya tālukaḥ
cintayānaḥ ca vittāni kasya etāni mṛte mayi

original: nakhāgraiśca spṛśan bhūmiṃ kālapāśena karṣitaḥ // BhS_37.114 //
analyzed: nakha agraiḥ ca spṛśan bhūmim kāla pāśena karṣitaḥ
mriyate paśyatām eva gale khurakhurāyate
jīvaḥ tṛṇa jalūkā vat dehāt deham viśet asau
saṃprāpya uttara vaṃśe ca tanum tyajati paurvikīm

original: dehabhedena yaḥ puṃsāṃ viyogaḥ karmasaṃkṣayāt // BhS_37.116 //
analyzed: dehabhedena yaḥ puṃsām viyogaḥ karma saṃkṣayāt
maraṇam tat vinirdiṣṭam na nāśaḥ paramārthataḥ

original: jāyate mriyate caivaṃ karmabhiḥ svayamārjitaiḥ // BhS_37.117 //
analyzed: jāyate mriyate ca evam karmabhiḥ svayam arjitaiḥ
śīta uṣṇa tṛṣṇā kṣudra ugra jvara ādi parivāritaḥ
sarva daiva pumān āste yāvat janma anta saṃsthitiḥ
duḥkha atiśaya bhūtam hi yat ante na asukham nṛṇām
tasya upamānam na eva asti kāryeṇa eva anu mīyate
kṛṣyamāṇasya puruṣaiḥ yat yamasya ati dussaham

original: duḥkhaṃ tatsaṃsmṛtiṃ prāptaṃ karoti mama vepathum // BhS_37.120 //
analyzed: duḥkham tat saṃsmṛtim prāptam karoti mama vepathum
tatas ca eva punar tasya yoni saṃkramaṇe ca yat
garbha sthasya ca yat duḥkham ati dussaham ulbaṇam
punar ca jāyamānasya bālya yauvana jam ca yat
duḥkhāni etāni anantāni saṃsāra antara vartibhiḥ
puruṣaiḥ anubhūyante sukha bhrānti vimohitaiḥ
na vai sukha kalā kācid atra asti atyanta duḥkha de
saṃsāra saṃkaṭe saṃgam upetānām kadā cana
viṣaya āsakta manasaḥ satatam pāmarāḥ janāḥ
na matim kurvate viṣṇau sarva loka īśvara īśvare

original: athāpi nātra bibhyanti vaiṣṇavā bhagavatpriyāḥ // BhS_37.125 //
analyzed: athā api nā atra bibhyanti vaiṣṇavāḥ bhagavat priyāḥ
viṣṇu dhyāna parāḥ santaḥ viṣu arcana parāyaṇāḥ

original: te viṣṇusadṛśā jñeyā na hi tān bādhate kaliḥ // BhS_37.126 //
analyzed: te viṣṇu sadṛśāḥ jñeyāḥ na hi tān bādhate kaliḥ
māyā iyam vaiṣṇavī bhūyas pātayet prāṇinaḥ tadā
dustarā api bhavet sādhyā yaiḥ nyastam mādhavemanaḥ
a saṃtyajya ca gārhasthyam a taptvā ca tathā tapaḥ

original: chinatti vaiṣṇavīṃ māyāṃ keśavārādhane rataḥ // BhS_37.128 //
analyzed: chinatti vaiṣṇavīm māyām keśava ārādhane rataḥ
viṣayān avirodhena sevamānaḥ api mādhavam
arcayānaḥ taranti enām viṣṇu māyām duratyayām
yatas evam atas labdhvā aśarīram karma sādhanam

original: śubhaṃ karmaiva kartadyaṃ tatprasādāya mānavaiḥ, // BhS_37.130 //
analyzed: śubham karma eva kartadyam tat prasādāya mānavaiḥ
prasādite asmin sarveṣām sva varṇa āśrama karmabhiḥ
sarve hasta gatāḥ kāmāḥ muktiḥ ca ante kara sthitā
kārya arthāḥ mūrtayaḥ tasya loka kalyāṇa kārakāḥ
atas sa ākāram eva iṣṭvā bhaktyā imam siddhim āpnuyāt
idam ca śāstram ālaṃbya pūjayet viṣṇum avyayam

original: yaddhyānaṃ kevalaṃ proktaṃ śāstre kvacidanāśrayam // BhS_37.133 //
analyzed: yat dhyānam kevalam proktam śāstre kvacid anāśrayam
na tatra indriya daurbalyāt karma sthasya adhikāri tā
yathā giri taṭa agra stha vanaspati phala icchayā
upāye vartate aśrāntaḥ tathā asau yatnam ācaret

original: sarvatra kramavān yatnaḥkāryo naicchaiva kevalā // BhS_37.135 //
analyzed: sarvatra kramavān yatnaḥ kāryaḥ na aicchā eva kevalā
tad kāya vāc manaḥ yogaiḥ kramāt icchet parām gatim

original: nirākāretu yā bhaktyā pūjeṣṭā dhyānameva vā // BhS_37.136 //
analyzed: nirākārā tu yā bhaktyā pūjā iṣṭā dhyānam eva vā
ramaṇīyam iva ābhāti tat anarthasya kāraṇam
sthūla bhāva prasaṃdīni janmanā asya indriyāṇi tu
sūkṣmāt śa na prapadyante cirāt ca kim uta acirāt

original: na ca rūpaṃ vinā dovo dhyātuṃ kenāpi śakyate // BhS_37.138 //
analyzed: na ca rūpam vinā dovaḥ dhyātum kena api śakyate
sarva rūpa nivṛttā hi buddhiḥ kutra asya tiṣṭhati
nivṛttā āglāyate buddhiḥ nidrayā hi parīyate
tasmāt vidvān upāsīta buddhyā sākālam eva tam
asti tasya parokṣam tat iti kiñcid anusmaret
sarva dhākāram uddiṣṭam na parityajya paṇḍitaḥ

original: paraṃ devamupāsīta muktaye vā phalāyavā // BhS_37.141 //
analyzed: param devam upāsīta muktaye vā phalāya vā
bhaktyā a kṛtena arcanena tuṣṭaḥ devaḥ prajāpateḥ
pūjā ādi anugrahāyai ādau āvirbhūtaḥ caturbhujaḥ
tasmāt tena eva rūpeṇa hriyā lakṣmyā samāyutaḥ
dhyeyaḥ sevyaḥ acaniyaḥ ca sadā nārāyaṇaḥ budhaiḥ

original: sākāre 'smin kṛtā pūjā stutirvā dhyānameva vā /
analyzed: sa ākāre asmin kṛtā pūjā stutiḥ vā dhyānam eva vā

original: vidhinā śāstradṛṣṭena tasminneva kṛtā bhavet // BhS_37.144 //
analyzed: vidhinā śāstra dṛṣṭena tasmin eva kṛtā bhavet
tat eva ārādhanam viṣṇoḥ avajñātam viśeṣataḥ
khyāpana artham kalau kaścid bhaviṣyati mahāmatiḥ
dharma glāniḥ adharmasya vṛddhiḥ yāvat bhaviṣyati
tau avbhartā mahā viṣṇuḥ sṛjati ātmānam ātmanā
śrīnivāse janāvāne śrīnivāsaḥ svayam hariḥ
śrīnivāsaḥ samākhyātaḥ bhūmau avatariṣyati
utpatsyamānaḥ eva asau bhrājamānaḥ sva tejasā

original: jagadāvaraṇaṃ krūraṃ tamaḥ puñjaṃ haniṣyati // BhS_37.148 //
analyzed: jagat āvaraṇam krūram tamaḥ puñjam haniṣyati
pañca hāyanaḥ eva atha prāpta sarva kalā ākulaḥ
saṃskṛtaḥ akhila saṃskāraiḥ brahmavarcasa sevitaḥ
sarva loka īśvaram devam śrīnivākam śriyaḥ patim
catur bhujam udāra aṅgam divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
śrīvatsa aṃkam mahā bāhum śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
kirīṭa mukuṭa upetam vara da abhaya cihnitam
vaikhānasaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ arcyamānam nirantaram
kṛta āspadam kali yuge tadīyam kula daivatam
arāyi kāṇa ityādyaiḥ śruti vākyaiḥ abhiṣṭutam
rayiḥ kakudmā ānitya ādyaiḥ mantraiḥ vaikhānasaiḥ paraiḥ
ijyamānam viśeṣeṇa vividhaiḥ pāramātmikaiḥ
kalyāṇa guṇa saṃpūrṇam divya maṅgala vigraham

original: svayaṃvyaktaṃ parañjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma parātparam // BhS_37.155 //
analyzed: svayam vyaktam paran jyotiḥ param brahma parātparam
vidhinā śāstra dṛṣṭena devam ārādhayiṣyati
prasāda su mukhaḥ devaḥ sva ātma bhūte śiśau svayam

original: avanamya ca mūrdhānaṃ gṛhīṣyati gale srajam /
analyzed: avanamya ca mūrdhānam gṛhīṣyati gale srajam
divyaiḥ prasannaiḥ grathitām kusumaiḥ tulasī dalaiḥ

original: svayaṃ sārdhaṃ kumāreṇa havīṃṣi ca bhujiṣyati /
analyzed: svayam sārdham kumāreṇa havīṃṣi ca bhujiṣyati
saṃtuṣṭena kumāreṇa prārthitaḥ karuṇā nidhiḥ
vaikhānasaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ upetaiḥ saha mandire
havīṃṣi aśiṣyati adhyakṣam kumāram sāntvayiṣyati
arcā avatāra mahātmyam lokebhyaḥ khyāpayiṣyati
sarvam tebhyaḥ kariṣyati
tathā sammānitaḥ premṇā śrīnivāsena sādaram
yajñaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ anyaiḥ yajñeśam saṃyajiṣyati
viśāle bahu saṃskāra saṃkule vasudhā tale

original: sthāpayiṣyati viṣṇvarcāṃ grāme grāme gṛhe gṛhe // BhS_37.162 //
analyzed: sthāpayiṣyati viṣṇu arcām grāme grāme gṛhe gṛhe

original: purāṇi ca janāvāsā gṛhāṇi gṛhiṇāṃ tathā /
analyzed: purāṇi ca jana āvāsāḥ gṛhāṇi gṛhiṇām tathā
mandiraiḥ indireśasya sundaraiḥ nati bhandhuraiḥ
maṇḍitāni bhaviṣyanti jagat tattvam bhajiṣyati
itas ācārya nirdeśaḥ itas śiṣya upasarpaṇam

original: ihaiva gṛhiṇāṃ bhūyaḥ prasaṃga iha mantraṇam /
analyzed: iha eva gṛhiṇām bhūyaḥ prasaṃgaḥ iha mantraṇam
acārya varaṇam ca iha śilpinām iha mārgaṇam
iha prastara saṃgrāhaḥ iha dāru grahaḥ tathā
iha diś sāthanam ca eha vasudhā saṃparīkṣaṇam
itas maṅgala ghoṣaḥ ca itas puṇyāha vācanam
itas ādya iṣṭakā nyāsaḥ itas mūrdheṣṭakā vidhiḥ
itas śūlagrahaḥ ca itas itas vairajjubandhanam
itas ca mṛtsnā saṃskāraḥ itas varṇa vilekhanam
itas madhūcchiṣṭa vidhiḥ itas alaṅkāra kalpanam
itas dhvajasya nirmāṇam itas bhakta samāgamaḥ
itas pratiṣṭhā saṃkalpa na atas nayana mokṣaṇam
itas adhivāsanam prabhūta bali dāpanam
itas agni manthanam ca itas homaḥ ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: iha gītaṃ nṛttamiha vādyaṃ śrutimanoharam // BhS_37.171 //
analyzed: iha gītam nṛttam iha vādyam śruti manoharam

original: iha pratiṣṭhā devasya iha ca dvijabhojanam /
analyzed: iha pratiṣṭhā devasya iha ca dvijabhojanam
iha kāla utsavaḥ ca iha dhanuṣi prātar utsavaḥ
mudga annasya guḍa annasya prasādasya nivedanam
adyā uttiṣṭhati vaikuṇṭhaḥ śayitaḥ kṣīrasāgare
adya vratasya apavargaḥ saṃśitaḥ sa bhuvaḥ hareḥ
adya vaivāhikam devyā vrata ante loka maṅgalam
adya pauṣī pūrṇimā ahoca adya ca ekādaśī śubhā

original: adya devasya kuryanti snapanaṃ kalaśaiśśataiḥ // BhS_37.175 //
analyzed: adya devasya kuryanti snapanam kalaśaiḥ śataiḥ
adya dāśarathiḥ jātaḥ dvādaśī māgha saṃbhavā

original: adya cātā jaganmātā phālgune revatī tithau // BhS_37.176 //
analyzed: adya cātā jaganmātā phālgune revatī tithau
adya kurvanti devasya damana utsavam īśvarāḥ
devasya mahā prīti karaḥ kila
kurvanti manuja adhīśāḥ vasante divyam utsavam
jala krīḍā utsavaḥ hi adya caitra yātrā hareḥ kvacid

original: gandhotsavo 'dya kriyate paurṇamāsī kadā dinam // BhS_37.179 //
analyzed: gandha utsavaḥ adya kriyate paurṇamāsī kadā dinam

original: kadā caikādaśī puṇyā kadā vā dvādaśītidhiḥ /
analyzed: kadā ca ekādaśī puṇyā kadā vā dvādaśī itidhiḥ
kadā nṛsiṃhaḥ saṃjātaḥ smṛta madya trayodaśī
vaiśākhe śukla pakṣe tu kriyate vārṣika utsavaḥ
kadā bhavet paurṇamāsī kriyate candrikā utsavaḥ

original: kadā jyeṣṭhotsavo bhūyātkadā vā pūrṇimā śubhā /
analyzed: kadā jyeṣṭha utsavaḥ bhūyāt kadā vā pūrṇimā śubhā

original: prapotsavaḥ kadā bhūyādāṣāḍhī ca bhaviṣyati // BhS_37.182 //
analyzed: prapā utsavaḥ kadā bhūyāt āṣāḍhī ca bhaviṣyati

original: kadā ca śravaṇaṃ bhūyānnakṣatraṃ yatra mārutiḥ /
analyzed: kadā ca śravaṇam bhūyāt nakṣatram yatra mārutiḥ
rāma sevā dhuram dhṛtvā jātaḥ sākṣāt mahāmatiḥ

original: kadā ca śrāvaṇī bhūyādyatra nārāyaṇo hariḥ /
analyzed: kadā ca śrāvaṇī bhūyāt yatra nārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ
sva ātmānam janayāmāsa loka kalyāṇa hetave
vaikhānasam vikhanasam viriñcam iti yam viduḥ

original: kadā bhādrapado māsastatra caikādaśī bhavet // BhS_37.185 //
analyzed: kadā bhādrapadaḥ māsaḥ tatra ca ekādaśī bhavet
kadā vā dvādaśī bhūyāt sarva pāpa praṇāśinī

original: tiladhenuṃ pradāsyanti yatra devasya sannidhau // BhS_37.186 //
analyzed: tiladhenum pradāsyanti yatra devasya sannidhau
kadā āśvinaḥ bhavet māsaḥ tatra api daśamī śubhā
aśva yātrā hareḥ bhūyāt anuyāsyāmahe harim
kadā bhavet amāvāsyā yasyām sa naraka ūhataḥ

original: kadā vā kārtikomāso bhaviṣyati haripriyaḥ // BhS_37.188 //
analyzed: kadā vā kārtikaḥ māsaḥ bhaviṣyati haripriyaḥ

original: dīpāropo bhavettatra kadā vā kārtikī śubhā /
analyzed: dīpa āropaḥ bhavet tatra kadā vā kārtikī śubhā
kadā yuga ādayaḥ stadvat puṇya kālāḥ viśeṣataḥ
kadā bhaviṣyati hare ratha yātrā mahātmanaḥ

original: kadā vā gajayātrā syātkadā vīśādhirohaṇam // BhS_37.190 //
analyzed: kadā vā gaja yātrā syāt kadā vā īśa adhirohaṇam
kadā bhramati deveśaḥ grāma vīthiṣu sundaram
kadā labhiṣṭati hareḥ tīrtham parama pāvanam
kadā prasādam devasya kaṇasya api labhiṣyati
kadā śaṅkha rathāṅga ādi divya lāñchana lāñchitā
pādukāḥ devadevasya saṃskariṣyati me śiraḥ

original: kadā vā tulasīṃ puṇyāmarpitāṃ tasya pādayoḥ // BhS_37.193 //
analyzed: kadā vā tulasīm puṇyām arpitām tasya pādayoḥ
aśnāmi śirasā ca eva dhārayiṣyāmi vaiṣṇavīm
kadā vā puṇya puṣpāṇām ekam deva samarpitam
śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi jighrāmi bhahu gandhavat
devadevasya drakṣyāmi kadā sarva aṅga suṃdaram
ā pāda mauli paryantam lāvaṇya madhuram vapuḥ

original: ityādikāḥ kathāstatra bhaviṣyanti prajāsu ca // BhS_37.196 //
analyzed: ityādikāḥ kathāḥ tatra bhaviṣyanti prajāsu ca
sarve dharma parāḥ sarve nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ

original: arcane vāsudevasya bhaviṣyanti ratā narāḥ // BhS_37.197 //
analyzed: arcane vāsudevasya bhaviṣyanti ratāḥ narāḥ
iti eva kālam kāleyam guruḥ ujjīvayiṣyati
śrīnivāsam śriyovāsam arciṣyati ciram bhuvi
pāṣaṇḍa upaplutam dharmam uddhariṣyati vaiṣṇavam

original: idaṃ ca bhagavacchāstraṃ cirasthāyi kariṣyati // BhS_37.199 //
analyzed: idam ca bhagavat śāstram cira sthāyi kariṣyati
sarva tantra svatantraḥ asau bahūn grandhān praṇeṣyati
asaṃkhyebhyaḥ ca śiṣyebhyaḥ tatta artham upadekṣyati
dharma vyavasthām kṛtvā evam kalau ati bhayaṅkare

original: sameṣyati paraṃ sthānaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // BhS_37.201 //
analyzed: sameṣyati param sthānam tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam
yuga ante ca punar nāma hareḥ na ekaḥ gṛhīṣyati

original: tadā harirmahāvīraḥ kalkī nāma bhaviṣyati // BhS_37.202 //
analyzed: tadā hariḥ mahāvīraḥ kalkī nāma bhaviṣyati
adharma nidhanam kṛtvā dharmam saṃsthāpayiṣyati
hareḥ divya avatārāṇām avatāra kathām imām

original: yaḥ paṭhec chruṇuyādvāpi so 'pi yāsyati sadgatim /
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet śruṇuyāt vā api saḥ api yāsyati sat gatim
dhanyāḥ te puruṣa śreṣṭhāḥ durante bhava sāgare
ye nāma api kalau viṣṇoḥ smariṣyinti avyaya ātmavaḥ

original: dhyāyan kṛtayuge viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ dāpare yajan // BhS_37.205 //
analyzed: dhyāyan kṛta yuge viṣṇum tretāyām dāpare yajan
yat tat phalam avāpnoti kalau smaraṇa mātrataḥ
hareḥ harati pāpāni nāma saṃkīrtitam sakṛt
pāṣaṇḍa bahule loke kalau ati bhayaṅkare
tad nāma kīrtayet yaḥ tu tam vidyāt kṛtinām varam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
sa mūrta ārādhanam kuryāt na anyathā muktim āpnuyāt
nātham ādyaiḥ tu navabhiḥ adhyāyaiḥ īḍyate kramāt
bhū parīkṣā ādi karmāṇi vimānānām ca kalpanam
vividhānām ca berāṇām nirmāṇa vidhi vistaraḥ
daśame na aṃkura āropaḥ paścāt dvābhyām udīritaḥ
pratiṣṭhā vidhiḥ atyanta phala daḥ jagataḥ pateḥ
paścāt daśa avatārāṇām caturbhiḥ procyate vidhiḥ
tathā saptadaśe ca uktaḥ ādimūrti vidhiḥ tatas
aṣṭādaśeḥ acanam sa aṃgam uktam madhuvidāriṇaḥ
pūjā dravya saṃgrahaṇa kramaḥ
ekaviṃśe viśeṣa arcā vidhiḥ samyak udīritaḥ
dvāviṃśe snapanam ca uktam trayoviṃśe viśeṣataḥ
vidhiḥ utsava cakrasya proktaḥ dvābhyām atha utsavaḥ
tatas ca ṣaḍbhiḥ adhyāyaiḥ prāyaścittasya vistaraḥ
proktaḥ tatas ca dvātriṃśe saṃkīrṇa aṃśāḥ udīritāḥ
svayam vyakta ādi bhedaḥ ca catustriṃśe prakāśitaḥ
pañcatriṃśe tu saṃproktam kriyā yoga āśritam phalam
ṣaṭtriṃśe tu apacārāḥ ca kathitāḥ deva kopanāḥ
kali dharmāḥ ca saṃproktāḥ saptatriṃśe viśeṣataḥ
saptatriṃśadbhiḥ adhyāyaiḥ evam guru kṛpā balāt
ṣaḍbhiḥ sahasraiḥ ślokaiḥ tu kriyā aṅgam upavarṇitam

original: ityārṣe śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ caturviṃśatsahānrikāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti ārṣe śrī vaikhānase bhagavat śāstre bhṛgu proktāyām caturviṃśat sahānrikāyām sahitāyām prakīrṇa adhikāre saptatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
iti śrīmati prakīrṇa adhikāre kriyā pādaḥ

original: śrī vikhanasamahāgurave namaḥ śrautasmārtādikaṃ karma nikhilaṃ yena sūtritam tasmai samastavedārthavide vikhanase namaḥ.
analyzed: śrī vikhanasa mahā gurave namaḥ śrauta smārta ādikam karma nikhilam yena sūtritam tasmai samasta veda artha vide vikhanase namaḥ

original: jayatyātmeśvarosni dradhyāna saudhapriyātithiḥ śrīmatpatrapurīvāsaḥ śrīrāmassītayā gṛhī.
analyzed: jayati ātma īśvaraḥ usni saudha priya atithiḥ śrīmat patrapurī vāsaḥ śrī rāmaḥ sītayā gṛhī
śrī rāmacandrāya namaḥ
